1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba pu le pra be sha ma hA sU tra/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
1b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
2a1(rgyud 'bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na/ gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs
2a2(rgyud 'bum): te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
2a3(rgyud 'bum): bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la bar 'dong ngo / / btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan
2a4(rgyud 'bum): pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzir rgyu
2b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs
2b2(rgyud 'bum): so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs
2b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i grong khyer du song la phyi nas sgro'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su
2b4(rgyud 'bum): bcad pa 'di dag smros shig/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la
2b5(rgyud 'bum): thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad
3a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan
3a2(rgyud 'bum): thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas
3a3(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/
3a4(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po
3a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka'
3a6(rgyud 'bum): stsa la to/ / muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig/ yams kyi nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas
3b1(rgyud 'bum): lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang
3b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la
3b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirga ts+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/
3b4(rgyud 'bum): ni rgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod
3b5(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la'ang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' sprul pa/ su mu su mu su mu/ su mu ru su mu ru su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/
3b6(rgyud 'bum): susu rU/ su mu ru/ su mu mu/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ ri mi/ ri mi/ ri mi/ ri mi/ r-i mi/ ri ma/ r-i mi/ ri mi/ ri mi/ mu nu ri mi/ mu ru ri mi/ mu ru ri mi
3b7(rgyud 'bum): mi/ su / sa/ ma mi / / ma/ / sa/ sra ti/ ma/ dzi // ma ba ma ma tshor/ / ma/
4a1(rgyud 'bum): mArI ti/ mi ti/ sam+b+ha/ sam+ba/ kakar/ kAM kaR+Sha/ kr-ik+Shar/ ka ka ran+da/ kaMkAn+ta/ kr-ikan+tha/ kAn+ta/ n+dza/ kakan+tha/ kakaR+Sha/ kan+tha/ ka kaR+Sha/ kAkaH/ kaMkaR+Sha
4a2(rgyud 'bum): k+Shan+d+ha/ u0f7f// n+d+ha/ R+ShA/ 1/ #/ ti te / du du // / rnas /
4a3(rgyud 'bum): ri pu ri phu/ nA thA tha/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ri phu ri phu/ nirga ts+tsha te/ pA la ya ta/ ri pu ri phu/ ba la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/
4a4(rgyud 'bum): byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ gtang snyoms la gnas par gshegs kyis/ k+Shi phran ni ra gats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs kyis kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis/ lha thams
4a5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs ni
4a6(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa mi mnga' de/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston
4a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ / sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig
4b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par
4b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs
4b3(rgyud 'bum): don 'byor gyur cing / / don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dag
4b4(rgyud 'bum): de/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa dgra rnam drug g.yos gyur cig/ bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
4b5(rgyud 'bum): ba na/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de// khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pha ma mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang
4b6(rgyud 'bum): du mdzad pa de/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sprin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas
4b7(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams mthu dag dang / / lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs
5a1(rgyud 'bum): shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing // khyed cag kun tu bde/
5a2(rgyud 'bum): legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/
5a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed
5a4(rgyud 'bum): cag kun/ / bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa dang
5a5(rgyud 'bum): bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams/ / skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes
5a6(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so//
5a7(rgyud 'bum): bi sa rata/ bi sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa rata/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
5b1(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams/
5b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi
5b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/
5b4(rgyud 'bum): bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/
5b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas lha chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang /
5b6(rgyud 'bum): skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams sam/ lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang
5b7(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nirga ts+tsha ta/
6a1(rgyud 'bum): ni nats+tsha ta/ ninats+tsha ta/ nin ts+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan
6a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la'ang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu srema?
6a3(rgyud 'bum): su mu su mu suma? sA mraT/ sum+b+hanA/ swa rba / sa / suma?Hsra mu ru sramu ru/ nAR+Ya l+r-i/ muru/ mu ru/ wan+da/ mu ru/ mAT
6a4(rgyud 'bum): muru/ mur+ra/ mir/ ma ri/ mi ri/ mi ra/ ma/ mi ra/ mi ri/ mu ru 'i/ mu ru mi rI/ mu ru mi ri/ muru mr-i/ mu ru mir/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mra nu mi k
6a5(rgyud 'bum): aM ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ kaM ka tsa/ kaM gtsa/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kaM ka rA/ kaM kan+da/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM kan+da/ kaM ka nA/ kaM ka nA/ kaM ka R+Sha
6a6(rgyud 'bum): / dzin/ #// #
6b1(rgyud 'bum): nin ts+tshata/ ri phu ri pu/ ninats+tsha ta/ ba la ya ta/ ri pu ri phu/ pa la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa
6b2(rgyud 'bum): byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis/ k+Shi phran nir gats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid
6b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam 'joms
6b4(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med mdzad cing / / thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad
6b5(rgyud 'bum): ston pa de/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur//
6b6(rgyud 'bum): skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi//
6b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la// gsung
7a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub
7a2(rgyud 'bum): pa de/ khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad
7a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / byang chub snying por gang zhig gi/ sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags
7a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ / thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun
7a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du mdzad pa des/ / khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu
7a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/
7a7(rgyud 'bum): rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan ba de legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde lags shing //
7b1(rgyud 'bum): khyed cag rtag tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/
7b2(rgyud 'bum): snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig/
7b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig
7b4(rgyud 'bum): gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/
7b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
7b6(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya tsau ri bi d+hA na sna nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang
7b7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ril gshegs
8a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mi rgod phal po che zhig rgyang ma nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang skrag ste spu zing zhes byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
8a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das mi rgod dag cig go/ / bde bar gshegs pa mi rgod dag cig go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs
8a3(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gti mug chen po'i
8a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rab tu gzhom pa 'di bka' stsal to/ / tad+ya thA/ a nu le me pra ti lo me/ a nu lo ma pra ti lo ma/ a ti ke/ pra taM ke/ paM ke/ a ti pa ke/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ paN+Da li/ ma taM gi/ puk+ka si
8a5(rgyud 'bum): ri mi ri mi/ ran+ti/ matse baSh+Ti ti tso ra pra dan+ta/ bis+t+ra hAn+tu/ b+ha man+t+ra/ ma mi yan+tu/ ya bad dgran thin muny+tsa mi swAhA/ kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kun tu srung ba dang / mi rgod thams cad dang
8a6(rgyud 'bum): ri sul gyi grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang / gseb lam srung ba thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa thams cad kyi rkang pa bcing bar byas so// rmugs par byas so// rengs par byas so// ji ltar
8a7(rgyud 'bum): rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar/ mi rgod rnams 'dar bar gyur cig/ rengs par gyur cig/ mgo rmongs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
8b1(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// cho ga ni shing kun dang / bong bu'i spu bregs te/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal
8b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ / yang na gos kyi mtha' ma la bdud pa bor te bde bar phyin na dgrol bar bya'o// 'di ni grub pa'o// 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
8b3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an+ta ra saM grA sa d+hA ra Ni man+ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/
8b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su
8b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni dug dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pas za ba dang / mes tshig pa dang / chur 'chi ba
8b6(rgyud 'bum): dang 'go ba'i rims gzhan yang ba dang / mdze'i nad dang / gsor mi rung ba'i nad yang ba dang / g.yang la lhung ba dang / gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis brnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa
8b7(rgyud 'bum): dang de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni sa dang nam mkha' la gnas
9a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ / phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la las
9a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la hUM
9a3(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ sarba big+h+nAM an+ta rA ya bi nA sha ka ra mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na 'grub pa'o// nges par 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs
9a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog
9a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa ni byang chub
9a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na
9a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pas bcu pa 'ba' zhig dang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
9b1(rgyud 'bum): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za ma rungs pa dag gis mi nad dang /
9b2(rgyud 'bum): phyugs nad dang / yams nad dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / ser ba dang / sa g.yos pa
9b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa byung ste/ de dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sku'i ba spu'i khung bu
9b4(rgyud 'bum): nas 'od zer me lce rab tu 'bar ba byung ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la thug pa me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur to// de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lham me dang /
9b5(rgyud 'bum): lhan ne dang / lhang nge ma yin te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lham me dang / lhan ne dang / lhang nge ma yin no// klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams ni rlung drag pos 'das pa'i shing /
9b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ mnyam pa'i phyag rgya bshig nas zhabs kyi pus mo la brdabs pas thugs kyi bdag nyid
9b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi brtan pa'i sku can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa dag byung ste/ thabs las byung ba'i khro bo'i sprul pa dpag tu med pa dang bcas nas nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa'o// 'od kyi
10a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dag na bzhugs pa tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / drag po chen po bzhi po dag ha hUM hri/ zhes bya bas skrag par byed pa/ 'dod
10a2(rgyud 'bum): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / ser sna dag 'joms pa/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za yi dgas la sogs pa haM maM/ zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to//
10a3(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi bag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can zhabs phyed sa la pus mo dang mthe bong btsugs pa/ zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs pa'i khro bo brtan pa'i sku can/ shes rab kyi bdag nyid ral gri
10a4(rgyud 'bum): me 'od dang bcas pas 'od kyis bgengs pa dag sprul to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NA/ a tsa la ka na na tsaN+Da ma hA re
10a5(rgyud 'bum): Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM badz+ra d+h+ri ka khaD+ga hUM maM hUM maM/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgrengs pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas skor du
10a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams gcad do/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+rIN+Ta/ a tsa la kan na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ a mr-i ta hU~M n+tu/ zhes brjod do// phyag rgya ni lag pa sor mo rnams brkyang skye mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa ni
10a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas nas bskor la bgegs bskrad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung ba bsrungs pa ni dmar po'i yi ge raM spyi bor bsams te/
10b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag pa'i yi ge 'dis brtan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris lus me 'od dang bcas par sgom ste/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ka te b+h+yaHsarba bi ga te b+h+yoHbi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba
10b2(rgyud 'bum): tathA ga ta hAM maM rak+Sha/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni rdo rje thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar smin mtshams su bca' bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rig pa chen
10b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i srung ba bkrus pa ni hUM dang bzhi'i rnam pas bltas te/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NA~M/ a tsa la ka na tser+N+Na mahA ro Sha Na ka te b+h+yaHsarba bi ga te b+h+yo/ bi shA mu khai b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta hAM maM/ rak+Sha ma hA
10b4(rgyud 'bum): pa le sarba ta thA ga ta pra me nirga rdza hUM hUM phaT Ta tha Ta tha/ a pra ti ha te swAhA/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la gung mo rtse sprad de/ srin lag gnyis brkyang nas
10b5(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bkug la snying khar bcas te srung ba ni yum gyi ste/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / ma rungs pa thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'byer bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
10b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ kha zas kyi bye brag bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / gzhib pa dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa la sogs pa dang / gzugs
10b7(rgyud 'bum): dang sgra dang / dri dang / ro'i bye brag la byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad de/ oM sarba d+harma tA si ta hUM/ zhes byas pas dag par byas te/ oM a mr-i ta au hUM hrIH/ zhes bya bas ni 'dod
11a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i don du'o/ / oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ti sam+b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra hUM/ zhes bya bas lan bdun bdun btab ste bsngos pas tshim par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//
11a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ sdang bar 'dod na sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra pA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ a si
11a3(rgyud 'bum): mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hasta ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ gardza kardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA naM ma hA ga Na pa tidz+dzi
11a4(rgyud 'bum): bi ta an+ta ka ra Na swA hA/ zhes bya ba brjod do// lag pa gnyis khu tshu ra ba cang sa la kha nang du bstan te mdzub mo bsgreng la brang du bsnol la phyag rgya bcings te/ gtor ma gtang zhing 'chag pa'i dus su'ang de
11a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / nye reg bya ba dang khrus bya ba ni rin po che'i bum par dri zhim po'i chu la/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra tAM/ a tsa la ka na ya a mr-i ta/ zhes lan bdun bdun btab ste/ lag pa g.yon pas
11a6(rgyud 'bum): bum pa bzung nas g.yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la/ ri mo can gyi nang du a bsams la chu blugs te/ oM shud+d+ha dun+te sho d+ha nA ye swA hA/ zhes bya bas khrus bya'o// de skad
11a7(rgyud 'bum): ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la'o// de nas rgyal po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang
11b1(rgyud 'bum): 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang / rnga dang / bdug spos dang / lha'i zhal zas dang / lha'i bu pho dang
11b2(rgyud 'bum): bu mo dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shing rta dpag tu med pa dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang skor ba rgya chen po dag byas te/ byang chub
11b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' byams pa dang thabs cig tu 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spro ba dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la lta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam pa mkhyen
11b4(rgyud 'bum): nas bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par gzhag ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te dga' bar rtog pa tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan dang po nas gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtse gcig pa'i
11b5(rgyud 'bum): rtog dpyod spangs te dga' ba de tsam mo/ / bsam gtan gnyis pa nas gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs te bde ba tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan gsum pa nas bzhi
11b6(rgyud 'bum): pal mnyam par gzhag ste/ tshor ba nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba tsam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan na rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa dang
11b7(rgyud 'bum): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud spel ba'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar mtha' bzhi las rnam par grol ba'o// na maHsa man+ta
12a1(rgyud 'bum): badz+rA NA/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma koH/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni 'di'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo
12a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sgreng ba'o/ / 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas te/
12a3(rgyud 'bum): snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thugs kyi sa bon 'od kyis nam mkha' kun khengs par bsams te/ sa bon de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang
12a4(rgyud 'bum): 'grib pa'i sgra 'od zer 'phro ba sdu dang bcas pa'o/ / de nas sna tshogs pa'i gdan 'dam nas skyes pa'i dri ma med cing yongs su rgyas par tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng du rta bdun pa kun nas 'od 'phro ba/
12a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dam skyes dang ldan pa dag gi steng du nam mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyi sa bon dang bdag nyid gcig pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur
12a6(rgyud 'bum): de dag las bdud dang ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po/ rnam rtog thams cad yongs su bcom pa/ dri ma med cing gzhon nu'i sku'o// de'ang gzhon zhing sku'i sha rgyas
12a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni dper na bus pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa'i lus lta bu ste/ de'i sku mdog ni mthing nag tu gnas te/ dper na dbyar gyi char sprin nag po'i mdog bzhin du gnas pa'o// nam mkha' ma
12b1(rgyud 'bum): lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pa ni/ dper na rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no// dbu skra gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni/ dper na shing a la ka'i 'bras bu bzhin
12b2(rgyud 'bum): sku cung zhig 'gying ba dang g.yo ba ni/ dper na dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'dus brtol bzhin no// zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa ni/ dper na gyad kyi 'gro sa bzhin no// spyan
12b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum shin tu dmar ba ni/ dper na ba la sha'i me tog bzhin no// spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni steng 'og gi bgegs sreg pa ste/ dper na lha ma yin gyi bya gtor ma za ba bzhin no// mche ba gtsigs
12b4(rgyud 'bum): pab ni dper na zla ba phyed pa bzhin no/ / ljags shin tu 'khyug pa ni/ dper na nam mkha'i glog bzhin no// smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa ni dper na shing 'brig sha'i lo ma bzhin no//
12b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa ni// dper na gza' chen po'i 'od ltung ba bzhin no// sbrul gyi zhags pa g.yon na bsnams pa ni/ dper na rgya mtsho'i mching bzhin no// de lta bu'i sku des ni
12b6(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa rnams dbang du sdud pa/ lha dang / klu ma rungs pa dang / srin po dang / sha za dang
12b7(rgyud 'bum): grul bum dang / lto 'phye la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dag go// de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ namaHsa man+ta badz+rA NA~M traH/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta la hUM
13a1(rgyud 'bum): tra ma ya tra ma ya hUM/ tra ta haM maM zhes brjod par bya'o// des ni 'tshe ba dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / sdang ba dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / log 'dren
13a2(rgyud 'bum): dang rnam par log 'dren dang / srin po dang / lha dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las
13a3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa dang / bangad kan las gyur pa dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa
13a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / ldang dub pa dang / yud tsam pa'i rims dang / rtag pa'i rims las thar par 'gyur ro// seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / spyang ki dang /
13a5(rgyud 'bum): sbrul dug can dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / brang ba'i gnod pa las thar ro// rgyal po'i chad pa dang / dmag dpung gi 'jigs pa las thar ro// rkun po dang / bran dang / gza' mi 'thab
13a6(rgyud 'bum): cing rtsod pa las thar ro/ / chu yis 'jigs pa dang / me yis 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa las thar ro// ral gri dang / shak+ti dang / dgra sta
13a7(rgyud 'bum): dang mdung dang / mnga' dang / mda' bo che dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa las thar ro// 'chi ba dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar ro// mtshams med pa lnga
13b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i sdig pa kun dag par 'gyur ro/ / sems can dmyal ba dang yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yul mtha' 'khob dang / dbang po ma tshang ba/
13b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / g+ha tshe ring po dang / log par lta bar 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba las mnyes pa med pa dag tu mi 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/
13b3(rgyud 'bum): lan cig brjod pas kyang sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro// 'di brjod pa'i gang zag des ni chos nyid kyi lam rdo rje lta bur myur ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rta bdun pa'i steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi
13b4(rgyud 'bum): ge nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa bsams te/ byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir haM ser po mig tu'o// srog gi lam du ni mo nag po bsam par bya'o// spyi bor chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yi ge bsams
13b5(rgyud 'bum): tesngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+ra pA Ni tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha/ hU~M/ zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar te/ gung mo bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo cung zad bkug la/ srin lag kyang de bzhin du byas te/
13b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gser la sogs pa'i snod du kha zas kyi bye brag nas dang / 'bras dang / gro dang /
13b7(rgyud 'bum): so ba dang / til la sogs pa dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / mu tig dang / byu ru dag blugs te/ 'bru gsum pa'i
14a1(rgyud 'bum): @sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ / na maHsa man+ta ta thA ga te b+h+yoH/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM udag te/ s+pha ra Na i ma ga ga na khaM/ zhes brjod par bya'o//
14a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba le ki te/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ zhes bya bas 'byung po kun la mchod par bya'o// de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta
14a3(rgyud 'bum): ban+d+ha/ tsan ma b+ha ro la khams ma dris ma ma thus ma pa/ sarbathA pa swAH/ phyag rgyamal mo sbyar la gsol pa gad ba snyed ma tshig gso laso// 'phags pami ma so ba'i gzungs las le 'u na gnyis pa'o//
14a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas dam tshig ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun ni 'bras bu dang / lam dang / sgrub pa'i khyad par te/ gang nas brtsams te khyad par gyis mchod
14a5(rgyud 'bum): cing nam du'ang mi 'bral bar bya'o/ / tshad med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tu sgom zhing smon lam rgya chen por gdab par bya'o// sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i rten rgyun du
14a6(rgyud 'bum): bcang zhing bral bar mi bya'o/ / lha dang / bla ma dang / byang chub kyi grogs la khong nas 'khrug pa'i sems spang ngo // srog gis btus pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje sngon du song bas/
14a7(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa dang rnam par 'che ba spangs te nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// ser sna spangs te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// sems can la gnod pa dang rnam par 'che ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims brten pa'o/
14b1(rgyud 'bum): rang la rnam par 'tshe ba la bzod par bya'o// rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o// rnam par g.yeng ba spangs te bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go// nyal ba dang ldang ba kun tu rang bzhin
14b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis rnam par dag pa'i don la ma yengs par bya'o/ / dam tshig med cing mi gnas pa la bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa kun bstan cing bshad par mi bya'o//
14b3(rgyud 'bum): srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la phyin ci log pa dang / brdzun du smra ba ni tshangs par spyod pa dang spyad par 'dod pas spang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams dang / byang chub tu sems
14b4(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa dang / dam tshig dang ldan pa la gus par bya zhing brnyas par mi bya'o// thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o// khro ba dang / bab col du smra ba dang / lang lud dang / bshang gci 'dor
14b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dri ma 'khru ba dang / skra dang sen mo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang / dri nga ba dang / dri mi zhim pa dku zhing mnam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// khang pa ni spos kyi khang pa yid du 'ong ba
14b6(rgyud 'bum): gtsang zhing dri ma med pa dag bkra shis pa'i sgo shar du bstan pa/ gseng skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa 'am/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ lha khang ngam/ ri bo'i rtse 'am/
14b7(rgyud 'bum): bya skad sgrog pa'i sa 'am/ dgon pa'am/ bas mtha' 'am/ spang ljongs dag tu dri zhim po'i chus sbyang nul byas la/ rtswa'i stan bting ste gnas par bya'o// khri la 'dug pa spang bar bya'o// zho dang
15a1(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma dang / mar dang / la du dang / la ban dang / snum 'khur dang / 'khur skya dang / 'bras dang / 'bras zan la sogs pa dag bsang ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o//
15a2(rgyud 'bum): sha dang / chang dang / sgog pa la sogs pa dgu pa'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o// zla ba dang / skar ma dang / tshes grangs la sogs pa ni yar gyi ngo dag la dkon mchog la gsol ba btab la bsgrub
15a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / re ba dang / rnga ma dang / rtsub pa dag ni ma yin no// 'dod pa'i don du 'jam zhing gnag pa la ni 'gal ba med do// dus rtag tu yi dam la dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan
15a4(rgyud 'bum): pas bsgrub par bya'o/ / sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni kha dog shin tu gnag pa ste/ nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// rdo rje chags chen ni mdog dmar po/
15a5(rgyud 'bum): chags pa dang chags par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mda' gzhu'o// rdo rje rnon po ni ljang khu ste/ 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba ni mdog dmar po ste/ mi shes
15a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang mi shes pa 'joms pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'i brag 'dzin pa'o/ / rdo rje khro bo ni ser po ste/ khro ba dang khro ba'i bdag nyid kyi ral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa'o// rdo rje gtum chen ni mdog ljang nag ste
15a7(rgyud 'bum): btang snyoms dang btang snyoms su gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ / rdo rje thabs bdag ni du ba'i mdog can/ bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdza rnga bsnams pa'o// rdo rje stobs chen ni
15b1(rgyud 'bum): mthing ba ste/ dman pa dang dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rgyu'i stobs ni dmar nag ste/ rten 'brel dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi be con 'dzin
15b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rdo rje rab 'byed ni sna tshogs 'phrin las kyi mdog can/ mtha' dang mtha' las grol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o// de dag ni sa bcu'i bdag nyid can me 'bar ba'i sku las
15b3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'phro ba'o/ / 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la thun mong du de dag pa'i
15b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir de'i cho ga gsungs pa/ gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la maN+Dal mda' gang ba byas te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i skyang nul byas la/ me tog sngon po dgram par bya'o// de nas bum
15b5(rgyud 'bum): pa gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs las byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi tshad du byas te/ der rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / byu ru dang / mu tig dang / rnam pa lnga
15b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par bya'o/ / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram dang / kha ra dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar rnams gzhug par bya'o// nas dang / 'bras dang / so ba dang / til dang /
15b7(rgyud 'bum): gro dang / cu rtse rnams gzhug par bya'o// cu gang dang / gur kum dang / dzA ti dang / sug smel dang / ka ko la dang / li shi rnams gzhug par bya'o// tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang
16a1(rgyud 'bum): du ru ka dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos dang / ga pur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyang gzhug par bya'o// mtsho dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / 'bab chu dang
16a2(rgyud 'bum): yu ma bkod ma rnams kyi chu'ang blugs la/ ba la'am ras la dri'i chus bsang bas mgul ba bcings te gzhag par bya'o// dri dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing la kha rgyan
16a3(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ dri dang / spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / lha bshos dang / rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bsham par bya'o// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'ang cha
16a4(rgyud 'bum): bdun nam lnga la sogs par bya'o/ / na maHsa man+ta badz+rA d+h+waM/ a tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShaHsarba big+h+nAM s+pho Ta ya/ badz+ra d+h+r-i ka khaD+ga hUM/ zhes bya bas mtshams rnams bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin du
16a5(rgyud 'bum): srung ba'i cho ga rdzogs par bya ste/ bum pa la gzungs kyi thag pa btags nas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgyur ba'i bum pa la b+h+rUM zhes bya ba'i sa bon las kha dog dang tshad dang bla'i bum pa'o// thugs
16a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi sa bon las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das don de kho na nyid las mnyam par bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag dang bcas pa gad na seng ge'i
16a7(rgyud 'bum): steng na sna tshogs pa'i gdan pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/ / chos nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam pa drug gis bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya'o// chos nyid dang / sems dang / sems kyi rnam pa
16b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / sgra dang / sgra brnyan dang / gzugs dang / gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa'i skur nyi ma'i gdan pad+ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po glang sna'i steng du bsam ste/ thugs kyi sa bon las ral gri me 'od dang
16b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pas nam mkha' kun khebs pa'o/ / de las bdud tshar gcod pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsams te/ mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/
16b3(rgyud 'bum): oM AHhUM/ pra ba ra sa ta kA ra pra tIts+tsha hUM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ sarba de ba tA a tsin t+ya a mr-i ta d+ha ra ya swAhA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA
16b4(rgyud 'bum): oM ha ra b+ha ga bAn/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra pU dzi te swAhA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hAnA~M/ oM AHhUM/ d+harma d+hA tu a nu ga te d+hU pe hUM swAhA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hAn+tu
16b5(rgyud 'bum): / oM AHhUM/ ma hA me tri b+h+yog te puSh+pa hU~M/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM aHhUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta a tsi prA Na u b+hA ba ga ga ni b+h+ya ni b+h+ya nir+ya A lo ka hUM swAhA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// nam
16b6(rgyud 'bum): sa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM AHhUM/ ga ga na sa ma ya gan+d+he hUM swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a ha ra sarba ta thA ga te nai wi d+yai pU dza na s+pha ra Na ye hUM swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hAH
16b7(rgyud 'bum): a b+hi sma ra yi/ s+pha ra Na i ma ga ga na khaM/ d+harma d+hA tu A kA shA ya sa man+ta ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri shud+d+ha maN+Da le/ ma ma pra Ni d+hi pU dza na ma ba len d+harma d+hA tu/ oM d+hiSh+ThA na pa tsa hUM swAhA/ zhes brjod do// rdo rje dang dril
17a1(rgyud 'bum): bu gsil bar bya'o/ / thal mo bkan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu cung zhig bkug la sgyur/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnol la mthe bong cung zhig bkug pa ni yon chab kyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo
17a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams gung mo la brten te cung zad bkug nas gung mo bsgreng ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o/ / sor mo rnams phan tshun ba snol te nang du bcug nas mdzub mo mthe bos mnan pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dang gung mo'i sor mo
17a3(rgyud 'bum): rtse sprad de lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ / mi 'jigs pa'i phyag lag pa g.yon pas mkhrig ma bteg pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo bkan pa'i zur sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs nas bsgreng ba ni lha ba shos
17a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya'o/ / spyi bor lag pa bskor te thal mo khong stong sbyar nas dgrol ba ni rgya chen po'i mchod pa ste mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha mos rdzus sbyangs pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba mud ga
17a5(rgyud 'bum): tAnA~M/ na maHpro t+ye ka bud+d+ha ar+ya thA ba kAnA~M/ na mo bo d+hi satwA nA~M/ da sha nU mi pra tiSh+Thi ti sha ran+d+ra/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwAnA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha~M kha khA hi khA hi duSh+Ta swAhA/ kA ma kre a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA ga
17a6(rgyud 'bum): hastA ya/ tsa tud+d+hAdza/ tsa tu rbu la/ Sha rba tsa ra Na/ gats+tsha le ga ts+tsha la/ sarba bi/ b+hU tA bi kritAnAM/ sarbab+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra an+d+ra sA sa nin+ni ta byAm+ba tsam bas ni/ ku ru ku ru sarba d+harmA d+h+waM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ sarba man+t+ra/
17a7(rgyud 'bum): b+hi nIHba ma~Mr+tha/ a kar+tha la a kar+tha la/ nim ni mtha/ sarba duShA na~M bring sha la bri shas maN+Dal ma gyi sgribs rgya hrI ba ti/ kar kar kun ma rnamams rba ts+yai/ da ga sa/ btsa /
17b1(rgyud 'bum): rmya bi la ba/ sams/ a nusmar d+hun+tu/ s+pho Ta la s+pho Ta ya/ sarba 'a dz+ra pUr// se zlag pa na/ kits+tshin+d+ra pa si/ ma ma sa rba rba swA r+tha ya/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro k+Sha klo Ta bats+tsha/ ngas tramarnam
17b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs la/ las dang / rnam par smin pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang /
17b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'tshe ba dang / nad la sogs pa zhi bar dmigs te bzlas par bya'o// de nas gtong bar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshe gdams pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u bzhi pa'o
17b4(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ shing bal shin tu dri ma med pa la bram ze'am gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'i khrus byas te/ dkon mchog gsum la gsol ba
17b5(rgyud 'bum): btab la brtag par bya'o/ / rigs ngan dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i ras dag ni spang bar bya'o// ras de gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / a ka ru la sogs pa'i chus bkrus te dag par bya'o// de nas
17b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di grog 'am ras la bris nas gdags par bya'o/ / a A i sI u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e me mo oM a a/ ka khag d+hAng tsa tshadzadz+nyAH/ ku Da nA/ ta tha dad+ha na pa phab b+ha ma
17b7(rgyud 'bum): ya ra la wa/ shaSha sa hak+Sha/ zhes bya ba bris te dgod par bya'o// de nas sngags 'di la na bdun brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bun+d+han+da/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro raN/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tram dam/ oM shA
18a1(rgyud 'bum): daM na maHzhes bya ba las thams cad 'grub pa ste/ gur kum dang / tsan dan dang / gla rtsi'i chu la bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o// de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag par byas te/ bram ze'i
18a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyis bri bar bya'o/ / tshon ni gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / lcags rang gis bri bar bya ba 'am/ yang na dkar rtsi dang / mtshal dang / ldong ros dang / ba bla dang / spang ma dang / mthing shun
18a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgya skyegs dang / rdo sol dang / snag tsha dang / de la sogs pa'i tshon rnams ya a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dan dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos la sogs pa rnams dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan bdun
18a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod de bri bar bya'o/ / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra thA haM maM/ bAkye hUM/ oM aHbi ra hUM/ khe tsa ra maM/ zhes brjod la bri bar bya ste/ khyad par bzang po 'jom pa'i dus su tshul
18a5(rgyud 'bum): khrims dang ldan zhing dag pa la kha zas byin te spyan dbye bar bya'o/ / bri ba'ang de bzhin te/ spyan 'byed pa'i dus su sngags 'di brjod do// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra thA hi maM
18a6(rgyud 'bum): ga ga na ba rak+Sha Na/ ku ru Na ma ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsak+ShuHoM AHhUM swA hA/ zhes sbrang rtsig ser gyi zur ma la byugs la lan gsum du byug par bya'o// bris sku tshad dang ldan pa yongs su zin pa dang / 'dri mkhan la
18a7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par bya ste/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs sam/ rwa 'am/ rdo ba dag las byed na'ang de bzhin du bya'o// gzugs dang sku'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin dang / rang bzhin ma yin
18b1(rgyud 'bum): pas khyad par tha dad pa dag tu bya ste/ rang bzhin dang ldan pa la bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni yongs su bsgyur nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas khyad par bzang po'i dus su khang pa ba'i rnam lngas
18b2(rgyud 'bum): byug par byas te/ ras ris dang / thang ka dang / po ti dang / glegs ba ma la sogs pa maN+Dal gyi steng du bzhugs su gsol to// spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / dri dang / lha bshos la sogs
18b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa bshams te/ gtor ma'ang de bzhin du'o// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re la sogs pa'ang bre bar bya'o// de nas khro bo'i sku dang ldan pas sngags
18b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya ste/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a mo g+ha a hi/ a pra ti ha ta a tsa la tse ta e naM ta ka NaM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ta di ta di/ ta Ta ta Ta/ big+h+nAM b+hU ta ya/ ma ra ya/ khA da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa taM tsa me/
18b5(rgyud 'bum): a nu ban+d+ha ya/ a dzAM ku ru/ a d+ha ha d+ha ha na kra/ ka ta ka ta/ ma ta ma ta/ ha haM ma maM/ e te ba la e hi ma hA nu na bi sha na/ nan+tha nan+da/ a be sha ya a be sha ya/ a tsa le tse ha/ ta Ta taT/ da ma da ma/ phaT phaT/
18b6(rgyud 'bum): ces 'bum brjod par bya ste/ lha'i sku gnyis la ni bye ba'o// zhi ba ni sprul pa'i sku ste/ sngon du ni de bzhin shes par bya'o// a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dan dang / ka bu ra dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos kyi tshul/
18b7(rgyud 'bum): namo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHshAkya mu na maM/ ta thA ka te b+h+yaHand b+h+yaH/ sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ mu ne mu ne ma hA mu ne/ oM dza ya dza ye/ bAkye she swA hA/ oM bAkye baM dza ya/ oM bAkye niSh+Te ye/ oM bAkye na maH
19a1(rgyud 'bum): oM bAkye daM na maH/ oM AHhUM haM maM/ zhes bya bas sku khrus bya'o// de nas rol mo bsgrags par bya'o// rdzas la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ haM maM/
19a2(rgyud 'bum): oM a d+ya nuta pa na na tA ta pra b+ha swa ra su bi shud+d+ha/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ zhes bya bar brjod par bya'o// de nas mchod pa dpag tu med pas mchod de/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
19a3(rgyud 'bum): chu brjod pa'i gzungs sngags so/ / nam s+t+rai sa nIk+Shan+tu/ sarba twa thA ga tAnA tsa tsaH/ bal ba la/ bathab tra/ shAn+te shAn+te/ ga la rga la/ ba rab la/ ma n+da u0f7f ma naHbadz+rad la sponam /
19a4(rgyud 'bum): li ti ta shi kha ra/ sa man+ta badz+rA Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/ na mo sU te/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sa saM ra Na ra Na haM hUM la badz+ra s+pho Ta maM swA hA/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+hI kA nAM ta thA ga tA nAM sarba tra a pra ti ha ta bAp+ta d+harma tA ba lI nAM/ aM a
19a5(rgyud 'bum): sam sa man+ta to a nA tatra pAp+ti shA sa ni/ ga ra ha ra/ sma ra sma ra Na/ bi ka ta rA ga/ bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma pa lA/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya/ ga ga na ma hA ba ra lak+Sha Ne dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga ra
19a6(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM a re dze/ bi ra dze/ ma hA bi ri dze/ ma hA bi ra dze/ swa ra te swa ra te/ tra yi tra li/ bi d+ha ma ni/ saM b+haM dza ni ra ma ti sid+d+ha a tre traM swA hA/ zhes brjod do//
19a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs te/ lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
19b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'dis lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya bcings pa rnams nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis ltas dang mtshan
19b2(rgyud 'bum): ma bar chad med par 'gyur ro/ / srod dang tho rangs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gzungs 'di rjes su brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i khrus
19b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di la brtson par bya'o/ / na maHsa man+ta bu d+hA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ au i ho shud+d+he shud+d+he maM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ raM ho aM shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a shu maM bi shud+d+haM shud+d+he sa ma ya swA hA/ zhes brjod do// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
19b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i gzungs te/ tshu la sngags bzlas nas khrus byas na sdig pa kun 'dag par 'gyur ro// rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus
19b5(rgyud 'bum): byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / rims dang / 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'tshe ba las thar par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u lnga pa'o// /
19b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa
19b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ dang po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi e'i rnam pa can gyi nam mkha' 'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu ba dan can yaM las byung ba'o// chu'i dkyil 'khor gangs ltar dkar ba'i zlum po bum pa can
20a1(rgyud 'bum): baM las so/ / sa'i dkyil 'khor gser gyi mdog grubazhi rdo rje can laM las byung ngo // de'i steng du ri rab rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i tshad dang ldan pa oM las byung ba'o// me'i dkyil
20a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa raM las so/ / de'i nang du bruM kha dog sna tshogs byung ba'i khang bu brtsegs pa/ gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang bcas pa'i rin po che sna lnga las grub pa ni shel dang / bai DUR+Ya dang /
20a3(rgyud 'bum): byu ru dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / gser las grub pa'o// de'i nang sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i gdan no// shar gyi 'dab ma ni shel las grub pa'o// lho'i 'dab ma ni bai DUR+Ya las grub pa'o// nub kyi
20a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma ni byu ru las grub pa'o/ / byang gi 'dab ma ni in+d+ra nI la'o// mtshams rnams kyang shal dang / bai nuR+Ya dang / byu ru dang / in+d+ra nI la las grub pa'o// dbus su ni tshogs bdag glang sna'i steng du sna tshogs pa'i
20a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dam skyes dang nyi ma'i gdan no/ / shar du brgya byin/ lhor lha chen po// nub tu khyab 'jug/ byang du thag bzangs ris so// shar lho mtshams su tshangs pa// lho nub mtshams su gzhon nu// nub byang du dga'
20a6(rgyud 'bum): byed/ byang shar du kun tu rgyal ba ste/ lha chen po brgyad kyi steng du pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan no// yi ge raM las byung ba'i nyi ma dang / maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma mo dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das de
20a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi g.yo ba nam mkha'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gangs pa/
20b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnabs pa/ phu pu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs yi ge tsaM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma tsaM dang
20b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba shes rab kyi mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'
20b3(rgyud 'bum): ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na klu nor rgyas bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'angon pa'o// lhor bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs yi ge d+he las byung ba'i shes
20b4(rgyud 'bum): rab kyi mtshan ma d+he dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag nyid mi g.yo ba bai rlung+gA'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das
20b5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o// phu pu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// nub tu bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs mi gem lnga
20b6(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma ma dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba byu ru'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom
20b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu chu lha bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// byang du bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs yi ge haM las
21a1(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma haM dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/
21a2(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu rigs ldan bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o//
21a3(rgyud 'bum): shar lho mtshams su raM las byung ba'i tri shU la raM gyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba// g.yas kyi dang po na tri shU la/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu mtha' yas kyi bu/
21a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// lho nub mtshams su ShaM las byung ba'i dbyug tho ShaM gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i gshin rje gshed po bai DUrma'i mdog can/
21a5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje'i dbyug to// g.yon gyi dang po na klu dga' bo bsnams so// g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma gnyis na tho ba phur bu bsnams pa'o// nub byang mtshams su Na las byung ba'i kha T+wAM ga na'i mtshan
21a6(rgyud 'bum): ma dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i rta mgrin byu ru'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang po na kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu pad+ma chen po bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o//
21a7(rgyud 'bum): byang shar mtshams su hUM las byung ba'i ba tson hUM gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ba in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang po ni be con// g.yon gyi dang po ni klu stobs kyi
21b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu bsnams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi tha ma gnyis bsnol nas bsdigs pa'o// shar lho'i gru chad la lha mo bdug pa ma mdog mthing kha bog por 'dzin pa dang ldan pa/ lho nub tu lha mo me tog ma mdog dkar mo
21b2(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'o/ / nub byang du lha mo mar ma ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa'o// byang shar du lha mo dri chab ma ljang khu dri chubasnams pa'o// de dag ni gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa/ mdzes pa'i tshul can cu
21b3(rgyud 'bum): las bskyed par bya'o/ / shar phyogs su lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar po lcags kyu bsnams pa ste/ lho phyogs su lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// nub phyogs su lha mo dmar mo lcags sgrog
21b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'o/ / byang phyogs su lha mo ljang khu dril bu 'dzin pa'o// de dag ni cung zhig khros pa'i tshul can gyi phaT las bskyed par bya'o// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las yongs su gnas par bsgom par bya'o//
21b5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par brjod pa'i gzungs 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM/ trai lo kya bi dza la hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM a kro/
21b6(rgyud 'bum): d+he ka ya mAM ta ka hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM/ badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nAM/ tra tha a mo g+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ tra tha badz+ra/ a tsa la tsi tang !
21b7(rgyud 'bum): daha hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tra tha rat+na a tsa la pa tsa hU~M phaT/ na maHsa man+ta budz+nyA nA~M/ tra tha pad+ma a tsa la tsa la ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ na maHsa a r+b+ba bud+d+hAnA~M/ tra tha a mo g+ha ka rma a~M tsa la gan sa na hU~M phaT/ ces bya ba
22a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ b+hU dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / ma rungs pa dang / snang ba rnams zhi bar byed cing sdig pa dman pa'i las rnams
22a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dag par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi nang du gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to// na maHsa man+ta
22a3(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+hA nA/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a tsa la ka na/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ na ta na ta/ ma ta Ta ma ta Ta/ mo Ta ta moT ta/ sha ta sha ta/ Ta ta Ta ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha sarba pA paM ka ra/ ha sa shas/ badz+ra has
22a4(rgyud 'bum): a me g+ha ku ru ha sa ha sa/ mar+ha mar+ha/ gardza gardza/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a bi sha ya a bi sha ya/ ma hA man+ta pa la ka/ du na du na/ ti ni ti ni/ kha da kha da sarba big+h+nAM/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba duSh+TAn b+hak+Sha
22a5(rgyud 'bum): b+hAk+Sha/ sarba bidz+dzi/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA bi shwa/ sarba pA ba~M/ ma hA badz+ra/ spron ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUHba li ta ra g+hen ta ka/ tsU n+tu ma ma ha haM/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ ma hA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NA ya/ a mo g+ha e hi/ a pra
22a6(rgyud 'bum): ti ha ta e hi/ a tsa la tse ta a nan+ta ka nAM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsa ru tsa ru/ ta di Ti ta/ ta Ta ta Ta/ big+h+nAM g+hA ta ya/ mA ra ya/ khA da yi/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa tsa me/ a nu ban+d+ha/ a dz+nyA ku ru ku ru/ a ha sa/ a da na/
22a7(rgyud 'bum): kra ka ta maH/ ma Ta maT/ haM haM/ a ti ba la i ti ma hA gu Na ba shi na/ nan+danan+na ta/ a bi sha ya i tsa la tse ta/ sarba tra/ a nut+ta re/ ka tse ta tan taT/ Da ma Da ma/ u0f7f/ ma maM/ phaT phaT tsU/ na maHsa /
22b1(rgyud 'bum): badz+rA dz+dza/ tra a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya tsU tra ma ya tra ma ya hUM traT tsa maM/ oM ba lin+na te dzo ba li swA hA/ na maHsa mat+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a tsa la tse ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM/ a sa man+ti ka tra ta/
22b2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ba la/ Shar+tha ra man+do/ a aM/ haM haM/ shud+d+ha trai lo kya tu sh+yo tu badz+ra/ a pra ti ha te bi li b+h+yAH/ na mo dza la ya tra ta/ aT+TA ha sa na maM hAM swA hA/ zhes gsungs ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i lha dang
22b3(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye la sogs pa thams cad sreg cing se la 'gyel par gyur to// de nas cho ga gsungs so// lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i
22b4(rgyud 'bum): ral gri khru tshad gsum pa byas te/ sngags kyi 'phreng ba maM haM zhes bya ba bkod la/ khru do dang ldan pa'i spos kyi maN+Dal byas te/ mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i dri gzhag ste/ gzungs sngags 'di khri phrag tu brjod cing
22b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur ro/ / de nas g.yul du zhugs na dpag bsam gyi shing yang dum bu dum bur gcod par 'gyur te/ g.yul las rgyal bar byed do// lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i lhung
22b6(rgyud 'bum): bzed byas te/ maM haM zhes bya ba'i yi ge bkod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / zangs las byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / me tog dang / 'khor lo dang / nya dang /
22b7(rgyud 'bum): dung g.yas su 'khyil ba rnams dang / byu ru bcug pa'am/ yang na zangs la bya ru bcug la gzungs sngags 'di gro ga 'am ras la bris te/ khong pa 'am mgul du btags nas gsang sngags bye ba bzlas na lhung bzed nam mkha'
23a1(rgyud 'bum): la 'phags te gsol ba btab na 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste/ ljon pa'i shing bzhin no// nam mkha'i tri ta'i lce dang / 'ug pa'i mig dang gnyis cha mnyam pa dang / lcags
23a2(rgyud 'bum): sna gsum gyi phye ma la khA ta'i khrag gis ril bu bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags haM maM zhes bya bas pad+ma la bskor te/ gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na pad+ma nam
23a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la 'phags te/ de mi dbugs dang bral ma thag gi snying gi khrag rlangs dang sbyar te/ mig ni snang byed du bsam zhing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na thams cad mthong zhing thos la/ khar bcug
23a4(rgyud 'bum): na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya/ bAkye daM na wa ni tsak+Shur bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ rnga lpags la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas mnyes
23a5(rgyud 'bum): telham byas la/ haM dang maM rang gi rkang mthil la bris te/ gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lham nam mkha' la 'phags te/ rkang pa la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas gon na gar 'dod par phyin no// na maHsa man+ta
23a6(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+hA nAM/ oM bruM ma hA ye gr-i ta swA hA/ zhes bya bas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'phags te/ bya rgod bzhin du'o// skye ba bdun pa'i sha dang / bya rgod kyi sha dang / rtsangs pa'i sha dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la
23a7(rgyud 'bum): lde gu byas te/ gzungs sngags bye ba brjod de lus la byugs nas ra mnye ba dang / nye'u shing pa dang / bra ma ka ra'i mar dang sbar ba'i lde gu rnams nang re la srang re cha sbrang rtsi dang ba ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btang ste/
23b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na nam mkha' la thogs pa med do// rta nag po'i mig gnyis dkar po 'am/ byi ba nag po rna ba gnyis dkar po 'am/ pha wang dkar po 'am/ mi mngal nas skra dkar po'i srog chags la
23b2(rgyud 'bum): rma bya'i chu 'khar phor du blugs pa la gzungs sngags bya ba bzlas te blud la/ de'i mig gnyis ma nor bar bton pa grib ma la bskams nas ma rul ba'i phye ma la sngags 'di btab ste/ g.yas g.yon ma nor bar
23b3(rgyud 'bum): byugs na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'gyu ro// mon spos dang / gi'u wang dang / stag ma'i shun pa dang / nya mkhris dang / ru rta dang / phug ron gyi mig dang /
23b4(rgyud 'bum): lce dang / go ro tsa na dang / rtug pa rnams la ril bu byas te/ kham pa'i ga'ur ril bu re re la gzungs sngags ha maM zhes bya ba brjod de/ ga'u nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/
23b5(rgyud 'bum): na maHyaM na ma hA ri bi ni nat+tA hri/ zhes lan bdun btab nas byin na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bya rgod dang / bya gag dang / khra dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / wa dang / de rnams kyi mche ba dang /
23b6(rgyud 'bum): sder mo dang / bram ze'i rus pa'i thal ba la gzungs sngags bzlas te bsgrub pa byas nas/ dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang ser ba dag la gtor na sprin rnams 'thor zhing ser ba dang / 'brug dang / thog la sog
23b7(rgyud 'bum): pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / gcan gzan thams cad dang / sha za thams cad dang / khyi dang / phag dang / rnga mo'i rtug pa dang / gu gul dang sbyar te dud pas bdugs na dom kun 'bros par 'gyur ro//
24a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u bdun pa'o// / oM tsar+N+Na ma sA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ gzungs sngags 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste/ lan cig brjod pas
24a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa kun zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / ldang dub pa dang / rtag pa'i
24a3(rgyud 'bum): rims dang / yud tsam pa las thar ro// 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / shu ba dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dag zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan cig brjod pas kyang mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa zhi bar
24a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rig byed tshig gi dang po dang // gnyis pa'i dang por bcas pa ni// gsum pa dag gi lnga par ldan// bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa dag gi lnga pa'o// uSh+ma'i rnams kyi bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas
24a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yis gnyis pa ni/ / oM gyis mtshan pa bri bya ste// uSh+ma rnams kyi gnyis pa dang // bzhi pa'i yi ge lnga pa dang // uSh+ma yi ge bzhi pa la// u yis brgyan cing thig ler bcas pa'o// sde tshan lnga pa dag gi ni
24a6(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang / / bzhi pa dang por bcas pa ni// snying po'i yi ge bcu pa dag go// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te/ khyinag po'i thod pa'i nang du bcug la/ gzungs
24a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te nyungs kar gyis zab par bya'o/ / de nas klu yod pa'i gnas su khyer la rang gi lus la gla rtsi byugs te// chu mig tu thod pa bcug la gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rAt+na
24b1(rgyud 'bum): tra yA ya/ na ma shAN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ na mo b+ha ga ba te bud+d+ha bI rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ phuT pu Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ mi li mi li/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phyag rgya ni sor mo rnams brkyang ste/ mthe'u chung bkug la mthe bos/
24b2(rgyud 'bum): mnan te bskor bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra kro d+ha h+ya grI ba na mi mi li tsi li d+ho/ ban+d+ha ya/ kro d+ha ya/ badz+ra la ma ya/ ma ka na ya/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ s+phu Ta s+phuT/
24b3(rgyud 'bum): sarba nA ga ban d+ha ban d+ha/ nA ga ni sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra sarba duSh+Ta hrid ya/ sho Sha Na hUM hUM phaT/ phyag rgya ni lag pa'i zur gnyis gshibs te/ srin lag gnyis rgyab tu bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan nas mthe'u
24b4(rgyud 'bum): chung gnyis gshibs bsgreng la gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis gshibs te spyi bor gzhag nas/ sngags lan bdun brjod de ldang bar bya'o// gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / dri chen dang / nya'i mkhris pa
24b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / sgog skya dang / shu dag rnams sbyar te lus la byugs nas rdzas kyis srung ba'o// rgya sol gyi me la bsregs te bdugs na ser ba dang dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams zhi bar 'gyur zhing gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur ro//
24b6(rgyud 'bum): zho dang / bo ma dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ra ma dang / khar dang / 'bras yos dang / dung dang / mtshal dang / rgya mtsho'i lbu ba la sogs pa dag 'khar gzhong du thugs te/ yungs kar la gzungs
24b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di brjod cing klu mchod par bya'o/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra kro d+ha ma tsUn+ma/ tad+ya thA/ oM an n+ta ka/ tak+Sha ka/ shaM kha pA la/ bA su ki ma sA bad+ma/ oM ga ta pa la wa ta/ karkoT su
25a1(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ zhes brjod pas klu rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// char dbab par 'dod na dri zhim po'i chus maN+Dal byas te/ spra tshil la klu'i gzugs sor mo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa byas nas
25a2(rgyud 'bum): maN+Dal gyi steng du me tog gtor la gzungs thag btags te gzhag par bya'o/ / snying khar gong gi de gro ga la gi'u wang gis bris la gzhug par byas/ nyin mtshan du mchod cing bal po se'u'i lcug mas byab par byas
25a3(rgyud 'bum): nas gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/ / oM suM su pra ti badz+ra dun+te mi li mi li ba ri sha ya/ ba ri sha ya swA hA/ zhes brjod de rang spyang bar gnas par bya'o// gal te klu rnams kyis char mi 'bebs na klu rnams kyi
25a4(rgyud 'bum): mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gams par 'gyur ro/ / spos kyi maN+Dal byas te/ spos kyi me la gzugs bsro dang gzungs sngags brjod pa ni spogs pa'i cho ga'o// dri zhim po'i me la bu ram dang
25a5(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / til la sogs pa'i dgang blugs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes bya bas mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa mi
25a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas 'das skyes pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi steng du a las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du muM gyi sa bon las byung ba'i shes
25a7(rgyud 'bum): rab kyi mtshan ma muM dang ldan pa las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal mgon po'i sku byis pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu/ gser btso ma 'am gur kum gyi kha dog 'dra ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems
25b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa la phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'byar ba/ g.yon pas po ti thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// shar gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog kha ba la gur
25b2(rgyud 'bum): kum gyis gtor ba 'dra ba'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa na ut+pa la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kan
25b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'o/ / lho'i pad+ma la 'jam dpal gsung gi dbang phyug sku mdog mthing kha zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sem+ba' ba'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la phyar ba/ g.yon pa
25b4(rgyud 'bum): na'akhor lo thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o/ / nub kyi pad+ma la 'jam dpal rnon po sku mdog byu ru bcag pa lta bu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis na ut+pa la gnyis
25b5(rgyud 'bum): bsnams pa'o/ / byang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal shes rab ral gri sku mdog ljang khu la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba
25b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon gyi dang po na ut+pal sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kar 'dzin pa'o/ / g.yas kyi 'og ma na mda' 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyi 'og ma na rin po che'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o// sku de dag ni ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i nam
25b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' ma lus pa'i 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i sku'o/ / oM d+harma d+hA tu bA gI shwa ri muM/ zhes brjod pas shes rab dang ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i bum pa cu gang dang / gur kum dang /
26a1(rgyud 'bum): a ka ru dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / mthil sogs pa rmi zhim po'i rgya thugs te/ namaHsa man+ta ta thAg te d+ha/ and d+hA/ sa mya pa s+t+rai b+h+ya/ t+yathA/ oM ku m+b+ha rad+hA d+hAH/
26a2(rgyud 'bum): d+hAr NI/ gas smras/ a gsal wAg stsa/ #/ d+d+ha/ hUM/ nA~M ngaM// mar+g+hash+misas/ kar la min+ta/ sarba duHkha~Mb+h+ya/ arba tod d+ha bas ma las
26a3(rgyud 'bum): ud b+ha be/ sarba pA pa me nA sha ya swAhA/ gos gzungs sngags 'di bum pa'i tshul lan bdun brjod de khrus byas na sdig pa thams cad bdag par 'gyur ro// dbang po rno zhing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nam
26a4(rgyud 'bum): sarbatwa thA ga tA ya/ ad b+h+ya/ saM rgyags parnas/ namam n+da thaM/ sa d+has/ mams pa/ 6/ oMm d+mo 'an can/ bam6/ ma sa m+b+ha/ mabastu/ btus pa/ ka ka
26a5(rgyud 'bum): / ga sa ma ga/ srungs drus/ drang pas na/ nam sa po d+hinAM/ tha shas/ rgyal// le She te/ za s+thAmapa/
26a6(rgyud 'bum): a be sha a be shA sa~M/ tsamasan so// hU~M la Ta baT swA hA/ zhes bya bas na pal 'azas kyi snyem 'am/ til btab ste khrus bya'o// gzungs bzlas pa'i khrus byas pas las dang / nyon mongs pad
26a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/ / ka re'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro// ral gril btab g.yul du zhugs na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// smyung ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs
26b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya zhing 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ / gro ga 'am ras la bris te sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa la btags par bya'o// skud pa la gzungs sngags btab ste mdud pa byas la srid kyis gdungs
26b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la btags te/ 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am bu mo dag smyung bas 'dug ste/ yi dam du 'don na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi
26b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ngo / / gzab dang / rgyu skar dang / lce 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dag las grol bar 'gyur/ stag dang / dom dang / dred la sogs pa'i dud 'gro dag gi gnod pa dang / rlung dang /
26b4(rgyud 'bum): ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sa g.yo ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// yid gzhungs shing thos pa 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i sku thams cad thogs pa
26b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dang bu mo dag gis 'di lan gcig gam/ lan gsum mam/ bdun mam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par byed na/ de'i lus la mdze dang /
26b6(rgyud 'bum): phol mig dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / mig dang / rna ba'i dang / son pa la sogs pa dag mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so// / de nas
26b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro dang
27a1(rgyud 'bum): gling bzhi'i mi'i 'jig rten du bod kyis khyab par mdzad do/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / ba thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
27a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang byed pa'i gnas man chad khyab par mdzad do/ / bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go// bsam gtan dang po las langs te bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag go// gnyis pa las
27a3(rgyud 'bum): langs te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag go/ / gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag go// bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam
27a4(rgyud 'bum): par gzhag go/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la
27a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par gzhag go/ / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas yod min med min skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// de las langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan
27a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
27a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga' 'o// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
27b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u dgu pa'o// / 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
27b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du
27b3(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA kalpa la g+hu tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
27b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi nam mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje snying por byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du rin po che sna bdun las grub pa/ lha'i gzhal med khang bye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor ba'i dbus su
27b5(rgyud 'bum): dpag tshad 'bum phrag khyab pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma shin tu mtho ba/ kun kyang rin po che du ma'i khri pad+ma dang seng ges mtho ba/ dbu rtsa rin po che zur mangs kyi mchod rten pad+ma/ 'khor lo dang gdugs mtho bar drangs
27b6(rgyud 'bum): pa la dar gyi spyangs lding ba/ de'i grib ma sa gzhi la bkod pa na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams lha'i bzhon pa las babs nas nang du gshegs pa/ sna tshogs dril bu dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i me tog gi
27b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dang / dra ba dang dra phyed pa dang / rdza yab dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / rdo rje phyed pa dang / chu 'phyang shar bu la sogs pa du mas mdzes pa/ sgo khyud khyams dang / sgo glegs dang /
28a1(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i me long dang / gdugs la sogs pa du mas khyab pa/ rin po che'i pha gu brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa du ma de thams cad kyi dbus su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan
28a2(rgyud 'bum): cig tu bzhugs so/ / dbang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang /
28a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / sna tshogs bkram pa dang / mkha' 'od me tog 'chad pa dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / gzugs mdzes dag pa dang /
28a4(rgyud 'bum): sa'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag bdun dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal dang / rta thul dang / 'od srungs la sogs pa bye ba
28a5(rgyud 'bum): phrag bzhi dang / brags chen snyan pa chen po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / lus ngan dang / gshin rje dang / dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa
28a6(rgyud 'bum): lha'i rigs sum brgya dang lhan cig tu chos kyi rnam grangs gsang sngags zhes bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i
28a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnams la dgongs pa tha dad kyi bsam pa dang 'thun pa'i bkod pa chen po bskyed pa dang / cho 'phrul du ma bsgyur ba dang / 'od zer du ma 'gyed cing thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum
28b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du 'khor la gzigs nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ yi ge ming tshig dag gi sgos// sngags dbyibs chos su byin brlabs kyis//
28b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge sgra tsam phyed dam gcig/ mngon sum rjes 'jug ring thung dang / dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshon mas mtshan// sa bcu pha rol phyin bcu ba dag/ dbang bcu don bcu rnam pa bcu// mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dres chos//
28b3(rgyud 'bum): / byams dang thugs rje chen po dag/ dbyangs gcig gis ni sngags su gyis// sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab zhi dang // yid 'phrog dpal 'byor dbang phyug dang // mthu stobs dum bskyed pa dang // rtag gnas thob dang don
28b4(rgyud 'bum): nges thob/ / rdo rje bla na med sems bskyed// mdor na gang gis gang 'dod pa// bsam pas sems rnams rdzogs pa'i phyir// rdo rje bla na med pa gsor// chos su bla na med pa sgrogs// 'khor lo bla na med pa skor//
28b5(rgyud 'bum): ral gri bla na med pa zung // pad+ma bla na med pa chongs// rin chen bla med gsal bar gyis// dkyil 'khor tshul du spros nas kyang // mchod rten tshul du bsdu bar gyis// lha klu gnod sbyin dri ma dang // lha min mkha'
28b6(rgyud 'bum): lding mi 'am ci/ / srin po sha za brjed byed tshogs// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs 'gyur ba'i// rnam 'phrul du ma 'di sgyur cig/ gsung mchog de skad thos ma thag/ lag na rdo rje mthu bo ches// dga'
