28b7(rgyud 'bum): mgu thal mo rab sbar te/ / snyan pa'i tshig gis 'di gsol to// gser dang rin chen lnga po las// rab mchog ri bor gyur pa las// 'gro rnams kun gyi rten gnas dang // rtags su yang dag 'dzin pa
29a1(rgyud 'bum): ltar/ / rnam par shes dang phung po bzhi// 'byung ba rnam par dag bsgrubs pas// lha dang phyag rgya 'phrin las su// sngags shes rnams kyis bzung byas nas// btul ba'i ye
29a2(rgyud 'bum): shes byang chub rim/ / khyad par de la ldan par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa che// kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches// sku las sna tshogs mdangs 'od can// 'od zer du ma byung nas kyang //
29a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhi dang snying po me tog gis// brgyan pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas tshe// sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// 'jig rten skyong dang bdud kyi tshogs// ma lus pa rnams brgyal bar gyur// nyan thos rang rgyal
29a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dar bar gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// tshogs rnams shin tu skrag par gyur// de tshe phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu nas// khro bo chen po'i tshogs byung ba//
29a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rtse mos drangs nas su// zhing dbus dkyil 'khor 'di ru lhags// 'od zer tshogs kyang rab 'dus nas// dpal be'u nyid du thim par gyur// de tshe 'od de'i byin rlabs las// mkha' la sgra 'di grags
29a6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ / shAkya'i mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang du gzi brjid che bzhugs slad// chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs// dri ma med pa'i dam chos mchog/ gsang
29a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba/ / thos nas byang chub 'dus ma byas// 'jig rten mgon po brnyes par gyur// de nas lag na rdo rje tshogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang // snyim pa me tog bkang byas te//
29b1(rgyud 'bum): gtor nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas// dang zhing gus pa'i tshul gyis su// pus btsugs thal sbyar gsol ba 'debs// mi gnas ye shes che ba'i mchog/ yon tan rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gtso// mtshan nyid thams
29b2(rgyud 'bum): cad rab brgyan pa/ / mtshan min spangs pa'i thub pa che// dri med dge ba ji ltar lags// gsang sngags tshul du spyod pa ci// 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub gang // 'jig rten mgon po ji ltar 'gyur// bdag cag
29b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams la sman rab dang / / 'gro la thugs rje che mdzad phyir// mgon po bcom ldan thub pa che// yang dang yang du bshad du gsol// de nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bos bka' stsal pa//
29b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin// shes rab chen po'i spyan ldan pas// bdag gzhan phan don la brtson phyir// legs par nyon la yid la zung // yang dag yang dag mtha' min tshul// de ni nga yis bshad par
29b5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / srog gcod ma byin len brdzun 'khrig/ tshig rtsub dbyen dang ngag bkyil smra// brnab sems gnod sems log lta chang // dri ro ngan pa'i zas skom dang // srog can sha khrag log 'tshor bcas// slob dpon
29b6(rgyud 'bum): dge 'dun mchod rten sogs/ / khyad par yul can yo byad dang // dman zhing nyam thag phrog dgu pa// glegs bam 'tshong dang chos kyi zong // g.yang sa ral gri so dug sogs// me 'obs ltar mthong spangs nas kyang //
29b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dkar la sogs par bya// yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin rtsol dang // nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang // mchod pa dang ni kha ton dang // de dag sems dang sgom pa ste// dkar bcu lam la yun rings dang // nub
30a1(rgyud 'bum): bcus rgyun mi 'chad du 'bad/ / gtan pa med pa'i byang chub sems// shel ltar dri ma med pa'o// mchog 'di spyad pas sdug bsngal tshogs// myur du gcod pas dge ba'o// chos
30a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag med dang mnyam nyid dang / / rang sems gdod nas dag pa gang // sgyu 'dra 'du byed med pa dang // zag bcas de dang bral ba las// byang chub phyogs mos ma lus pa// chos nyid bdag med spyod pa ni//
30a3(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings ye shes mngon byas nas// ma 'dres chos rnams rdzogs gsal ba// 'dus ma byas kyi byang chub ste// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi lus so// 'dod pa'i khams sogs yon tan la// shin tu bde
30a4(rgyud 'bum): rol sprad pa spyod/ / sangs rgyas mu stegs can rnams kyi// lkog tu gyur pa gsang ba ste// bskal pa bsam yas dpag med du// brlabs dka' yangs zab rgya chen rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin du//
30a5(rgyud 'bum): lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa// dbyer med tshul du skyobs pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis sngags su brjod// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku// yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs pa ni// bden pa gnyis la
30a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa yi/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgon// la lar 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs// la lar dge sbyong chen po'i gzugs// la lar srin po srin mo'i gzugs// la lar 'gro ba
30a7(rgyud 'bum): bzang po'i gzugs/ / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang // seng ge ltar gzigs mdzad la sogs// sna tshogs du ma mdzad pa ni// rkang gnyis lha min rnam gnyis sogs// 'gro ba'i mgon por gyur pa'o//
30b1(rgyud 'bum): rtag dang 'dra dang nges med pa'i// gtso bo bsam pas gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten phal pa'i mgon po ste// gzugs byad kha dog tha dadang // yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gis// grangs ma byung ba mchod 'os so//
30b2(rgyud 'bum): thub pas gsungs pa'i de ma thag/ rdo rje can gyis bzhengs nas kyang // phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsol// 'dren pa gtso bo bcom ldan 'das// sngags
30b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa ni gang gang yin/ / phyag rgya zhes ni ji lta bu// ting 'dzin zhes ni ji ltar bshad// lus ngag yid la ji ltar gnas// dbyer med tshul du ji ltar skyob// bdag la phan pa'i don phyir dang // gzhan la
30b4(rgyud 'bum): brtse phyir bshad du gsol/ / de nas rgyal ba gtso mchog ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas te// tshangs pa chen po'i gsung snyan gyis// rnam rtog zad phyir 'di gsungs so// snying po nye snying rtsa ba'i sngags/
30b5(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sngags su gyur pa ste// snying po brjod dang sa bon no// nye snying ye shes gachog dang ni// gsang ba'i snying po zhes grags so// las kyi sngags ni gnyis yin te// bdag nyid brtan byed las sngags dang //
30b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor tshogs grub par byed pa'o// phyag rgya lag pa'i 'du byed dang // rkang pa stabs kyi 'gyur ba'o// rtags su mtshon dang 'debs pa dang // 'gyur ba med par byed pas na// phyag rgya zhes su bshad pa'o//
30b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rtse gcig sems bsdus na// sems la lhag pa'i chos 'bebs pa// de ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya// de ltar de dag la rten nas// snga ma'i gnas de yongs gyur nas// sgo nga bral ba'i 'dab bzang ltar//
31a1(rgyud 'bum): lus 'di mkha' la cher song nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad du// rgyal ba dam chos mnyan nas kyang // rgyal sras kun la bshad pa dang // skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes pas
31a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / shes bya ma lus phyogs khyab pa// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o// sems dang yid ni 'dres pa'i tshe// ye shes bde bar shar ba ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dbyer med tshul
31a3(rgyud 'bum): du skyob ces gsungs/ / 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtogs pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// lhag par gnas pa'i don yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // zhi bas btul dka' bgegs/
31a4(rgyud 'bum): chen dang // log 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sems kyi bye brag thugs chud nas// de dang gzugs 'jal gzhom pa'i phyir// rtog med nam mkha'i lam gnas te// rdzogs sangs gdul dka' 'dul
31a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad sku/ / rab 'phags khro bo stobs chen dpal// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras kyi sras// mi g.yo'i mtshan grags de la 'dir// rgyal dang rgyal sras rtag phyag 'tshal// tshangs sogs lha dang lus can kun/
31a6(rgyud 'bum): de la rtag tu mchod par byed// rgyal bas byas gzo rgyal sras kyi// smon rdzogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// ye shes rdzogs nas mi g.yo'i sa// thob pas mi g.yo ba zhes bya// phas kyi rgol 'joms dpa' bo ste/
31a7(rgyud 'bum): tshar gcod pa ni khro bo yin// sngags kyi bden tshig mi slu bas// nyan thos bdud tshogs kyis mi g.yo// rtog med bdud rtsi khro bas rgyal// rdzu 'phrul bskyod med mi g.yo ba// de bzhin nyid kyi snying po mchog/
31b1(rgyud 'bum): sto nyid las byang rgyal ba'i sku// chos dbyings bdag nyid la bzhugs nas// sprul 'dis srid pa'i khams sbyong mdzad// mkha' ltar dri med spros bral bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung // spros
31b2(rgyud 'bum): med nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/ / tha snyad tsam du gsang sngags zhes// brjod kyang ngag gi spyod yul 'das// skyob pas tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs// sems med rang bzhin stong pa nyid// sku 'dra
31b3(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis sgom pa yin/ / dngos med mnyam mdzes 'dod don nams// gsang sngags mgon 'ongs brjod pas spol// mu stegs bdag dang srog gang zag/ gtso bo skyes bu khyab gnas pas// 'khor ba rtag rtog
31b4(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal rmongs/ / log pa'i zhabs bcings sdug bsngal skyed// bdag med srog med sems can med// byed po med cing gtso bo med// khyab gnas med cing dngos po med// rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
31b5(rgyud 'bum): med/ / log rtog srid 'ching zhabs gcad phyir// dngos med sna tshogs gzugs bsgoms pas// dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang 'thob// phyi nang khyad par goms pa'o// lbu ba chu bur sgyu 'drar sgom//
31b6(rgyud 'bum): stong nyid las ldang ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog sdig bcing sa las grol nas// 'chi med ye shes go 'phang thob// phung po khams dang skye mched med// kun gzhi med de gang zag med//
31b7(rgyud 'bum): gzung 'dzin med de bcings med pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshad// kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i// stong nyid byang sems sgyu 'dra bar// bag yod pas ni rtag bsgoms na//
32a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char// yid bzhin nor 'dra rdzu 'phrul che// mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i sku// sngags spyod byang chub sems dpa' yi// byang chub sem
32a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgom pa 'thob/ / ngo mtshar gsungs te thos ma thag/ khro bo rnams kyis gtso la bstod// rtag tu dag cing dri med pa// rnam rtog rgyun 'gags kun rtog med// brtag rtog med la zhugs pa
32a3(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos kun g.yo ba med pa khyod// spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas// kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa rtog/ rang bzhin spros bral khyod phyag 'tshal// sems
32a4(rgyud 'bum): can sna tshogs phan don du/ / mdzad spyod sna tshogs gsungs pa'o// dag pa'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung // rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// mun pa phra rab rdul spangs pa'i// sprin bral nam
32a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' dag pa ltar/ / mgon po khyod sku shel sgong ltar// kun rtog spangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// spros med nam mkha' lta bu la// dngos po thams cad dang bral bas// phung khams skyed mched shin tu dag/
32a6(rgyud 'bum): na 'am rjod// mibab la 'a tshogs sa/ gos sbyo dag pa'i mams can gags/ pa yo na thob das pan gas chen pa phyug mam bstod l
32a7(rgyud 'bum): as byung byung / mi kyi pa 'i rjo la// sems cad sdug bsngams gshes/ mun 'jigs sepal gyun la stod// sngags rigs pa sa// rnam sram sh
32b1(rgyud 'bum): es rab bskyed/ / bla med go 'phang myur 'gro gsungs// gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos kun gyur dang bcas pa yi// las dang skye las rnam par grol// rgyal ba rgyu med bdag nyid 'khrungs// gtso mchog khyod la
32b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal bstod/ / dngos med ye shes me lce yis// 'dus byas ri bo kun bsregs nas// chos dbyings rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal// bla med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i don de thugs chud nas/
32b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro la phan phyir cho ga gsungs// gsang sngags log par spyod pa dang // ser sna log par goms pa la// 'dod pas non pa'i sems rtog gis// sngags pa yi dgas gnas su skye// dang pos mar me me
32b4(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / / zhal zas gtor ma 'phreng ba sogs// mchod pa'i rdzas dang yo byad dang // mi yi lus dang kha zas la// 'tshe zhing sgrub pa'i bar du gcod// mi sdug nad skyed lo tog 'tshe// gnyis pa
32b5(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin 'dra gyur nas/ / sha khrag chang la snom zhing rgyug/ thos bsam sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing // nad skye tshe len log lta skyed// rig sngags 'chang gi gdon gzhom phyir// sgrub pos 'bad
32b6(rgyud 'bum): de sngags brjod bya/ / sngags mthu bskyed pa gtor ma dang // sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bcas dang // mnan pa'i las kyis nags me ltar// thogs pa med par 'joms par 'gyur// de dag rten
32b7(rgyud 'bum): byed lha yin te/ / de gsal byed pa ras ris yin// de kun rnam dag gsal byed pa// byang chub sems mchog zhi ba ni// log rtog 'khor ba'i zo chun la// ral gri rnon po'i sta re lta// 'phags
33a1(rgyud 'bum): pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ 'byung bar rab tu bshad par bya/
33a2(rgyud 'bum): namaHsarba sa pa ri b+hA ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ka te b+h+yaHsarba dz+nyA hAM/ snying po dam pa'o// ma maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya ts+tsha/ Ta ta tsa ma~M/ snying po'o//
33a3(rgyud 'bum): na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ hra ta a mo g+ha/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na spre Ta ya hU~M/ tra sa ma ya hUM/ Ta Ta haM ma nye ba'i snying po'o// na maHsarba sa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA
33a4(rgyud 'bum): ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ a tsa lArka na/ nan+ma nan+da/ mon+tha mon+da/ sar+b+bA sar+b+ba/ tan+na tas+dza/ tiSh+ThA tiSh+ThA a be sha aHman+tha/ ma la ka/ d+ha Na d+ha/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/ big+h+nAMn/
33a5(rgyud 'bum): mA ra mAM ra duSh+Ta na rak+Sha rak+Sha sa traM/ ku ru ku ru/ ki raM ki re/ ma hA bi dza ya badz+ra phaT/ hU hUMhAM/ tri bi la ta rag naHka/ natsa/ a tsa la/ te tsa phaT phaT/ ar+thA
33a6(rgyud 'bum): a sa man+ta ka/ Ta Ta/ ma hA ba la sa ta a ma na ya/ tr-i ma haM/ shu d+h+yA tu lo ka/ tuSh+yAn tu lo ka/ badz+rI na ma/ sA pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yoHdza la ma tra ta/ a sa ta na maHswA hA
33a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i snying po'o/ / de nas phyag rgya stang stabs kyis sngags brjod pa 'dir gsungs so// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU re ka b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ha na ha na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ dz+nyA na kha T+wAM ga hUM phaT/
33b1(rgyud 'bum): dmatsha phyag tu sdugs so// nam mams pa d+hA ked+had+hasan thAka teb+h+yaHsa/ 9// zhwa da/ d+hAn+tu/ g+hAt+mA/ a.U te/ !t+te swAt+ma/ gags pa'i/
33b2(rgyud 'bum): namaHsa zas pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsa sa ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarba nA~M/ oM ra/ rat+te/ gan can/ gang+ya sar+d+ha/ mA ri la du zhwa bi na la ko hU~Mdza/ go cha'i'o// na moHsarbas pa ra bA ri ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga teH
33b3(rgyud 'bum): sarba thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+rA nA li/ kha dz+nyA ga~M pA sha d+ha re sAny+dza/ gtsug tor gyi'o// na maHsa thes pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga tib+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM b+hAn+d+ha ban d+ha darba pa tsa b+ha smr-i ku ru ku r+m+ma han rgan badz+ra
33b4(rgyud 'bum): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT/ tho ba'i'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM Sh+Tan ta mU ti/ da ha da ha/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ bi dza ya kIrti swAhA/ mgo tsa
33b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM b+hu d+ha ra d+ha ra/ a tsin d+ye ba la bi kra ma NaM/ bu ra bu sa la ya/ rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba swA hA/ rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sa
33b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM badz+ra hrid ya/ badz+ra ma taM gi swA hA/ snying kha'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga trai b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM hU da ha da ha/
33b7(rgyud 'bum): kiny+tsi ra ya si/ A na pa shI g+h+raM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ban rna banad+ha/ duSh+Tan/ da ma da ma swAhA/ phyogs bcing ba'o// na maHsarbas pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bA
34a1(rgyud 'bum): oM dun du na ma hA bA sha kha T+wAM ga d+ha ra/ pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yabaka' rtags kyi'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta bA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ga ga na gan d+hod b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya/
34a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ri pU ra ke swA hA/ dri'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri b+hu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi shud d+ha dz+nyA na rA dzi so b+ha be ga ga nA nAn hAHswA hA/ ma mo'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sa pa
34a3(rgyud 'bum): ri pU ra ke b+h+ya sa ma sa nag te rgya oM shud d+ha d+ham te/ shud+d+ha shud+d+he/ gr-ih+Na kr-ih+Na/ sarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsAH/ gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA u0f7f t
34a4(rgyud 'bum): e b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM shud d+ha ma hA dz+nyA na swa b+hA be/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma sA na ye swAhA/ bdug pa'i be// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ga ga na bi krAn
34a5(rgyud 'bum): ta kA mi ni ma s+t+ra shud d+ha na ye swAhA/ me tog gi'o// namaHsarbas pa ri pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga teb+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM han ha na/ pa ra ma bi shud d+he/ d+harma na ya pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswAhA/
34a6(rgyud 'bum): zhal zas kyi'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM a pra ti hi hau na d+ya ta da ma da ma/ sarba thA/ sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA/ dpa' bo spyan drang ba'i'o//
34a7(rgyud 'bum): na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi shud d+ha bi shud d+ha/ sa kra sA hA be A na ya/ ma hA na ye swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang ba'o// nam
34b1(rgyud 'bum): sarnas pa keSh+Tha na g+hA/ ba rba d+h+ya AH/ natA/ dam sa/ mnyan mesaH/ kun thos spyan ba lo// nag+saHsa bas pa d+hu /
34b2(rgyud 'bum): oM d+hA/ shAb+da/ ba/ man pa wA re swA/ ponyal mo spyan drang ba'o// namaHsazlas pa ri b+ha ra ki b+h+yaH
34b3(rgyud 'bum): thAg te b+h+yaHsarbathA/ oMm pa ma the stan dA stan pa/ pra be sha ya b+hA be sha ya/ sarba ta thAka/ sa / tam tam/ mahAn pa/ ba ring+ga re swA/ 'jig rten
34b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams sbyin drang ba'o'o/ / nAHsams pa b+hUM kAT+Tasar+b+bam+b+ha/ oM saHsaH/ mahA swAH/ dmadas/ masbyangasa.A kaR+Sha ga swA kArnamargyas ma snun pa cwa
34b5(rgyud 'bum): nang mong snyan za ba'o/ / nas mchis pa b+h+ya/ sa wAg mdzas/ bang labi sa / sa
34b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin drang ba'o/ / namaHsams pa ri b+h+ya kleb+h+yasarba twa r+dz+dzag teb+h+yas/ oM bits+tshaH/ ma thAmathA/ dmadam/ nam hAn le/ mar tharan/ ma mo rnams
34b7(rgyud 'bum): skyo nang 'o/ / nam mams pa'i phyi ko b+h+yaHsarba thAg sarba/ mi pa tshusarba rbaH/ ma hAs/ naH/ sarba g+h+nAn dam sa/ mdun
35a1(rgyud 'bum): oM hUM phaT swA hA/ rkang stabs tsham ngam gyi sngags so// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM aHnU/ A kA shA ga ga na s+pha ra Na khaM swAhA/ 'o thug 'khur ba 'bru
35a2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs/ / spos dang me tog la sogs pa// ci 'byor 'byor pa'i gtor ma ni// sngags des spro zhing spel bar bya// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM swa b+hA ba sarba thA b+h+yo
35a3(rgyud 'bum): bAM swAhA/ na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM lab+h+yAM sarba ga ga na lab+d+ha ya swAhA/ na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi/ dA d+ha mi haM swA hA/ byin rlabs
35a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du bsgyur ba dang / kun gyis thim par bya ba dang // 'dod pa'i las rnams gang dang gang // grub par bya ba'i sngags yin no// gza' chen brgyad dang rgyu skar yang // nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams kyi sngags/
35a5(rgyud 'bum): namaHsarnaMs pa pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba twAthA ga tib+h+yaHsarbak+Sha A u0f7f oM kiraHsar+b+ba khIngasati/ shuH/ sha na shwa ra2ke u0f7f bat+tik+Sha/ r-itsinI/ mr-ig+sa shin+da/ an+d+ra s+thAn rba s+ya pu
35a6(rgyud 'bum): Sh+ya a shwe ShA/ ma g+hA purba pal+lA nI ut+ta ra pal+lA nI/ hAstA/ tsi twA sA sti/ bi shA khA a nu rA d+hA dz+yeSh+Ta mu lA/ pU drA ShAn+na/ ut+ta rA ShAr+thA shra ba Na a b+hi dzi ta/ sha ti b+hi ShA d+ha niSh+Ta
35a7(rgyud 'bum): pUrba b+ha dra pA dI ut+ta ra b+ha dr-i/ pra dA re ba tI/ a shInI/ b+ha ri/ oM dang swA hA ra bcas pa ni// rang rang snying po'i sngags yin te// gang 'dod las kyang sbyar bar bya// mchod
35b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs kyang tha dad bya/ / na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badz+rA NA/ oM a tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya tra ka kha ha maM/ na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA kIt+ta badz+rA NA/ oM badz+ra ka pa tsa dru rba/ oM na maHsarba
35b2(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yaHbi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM rak+Sha/ ma hA ba li/ sarba ta thA ga te pu N+ya nirdza te/ hUM hUM tra thA/ a pra ti ha te swA hA/ khro bo spyan gcig drag shul can// srung dang
35b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas par mchod pa dang / / sngags bzlas dngos grub blangs pas 'grub// ci 'dod las la cho gas sbyar// lag g.yas gung mdzub gzhibs te brkyang // srin lag mthe'u chung mtheb mos mnan//
35b4(rgyud 'bum): shugs drangs tshul phyung mkha' la 'phyar// ral gri phyag rgyas bdud tshogs 'joms// g.yon pa khu tshur sdigs mdzub bsgreng // slar sgyur byed pa zhags pa'i rgya// gung mo mthe'u chung so sor sprad//
35b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo ming med nang du dgug/ mthe thong gzhibs pa gung 'gram sbyar// snying kha bkod de go cha'i rgyan// sor 'khyud khu tshur nang du bsdam/ mtheb gnyis cung bsgyur mgo thod rgya// g.yon
35b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khu tshur mthe bong ni/ / g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang bcug nas// mthe bong g.yas bsgreng tho ba'i rgya// phyogs bcur brdung ba ltar bya'o// g.yas pa khu tshur gung mo bsgreng // spyi gtsug phyag rgya gtsug tu
35b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ g.yon pa khu tshur gung mdzub bsgreng // bka' rtags phyag rgya rtag tu 'phyar// khu tshur gnyis gzhibs lho sbyar ba// rdo ba lta bu'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa khu tshur snying khar gzhag/ snying /
36a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyan pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis sor mo so sor brkyang // phyogs bcu bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag sbyar gung gnyis nang bcug pa// dri yi phyag rgyar bshad pa'o// khu tshur rgyab
36a2(rgyud 'bum): sprad gung mthe bong / / mthe bong gung mdzub sprad dang 'khyud// gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo khong stong shugs ltar gdon// bdug spos 'bul ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis so sor gung srin bkug
36a3(rgyud 'bum): mtheb mnan bzhag brkyang me tog rgya/ / thal sbyar gung srin 'dzub mo bkug/ mthe'u chung mtheb brkyang zhal zas rgya// skyil krung 'dug ste snyim pa zed// mthe bong gnyis ni nang du bkug/ so ra ga zhibs nas
36a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yab byed pa ni/ / dpa' bo gtso bo spyan drang rgya// thal sbyar mdzub bkug mthe bos mnan// byang chub sems tshogs 'gugs pa'i rgya// snyim bskyed mthe'u chung gshibs te brkyang // lhag ma brgyad
36a5(rgyud 'bum): po so sor dgug/ nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can// ma lus thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya// khu tshur g.yas pa g.yon steng gzhag/ mdzub gnyis brkyang ste so sor dgug/ cung zad skyod par
36a6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa ni/ / pho nya pho mo 'gugs pa'i rgya// khu tshur rgyab sprang gung mdzub ni// so sor drang por gshibs te brkyang // mtheb gnyis cung zad sprad de dgug/ 'jig rten pa rnams 'gugs pa'i rgya/
36a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon min g.yas pas de ltar bya// brtul zhugs drang srong dgug pa'i rgya// g.yon pa khu tshur gung mo bsgreng // dngos grub srin mo 'gugs pa'i rgya// lag g.yas ba kan te brkyang nas kyang /
36b1(rgyud 'bum): mthe bos mdzub mnan gsum po g.yab// ma bdun la sogs ma mo rnams// las kyi dus su bgugs par 'gyur// res kyis bteg cing drang po yis// pus mo dag la rkang mthil sbyar// spyi bor
36b2(rgyud 'bum): me tog thal sbyar yang / / phyogs der g.yob cing 'bru tshugs blta// zlum pa'i stabs kyis 'di kun gyis// bgegs tshogs 'joms shing rnal 'byor srung // lag pa g.yas ni gyen du brkyad//
36b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa snying khar sdigs mdzub ste// rkang gnyis sprad nas rting brdebs// hUM brjod drag skad mdun du lta// sa gsum g.yo byed zla gam stabs// rkang g.yon brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni// ha ha brjod
36b4(rgyud 'bum): cing zhabs rgya bcings/ / phan tshun bsnol nas bgegs la bsnun// 'khor lo phyag rgya phye mar bya// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni// rdo rje thal mo mkha' la bsnun// khro gnyer mig can
36b5(rgyud 'bum): ma mchu mnan/ / yan lag gnyis gnyis me ltar sprad// rkang pa mnyam stabs hUM sgra can// lag gnyis sdigs mdzub phyag rgya'o// rkang gnyis mnyam du bzhag pa las// g.yas kyis g.yon
36b6(rgyud 'bum): bskor lte ba yin/ / mdun du g.yas te rgyab tu g.yon// gya tshom gsum gsum mnan pa ni// rtse gsum yin te rtse gsum rgya// lag pa steng brkyang dbyig bsgreng ltar// bgegs la bsnun zhing 'bru
36b7(rgyud 'bum): tshugs blta/ / g.yas su tho ba hUM brjod brdeg/ g.yon pa snying kha'i sdigs mdzub ste// gnyis ka sprad pa 'khor lo bya// nub bltas rkang pa mnyam bzhag nas// mdun g.yas rgyab dang
37a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon phyogs su/ / g.yon pas bgegs gsum mnan bya zhing // rim pas me dang ral gri dang // sdigs mdzub zhags pas phyogs bzhir bcing // ha hUM drag brjod brjid
37a2(rgyud 'bum): gnon rgya/ / rkang gnyis pus 'bur lag pa gnyis// gru mo bsgyur na thig gis mnan// bgegs bskrad phyir ni 'bru tshugs blta// rtse gcig rdo rje stabs su bcad// rkang pa g.yas g.yon
37a3(rgyud 'bum): res kyis bskor/ / lho byang g.yon te shar nub g.yas// brkyang zhing drag tu brdab par bya// rgyab nas drang dang tho ba dang // rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i rgyu// phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs/
37a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang ni stang stabs kyis// phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na// 'byung po'i tshogs 'joms smos ci dgos// thams cad dbang du sdud par byed// de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yi//
37a5(rgyud 'bum): rkang stabs khyad par bshad par bya// shar du rkang pa mnyam pa yis// rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg/ lhor ni rkang rting sprad de gdang // hUM sgrog thal mo mdun rgyab sbyar// nub tu rkang sprad
37a6(rgyud 'bum): lag pa gnyis/ / so sor sdigs mdzub gyen du brkang // byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang // rkang pa ya gcig sa la bsgreng // khu tshur mdzab sbyar dpral bar bzlog/ rkang gnyis mnyam byas
37a7(rgyud 'bum): res kyis phyar/ / mche gtsigs hUM sgrog khro gnyer lta// byang shar thig ler grags pa'i rgya// khu tshur mthe'u chung mtsho ba'i rgya// rkang pa ros bteg shar lhor phye// lho nub rkang gnyis res
37b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis brdab/ / zhags pas bdebs dang ral gris gcod// nub byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang // lag gnyis mtheb spyad 'khor lo bskor// yang na mche gtsigs phyag rgyas gdag/ stang
37b2(rgyud 'bum): stabs thams cad tsan+du sgrog/ de nas rig sngags bzlog pa yi// phyag rgya cho ga bshad par bya// khu tshur gung mo brkyang rtse sprad// mdzub gnyis de yi 'gram du bcad// sngags dang phyag rgya
37b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis/ / lhaklu srin po gnod sbyin dang // mkha' 'gro 'byung po mi ma yin// gsod dang sprod de me ltar mdzad// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/
37b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // bla na med pa'i ras ris sku// cho ga de nas bshad par bya// bris sku 'dod pas thams cad du// dge ba'i ras bzang
37b5(rgyud 'bum): btsal nas kyang / / bkrus te sngags kyis bsrung byas la// drar smrig tu ni bsgyur bar bya// rgyud bzang dal zhing dul bag yod// chos thos ri mo mkhan la sprin// srid chung yid gzhung
37b6(rgyud 'bum): khro med pas/ / sen rtsi shun kan tshul sbyar// spang dang mu bi kan tar ldang // ba p+la kra nI bla na ser// li khri skong mtshal lpags dmar// rams dang mthing shun bru nir sngo// spyig dang a
37b7(rgyud 'bum): nag po ste/ / she tha dag kyang dkar por 'gyur// sa snod so btang sags snyeg byug/ pir 'jam ral 'bring tha mabri// rgyal dngas rinam gru dang // sngon sbubs sprin drug lha mtshams shes
38a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ / thub pa'i dge ba ras ris la// dbus su byang chub shing mchog drung // gser mdog 'khor lo sgyur ba'i chas// chos 'chad phyag rgya ngur
38a2(rgyud 'bum): smig bsnams/ / logs su 'dab bzang rgyal po gnyis// snyim pa me tog bkang ba'i gzugs// g.yas su 'jig rten dbang po dkar// ngur smrig gon pas thal mo sbyar// de yi zhabs
38a3(rgyud 'bum): su mi g.yo ba/ / spyan gsum khros pa klu yi brgyan// na ra'i stod g.yogs stag smad bkris// rin chen rgyan can do ker can// rdo ba dmar po'i khri stangs na// ral gri dang ni zhags pa dang /
38a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs// gtso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs chal// rdo rje 'dzin sngo ngur smrig can// rdo rje dang ni zhags pa 'chang // de yi 'og tu sgrub po ni// pus btsugs spos kyi
38a5(rgyud 'bum): khang bu 'dzin/ / gtso bo zhabs su khro bo che// nag po khams gsum bstan pa yi// lag gnyis rin chen khri la bteg/ gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste// 'jig rten dbang dang khro bo yi//
38a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin dang sgrub pa'i sngo// yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig/ klu yi bu mo mdzes ma gnyis// pang gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang gi phyir// de nas bris sku yang dag
38a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / dbus su shAkya thub pa dang // g.yas su 'phags pa 'jam dpal te// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o// bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni// shin tu blta dka' gsus po che//
38b1(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yi brgyan// kha nas khrag 'dzag lce 'dril ba// mche gtsigs kI sgra cher sgrog pa// spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'od// ngur smrig bsnams pa char sprin mdog
38b2(rgyud 'bum): sku la thod rlon 'phreng ba can/ / dbu la thod pa tshar bzhis brgyan// g.yon du rin chen zur bud 'phyang // bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar ba yis// phyogs kyi bgegs tshogs sreg par mdzad// g.yA
38b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dang po rdo rje ste/ / gnyis pas ral gri 'od 'bar 'chang // g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags// gnyis pa sdigs mdzub brkyang ste mdzad// rin chen rdo yi khri stengs su// bgegs kyi rgyal po mnan nas
38b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / g.yon brkyang ba yi gar gyis gnas// de yi mdun du zhi ba'i byad// spos khang bzung ba'i sgrub po bri// ci 'byor rgyun du mchod par bya// mngon spyod sgrub pa'i ras ris ni// de nas yang dag
38b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / dur khrod ras la mi g.yo ba// mdog nag spun gsum zur mig lta// ngur smrig gos gyon khro gnyer ldan// ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'chang // bris nas bdag gi khrag gis ni// spyan
38b6(rgyud 'bum): phye gsol ba btab par bya/ / ri mo 'dis ni rig 'dzin kyang // sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci dgos// yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir// mthing kha na ra'i rgyan can ni// brkyang bskum rdo rje dril bu 'dzin//
38b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs bri// dmag dpung rengs pa'i ras ris ni// gser mdog khro bo mi g.yo ba// mi sdig mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku// 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// zhal bzhi phyag
39a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang bzhi pa ste/ / ral gri zhags pa dang po 'dzin// ri bo che dang sdigs mdzub 'og/ zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying khar ro// de nas rig 'dzin dngos grub kyis// ras ris
39a2(rgyud 'bum): bri ba yang dag bshad/ / mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa// mdangs bzang zar ma'i me tog mdog/ ral gri zhags pa sdigs mdzub can// pus mo g.yas bteg g.yon pa ni// sa la cung zad
39a3(rgyud 'bum): btsugs par mdzad/ / mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis// dbugs 'byin mdzad pa nyams dga' gzugs// g.yas su rnam snang mdza bris te// g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o// de mdun sgrub po nyid kyang
39a4(rgyud 'bum): bri/ / gang yang ris ma thams cad la// mchod de me tog gtog nas kyang // spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te// rten 'brel sngags kyis rab gnas bya// de rjes smon lam btab pa ni// oM ldan bdag
39a5(rgyud 'bum): gis bsags pa yi/ / bsod nams grangs med gzhal mi lang // des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa// bla med go 'phang thob par shog/ sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro dang // yi dgas gang dag grangs med rnams//
39a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig/ gang yang lha mi dbul 'phongs dang // mi nang bu ge dgra tshom sogs// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// de dag thams cad
39a7(rgyud 'bum): bral gyur shog/ ji skad sems can thams cad rnams// de snyed sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun// sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas// 'ga' yang sdug bsngal med par shog/ sems can gang dag
39b1(rgyud 'bum): lus ngag yid/ / mi dge sbyod pa bral gyur nas// dge ba phun tshogs spyod gyur te// kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog/ de nas rgyal sras kun btud de// lag na dri dang me tog sogs// mchod
39b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yo byad kun thogs nas/ / bla 'og tha dad gsal bya'i phyir// bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod// oM bde gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// skyob pa dngos su bzhugs pa rnams// bdag la
39b3(rgyud 'bum): slar yang brtse ba'i phyir/ / rgyal ba sras bcas la mi mnga'// bdag don grub par 'gro ba la// brtse phyir slar yang byon par mdzod// de nas gtor ma me tog dri// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tshon rnams/
39b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dam tshig gnod spangs phyir// lag pas reg par mi bya ste// gos kyi phur ma la sogs pa// ci bde bas ni phyags nas kyang // skye 'gag med pa'i sngags brjod nas// chu bo la ni dor bar bya//
39b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras dang 'o ma sha ka dang // mar dang bcas pa bskol byas te// 'bras zan dang ni lhan cig tu// dga' skyed phyir na dge 'dun dang // bram ze la ni ston mo bya// de nas bris sku brtan par ni// gsang ba'i
39b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas su mchod par bya/ / khyad par tshes brgyad dus su mchod// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing // rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang // mnyes par bya zhing khros pa min// sems can ma mos spang bar bya//
39b7(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la nges bskyed de// the tsom le lo spang bar bya// rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir// khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas// gos bkra dri ma med pa bgo/ zas kyang 'bras sogs dri med la/
40a1(rgyud 'bum): cung ngu bza' zhing btung bar bya// mangs pas gnyid dang le lo dang // dring ba ni skyed par 'gyur// thorarangs dang por langs nas ni// srod thal bar du brtson par/
40a2(rgyud 'bum): nam gyi gung la gnyid pa'i tshe// 'grol phan bya'i sems kyis nyal// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ bris glu'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas pang
40a3(rgyud 'bum): dag bshad bya ste/ / lha sgom pa yi rim pa ni// rang gzugs stong par byas nas su// yi ge 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo las// sgra grags pa ni rig pa che// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang /
40a4(rgyud 'bum): der son pa ni rdo rje sogs// rang gi phyag rgya nyid yin no// de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni// 'ja' tshon shar ba ji lta bar// mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag ldan// brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang
40a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni// byis pa gzhon nu'i lang tsho 'dra// rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni// gzugs mdzes lha yi ji lta ba// khros pa'i srin po lta bu ste// skra dang kha spu la sogs pa/
40a6(rgyud 'bum): spu sogs ser zhing rtsub la 'khril// sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan rnams ni// rtsub cing blo ldan rab tu khros// na bza' rlon pa khrag can ni// steng gi khyams su yod par mdzad// ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT kyi//
40a7(rgyud 'bum): ngar skad 'brug sgra spags glu ni// ri rab 'bum snyil tshal chom ltar// lus rab ltos 'gros brgyan pa ni// gzi ldan 'khyud cing bu sgra 'don// 'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni// nye 'bum dus
40b1(rgyud 'bum): me'i bskal pa 'dra/ / rab gdug mtshon cha du ma ni// lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs 'byung ba// thams cad yi ge hUM sgra can// ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro rnams// b+h+yo yig
40b2(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i bdag nyid can/ / thub pa yi ge muM las bskyed// rgyal sras rig ma nyan thos dang // 'jig rten skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/
40b3(rgyud 'bum): oM sarba saM ska ra pa ri shud d+hed+hamA te ga ga na/ sa mud ga te sa ha pa ri shud d+he/ ma hA na ya ba ri wA re swA hA/ rang gi lus la sems bcug nas// sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi// ngang tshul bzang por yang dag byung
40b4(rgyud 'bum): rig par gyur pa'i sems ldan nas/ / drang srong rdzu 'phrul can du 'gyur// gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nus na// rang gi bde thob smos ci dgos// rang rang rigs kyi lha rnams kyi// gzugs bsnyen phyag
40b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan kha dog ni/ / dkyil 'khor ram ni ris ma las// gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya// de nas mi g.yo khro bo ches// rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas// dag cing gsal la snyan pa yis// tshig gis
40b6(rgyud 'bum): yang ni 'di gsol to/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das// gtum mo mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// nga yi mtshan nyid khyed shad nas// de tshe rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas// rang
40b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis/ / gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to// dag pa'i sems nyid hUM rdo rje// mthing kha'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin// mthing kha brkyang skum khro sems can// na ra'i
41a1(rgyud 'bum): @rgyan bcas 'jigs byed sku/ / gyen smra kha spu na ser dmar// pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ni// me yi nang bzhugs rdo dril 'chang // rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po// bzhi pa'i
41a2(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa de'i gsum pa/ / lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i bzhi// me yi sa bon dgug bas man na// bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin// gsum pas bteg go hUM phaT bcas// gsang sngags rgyal po bla med
41a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dis/ / dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa dang // khyad par du ni 'byung po sel// klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che// nam mkha' lding gi cha byad che// grub pa'i gter gyi don du ni// ser po 'od dang ldan pa yi//
41a4(rgyud 'bum): dmar po dang ni ljang nag dag/ drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang // tshe ring ba la shis pa'o// lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku mchog ni// 'byung por gyur pa'i de ma thag/ sa stengs thams cad mun nag 'khrigs//
41a5(rgyud 'bum): bdud rnams thams cad rab tu tshig/ ye shes me 'od chen po 'di// bzod par bla la gcig ma mchis// bgegs chen log par 'dren pa rnams// dog pa'i sems kyis thag rings 'bros//
41a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags yi ge hUM sgra can// glog 'khrug pa yi 'od zer 'dra// klad par yi ge haM gi gzugs// gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can// 'od dmar tshal pa rab 'thor bas// bgegs tshogs
41a7(rgyud 'bum): sreg cing 'bros par byed/ / bong bu rnga mo khyi spre'u gzugs// ro langs ma lus thams cad kun// ha hUM brjod cing 'bros par byed// rlung gis g.yengs pa'i rdul dang mtshungs// gyen thur haM gi 'phro 'du dang /
41b1(rgyud 'bum): khro bcu sa bon yi ge hUM// me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar// mngon sum rtswa la me bzhin du// snying gi hUM gis 'das nas kyang // klad pa'i hUM gis sreg par byed// 'dod dang phyag rgya lnga yi sku// bskrad dang
41b2(rgyud 'bum): bcing dang myos byed bsam/ / seng ge dang ni glang chen 'brug/ drag po'i sgra skad ci 'dra bar// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlog pa ni// bgegs dang log 'dren ma lus pa// sreg cing phye ma rdul du rlog
41b3(rgyud 'bum): snying nang snying po bstan pa ni/ / 'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tshogs// du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad// lus ngag yid brtan 'khor lo sngags// oM dang aHdang hUM phyor gyis// dpal 'phel dbang
41b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag skyed pa dang / / go cha chen po sgron par byed// na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nA/ ta thA ga tA nA haM/ go cha chen po'i gsang sngags 'dis// rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar gyur na// bgegs rnams sreg pa smos
41b5(rgyud 'bum): ci dgos/ / sa ma ya s+t+waM aM haM gis// ye shes lha dang 'brel bar bya// rgyal bas dbang bskur sbyor bas ni// ye shes dbu rgyan btags par bya// gtso la mi bskyod dbu rgyan can// 'khor kun
41b6(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya/ / bdag nyid yi ger byas nas su// me gzugs shin tu phra bas ni// mtshon mo dus su nyams par bya// sdang ba hUM gi sgra las so// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus
41b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyud las/ lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags sprod tshul gyi cho ga nyon// dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing // byang chub sems las ma bskyed de//
42a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur rjes gnang ma thob la// sdom tshul dam tshig bral ba'i mi// gsang sngags rang nyid len pa ni// byis pa lcags sreg mid pa 'dra// thog ma med sgrib bkru ba'i phyir/
42a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje slob dpon 'di skad brjod// oM/ sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag chu// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems su byed// oM sarba
42a3(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga ta badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na kA ya b+hA ka tsit+ta bi sho d+ha na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yi// rin chen sngags las byung ba yi// dbu rgyan lha rdzas cod pan 'dis// dbang bskur rin
42a4(rgyud 'bum): chen mchog tu 'gyur/ / oM badz+ra d+ha ra shrI badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ rat+na mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ rdo rje chen po bla na med// bzung bas phyogs las rgyal gyur te// rdo rje lta bur brtan byed pas// khyod kyis
42a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang ni rtag tu zung / / oM sarba badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dril bu dbyangs snyan bla na med// sku yi rdo rje rab tu bskyed// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu phung // khams gsum srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// oM sa ma pa
42a6(rgyud 'bum): g+haN+Ta badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM/ snying rje shes rab dbyer med rgya// gang gis thos pa nang gi su// de yi ming mtshan bdag por 'gyur// rtag pa'i dang gnas blang bar mdzod// oM badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/
42a7(rgyud 'bum): thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu rgya// shes rab dbyang
42b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ / rtag tu khyod kyis bzung byas nas// byang chub mchog thob rgyal bas gsungs// oM/ shes rab ral gri bla na med// gang gis 'chang ba rgyal 'gyur te// bdud kyi dpung
42b2(rgyud 'bum): ni gshegs nas kyang / / mkha' la ye shes 'od 'bar 'gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra dz+nyA na khaD+ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ a/ rdo rje zhags thugs rdo rje can// nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong bu rnams/
42b3(rgyud 'bum): thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang // srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzad// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra pA she na a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM/ dbang dang rjes gnang ma thob cing // dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la// bla ma mnyes
42b4(rgyud 'bum): par mi byed na/ / sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gro// log lta can gang bla ma 'tshe// dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro bar nges// 'dir nyams pas ni nad yams dang // dgra bo mu ges rtag tu 'tshe// dkyil 'khor sa
42b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi nyams dga' ba/ / chu klung mtsho 'gram ri ljongs dang // 'bras bu me tog skyed mos tshal// kun dga' ra ba khang bzang mchog/ bzhi mdo ri sul shing gcig rdung // phyugs lhas khang brtsegs glang
42b6(rgyud 'bum): chen bres/ / gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa dang // chu gling mtshe'u 'gram ne'u gsing du// bsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang // dur khrod sogs su las rnams sgrub// las kyi dkyil 'khor khru gang ste// dbang gi
42b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po la/ / thub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa// yang na drug gam brgyad kyang bya// gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du bya// yang na lnga 'am bdun du bya// gza' yi dkyil 'khor khru gnyis te/
43a1(rgyud 'bum): yang na phyed dang gsum par bya// kun tu bzhi cha bo drang ste// khang pas tshad kyi phyed yin te// khang pa gnyis pa cha gsum pa// rta babs rdo rje pad+ma'o// lha snam bzhi cha dag tu
43a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / thub pa'i sgo ni bzhi yin te// gzhan du sgo gcig pa nyid shis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byang gi sgo// chos ni nub sgo rdo rje lho// gza' dang 'jig rten skyong sogs shar// dbang sgyur lha yi gnas
43a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams su/ / bum pa phyag rgyar bcas pa 'am// sku 'am rang rang phyag rgya gzhag/ thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad da ka ra steng du lhung bzed do// gtso bo'i sa ni sor drug ste// lhag ma rnams ni
43a4(rgyud 'bum): sor bzhi'o/ / rigs kyi mtshan mas yang yang bskor// byang du 'jig rten dbang sdud ni// pad dkar rdo rje gdengs por bcas// dbang ldan spyi blugs byams pa'i 'o// shar du 'jam dpal ut+pal+la sngo/
43a5(rgyud 'bum): mer ni kun bzang yid bzhin no// lhor ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// bden bral mkha' snying pad dkar te// nub tu pad ser rdo rje chos// nub byang sa snying pad+ma dmar// gtsug tor gnod mdzes steng 'og char// gtsug tor
43a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni gtun shing ngo / / shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste// mer ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsum mo// rdo rje rtse gcig gshin rje lhor// bden bral ral gri stobs po che// nub tu rta mgrin pad+ma ste// byang du bgegs dgra rdo rje
43a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya/ / nub tu dbyug pa sngon po ste// dbang ldan du ni mi g.yo ba// de yi rgyab tu nyan thos ni// shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang // mo'u 'gal bu dang 'od srungs dang // rgyal mchog dang ni sa stengs skyong // rta thul dang
43b1(rgyud 'bum): ni ba glang bdag/ dra ga shul dbang chen tshangs bu can// b+ha ra d+h+wa dza lteng rgyas dang // dga' bo nye dga' sgra gcan no// de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i steng du lhung bzed do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
43b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor bzang po yi// dbus su ral gri me 'od can// rin chen rdo brag stang du bri// byang du rdo rjes mtshan ma yi// bum pa bri ba byams pa'o// shar du kun tu bzang po yi// rdo rje dkar po bri
43b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / lhor ni me 'od ldan pa yi// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri// nub tu 'jig rten dbang po ste// pad dkar 'od dang ldan pa bri// yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes gzugs can// rin chen rdo steng dbang ldan bri// mer
43b4(rgyud 'bum): ni rab 'bar rdo rje yi/ / bgrang 'phreng pad+ma la gnas bri// bden bral du ni rab brjid pa'i// go cha 'bar ba bri bar bya// rlung du mdzes pa gzhon nu'i lha// rin chen sgron ni bri bar bya// steng du rtul phod ces khro ba'o//
43b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i steng du khro bo yi// 'og tu khro rgyal mnga' gzhug gi/ rdo rje brag stengs zhags pa bri// khro bo lhag ma sngon gyi ni// tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod par bya// brtan pa zhes pa'i pho nya mo'i// chu gri byang du bri bar bya//
43b6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi// mkha' sor ma ni shar du'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi// rnam 'jigs ma ni lho ru'o// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// mdzod spum zhes rin 'phreng 'dzin//
43b7(rgyud 'bum): rin chen rdo stengs shar lhor bri// shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa// 'khor lo me 'bar rdo rje bri// 'bar ba'i gtun shing bden bral du// 'joms pa'i tho ba rlung du bri// thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug
44a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma mdzod kyi phyag rgya dang / / sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHhUM hUM/ ba ba/ maM maM swA hA/ spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba
44a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / srung ba mchog gi sngags yin no// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi shA mu khe b+h+yaHhe he he A dz+nyA ba ra ma ra ga ga na/ A gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn shi g+h+r-i swA hA/ bsnyen pa 'bum la byin ba rlabs dang // lha sgrub pa dang
44a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'o/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid// pad+ma dmar po 'chang ba'o// shar du don yod zhags pa ni// bgrang 'phreng sngon po 'chang ba'o//
44a4(rgyud 'bum): lhor ni nam mkha' dri med de// rdo rje sngon po 'chang ba'o// nub tu gar gyi dbang pad+ma// byang du thugs rje shugs po che// rdo rje nag po 'dzin pa bri// sgrol ma khro gnyer ral gcig dang // yid bzang ma ni mtshams
44a5(rgyud 'bum): su bri/ / khro bo dang ni pho nya mo// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rim pas dgod// de nas phyag na rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad par bya// dbus su phyag na rdo rje nyid// rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o// shar du
44a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas spyan ma yin/ / lhor ni pad 'dzin mA ma kI// nub tu gos 'chang na bza' dkar// byang du sgrol ma ut+pal 'chang // phyogs bzhir nam mkha' dri med dang // shugs po che dang rdo rje tog/ bsnyems
44a7(rgyud 'bum): tshul chen po zhes pa rnams/ / rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o// der yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams// rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya// de yi cha rgyab dkyil 'khor la// drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni// dpung bzang
44b1(rgyud 'bum): la sogs rdo rje can/ / brgyad po byang gi phyogs su bri// tshogs 'chang ba shes gnyen 'gro skyong dang // mthong dkar rigs byed bden bral med// ngan spong brgyad de drang srong shar// lhor ni rdo rje dgra sta ma/
44b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje tho ba drag shul ma// rta rnam dang khro gnyer ma// ro langs ma dang lcags sgrog ma// mthong dka' ma ste brgyang po bri// dug sel rma bya 'od zer can// nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma// dbyangs
44b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan dril sgrog brgyad nub phyogs/ / kun kyang rang rig phyag rgya can// sgo yi phyogs su dgod bya ba// thub pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi// brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa 'jam dpal dkyil
44b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la'o/ / rgyal dang rnam rgyal mi thub pa// gzhan mi thub pa spyan ras gzigs// nag mo che dang uts+tshaSh+ma// gzhon nu 'phrog mo gter 'dzin gyi// khro bo mi g.yo sgo bzhi la// nag po che dang dga' byed
44b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ngan spod dang ni tshogs bdag go// mi g.yo dbang bskur dgyes pa yi// dbus su khro bo mi g.yo ba'i// ral gri me 'od 'bar ba'o// phyogs bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o// 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad
44b6(rgyud 'bum): can/ / rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rgya gram g.yas pa'i phyag tu 'chang // g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang // rin chen zag la sku bzhugs nas// zhabs gnyis pad+ma'i steng du'o// mtshams su khro mo
44b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi po yang / / gtso bo dang mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams// de rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu// sku 'am phyag rgya'i 'phreng ba bri// dkyil 'khor cha yi rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten skyong bcu drag shul can// khros pas rang
45a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs 'khor bcas bri/ / bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri// dri bzang chus bkang lha grangs sam// bcu gnyis sam ni drug kyang rung // kha rgyan dang bcas gzhag par bya/
45a2(rgyud 'bum): bla re ba dan gdugs rgyal mtshan// yon chab bdug spos me tog dang // sgron me byug chab zhal zas dang // gling bu sil snyan na bza'i tshogs// gtor ma dri bzang sman dang bcas// yid 'ong dri zhim
45a3(rgyud 'bum): zas skom tshogs/ / dkyil 'khor sprad nas mchod par bya// sa la pus mo tshad brkos nas// 'bu srin shing rdo dum bu sogs// skyon mnga' bral nas sa yis dgang // ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa'i sa ra//
45a4(rgyud 'bum): me tog gcal bkram mchod sogs bkod// lha ni spyan drangs mchod nas kyang // dge dang mi dge'i rmi lam brtag/ rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas// sa bdag mo la gsol ba gdab// khyad par du yang
45a5(rgyud 'bum): gtor mas mchod/ / bu tshur shog ces theg chen gyi// tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung
45a6(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams/ / mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas// ye shes mtshungs pa med pa brnyes// skyob pa shAkya seng ges kyang // gsang sngags sbyor ba ma nyam med 'das// bdud sde shin tu mi
45a7(rgyud 'bum): bzad pa/ / dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom// 'jig rten 'dul phyir chos rnams kyi// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu khyod blo gros 'di kyis shig/
45b1(rgyud 'bum): u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar// brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ste// skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che// rnyed dka' rnyed par gyur na yang // gsang sngags skyob pa'i tshul 'byung ba/
45b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dka' ste rmad byung phyir// sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho cher 'jigs las// myur du sgrol ba gsang sngags las// sa stengs gsang sngags nor bu 'dra// rga nad 'chi
45b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs spong ba dang / / nyes mdzad grogs gcugs mthun 'dod dang // mu ge dgra tshoms bral ba de dang // zas skom gos rgyan longs spyod pa rtag/ bde bskyed dpal 'byor thob pa dang // myur du sangs rgyas
45b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa yis/ / gsang sngags thabs la myur brtson bsgrubs// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bya//
45b5(rgyud 'bum): sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// deng nas mchog tu brtan par gzung // 'gro la lhag pa'i sems bskyed nas// bla ma la ni
45b6(rgyud 'bum): yon phul zhu/ / yid bzhin nor 'dra bla med sku// zhi ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob// srog gcod chu brdzun mi tshangs spyod// myos byed 'thung dang glu gar rol// rgyan byug mal chen mtho ba dang // phyi drol zas
45b7(rgyud 'bum): spang ba ste/ / brgyad dang bcu gcig bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni gnam stong la// dal 'byor thob pa shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon// sdom pa blangs nas srog bzhin du//
46a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yengs med bsdams te bsrung bar bya// gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'gro bya// lha mi bde ldan lus thob nas// dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dgas gnas// thob gnas spang dka' de
46a2(rgyud 'bum): dag ni/ / nam yang thob par mi bya'o// bdag ni dpa' bo ral gri 'chang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas// bka' las 'das pa'i gdug can rnams// dum bu phye mar 'gas par 'gyur//
46a3(rgyud 'bum): slob ma gzung phyir thog mar ni// bsnyen pas sngags kyi mthu bskyed bya// longs spyod 'phel phyir gtor ma btang // bsod nams 'dod phyir mchod pa brtson// bla ma thos pasam sgom
46a4(rgyud 'bum): la gnas/ / gtong po dul zhing chos spyod mkhas// nad med bzod de snying rje che// sngags sgrub brtson dpal shes rab can// brtags nas slob ma lnga 'am bdun// dad brtson ni dul bla ma
46a5(rgyud 'bum): bkur/ / sdig 'jigs nad med dbang po tshang // dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa gzung // ba phagos pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//
46a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub che// gzhan du med pa phul byung ba// rgyud 'dir bshad pa mnyan par byos// mi ni rin chen dang po ste// gang gang sgrub
46a7(rgyud 'bum): pa de dang de/ / 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ral gri lcags sam shing la bya// sor bzhi pa 'am sor rabargyad bya// yu bar rigs kyi rgya lnga bri// ba yi rnam lnga dri zhim chus// bkrus te dri dang me tog
46b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod/ / zla drug sngags bzlas khro bo sgom// ral gri dud 'thul 'od du 'bar// blangs pas mkha' spyod yul 'gro 'gyur// tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa ste// lha yi bzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs//
46b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'gro bar 'gyur// gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa'am// shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grub// rgyal mtshan nor bu gi'u wang gdugs// lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin
46b3(rgyud 'bum): / sgrub// lha rnams sgrub na thang shing la// gang 'dod lha yi gzugs byas te// sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong // ci 'dod gsol 'debs 'dod pa smra// klu la nA ga ge sar shing // gnod sbyin
46b4(rgyud 'bum): la ni gser las gzugs/ / dri za la ni bo ma'i shing // mkha' lding 'jim pa'i gzugs kyis so// srin po la ni dur khrod shing // gang yang gzugs byas rkang pa ni// g.yon pas de yi ske ma nan te/
46b5(rgyud 'bum): sum 'bum bzlas na mdun du 'ong // ci 'dod sgra tshe dgos pa blang // shar du ras ris kha sprad drung // dus gsum khrus byas gos rlon gyon// sum 'bum bzlas na mar ngo yi// brgyad la 'byung po gtor
46b6(rgyud 'bum): ma sbyin/ / maN+Dal steng du ro bzhag nas// rang nyid rin chen khri stang du// snying po khri brjod ro 'gul 'gyur// mi skrag kha yi nang du lce// pad+ma kha bye lte can mthong // bcad na ral gri rig 'dzin 'gyur// g+ha yi
46b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis tshangs pa yi/ / 'jig rten khams kyi gnas rnams rgyu// gi'u wang bdun bzlas thig les ni// skye bo kun gyis mi mthong ngo // mi g.yo pus mo btsugs pa 'am// 'jam dpal ris mchi
47a1(rgyud 'bum): @drung du ni/ / 'jam dpal sngags 'dis ya bzlas// nya la khyad par mchod pa byas// mtshan rangs bzlas pa'i tho rangs nas// dang po rtags sa g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis
47a2(rgyud 'bum): pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed/ / phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra chen po// ha ha 'brug skad grag par 'gyur// gsum par mkha' la rig 'dzin rnams// me tog char 'bebs chun 'phyar sbreng /
47a3(rgyud 'bum): de rjes rig 'dzin ma lus dang // 'jig rten skyong bas rab bskor nas// khro rgyal byon nas gsung snyan gyis// ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur// rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs// ci 'dod
47a4(rgyud 'bum): par ni smra bar bya/ / grub nas brgyad gnyis cha byad can// rgyan bzang lag na ral gri thogs// lha yi bzhon pa la bcibs nas// rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu// sangs rgyas zhing mang phyin pa'i
47a5(rgyud 'bum): tshe/ / rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas nas// mchod pa chen po thob 'gyur te// bskal pa du mar tshi gnas 'gyur// ut+pal sngon po lig bu mig/ ru rta zangs snod ril bu gzhag/ zla ba gzas zin
47a6(rgyud 'bum): par bzlas nas/ / mig bskus 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyur// bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo // ga na ma lcags rdo rje sor bcu drug/ ngos gnyis rtse gsum dbyibs can te// tsan dan dmar dang
47a7(rgyud 'bum): dri bzang phyug/ cho 'phrul tshes gnyis nya yi bar// mchod cing bzlas na tha mar ni// mar me brgya sogs kyis mchod de// ku sha khres kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje lag gnyis bzung ma thag/
47b1(rgyud 'bum): dud 'thul 'od du 'bar nas kyang // 'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi// 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur// 'khor lo bdun brtsegs mtshon cha dang // gser dang mal lham tshangs skud sogs//
47b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos po thams cad de ltar sgrub// sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung // tshes gcig nyin par sku gzugs kyi// mthe bor dza ti sngags brjod brdeg/ stong phrag brgyad kyis mthe bong las// 'od zer phyung nas reg ma thag/
47b3(rgyud 'bum): dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil gyur nas// 'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyal po thob// sus kyang mi thub lus grub 'gyur// tshe ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas// sa la pad 'dab brgyad pa bri// bum pa skud pa nag pos dkri//
47b4(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan gyis byug dris kyang dgang // pad+ma'i steng gzhag pa stangs 'dug/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas sa gzhigs// pad+mar snang zhing sa gzhir snang // chu des gtor la khru gang brko// blangs pas bskal pa'i tshe tshad
47b5(rgyud 'bum): thob/ / grog mkhar sa la seng ge bya// ga'u wang gis byugs dkyil 'khor gzhag/ g.yo 'gul bar du mchod cing bzlas// seng ger gyur nas rgyab zhon nas// 'dod gzugs lha gnas kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas
47b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur/ / tshe lo khri phrag gcig bskor nas// rig 'dzin chen po'i gnas su 'gro// 'dir gsungs pa 'am ma gsungs pa// sngags dang lha 'dis sgrub pa yis// rig 'dzin grub par
47b7(rgyud 'bum): grags pa rnams/ / ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las/ rig 'dzin sgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas
48a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad bya ba/ / phran tshegs las kyi sbyor ba gtso// gza' yi cho ga 'di yin te// gnod pa sel dang phan skyed mdzad// ba yi rnam lngas byug pa yi// dkyil 'khor
48a2(rgyud 'bum): dbus su pad+ma ni/ / kha dog sna tshogs nyis brtseg gi/ dbus su sangs rgyas de bzhin lhor// chos ni rdo rje chos dkar po// shar du dge 'dun ljang khu'o// nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar/
48a3(rgyud 'bum): byang du phyag na rdo rje ste// byang sha ra du ni 'jam dpal ser// me ra ni ka shin rje gshed ngo gnas// dbyug 'chang ma he zhon pa'o// mi g.yo mgon po srin po phyogs// rta mgrin rlung gi phyogs su'o//
48a4(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum po chos 'chang rgya// sems dpa' khro bo rang rtags so// kun kyang rin chen khri la bzhugs// de rgyab cha la gza' rnams te// shar du nyi ma da ka ra ser ni// rta la zhon te pad+ma
48a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang / / nub tu zla ba dkar po ni// ku mu da 'chang dang bzhon// lhor ni mig dmar kha dog dmar// ril ba'i steng bzhugs me sgron bsnams// lhag pa mdog ser ut+pal 'chang // byang du pad
48a6(rgyud 'bum): stengs bzhugs pa yi/ / phur bu mdog sngon glegs bam thogs// shar lho phyogs su klu la bcibs// pa wa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang // lho nub gser gyi khri la bzhugs// byang shar span pa
48a7(rgyud 'bum): mdog gnag ni/ / tshangs pa'i steng na dbyug pa thogs// nub byang sgra gcan dud ka ni// sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin// rnon po ljang khu ral gri 'chang // gtso bo drug du pad steng bzhugs// na maHsarba
48b1(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM b+ha ki naM swA hA/ nyi ma'i snying po'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya u0f7fsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM sarba tra paM a swA hA/ zla ba'i 'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH s
48b2(rgyud 'bum): arba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM a bI rA ya swA hA/ rnon po'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM su bi shud d+hA swAn+d+ha/ dmig dmar gyi'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa
48b3(rgyud 'bum): ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi suT pa kA ya swA hA/ gza' lhag gi'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM b+hi ka myA d+hA ya sAhA/ pur bu'i 'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te
48b4(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaHsarba saM bi ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM su d+harmA Na ra ho swA hA/ pa wa sangs kyi'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM kr-iSh+Na bar+Na pha ka swA hA/ spen pa'i'o// na maHsarba
48b5(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi kri da la ku ru tsi swA hA/ sgra gcan gyi'o// sngags re brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas// ci 'byor mchod de gsol ba gdab// longs spyod spel cing
48b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa sel/ / nad med bgegs rims 'joms par 'gyur// rims sogs gzas zin nad la yang // sku yi drung du gsol btab sel// zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba// de dag thams
48b7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / mi dang bya rgod sbrul rus pa// skabs gtums nas dgra khyim snga// dgra bo nad skyed nor rnams brlag/ rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar nges// stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu/
49a1(rgyud 'bum): / dgra bo'i sgor sgras bskrad par byed// ne'u le nag po wa sbal rus// rang khrag rtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams// gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor sba// dgra bo 'khor bcas shi bar
49a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / mi tshil dur thal rgya skyegs ni// thod pa so can nad blugs nas// glang gi sgor gzhag khang pa 'jig/ ku sha'i gzugs bstan rkang pas mnan// dbang byar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas na/
49a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po che yang dbang 'gyur na// 'byung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bud med skyes phyugs la sogs la// rang ming ldan pa'i gzugs byas te// rkang pa g.yon mnan ming bcas bzla// gang dang gang yang
49a4(rgyud 'bum): nges par 'grub/ / sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bri te// sngags kyis brdungs na brlag par 'gyur// 'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te// gdab cing brdungs na sel bar byed// phur bus gangab
49a5(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshon chas brag/ / rdo rje ri rab lcog brgyad ldan// sa la byas pa'i thems bar du// gzugs brnyan bcugs ste rkang pas mnan// gzas zin nub mo pa'i maN+Dal// dri bzang me tog sil ma bkram//
49a6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs// dngas ma'i snod du mar bzhag ste// seng ldeng mes ni bskol bar bya// dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang // gter mthong bar yang 'dis 'gyur ro// khros
49a7(rgyud 'bum): pas spyan gyi phyag rgya bya/ / sku mtha' gsang sngags drag tu brjod// dur khrod thal ba gang byin pa// gdon gyis 'dzin nam bran du 'gyur// de nas mi g.yo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags kyi cho ga bshad par /
49b1(rgyud 'bum): ris ma'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum// brjod pas 'di yi bsnyen pa rdzogs// dben par zan gyi chang bu sbyin// des ni rtag tu 'brel bar 'gyur// mdzub mo'i rtse la hUM bkod nas// brjod pas sprin
49b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'dral bar byed/ / dgra bo lhar bcas gzugs bsnyen la// rkang g.yon mnan bzlas lcags phur gdab// bka' nyan 'gyur rog tu bas na shing // skud pa ser po bcings na ngag/ spang
49b3(rgyud 'bum): le ba mnan na mnan par 'gyur/ / ra lpags brabs na bka' nyan 'gyur// srad bu yungs kar la bzlas te// 'chang na gang 'dod srung bar byed// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM tsaN+Da
49b4(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ro Sha Na hU traM b+hU ma hA tsaN+Da/ a tsa la ka na tsU hUM hUM a pra ti ha ta ta thA ga ta dz+nyA/ sma ra hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du// tsan dan sbags pa'i pad+ma ni// sngags bcas ci tsam bsgyur
49b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i grangs/ / gser gyi dong tshe rnyed par 'gyur// bram ze'am ni dge 'dun ras// rgyal po'i ras sam gro ga la// pad+ma mu khyud gnyis ldan bri// lte bar oM hUM ming dang bcas// tsaN+Da ma hA ro Shak+Sha/
49b6(rgyud 'bum): phaT dang bcas pa 'dab mar bkod// mu khyud dang por rtsa sngags te// gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid bri// dri dang me tog sogs mchod nas// skabs kyis dril nas lus la bcang // gdon
49b7(rgyud 'bum): dang nad dang mu ge sal/ / g.yul du phyin na rgyal bar 'gyur// yang na ral gri sor bzhir bri// 'od kyi ri mo nang chud pa// le d+harmA la sogs kyis bskor// dbus su ming dang bcas pa yi// snying po
50a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni khrigs su bri/ / 'dis kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyur// mtho lngas 'khor ba'i bar du ni// mtho gang 'phang du yod pa bya// nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal sngags
50a2(rgyud 'bum): mgo ni gyen du bltas pa bri/ / kha la nye bar rten 'brel sngags// spra tshil las byas dgra yi gzugs// dug dang gri khrag gis bris nas// ming yig gsad par bcas pa ni// ling ga'i snying khar
50a3(rgyud 'bum): bcug byas te/ / dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po yi// dbus su mtho gang brus byas te// nang gzhag steng du spar bu sbub// ji srid mar gyi tshe sa gcig nas// zla ba mi snang zhag bar du// nyin mo rten
50a4(rgyud 'bum): 'brel sngags bzlas te/ / mtshan dus khro bo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags na drag tu brjod par bya// mtshams dang ji srid mtshams bar du// g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i
50a5(rgyud 'bum): grangs su brjod/ / 'jam dpal sngags kyis chos gos srung // bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas ni// mchod rten la ni gseg shang gsil// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang // sngags la 'phya
50a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing sems can 'tshe/ / log lta log par spyod byed cing // sems can la 'tshe byed pa ni// rgyal po khro bo che bcu dang // 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi// ma tshogs gza' dang rgyu skar tshogs//
50a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol// rgyud gzhan dag la grags pa yi// bden pa'i mthu yang du ma brjod// dur khrod sa la mchod rten ni// nag po gru gsum khru gang ba'i// srog shing nag po
50b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa la/ / bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas drakri// gur kum li khris bris pa'o// mya ngan med shing gru gsum la// rgya gram dbang chen rim par bca'// laM s+t+waM b+hA ya nan pa brgyad// phyogs brgyad
50b2(rgyud 'bum): / briba'i rwa dbus la// nye snying ming dang bcas pa bri// de yi lte bar snying po ni// gsang ba'i ming bcas bri ba'o// tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod// ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras/
50b3(rgyud 'bum): sha khrag me tog nag pos mchod// ji srid gsum dang bdun bar du// le lo med par byas gyur na// dge slong dge tshul bsnyen ldan gang // sdom brtson de ni ldan gyur te// sdig ldan myur du shi bar
50b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sna tshogs las rnams thun mong ste// khyad par sbyor ba cung zad bshad// yungs kar bsnun pas 'byung po 'bros// sar ba srung na
50b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo 'am/ / rnga dang dung la bri bar bya// g.yul du 'jug na ral gri sogs// nad la 'khor la chu yungs kar// thod la kor gyis sa phor la// bris te sgor sbas spre'u srung // spra tshil gzugs bstan
50b6(rgyud 'bum): sor bzhi pa/ / dur khrod thal bzlas sgo stengs gzhag/ nad pa gdon las srung bar nges// snying khar ming sngags sprul bcug nas// tsher mkhar btsugs ngag rengs byed// snying le btsugs nas
50b7(rgyud 'bum): khros pa zhi/ / nan tan sems kyis gsod par nges// ling gas brtags kyi nus pa med// yang na rabs chad thod pa la// ming sngags bris te mi khrag bkang // rabs chang ngur sbas rigs
51a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'chad/ / khyi nag thod par ming sngags bcas// dug bkang klu gnas sbas mdzes 'dzin// dgra yi sgor sbas 'byed par byed// zhing du sbas na lo nyes byed// phyugs
51a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas god 'byung zla dang 'byed/ / chu dong sbas na chu skems 'gyur// me dur sbas na rims kyis 'dzin// yang na dgra ming khrag gis bris// spra tshil gzugs kyi snying khar bcug/ mchod rten nag po
51a3(rgyud 'bum): mtho gang ba'i/ / nang bcug dong gzhag lhung bzed sbub// bram ze rigs bzhis sngags brjod cing // nag po tshes nas phyis skor zhing // bden ma'i mthu brjod gzugs brnyan sreg/ dgra bo shi 'gyur the/
51a4(rgyud 'bum): tsom med// gri khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag/ ka tra ta yi lte ma ma la// ka ro ki li dus su ni// gzugs la ming dang sngags bcas bri// rkang pas mnyes na rdul du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin no//
51a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la// sngags dang yul lha'i ming spel bri// lha yi gnas bcug de steng du// sngags bzlas phur pa snying khar gdab// gdug pa'i tsher ma'i hom sbar te// mi rta ba glang
51a6(rgyud 'bum): khyim he/ / sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod// lha khyod yul 'dir thog ser phog// med na bskal par khyod nyid sreg/ de rjes dkar dang mngar mchod do// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po
51a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas sbyin sreg las rnams kun// myur 'grub thabs ni bshad par bya// mngar
51b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum dur ba bsregs pa yi/ / gnod rigs thams cad sel bar byed// ya ma shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing // gdon nad thams cad zhi bar byed// 'o ma can gyi yam shing la// 'o ma dur ba
51b2(rgyud 'bum): til dang 'bras/ / snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs na// gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// ga pur mngar gsum 'bru thams cad// dur ba dkar po pa yim shing rnams// 'o ma can gyi shing la
51b3(rgyud 'bum): sreg/ nad dang gdon rnams thams cad zhi// 'o ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad// phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur// dur ba mngar gsum ming bcas pas// bsregs pas rta phyugs nad zhi byed//
51b4(rgyud 'bum): shar lho nub byang phyogs kyi ni// dkar nAg dmar ser kha dog 'grub// khru gang khru gnyis tshad kyi thab// sor bzhir kha khyer rim pas gtang // sems dpa' pad+ma'i rdo rje dang // gcig pus zhi rgyas
51b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang drag 'grub/ / de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni// ci 'dod thob pa bshad par bya// pad+ma'i chu ba 'bum phrag gcig/ rgyal po 'tho ba ste blon po ni// ku mu da la 'bum phrag gsum// zho dang mngar
51b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang bcas pa'o/ / a ba ma rga ba 'bras bu dang // mngar gsum 'bum gyis yul bdag 'thob// ri bzang 'bum phrag bdun gyis ni// yid la ci 'dod thob par 'gyur// du ra ba til dang 'bras
51b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs sreg/ bud med bu bzang thob par 'gyur// nor 'dod pas ni rkun po yi// lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas// mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni// nor rnams myur du thob par 'gyur//
52a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ yang na rgya yi pags pa la// gur k+Sham kibu ljang srung bas ni// byi ba che brji sar po za// shar na mdzod phrugs bltas par gzhu/ zas kyi ljag mas mchod bya rnying // gsol
52a2(rgyud 'bum): btab pas nor rnyed 'gyur/ / pad+ma'i ze ba ka lig/ pri yang ku ni nor rnyed do// 'bras bsregs pas kyang nor chen thob// ku mu da yi 'bras sogs sreg/ longs spyod che dang sa gzhi 'thob/
52a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi mar// sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol ba// gsum pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// bil ba'i 'bras bu mngar gsum bcas// 'bum phrag gsum du bsregs pas ni//
52a4(rgyud 'bum): rang nyid rgyal po chen por 'gyur// mar dang nyungs kar dkar pos ni// nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsregs na// snying po snying pa rgyas par 'gyur// nas la sogs pa'i 'bru rigs rnams// gang bsregs
52a5(rgyud 'bum): gsol btab de rgyas 'gyur/ / gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can// me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur// spos shing bsregs na 'khor g.yog 'phel// zho mar seng ldeng ma la stong // bsregs na nor
52a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ / de nas dbang gi sreg blugs bshad// til dang 'bras sogs phub ma bsregs// bud med dbang du byed pa'o// pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg gis// byis pa rnams ni dbang du 'gyur//
52a7(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma sbrang rtsi a ru ra'i// shing la bsregs na lha dbang byed// gsum po de dang ku gul sreg/ gnod sbyin rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// mya ngan med pa'i lam shing gis// gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du
52b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas// bsregs pas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur// de nas drag po'i las grub pa'i// sbyin sreg yang dag bshad par bya// ming bcas tshad dang nim pa bsregs//
52b2(rgyud 'bum): bstan sdang dgra bo myur du 'chi// dgra ming dug gis nim pa la// bris te dug dang lhan cig tu// sbrul shun thum po lnga byas nas// thod pa lnga yi nang bzhag ste// lnga po yungs mar gyis bkang nas/
52b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum ni skyed bu gnyis brtsegs la// khros pas gcig tu skra grol bas// sngags brjod thal bar gyur bar du// nyin phyed bsregs na dgra 'chi nges// 'chi ltas 'dab ma rtsa ba shun// ra khrag nyungs
52b4(rgyud 'bum): mar tshwa rgya skyegs/ / tsha ba'i bud shing yam shing la// bdun phrag ming dang bcas pa sreg/ stong phrag gnyis kyis rta phyugs 'chi// bzhis ni bu dang chung ma 'chi// drug gis nye du gnyen 'dun rlag
52b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad kyis dgra yi rang srog 'chad/ / gal te skyabs su 'ong 'gyur na// 'o ma stong bsregs rnal du sos// khrag dang dug phye nim pa'i 'bras// yungs mar la sbags brgya rtsa brgyad// myos byed la
52b6(rgyud 'bum): bsregs dgra bo 'chi/ / yang na rus phye nim pa'i lnga// rang gi khrag gam yungs mar skrag/ yang na ske tshe dug dang ni// nim pa'i 'bras bu gsad par bya// yang na gri khrag gis bsregs pas// byang ma
52b7(rgyud 'bum): myur du gsod par 'gyur/ / nim pa'i lnga dang ra khrag duka/ dri ma lnga bcas gzugs snying khar// ming yig bcug nas phur bus gdab// rig sngags byad ma nyid ldog 'gyur// rgya skyegs mi rus phye ma
53a1(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / mi lpags rlon la dgra gzugs bri// dug dang ske tshe cung zad byug/ nim pa'i me la khros pas bsro// bsregs pas tsha ba'i rims kyis 'chi// dUr ba'o mas sos
53a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang // mi rus phye bsregs phyugs rnams rlag/ cha bsum lan tshwa du rang sbyar// yungs mar ro sla sbrul shun dang // nim pa'i lnga dang mi rus phyi// ske tshe dug skye
53a3(rgyud 'bum): sgog bcing dang / / sgog skya tsher ma'i mi la sreg/ dgra bo khrag tu sgrags te 'chi// rgya skyegs lan tshwa ba glang mkhris// bsregs na mchi nags nad kyis 'chi// sge'u gsher lan tshwa tsha ba gsum/
53a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la/ mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du sreg/ thig nag gis ni gsod par 'gyur// 'o ma can gyi lam shing la// dkar gsum bsregs na sos par 'gyur/
53a5(rgyud 'bum): dri chus spangs pa'i sa las ni// thab 'ang byas te dug gis byug/ nim pa'i 'dab mar dgu bo'i ming // ra khrag gis bris rgyas pas bkris// tshag sum shing gi mer bsregs pas// rgyal po rtswa
53a6(rgyud 'bum): du'achi bar nges/ / dug khrag lan tshwa tsha ba bsam// ming bcas gzugs bsnyan nim pa'i mer// bsregs na dgra bo dmu rdzing ngam// mdzend kyis ni gsod par 'gyur// tshagasum nim pa dug
53a7(rgyud 'bum): dur/ / khrag dang lan tsha'i gzugs brnyan ni// lan tshwa nim pa tsha ba'i mar// blugs nas arga'i shing la bsregs// mngon chen pos bzung nas 'chi// ra khrag tshag sum nyungs mar spos/
53b1(rgyud 'bum): nim pa'i lo ma na le sham// nyungs mar dug bsregs tsha bas 'chi// ne'u sha 'am dug dang tsha// da ru ra lnga tsha ba gsum// sol ba la ni dgra gzugs bya// nyungs mar byugs te bsregs na 'chi//
53b2(rgyud 'bum): tshagasum pa yi 'bras bu yis// nim pa'i 'dab la dgra ming bri// thod par dug nyungs lhan cig gzhag/ da ru ra lnga bcos na 'ching // ris ma byang du bltas nas kyang // rang nyid lho phyogs blta bar
53b3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs dang // 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sogs// sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems// rig 'dzin khro bo'i rgyal po dang /
53b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson// sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro// chad lta sngags 'phyang dkon mchog bcom// bstan la snang zhing sems can 'tshe// mtshams med can 'di sprul
53b5(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / rlung gis 'dar zhing char gyis gsher// mes gdung rdul tshub skabs 'dir skye// seng ge mkha' lding stag khro bos// bcom zhing 'bu sbrang bung rgod kyis// khrag 'jib bya tshogs
53b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la khyer/ / mngon spyod las kyi bsam gtan no// de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa// mi rus phye ma tshe ske tshe// gnod sbyin 'khrig pa dug shing la// tha dad ming bcas bsregs pas ni//
53b7(rgyud 'bum): bskrad dang dbye dang smyo bar byed// dur ba 'o ma ra bcas pas sos// da du ra yan lag lnga 'bras bu// tsher ma'i mes bsregs smyo bar byed// tsha gsum lan tshwas tsha rims bskyed// yang na shing
54a1(rgyud 'bum): skam lta bur bskams/ / dzam pa'i ra dang rang sgyur bcas// dgra bo grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs// khA'i sgo e raN+Da'i mar khus// byugs pa da dur me la sreg/ lab stobs
54a2(rgyud 'bum): khA ta lta bur ni/ / dgra bo sa mtha' kun tu 'khyam// ske tshe mi rus lan tshwa dug/ nyungs mar nim pa'i me la sreg/ dgra bo rtag tu 'thab pa dang // nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par 'gyur// dur
54a3(rgyud 'bum): khrod thal ba sol bar bcas/ / dgra bo'i gzugs byas dum bur mnan// tsham rngam phur bus 'debs pa ni// phol mig nang ngan skyed par byed// bya rgod 'ug pa byi la sha// ne'u la'i bu rnams
54a4(rgyud 'bum): khyer ba'i mar/ / drug cu rtsa brgyang bsregs pa yis// mthun gnyis myur du 'byed par nges// khrag can ras la gzugs bris nas// rkang g.yon skar mnan tsham rngam bcas// 'dod bcas
54a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni drag po yis/ / brgyal dang rims nad mcher nad bskyed// dgra yi sgra dang rkang rjes sa// dgra gzugs dug dang ske tshes byug/ chos mes bsregs na rengs par 'gyur// dgra yi pha rus
54a6(rgyud 'bum): dug rab skyur/ / gzugs byad nim pa'i mer bsregs na// dgra bo gdon chen nad kyis 'debs// phag rtug sna ha arga'i shing // tsher mes bsregs na mgo 'khor 'gyur// ne'u le byi la
54a7(rgyud 'bum): byi tsher spu/ / bsregs na bud med bu rlab 'gyur// mi dang ne'u le khA rus pa// yungs mar nim pa'i me la sreg/ grong dang grong khyer bskrad par byed// stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu// sahA
54b1(rgyud 'bum): me tog na la sham/ / nim pa'i lo ma dug bsregs byed// nim pa'i 'bras bu dug lan tshwa// da dur 'bru ba sregs nad skyed byed// dug khrag dur 'bras bu yis// nim pa'i shing la dgra ming dri/
54b2(rgyud 'bum): tshe gsum lan tshwa khrag gis byug/ lcags snod yungs mur nang bzhag nas// nim pa'i shing gi ma yis btso// dgra bo lha dang 'byed par 'gyur// mi khyi bya rgod rus phye dug/ ske tshe yungs mar
54b3(rgyud 'bum): sbrul shun dang / / nim pa'i lnga dang skyugs lan cha// tsher mes bsregs na nad kyis 'debs// ske tshe dug sbrul tsha ba'i mar// gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung // char ches pa dang thog
54b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bab 'gyur/ / 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas tshangs pa khyab 'jug sogs// 'khor gyi
54b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/ / bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas kyang // snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas thams cad la// thabs dang shes rab bsam du med//
54b6(rgyud 'bum): thugs rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni// mtshungs med rgya che dam chos gsungs// dug gi 'jigs pas sa stangs 'khrigs// nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi// bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'di
54b7(rgyud 'bum): gus na/ / ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stongs par 'gyur// de nas tshangs sogs 'jig rten skyong // rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas// ngam zhing ched du brjod pa 'di// snyan pa'i tshig gis
55a1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gsol/ / e ma sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ sems can kun la sman par dgyes// skyob chen 'jig rten mgon po yis// mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab thabs/
55a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sbyong // 'gro la sman mthong bsgrubs pas ni// lhag pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// byang
55a3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ / ngo mtshar spyan ni gdangs nas su// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// gdod nas thugs su 'gro don chud// rtog med
55a4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin las grol nas/ / bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang gsungs// 'chang byed dang po ngan 'gro gcod// gnyis pa mthong chos dngos grub byed// de rjes 'jigs med nga yi med// dogs pa
55a5(rgyud 'bum): spangs na zad par gyis/ / sa la bzhugs nas sems can don// ma bsams thogs pa med par byed// gsang sngags rgyal po skyob kun la// sbyangs nas 'dod don kun grub ste// nam mkha'
55a6(rgyud 'bum): chu ser dag pa ltar/ / sgom pa bla med yid rgyas byed// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang // gau tse la me tog gtor byas te// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//
55a7(rgyud 'bum): e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// 'gro la phan dang don byed pa'i// cho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang // snying rje'i dbye bas rgyas gyur nas// mnar med la
55b1(rgyud 'bum): sogs ngan 'gro yi/ / 'jigs rnams las brgal pad+ma ltar// rnal 'byor can de mdzes par spyod// de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i// phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus nas// shin tu dam pas snyan
55b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig gis/ / ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog bsam mi khyab// 'khor ba'i mun pa chen por ni// bying bas blta dka' rtogs pa yis// sngags
55b3(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/ / mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang // blta dka' 'byung po drag po rnams// lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur// de nas rig pa'i lha mo che// spyan la sogs pa rgya chen rnams//
55b4(rgyud 'bum): ngo mtshar gyur nas spun gdangs te// snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas rmad du byung // e ma sangs rgyas dpa' bo che// e ma sangs rgyas rab tu zab// chos rnams skye med 'gag
55b5(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs rol pa ltar// sgyu ma gdul bya tshim mdzad pa// spros pa dang bral spros pa ltar// sgyu ma rab tu 'phel bar mdzad// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// stong
