55b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum mi mdzad 'jig rten khams/ / gdul ba dag la rab gzigs nas// 'dul mdzad rdo rje 'chang ba la// ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsung gis ni// ched du brjod pa 'di bstod do// oM zhes dang po phyag
55b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa/ / ser sna rnam par dag nas yo byad dbang thob dang // gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// rab dga' ye shes khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dud//
56a1(rgyud 'bum): tsaN yig dri bzang tsan dan blugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs// tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshel dbang ba dang // las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// dri med
56a2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tshal lo/ / Ta yi nyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i zhi gnas dang // bzod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang // mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes bya'i stobs dang
56a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ 'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 'tshal lo// ma yi gi sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag mthong che ba'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang // khams kyi rnam pa sna
56a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ / 'od byed ye shes gshin rje bshed po phyag 'tshal lo// hA yig ma chags shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs pa che// bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob
56a5(rgyud 'bum): dang thams cad dag tu 'gro ba'i lam dag stobs dang ni/ / sbrang dka' ye shes rta mgrin khro bo phyag 'tshal lo// ro yig 'khor 'das nad bral shes dag las dbang thob// bsam gtan rnam
56a6(rgyud 'bum): thar ting 'dzin dang ni snyoms zhugs pa'i/ / kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang lta ba kun mkhyen stobs// mngon gyur ye shes 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo// Sha yig mnyam nyid sdom chen dbang
56a7(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po rgyal/ / stobs chen dag las mos pa la ni dbang thob dang // sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// ring du song ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'khyil la 'dud/
56b1(rgyud 'bum): NA yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gtso// smon lam dag pas smon lam che la dbang thob dang // dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// mi g.yo ye shes khro bo stobs
56b2(rgyud 'bum): chen phyag 'tshal lo/ / hUM yig hu lu sprin gdengs 'brug sgra gad rgyangs can// thabs dag pas ni ye shes che la dbang thob dang // 'chi 'pho dang ni gang zhig skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs/
56b3(rgyud 'bum): legs pa'i blo gros ye shes khro bo hUM mdzad bdud// phaT sgras bag chags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mtshungs// ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang // zag pa thams cad yang drag zad
56b4(rgyud 'bum): pas mkhyen pa'i stobs/ / chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod mdzes 'dud// de nas chos rje thub pas ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkra ma byas nas// 'dzum pa mdzad pas rab gzigs te//
56b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus// lag na rdo rje mthu chen la// snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mchog tu brtan par rab bsngags pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// mi gang
56b6(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams dman pa 'am/ / mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang // rgyud 'dir zhugs pa'i de ma thag/ gser 'gyur gyi ni rtsi bzhin du// log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang // rtog
56b7(rgyud 'bum): med bde ba'i skur byung ste/ / rmi lam bzang po'i sems bzhin du// rnam 'phrul sna tshogs cir yar snang // mu mtha' med pa 'khor ba'i mtsho// bskal pa'i gzings chen bla mer 'di/
57a1(rgyud 'bum): chags gsang med pa'i tshul duni// khyod kyis rgyub tu gzung bar bya// lag ma rdo rje stobs po rjes// ston pa la ni 'dri ga sol to// chung 'di byung ma thag tu ni/ gdul/
57a2(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba ni rab tu zhi// sa stengs nad dang gdon mug/ bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral// slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir// brtan por bdag gis gzung bar bgyi// dpa' bo mkha'
57a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro drag po rnams/ / yid kyis brtul zhugs phyung nas kyang // rgyang 'di 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang // lha dang 'jig rten pa dang ni// ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro ma// sha sa gnod sbyin
57a4(rgyud 'bum): srin po rnams/ / rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed// rgyud 'dzin longs spyod spel bar byed// ston pas gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin// legs so shin tu cher legs so// rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor
57a5(rgyud 'bum): can chen de/ / rgyun du srung zhing blo 'phel mdzod// de skad kyi ni gsung thos nas// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // mkha' 'gro ma mo 'jig rten skyong // lha klu gnod sbyin dri zar
57a6(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams// dgyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'i// mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor ba'i btson ra nas// lha klu 'bum phrag 'tshe bral
57a7(rgyud 'bum): dkar po dge ba'i kun slong rnams/ / skyes nas byang chub rini chen nor thob mdzad pas rmang byung mtshar// rgyas pa'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shin tu gsang // 'phags pa rdo rje
57b1(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las/ / mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / 'phags pa rdo rje khro ba 'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs so//
57b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kAny+dza ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ ba phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
57b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das lhas ma lta bu na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thubs cig tu bzhugs te// de nas
57b4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i
57b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / rig sngags rnams dang //
57b6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi
57b7(rgyud 'bum): sgyu dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rab tu gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du/ rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/
58a1(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das/ nga ngos 'das stu stsal/ na// rnam gsu byung na/
58a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / gsang sngags rnams dang / sman rnams kyis pham pa de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ sgyu thams cad rengs par byed pa/
58a3(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags thams cad zlog par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mched 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu
58a4(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/ gang bskal
58a5(rgyud 'bum): pa grangs med pa gsum du/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar chad du byas pa las/ ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan
58a6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tsho ba rnams
58a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgyu dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen po dengs bshad par byas/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis sems can
58b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags chen po rnam par rgyal ba chen po zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ lha'i dbang po brgyu byin bcom ldan 'das kyi
58b2(rgyud 'bum): ltar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gas ra can 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ oM hi ni hi nI/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ hi mi li/
58b3(rgyud 'bum): ni hi ra pA ni/ kany+tsA nA pa ti/ lo kA mA te/ b+hU te/ b+hU ta/ man+tha/ a d+hi kr-i te be de be de ta man+ta/ a d+hi kr-i te/ ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ sIn+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ye bi dza ye/
58b4(rgyud 'bum): dzan+ma ni/ stam+b+ha ni bin d+ha ni/ mo ha nI/ a mo g+ha shak+ti d+ha ra Ni/ grah+Na gr-iH/ kA Da ma mA na si/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ stam+b+ha ya stim+b+hi ye/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/
58b5(rgyud 'bum): / lha'i sgra dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang / srin po'i sgyu dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgra dang / dri za'i sgra dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
58b6(rgyud 'bum): sgyu dang / rig sngags 'chang gi sgra dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu dang // drang srong gi sgyu dang sems can dang rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi sgra dang / 'byung
58b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i sgra dang / sgyu thams cad ril ral/ rat+na radz+dza/ d+ham d+hum/ drA d+ham/ rA bi nA ba rA ba na/ krAn tan/ nAn rba ni/ han tan/ sarba bid+ha/ shad+d+ha nAm/ stam+b+ha ya~M/ b+ha su
59a1(rgyud 'bum): ya sUD+yan stam+b+ha ya/ so nan stam+b+ha ya/ barbaHna/ s+thAm+b+ha ya/ ag+nin stam+b+ha ya/ ud nan d+hi tiHti/ d+hA ra Ni/ bA sha ha ste/ be+eSh+Ta ya pA she n+ya/ gang dag bdag la
59a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir rgol ba rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa dang / mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad han
59a3(rgyud 'bum): han/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ban d+hA ya ban d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ma hA mo hA ni/ b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa
59a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig phaT swAhAt+ma/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen
59a5(rgyud 'bum): po gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes su dran par byed na/ de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // de'i sde la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs so// lhas ma yin
59a6(rgyud 'bum): klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis ma ya ni/ nam mkha' lding gi sa ma yin/ mi 'am cis ma yin/ rig sngags
59a7(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gis ma yin/ mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol
59b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang / chu dang / dug dang / rig sngags dang /
59b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so// gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba de nyid la slar 'bab par 'gyur/ de nyid du slar 'gro bar
59b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / ko'u shi ka de lta bas na dad pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la lan bdun
59b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te bdag gi lus la byugs na/ bdag gi lus srung bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang // rig
59b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang sman thams cad dang / byad thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'dod pas/ gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o// rgyal po 'am
59b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshegs gzhom pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'dul bar 'dod pas/ gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o// lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun
59b7(rgyud 'bum): bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba 'am/ tshul lan bdun bzlas pas bdag bsrung bar bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gzungs yi ger bris te 'chang bar bya
60a1(rgyud 'bum): mgul du gdags par bya'o/ / yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul du zhugs na/ dge ba dang bde bar thar par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'di
60a2(rgyud 'bum): stobs kyi nang mi dang / g.yog 'khor dang / sde dang bcas te dag pa dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyur ro// ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas/
60a3(rgyud 'bum): srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor na/ bcings pa dang rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// skya rengs par byas par 'dod pas/ dur khrod kyi sa la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na/
60a4(rgyud 'bum): sgyu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed pas/ zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te 'chos na/ smra ba thams cad kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro// bklag par bya
60a5(rgyud 'bum): kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang gis byas par gyur pa dang / gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'gro'o//
60a6(rgyud 'bum): srad bu btags sam/ chus bdag bsrung bar byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro//
60a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i don thams cad kyang mthun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
60b1(rgyud 'bum): bstod do/ / 'phags pa gaster can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzini mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / thu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur/
60b2(rgyud 'bum): cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
60b3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// na maHsarba bud+d+ha/ bo d+hi satwA nA na/ sa man+ta a mo g+ha/ a pra ti ha
60b4(rgyud 'bum): ta/ shA sa nA nA na/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/ badz+ra satwA ya/ badz+ra bi pu lA ya/ pad+ma saM b+ha bA ya/ pad+ma po na ye/ tad+ya thA/ AM hrIHka ra/ shrI ka ra pra b+ha ka ra badz+ra satwA/
60b5(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra saM b+ha ba/ pad+ma saM b+ha ba/ pad+ma sA ga ra/ pad+ma go tsa ra/ ba ra da/ ma hUM kA ru Ni ka/ ka ru Na saM b+ha ba hUM hUM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shud+d+ha satwA swA hA/
60b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/
60b7(rgyud 'bum): yon tan rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas/ sems can rnams la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa legs so legs so// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang
61a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dgu par byed pa'o/ / gang la lanan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / bran chub par byed pa des ni skyon tan phun sumachogs
61a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing 'jig rten gyi khams gsum po kun tu rgyus ko lta ste/
61a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyug
61a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa/ sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba// srid gsum mo lus yon tan chen po'i bdag/ dri med skyon
61a5(rgyud 'bum): bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ / snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba// rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa'o// bskal pa bzang po rnam par zhi ba'i gtso// shin tu rnam dag
61a6(rgyud 'bum): yon tan chen po'i bdag/ rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod/ rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa// mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes// dpag med pas
61a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung / / skyabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing sel bar mdzad// nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba// srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan// thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems
61b1(rgyud 'bum): can kun pas dpa'/ / 'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog/ snyan cha 'gul zhing pad+ma dag pa bsnams// dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tsugs can// tshul bzang yon tan
61b2(rgyud 'bum): skyed du 'tsham pa'i gzugs/ / 'jigs pa'i rlung chen 'tshub pa'i mtshon cha can// dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu// tshul gyi longs spyod bde can mchog gi rgyu// dkyil 'khor mchog gi
61b3(rgyud 'bum): spyod yul rgyu gcig pa/ / srid gsum sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags// dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te sdig med pa// gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste// mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam
61b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs par 'gyur/ / sa brnyas 'od zer rgyas pa rgyan 'phreng mnga'// chen po'i che ba thogs pa med pa ste// snga ma mun pa kun bsal nyon mongs med// dge ba dag pas spyod yul rnam par dag
61b5(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyi dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag/ srid gsum dbang phyug pad+ma las byung ba// srid gsum bde chen yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste// dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa'o//
61b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rab mchog yangs// nor bu'i rgyan te rdo rje rgyan du thog sa// pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba// dge slong yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa// bde la longs spyod rnam
61b7(rgyud 'bum): badren chen po'i bdag/ smon lam rgya che rgya mtsho ldan pa ste// 'gro ba srid par lhung ba 'grol mdzad pa// sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad// bskal bzang bskal pa stong gis gonang ba 'o//
62a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mchog gis sgeg pa'i dkyil 'khor can// yon tan rnam grangs khyang par dkyil 'khor ba// dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba// de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen
62a2(rgyud 'bum): spyol yul can/ / cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan// lha chen brgya mnga' sum cu gsum bdag dbang // lha dang lha min dbang bcas rnams kyis btud// brtson 'grus
62a3(rgyud 'bum): brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'/ / bsod nams brgya mang mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba// pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung // dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste// chos brgya ldan
62a4(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog stong ston pa po/ / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa// bskal pa rab 'byam mang por mkhas pa ste// dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku// 'jig rten
62a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po/ / rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// rab dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thod// na bza' dar dkar la mnabs 'od mdzad
62a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa lags// cha phrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes// dpa' bo'i nyi ma 'od zer rgyan mnga' ba// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra'ong
62a7(rgyud 'bum): gsal zhing / / nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa// me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i lha zhes grags// gtsug pud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag/ btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen
62b1(rgyud 'bum): nang du skyes/ / rang gi rigs gsal dbang chen dkyil 'khor ba// pad+ma bzang po'i rigs mchog thig le'i mtshan// spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa// gsang sngags mang po 'dzin
62b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang phyug po/ / tshogs chen 'dun ma 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags// spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa// ka la bing ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul// mda' dang
62b3(rgyud 'bum): rus gzhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams/ / stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pos bdul// rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par sprad pa ste// rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod//
62b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mchog dga' byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa// chu srin 'dzin khri 'jigs las rab grol mdzad// gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab sbyin pa// lha yul grol ba'i khyad par
62b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor can/ / mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'// stabs gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan// 'jig rten nang na mkhas pa sprin ras gzigs// sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor
62b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can/ / 'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes// nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa// mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste// rab zhi kun las 'phags
62b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i spyod yul can/ / don dam tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba// theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags// dul dang sprin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes// skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom//
63a1(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po// bde ldan kos rgyun yang ba sna tshogs can// bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzad// rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa
63a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo/ / bde la longs spyod che 'byung dri ma med// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa// ming dang srid med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten
63a3(rgyud 'bum): mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po/ / stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags// sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs// dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub
63a4(rgyud 'bum): par dka'/ / khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs// khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba'i// rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma dri med
63a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag gi dbus bsnams pa/ / thor tsugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs// spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba// rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas
63a6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / mchog chen rdo rje'i glu la bstod pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sil legs pa mnga'// ci ste la la rtag tu ngag mchog 'dod// spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni bstod byed pa/
63a7(rgyud 'bum): des ni ring po mi thogs yon tan gyi// longs spyod mchog chen chos ni thob par 'gyur// mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la// spyan ras gzigs dbang ngam pa sbyin par byed// sdig pa rnams
63b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur/ / 'dod pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob// de ni sdig pa'i dri mas mgos te// lam srang bzang por dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur// srid gsum skyabs bos gcig
63b2(rgyud 'bum): pu pad+ma skyes/ / de 'dra'i chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur// de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing // gang zhig rtag tu bde bar 'dod pa yis// 'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs//
63b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis// bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
63b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang
63b5(rgyud 'bum): chu ba sems dpa' byam sa pa sa rang gi snying po gsungs pa/ na ma s+t+rai pa d+hI kA nA na/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha rA/ tsau ra tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ra/
63b6(rgyud 'bum): b+hA ra b+ha ra/ ma hA b+ha ra/ kam+ba kam+ba/ ma hA kam+ba hUM/ ma hA s+pha re Na/ d+harma a gra sA ga ra swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma gzungs chen po ni
63b7(rgyud 'bum): yon tan che ba ste/ mtha' yas par khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi
64a1(rgyud 'bum): khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar bar
64a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'o/ / sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongs su thar par byed pa de shin tu dkon pa'o// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pas nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings
64a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rgyan 'phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po thabs
64a4(rgyud 'bum): brnyes pa/ / rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste// 'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal// da rab chen po mngon par rgyas// tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste// de bzhin gshegs shing rdul dang bral// dbang
64a5(rgyud 'bum): chen brtse ldan 'ong ldan pa/ / sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon// rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste// mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon// yon tan bong rgyas bsgyings pa ste// nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thogs
64a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / srid gsum dag na dpa' ba'i sku// rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can// lhun po zla 'byin ti se yi// rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po// dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa// rab tu dga' ba
64a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin des/ / yongs su dga' ldan chen po'i lha// che ba lho rnams kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas gdung rgyad rgyas mdzad cing // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas longs
64b1(rgyud 'bum): spyod longs par spyod/ / sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// ti sa zla 'byin bzhin du gnas// sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa// rdo rje'i pad+ma legs par skyes// chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod/
64b2(rgyud 'bum): sadang mnyam pa thub par dka'// snang bar mdzes pa 'byung ba'o// srid gsum ye shes nyi ma lags// gtso bo chen po cher grags pa// seng ge chen po stobs po che// cha logs chen po zhal cheg
64b3(rgyud 'bum): skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul/ / rdo rje byu ru be DUR+Ya// nor bu'i dbu thong rgyan du thogs// b+hu ru gser gyi gcal bkram la// sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs// zhal gdangs nyi ma
64b4(rgyud 'bum): du ma'i gzi/ / lcang lo cod pan dbu thod can// rig sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la gtugs// rjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod// nor bu rgyan 'gul 'od zer gyis// brang gi phyog
64b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams dag par byas/ / cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba// nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan// ran chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing // dri med dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro// rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa
64b6(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / 'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can// 'od zer mang pos phog pa yi// phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa// brjid pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa yi// 'od kyi zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod// dpung
64b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan 'od zer spel bar bkod/ / tshon bris shin tu mdzes par 'tsher// lhun po phrad cing 'khrug pa ltar// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrog/ rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo can// shin tu dga' mdzad
65a1(rgyud 'bum): bde sbyin pa/ / byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos// btsan pa kun las rnam par rgyal// snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste// mtshon cha chen po shin tu 'bar/
65a2(rgyud 'bum): byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can// kun nas dpa' ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// ma pham thub med dam pa ste// sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam meng che// byams pa'i snying po snying po che//
65a3(rgyud 'bum): byams pa'i pad+ma las byung ba// rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can// rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud// de bzhin bstan cing bstod pa'o// grub
65a4(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po'i rig sngags grub/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad// thams cad grub mdzad grub pa'o// sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags// gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges//
65a5(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa// nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi// snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad// 'bar ba rtsa mar 'od snang ba// dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste// gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos
65a6(rgyud 'bum): / dbyings dang // nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges// swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog/ 'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad// stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa// nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags// stobs
65a7(rgyud 'bum): byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan/ / mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can// dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med// dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes
65b1(rgyud 'bum): ston/ / rlung chen shugs kyis baspyod pa yis// g.yo dang 'brug sgrog snga ldan pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul bad+ma ste// de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes// mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes/
65b2(rgyud 'bum): khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nas sa yi dbang phyug po// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la// bstod nas kun mkhyen gnod bral ba// thub pa'i nyi mas bka' stsal pa// kye ma
65b3(rgyud 'bum): ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ ming gi yon tan 'od ldan la// bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa// thabs chen bla na med pa ste// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// 'jig rten kun gyi bde byed pa// 'di ni bton
65b4(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis kyang / / sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi// byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis// mi ni la la gang bstod pa/
65b5(rgyud 'bum): de la lha la sogs kun dang // lag na rdo rje stobs chen rnams// rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun// gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni//
65b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te// 'di la the tsom yong med do// nang par mal nas langs nas ni// gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod// de la byams par rtog pa yi// byams pa bde legs byed
65b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / de phyir dri ma thams cad rnam par sel byed cing // sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs//
66a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa byams pa'i mnan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// oM m+b+ha ma/
66a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim
66a3(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// oM swa sti ka mA la k+Shi bi pu la sam+b+ha ba/ d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra swA hA/ gzungs
66a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa'ang g.yos par gyur/ rnga bo che dag gi sla'ang grag par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no//
66a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po dkyil 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i
66a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi gzungs 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba/ bsod nams chen po/ sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon
66a7(rgyud 'bum): cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la/ shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// pad+ma lta bur 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so// nyi ma lta bur
66b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad snang bar byed do// zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad rab tu sim par byed do// nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis
66b2(rgyud 'bum): mi gos so/ / sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mtho dman med do// lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so// thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis
66b3(rgyud 'bum): mi gos so/ / de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rjod pa dang / ston pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas
66b4(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis gang ci'ang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs
66b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / mgon med pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan gzan dang /
66b6(rgyud 'bum): mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/ bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad
66b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis ha ha nas ca co dang gzhabaton te/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan
67a1(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog/ 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/ sems can
67a2(rgyud 'bum): dag pa bla med rin chen mchog/ thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen// thar mkhyen chos mkhyen pade dang mi bde mkhyen// lam mkhyen gtse
67a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen/ / dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyen// 'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog/ lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog/
67a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog/ dag mchog stobs mchog mchog dang mchog min mchog/ zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab// 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rgyan gyi rab// rgya rab sngags
67a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/ / mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab// legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min smon// thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min smon// dge sgron gzi sgron
67a6(rgyud 'bum): nor bu bod kyi sgron/ / rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron// mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od// legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od// 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i
67a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba/ / rdo rje'i dbang po'i 'dren dbang sems can dbang // rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po// rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun chad med dbang // dpa' bo rig sngags
67b1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang / / rdo rngubabang po rdo 'od rdo rje 'bar// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje' b.rabs brgyan// rdo rje'i 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag/ don gyi chen po rab mchog dbang // na bka' sngo zhing skum
67b2(rgyud 'bum): lugs sngo/ / sku mdog sngo ning sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// ral gri no 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams// mkha' sngogazhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs// lha zhal ji med shin tu mi bzad 'bar// rab tu dral
67b3(rgyud 'bum): la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur/ / sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrug byed 'phreng mchog can// glog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brtan// ral gri mtshon thogs dang ldan mthu stobs mtshon// rdo yi mtshon thogs mnga' dang
67b4(rgyud 'bum): mdung thung 'jigs/ / 'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul// gsal shing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa// bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje dbyug/ sku rnams thams cad nyi ma'i
67b5(rgyud 'bum): bod kyis brgyan/ / grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad// mu tig 'phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis// sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa brnyes// rab 'jams mchog brnyes sa la
67b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa brnyes/ / mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la// rig pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa// bde 'dren zhi ba 'dzin cing 'od 'dren pa// cha lugs gsal mchog darab chen po
67b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dren/ / byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren// legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying brtse can// dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar// rnam grags sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can// 'gro ba'i
68a1(rgyud 'bum): skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen/ / longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ skung mar sku mthon sku mdzes sru bzang ba// sku ser spu dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/
68a2(rgyud 'bum): sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku// rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams// gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog/ cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog/ dpal 'dzin rin chen dam
68a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'chang ba'i mchog/ sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs// rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu// srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 'od stong mnga'// ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra
68a4(rgyud 'bum): shis pa/ / yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags// nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od// nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar// yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu// nam mkha'i dkyil
68a5(rgyud 'bum): nanor bu gcig snang ba/ / sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags// srid gsum bsrung ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog/ zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os stag/ skye dgu'i bdag po pad byung pad+ma skyes/
68a6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba// da rab legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag/ blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang // mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan// zhi mdzad rgyal
68a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas/ / 'od kyi 'byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad// legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa// snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad// rnam grol nges
68b1(rgyud 'bum): grol shin tu grol ba'i blo/ / blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags// kun tu longs spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog/ blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs// sangs rgyas pad+ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i
68b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal/ / dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad// snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul// ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba// spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad legs pa// 'jig med
68b3(rgyud 'bum): zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra/ / mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs// drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes// rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris pa sla// rab tu drag pa
68b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyen rab gser mdog can/ / lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams// spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan ma gsum sel// 'od bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mda'// na bza' bzang mnabs
68b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen/ / legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mda'// na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal// zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra// zhal mdangs bstan pas
68b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad/ / bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'// zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gas la mdzad lam me ba// dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba
68b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / sgra snyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan// blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog/ rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chemazhal dang ldan// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa
69a1(rgyud 'bum): mgon sras 'phreng ba bzang / / stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags// mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu// rgyu 'ja
69a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i mda' dang rdo rje can/ / mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan// ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs// gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad// brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur
69a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags// gcig pu skye dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen// rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes// dbang bskur brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas//
69a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags// skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas// bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa//
69a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang // nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi// mdun 'dug nang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang // de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing // dri ma'i gnas
69a6(rgyud 'bum): kun las kyang thar par 'gyur/ / g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzang dang // mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na// mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dang bskyed nas// nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod byed pa// de ni 'jigs
69a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / / sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol// des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang // bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur// bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba 'am//
69b1(rgyud 'bum): / rgyal srid 'thob dang byang gzugs nor 'thob dang // rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi sgrub phyir// bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de phyir ci ste rtag tu 'dod pa de kun// 'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba//
69b2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la// rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang bstan par bgyi// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
69b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po kun tu bzang po nam mkha'i dkyil kun
69b4(rgyud 'bum): rab 'byam ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal bar brnyes pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs can byang chub
69b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa/ yon tan chen po'i skus kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog
69b6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
69b7(rgyud 'bum): po kun tu bzang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun tu yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su
70a1(rgyud 'bum): gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
70a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sangs rgyas 'byung ba
70a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog/ lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas
70a4(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di bshad do/ / tad+ya thA/ oM na mo na ma s+thi/ b+hu ba na/ shwa re/ ma hA/ b+ho gA ya/ a sam sa ma/ a mr-i ta sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma/ ga ka na sa ma/ trib+hU ba na sama?/ a she Sha su ma/ be Sha sa ma/ pa ra mAr+tha sa
70a5(rgyud 'bum): ma/ swa b+hA ba sa ma/ tarba tA sa ma/ a ra dze sa ma/ shud+d+hi sam/ bud+d+hi sa ma/ d+harma ta b+hU tA sa ma/ a b+hi Sha sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ e kA nA pa sA ga ra/ bi shud+d+hi/ A lo ka/ hI k+Shi/ lad+d+ha laSh+Ta/
70a6(rgyud 'bum): bi dza ya bi dza/ au/ pra sa ga ta/ na ya na ya/ ha ma ni ra d+hiSh+ThA na/ saM b+ho ga/ a a na la ya la ya/ d+harma a kra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza ya/ nAM hUM/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swAhA/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo/
70a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor
70b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yo bar byas nas 'di skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byas so// de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'od zer 'bar/
70b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing snang la/ rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de/ dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste smras pa// kye ma snying rje chen po dang / yon tan grang
70b3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen mo/ / kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing / sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
70b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la/ lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar
70b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i gzungs chen mo/ bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par bsags shing / bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la/
70b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa/ rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang mi nus na/
70b7(rgyud 'bum): gzung ba dang / bklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba lta ci smos/ gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka' 'o// kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sems can gang dag gi lag
71a1(rgyud 'bum): na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o/ / 'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin
71a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o/ / yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// 'di lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis brjod
71a3(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ / lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan rnams 'thob par
71a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// shing gcig bsgrengs kyi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams
71a5(rgyud 'bum): cad thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug le lan bdun brjod na bsam gtan chen po thob par
71a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur la/ nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pa mchod nas lus ngal bar gyur gyi bar du gzungs
71a7(rgyud 'bum): chen mo 'di brjod la/ ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pa de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de
71b1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi snang ba chen po'ang stsol bar mdzad do/ / 'di skad du/ rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod tshe brjes nas sa chen po thob
71b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsung ngo / / de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro// mthu che ba dang che bar grags par
71b3(rgyud 'bum): yang 'gyur ro/ / lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo // nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o// sems can thams cad la'ang phan pa
71b4(rgyud 'bum): dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ / de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags
71b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / lha la sogs pa'ang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa
71b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rdo rje'i gtsug pud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang / rdo rje snying po
71b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje'i zhabs pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen mo rnams dang / rin chen dra ba can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang / lha mo sgrol
72a1(rgyud 'bum): ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / dar chen dang / gzugs bzang dang / shin tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams dang / gzhon
72a2(rgyud 'bum): ma rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang / lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / ma mo la sogs pa srin mo
72a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/ byang chub
72a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po'i michog 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sna tsho ba kun gyi 'byor pa che// dkyil
72a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag/ rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che// gzi brjid chen po stobs po che// gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab// khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros
72a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal/ / rdo rje chen po rab tu bshad// sgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa// rol mo chen pos rnam par rol// rab dga' chen pos 'dul ba po// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste// btsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i
72a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ sa stengs sa 'ogs la dgyes// de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa// dul dang sbyin pa'i go rims thabs// rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags// bshes gnyen can te bzod la dgyes// brtson bkrus
72b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba 'byor pa che/ / brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcub// stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste// mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang // yongs su ldan zhing bcus la ba// rdul sa la rgya mtsho chen po ste// rgyal
72b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba/ / rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs// cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa mdzes pa skal pa bzang // shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa// snying po chen po las byung ba// nyon mongs
72b3(rgyud 'bum): bral ba thub par dka'/ / sa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' dang // rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can// gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs// rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra// rmugs dang spro bzhi bar mdzad// thub par
72b4(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil/ / g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes pa ste// g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa// gsung bzang ngang pa'i mdangs su bzhad// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras// dbang po'i las lhag thub dang mnyam//
72b5(rgyud 'bum): chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan// rab dga'i bun longs zhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs 'dam rdzab skems par mdzad// dbang po rgyags pa'i rims nad sel// khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms// gsung snyan
72b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa nyid dang mnyam/ / mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang // mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das// sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig/ byang chub snying po rgya cher rol// rim pa rab ston dge ba ste/
72b7(rgyud 'bum): spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge/ gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa// dag mdzad sreg mdzad mchog sbyin po// 'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'joms// 'thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po//
73a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba// skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag/ nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa// sems can 'khor bzhi mdzad pa// brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral/
73a2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba po// kun tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor can// kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad// kun tu nyes pa sel ba lags// mi bzangs 'og rnam par dkrugs// de bzhin zad mdzad thug par mdzad//
73a3(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs// nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad// 'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phrog mdzad pa// rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad// rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa// sdang ba thams cad
73a4(rgyud 'bum): nges par 'joms/ / pha rol zhugs pa'i sdig sel ba// dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can// dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin// 'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa// ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin// longs spyod sbyin zhing
73a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal sbyin pa/ / dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin pa// nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can// gzugs bzhin dbang po rnam par rgyal// dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa// bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs// sa 'dzin
73a6(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar dka' ba po/ / dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa// 'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad// rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam// sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba can// yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan// brtan
73a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog che ba'i chos nyid can/ / gsung ba chen po shes rab che// sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa// mchod pa chen po thag chen gyi// theg pa bla na med par ldan// mchod pa chen po'i chos che ba// 'bras bu chen po chos kyi
73b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston papo// zhi ba de bzhin ni mdzad pa// bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid// kun tu rab 'byams la mdzad pa// snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen// snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
73b2(rgyud 'bum): can/ / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs// dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad// mtsho mchog dang ba rab mtho ba// rtsod chen 'das pa spyod yul can// skye dgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa// rnyed par dka' ba'i dal
73b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor can/ / kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba// dga' ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po// kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste// zhes bzang po rtag tu mnga'// dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma lag//
73b4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thobs// mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen// spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mkhyen// slob dpon chen po
73b5(rgyud 'bum): grags pa che/ / dam pa nyid de bla na med// gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad// de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni// yon tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas// dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs// yon tan 'byung
73b6(rgyud 'bum): ba rig sngags rgyal/ / gtsug na nor bu thogs la sogs// mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang // sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs// kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya/
73b7(rgyud 'bum): ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin// mi rnams la la gang zhig gis// sdig pasal kun tu bzang po la// snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na// des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don/
74a1(rgyud 'bum): mi yon tan yongs rdzogs shing // de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi// ye shes ma lus smra bar nus// de ltar thub mchog sras pos yon tan brgyal spobs las nges par 'byung 'gyur zhing /
74a2(rgyud 'bum): yon tan sna tshogs byung dang 'jig rten no// yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams la// bstod pa chen po rnams byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/ stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba zob
74a3(rgyud 'bum): cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur/ / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// 'phags pa
74a4(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa/
74a5(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra tsaN+Da/ sarba duSh+TAn ta ka/ ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ de nas gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo //
74a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to// lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du
74a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ sdang ba sel ba/ 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig/ rdo rje 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba lags so//
74b1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang / dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / zos na don mchis
74b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs skyed pa dang / gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa skyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang
74b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyid pa dang / sdang ba 'joms pa dang / sdang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dugasel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid
74b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs par bgyis pa sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi
74b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyid pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal skyed pa dang / skal ba bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams
74b6(rgyud 'bum): cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa
74b7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byad stems dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang /
75a1(rgyud 'bum): skrod pa dang / srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jig pa chen po byung ba na/ nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la/ bcom ldan 'das
75a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing lan bdun brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / grub pa chen po'ang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad du'ang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can
75a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so// de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas/ rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstong pa
75a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ / rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che// rdo rje snying po stobs po che// rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che// snying rje chen po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jin
75a5(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / rdo rje hUM gi hUM lags te// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs pa po// chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che// chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che// phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste// spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags//
75a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che// mthon mthing dbu smras brgyan pa lags// ral gri sngon po ral gri che// dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can// mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngo ba// 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan/
75a7(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs// rdo rje spro ba'i stobs che ba// khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che// sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel// khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod// khro bo bgegs ris sel bar mdzad// gzhu ba snams was
75b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bsnams pa ste/ / rdo rje'i mangs ni nges par 'gums// dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams// rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms// rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che// 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog rab tu khro// sna tshogs
75b2(rgyud 'bum): sku ste thig les bris/ / gzi brjid skyed pa grags mdzad pa// bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod// sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa// drag po chen po rdo rje khro// skyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad// gting
75b3(rgyud 'bum): dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/ / rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'// rgya mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan// dam pa'i ti se lhun po'i ri// gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po// spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum// rig sngags
75b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang mchog rdo rje can/ / rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags// na bza' rnga gong rtsa dmar gsol// mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes// srin po srung ba drag po ste// me tog 'phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes//
75b5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od// 'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed// grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po// rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod// mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba// mgur bzang zhal bzang
75b6(rgyud 'bum): dam pa lags/ / cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od// phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa// ye shes che ldan srung ba che// rlung mar lags te spyod yul ring // gtso bo sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs// 'jigs
75b7(rgyud 'bum): las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa/ / rgya chen gtsug na nor bu thogs// mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon// 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig/ gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug pud gsum// 'dod pa'i lha
76a1(rgyud 'bum): ste snang chen mtshon/ / zab po ste 'jigs par mdzad// mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa// tsha mtshom med de srin las byung // rtag par dkar dgyes dus 'byor pa// rgyu skar rgyal ris
76a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar mdzad/ / rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste// bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags// bai DUR+Ya ltar dri med sku// mdzes shing stobs skyed sna tshogs stobs// dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar
76a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog/ lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste// brtan pa dpa' bo lam me ba// bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod// dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba// mtshon cha che rdzogs gcod pan
76a4(rgyud 'bum): can/ / rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba// pad+ma chen po phyag ring ba// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mdog/ nag po chen po 'byung po che// gtum chen thog thog chen po ste// rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje
76a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa/ / rtul phod thub pa brtson pa ste// 'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje// zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon// brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems// rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba// rdo rje yi ni dkyil
76a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rgyan/ / rdo rje lcags mangs sreg mdzad pa// rdo rje mdas ni rnam par sbyong // rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo rje rtsal// ye shes dam pa theg pa che// thabs brnyes snying rje chen po lags//
76a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can// spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po// rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan// mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen// rdo rje chen po dgon pa po// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje chen po gang
76b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyangs sgrog/ me tog chun po 'od gsal ba// dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras// nges pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags// sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog/ rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje gtsug sdung shes
76b2(rgyud 'bum): rab car/ / rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes// mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag/ bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags// dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang // rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed// gsang ba pa ste gsang
76b3(rgyud 'bum): ba gsung / / skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba// rdo rje thog thog sgra chen sgrog/ rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms// rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba// nor bu spras pa'i na bza' gsol/
76b4(rgyud 'bum): spos dang me tog 'phreng gis brgyan// dbu yi snyan cha gdug kor btags// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dbang phyug chen po grags pa che// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil
76b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor can/ / sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ba ston pa po// dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod// de nas
76b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa/ / rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi// rdo rje brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di// ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung // sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa// ming ni brgya rtsa brkyang pa 'di// dad pas gang zhig 'chang byed pa//
76b7(rgyud 'bum): grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // ces pa kun las rnam par grol// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rnab tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che// gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// de ni snga
77a1(rgyud 'bum): pa kun las grol/ / ngan 'gro kun las thar par 'gyur// gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di// su zhig nang par langs nas brjod// rgyal po blon po grong khyer ba// gnyen rnams kyang ni
77a2(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar 'gyur/ / bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa// 'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang // tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa bzhin//
77a3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nang par langs nas ni// lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod// de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang // ldan 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la// bgegs dang
77a4(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren thams cad dang / / 'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang // zil gyis mnan par mi nus so// shes rab can ni gang zhig gis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// gzugs bzang stobs ni
77a5(rgyud 'bum): skye ba dang / / bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don// mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa lag na
77a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ / @'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags
77a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing / mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gzhon nu
77b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur bathugs drim dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/ yon tan tam med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ zhabs brten gyi pad+mal lba dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'byung
77b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi sbyor tshugs dang cod pan g+hi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
77b3(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho/ ma hA ma Ni/ ru tsi ra ka lA pa/ bi tsit+ta/ muk+ta dA ma/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ pa ra ma satwa mo tsa ka/ ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma/ ko Sha d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma/ lab d+ha/ bi dza ya/ su rata
77b4(rgyud 'bum): bam+b+ho ga pa dar sha ka/ kle sha ga ra/ pra sha ma ka/ shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba/ a nu swa ri/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra/ ba ra ta/ ba ra Na da da/ oM ma hA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma sa man+ta/ b+ha dra/
77b5(rgyud 'bum): sa min+ta san+d+ha ra/ sa man+ta mA ka ra/ sa man+ta pra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ he he many+dzu ra ba/ ma hA badz+ra ma hA khaH/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ bir dza bir dzA/ karma a ba ga ma ka/ ku ru ku ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ su ru su ru/
77b6(rgyud 'bum): mraru mu ru/ d+had+had+had+ha/ d+hud+haR+thar+d+ha/ ma hA mahA/ mahA many+dza/ mos la mo ha sa/ b+h+yob+ho/ b+hI ma d+hI ma/ nad na/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+hi saH/ mo tsa ya/ mA man+ta tha/ mnu sr-i
77b7(rgyud 'bum): a pA la duHkhan su kha da ma hA bA ru Ni kA/ anA rbo ha~M/ duHkhi to ha~M/ sar dzoH/ u bid d+ha dza~MH/ a bi bak+toH/ kum+bi doH/ mA ra Na nA mo ha~M/ tran b+ha ga bAn duHkhi tA nAn/ su lan dar+tha/
78a1(rgyud 'bum): a mAn+ma/ sarbAT+Taka/ sa dzas/ b+hU 1/ u ba thun n+dan/ sa rob trab/ pra shamaka/ ma bajig tanan/ Ta sha lasan+d+har/ pa 'i pUr miSh+Ta/ bas
78a2(rgyud 'bum): sa Sh+Ta / / sa / mamaM// sa pa d+hig tan/ rbok+kapa/ shwA // par shAn / sasa? zhan/ ste pra shas sardzams/ ya n+na hA/ sazlas /
78a3(rgyud 'bum): sa ri ba rbaT/ du la nim/ nA shas/ sarba ku sha la rnaMrma/ pa ri pU ma me/ ur+tha/ sarba kasaM/ a b.raNi/ kle sha par tAm/ ba~M ma~M ki ra/ man+ta bo d+his rbA sa d+d+he d+hi bI pA ra mid+da/ yo gam+be/ sin+ta
78a4(rgyud 'bum): dzas/ A ba raH/ u0f7f/ bi nAg pa radza/ sar+b+ba ha pra dzaH/ d+hi rIH/ sa ma khasam/ dz+wal ni ni sa ma/ me nus ma/ ma hA ba d+hi satwA/ ba rad swAhA/ rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di/ 'ja p
78a5(rgyud 'bum): a'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ / de ma thag tu sems can rnams// skye dang rga bzad par gyur// ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas// bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/
78a6(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur// sdig bzhi par byed pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang // grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed// 'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/
78a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing // gang tsho rig sngags bshad pa na// brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas// rgyab dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// sa gni de yi tshen g.yos// sangs rgyas 'od kyis snang ba yis
78b1(rgyud 'bum): sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur/ / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams// stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes// skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smra// lha rnams
78b2(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ / thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas// gang na rdo rje ral gri che// de yi rlung lhags smras pa ni// phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la//
78b3(rgyud 'bum): shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can// bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa// sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang // sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag/ shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes
78b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs/ / drag po drag po rab 'joms pa// gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal// dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe// rdo rje can de snying sbyor ba// mi shes pa yi rab rib sel// sgeg pa'i cha lugs
78b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog mnga' ba/ / skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes// gzhu stobs can la phyag ring ba// nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad// mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// me tog 'phreng rgyan sna tshogs can// spyan
78b6(rgyud 'bum): bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/ / dgyes shing na bza' sna tshogs gsol// 'jam pa'i dbyangs te rab tu bzhad// dkar gnag 'byed pa'i spyan mnga' ba// ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu bsgrags// rab tu dga' ba ston par dga'/
78b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan// rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can// tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste// sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad// cha lugs sngo bas skyong ba// lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad//
79a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel brtan// rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa// brtan po rnams la brtan par grags// yon tan dag gi phyogs su bzhad// btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa//
79a2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags// stobs po che la shugs che ba// phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po// sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste// mdzes shes rab srung ngo tsha shes// dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog/ dkyil
79a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po ston pa po/ / dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste// dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can// zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan// ha ha swA hA'i bdag che
79a4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam// hUM gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po// lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud// de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis// zhabs 'bring
79a5(rgyud 'bum): gad rgyangs chen po can/ / rlung drag mun pa sel bar mdzad// 'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags// gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba// drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba// mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu
79a6(rgyud 'bum): can/ / 'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu spyod// sprod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa// nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba// nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs bzhin// tha le ra bzhugs
79a7(rgyud 'bum): shing rgya cher bzhad/ / mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad// nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin// dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sprin// gzugs sprin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa// dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs/
79b1(rgyud 'bum): gnon ri// kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad// 'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa// zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa// dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can// nor bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/
79b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron// rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po// ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa// dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog/ 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste// 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin
79b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dkar bsngo ba 'od bzang ba// mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags// ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba// de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston// shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad// stong nyid chos ni lhur
79b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ / byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen// rnam par grags pa gsan pa nges// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los sgyur// 'jigs
79b5(rgyud 'bum): med blo gros shes rab can/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dzin pa// mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste// zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa// lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur// sems can thams cad 'jigs med
79b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / sems can kun la rab ston pa// brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi blo la mkhas// sred med bu ste drag shul stobs// me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste// byis pa'i sku mchog mchog sprin la/
79b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsed me rol mo ston par mdzad// phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad// bdag gir mi mdzad rtul med brtan// mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa// bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po// mi mchog brtson pa bskyong du
80a1(rgyud 'bum): med/ / de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal// brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// mya ngan med cing gnas pa med// 'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang // dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam
80a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'joms/ / tshad med nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs// mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog/ gshin rje 'pham mdzad skye dgu srung // las dang nyon mongs rab bsregs pa/
80a3(rgyud 'bum): ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags// legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan// brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing // dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di// lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad// bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren
80a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang // mdangs 'phrog rkun po rgod rnams kyis// de ring legs par bstod par gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab// bsgyings pas lha yang bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun la bltas
80a5(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / 'di skad du ni tshig smras pa// khyod kun rtag tu bgegs med cing // nges legs thar pa thob gyur la// 'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog/ nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig/ de nas rab tu cher
80a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhad cing / / 'brug chen sgra ltar sgrog pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas// shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul// sems can gti mug bsal ba'i
80a7(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs// shan tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur// kye ma bsod nams cher bcas pa'i// sems can rnams ni rab sbyangs phyir// dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/
80b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad// la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas// sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi// grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am// yang na nyan tam sems kyang rlung // de yi don kun 'grub
80b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa// de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kyi sa chen yang // ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob// byang chub sam
80b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams kyis/ / rab dga' shin tu dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur// ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// sa chen dam pa de dag kyang //
80b4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi// sems can chen pos mi thogs par// tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang // sems can kun la sdug pa dang // spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi//
80b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang // sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing // bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di// sor mo bcu yi thal sbar nas//
80b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su// nang par langs nas su brjod pa// de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang // de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams// gnod sbyin srin po mang po
80b7(rgyud 'bum): dag/ rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang // de bzhin rdo rje'i mchog 'chang rnams// de la nges par srung bar byed// de ni sangs rgyas
81a1(rgyud 'bum): skur bzhugs shing / / mnyam par bzhag pa snang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams// bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag/ dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis// rgyang mngag nas
81a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag kyang 'tshal/ / de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas// 'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so// lan cig bklags na tshangs chen dang // bsod nams mnyam par thob par 'gyur// shes rab chen po gang zhig/
81a3(rgyud 'bum): gis// nyi zer mtshan mchog brjod byas na// dri ma med cing rab dag la// rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang // sems can thams cad dga' ba yi// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob// mtshungs pa med cing
81a4(rgyud 'bum): stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang / / 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing // yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi// gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin//
81a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
81a6(rgyud 'bum): pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mr-i ta/ bin+du dza ba/ ma hA su kha swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
81a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag gams pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i tshis
81b1(rgyud 'bum): can khyod kyi gzungs sngags padi byung bas/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzungs sngags 'ad thos pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pag ng+gA'i klung bcwam
81b2(rgyud 'bum): bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gang la la'i rnalam du grags par gyur pa de'ang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar rgya ches brgyad
81b3(rgyud 'bum): dam/ tshes bco lnga la smyung bar 'dug cing / gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod la/ bskor ba
81b4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas bzlas brjod bya sa na/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
81b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad
81b6(rgyud 'bum): sel bar byed do/ / de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen po sa gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
81b7(rgyud 'bum): ba la btud nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che// byang chub sems dpa' tshul tshe ba// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshalo//
82a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing // nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba// skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lam srang gcig pu'i tshul ston cing //
82a2(rgyud 'bum): theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa// theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te// theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// snang ba chen por snang ba brnyes// yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag/ zla ba bzhin du 'od
82a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar ba/ / 'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal// theg pa chen po dag pa che// sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams grags pa// rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal//
82a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal// dpa' bo chen po nyon mongs choms// bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste// rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal// zla ba chen po nyi ma che// lhun po chen po dbang phyug che//
82a5(rgyud 'bum): lha chen mgon po chen po ste// 'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing // sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa// kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che// rnam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
82a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa ste// chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags// ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che// sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sku mdzes yon tan snying po mkhyen// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan//
82a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas la mo ste don yod che// ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// bstan pa gnas dbang bdag po ste// bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste// yangs pa dri med shes rab can// snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// zab
82b1(rgyud 'bum): cing brtan la rnam par gnon/ / zhi ba 'jig rten dag par mdzad// ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na// dpa' btsan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom// 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jom
82b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / zhi bzhi mdzad bde 'byung ba// chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che// bde 'gror gnas pa dri ma med// rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen// nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
