82b3(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo yangs pa rnam par grags// sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa// snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog/ dkon
82b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/ / rnam gsum mkhyen pa brnyes pa'i bdag/ rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi// 'byor pa brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes// bskal pa
82b5(rgyud 'bum): dgun grangs med para'o/ / tshogs chen bsags khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes// sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba// ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo//
82b6(rgyud 'bum): ti nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa// nyes gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel// ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba// mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal// mgon po chen po snang ba che// sdug bsngag chen po'i dri ma sel/
82b7(rgyud 'bum): zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa// yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa// chos kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs// dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa// rin chen mtha'
83a1(rgyud 'bum): yas khyod phyag 'tshal/ / rdo rje chen po dri med mchog/ rdo rje mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'// nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan// ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'// de bzhin
83a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs dang yul gcig pa/ / sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong // shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras// sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje rtsal
83a3(rgyud 'bum): can rnams kyi rtsal/ / rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen chen po rin chen blo// rin chen rdo rje'i 'od che ba// rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung // rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa// stong pa nyid kyi yul
83a4(rgyud 'bum): brnyes shing / / ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston// stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan// stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can// dag pa rnam dag sa dang bral// chos gcig
83a5(rgyud 'bum): las byung snang ba po/ / 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags// 'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa// 'jig rten chos las snang bar 'das// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes// rgyan par mdzad/
83a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dkyil 'khor dag/ nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste// phyag chen skye bo kun la phan// sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyod pa// dga' ba'i
83a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog/ dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can// dga' ba ldan pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sgeg chen 'dzin zhing dgongs par ldan// rnam par sgeg la spyod pa brtan// rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog/ sgeg chen khyod la
83b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ sgrib pa
83b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sel mdzad la/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// rdo rje bstan pa rnam grags pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yis// dkyil
83b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor pa/ / gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa// 'di dag so sor rjod byed na// nga ni nyes pa kun zlog cing // rtag tu de yi phyi ba zhi ni 'brang // nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis// sgrib pa thams
83b4(rgyud 'bum): cad sel ba la/ / blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa// de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ nang par langs nas rjod byed pa// sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur// bgegs rnams kyis
83b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang yongs su btang / / sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang // de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang // ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing // sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// gang zhig nges par gnas byas la//
83b6(rgyud 'bum): ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa// de ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa// ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba// gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bstan pa la// ring por
83b7(rgyud 'bum): mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
84a1(rgyud 'bum): @#/ 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM suM b+ha ni
84a2(rgyud 'bum): suM b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA pA sha/ ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha/ badz+ra satwA swA hA/ de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// ti sa'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur//
84a3(rgyud 'bum): sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras// skal ldan chen po legs so legs// sa stangs khyod kyis yang bar byas// khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing // yon tan dpag med
84a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog bskyed pa/ / sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang // nyes pa zlog cing thos pa 'di// 'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na// nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te// ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag/ 'dam gyi nyes pas mi
84a5(rgyud 'bum): gos bzhin/ / lus can dag la su yang rung // khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa// de dag las ni gcig tsam yang // byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog/
84a6(rgyud 'bum): thos nas mos par byed pa dang // nges par yon tan thams cad kyang // thos par 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor// langs te sa yi dbang phyug po// sa yi snying po sa mchog la// ming brgya
84a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad smras pa ni/ / sa yi snying po gtso bo che// glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// cod pan can te sa brnyes pa// phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog/ rigs ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas// gtso bo dge
84b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyong ston pa po/ / gzhi bcas ldan pa'i klung gi tshul// swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog/ snying po snying po mkhyen par grags// gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol// sa yi/
84b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gar stabs can// sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan// 'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po// rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen// snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med// mgon po sangs rgyas gzug
84b3(rgyud 'bum): mnga' ba/ / shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs// 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal zhing // kar stabs chen po ston pa po// ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra// nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa/
84b4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma chen po nyid yin te// dbang phyug chen po 'bar ba bskor// yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa// sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can// chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che// yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtsho/
84b5(rgyud 'bum): yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog/ thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste// theg pa chen po 'jigs pa med// mchod pa chen po sgra che ba// zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can
84b6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje 'chang chen mtshon brgya pa/ / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor me tog thod// blo gros chen po phyag ring ba// pad+ma chen po stobs po che// sngags 'chang chen po stobs cher ldan// sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags// lag na rdo rje yon tan
84b7(rgyud 'bum): nges/ / nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan// mnyam nyid 'byam la longs spyod pa// rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can// rdo rje'i 'od lnga rdo rje ldan// sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin// sa la longs spyod longs spyod che// mtshon cha g.yo ba
85a1(rgyud 'bum): phranas mtshogs/ / rab byam snod na rnam par grags// snga ma khas rdo rjerab 'joms pa// spyan gyi ming tsam dam sa ste// me ton sngon pamazod kyis bcings// sgrob chen po byan mi
85a2(rgyud 'bum): brtan po brtan pa bde sbyin pa/ / ded dpo dpal bzang chen po ste// gangs can lhun po lta bu lags// dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang // btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug/ 'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas
85a3(rgyud 'bum): tshangs/ / de bzhin nyid tshul spyod tshul can// rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa// dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// gzigs pa ring ba spyan yang ba// nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med// thogs pa med dpogs rin chen
85a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsug/ srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu// dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal// dag pa gtsang ma gso sbyong can// rnam par gnon pa yul las 'das// ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che// stobs kyis grags pa rgya
85a5(rgyud 'bum): che ba/ / bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can// dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed// sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa// mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan// dga' ba rgya cher rab 'byung ba// rigs mkhyen rigs
85a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po mkhyen/ / rigs kun tu ni mchod pa lags// rgyal po rigs chos skyed pa'i rten// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rjes 'og rab grags pa// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// mngon par 'phags pa
85a7(rgyud 'bum): khyab par mchog/ mgrin bzangs nad dang bral ba lags// skyong mdzad ston padag pa ste// sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa// sgrol ba smin mdzad sdud par mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btud//
85b1(rgyud 'bum): pa sa ma na rjo pal/ rdo rdzordzogs yong ma rnams ma// ma
85b2(rgyud 'bum): sa/ / c-i pas bye ga sa ma nga // shA ldan pa la ma dzug/ 'kho bdam dgas /
85b3(rgyud 'bum): la spyod phul ba/ rdorje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags// rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba na// 'byung ldan rab 'bum shes rab can// ma lus grags pa'i 'ong ba'ang ga// sa mi snying po snying po che// rdorje po snying po rnam par
85b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dren/ / dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs// khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil// dga' ba dang bskyed pa ste// ye shes
85b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen spyod yul ba/ / rlung gi drag shul lta bur grags// drag po lags te drag sel gtsang // rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la zhi// rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad// lhun po ti sa ma la yas// spyod yul
85b6(rgyud 'bum): zab mo gnod pa ste/ / rin chen rdo rje snying po che// sa gzhi spyod yul mnga' ba lags// rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa lhur dgyes pa// shugs drag dpal
86a1(rgyud 'bum): gshi na lags/ / pags sa dpal ma dag cangasaste/ phyogs 'i nga phyug pang phyug // des po rgya can pa// ming rgyam brgya mcho rnams / rdo rjemams
86a2(rgyud 'bum): n-i/ / rdordzas nas sa/ 'on na shes mas/ sas bzlog pa mas sa// ma she ma mas
86a3(rgyud 'bum): dra pa'adi/ / thams cad rtsub byed dga' s+ho// rjeg pa thams ci nges pa bdang // ji mthun bral yon na ngas// de byir sgrib pa thams cad kyis// phun sumatshogs pa 'dod pa mas// nga
86a4(rgyud 'bum): dge ba 'di/ / rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi// gnas mchog blan med pa ste// dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yi// yid ni shin tu dang ba yis// sa mi
86a5(rgyud 'bum): snying po mtshan gsal ba/ / 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i// yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang // dpal yon rgya cher 'dzin pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mi ni gang zhig rjod byed pa// sdug bsngal
86a6(rgyud 'bum): kun las myur du grol/ / 'phags pas 'i snying ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma~M tri pra tid+han+ta
86a7(rgyud 'bum): man+t+ra ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra pA ya/ na mo b+ha ga
86b1(rgyud 'bum): shAH su na ye/ tathAg ta ya/ ma te/ samyags prad+hA ma/ tad+yASh+TA/ oM mdzi ta mdzite/ a ba dza/ a dziHstA / har ha/ me b+hi sa pa lo ki te/ kar kar/ mahA sa ma pa sid+d+he/
86b2(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ra b+hA ra/ ma hA bo d+hi mar+d+ha dzIdzA/ s+pha ra sma ra/ Asma ka sa me ya/ br-id+hi tsa d+hi/ ma hA bo d+hi swAhA/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma nya ma hI/ ma hA mo hi swAhA/ snying po'o// oM mu ni mu ni s+phA ra swAhA/
86b3(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i snying po'o// gzungs 'di nyan pa tsam dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la sems pa dang / bsgoms pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
86b4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na/ bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur
86b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ri dgas dang bya rnams kyi rna khung du sgrog par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo// 'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du'ang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur// ngan song gi
86b6(rgyud 'bum): drims kyang mi gos so/ / mi'i mngal du'ang mi skye'o// lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i longs
86b7(rgyud 'bum): spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can de bskyed par mi bgyi lags so// nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas de ji ltar gyur kyang rung / bla na med pa yang dag par
87a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ / 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du
87a2(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Dal ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
87a3(rgyud 'bum): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
87a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas// chos gos phrag pa gcig
87a5(rgyud 'bum): tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/
87a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
87a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por ni chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas
87b1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
87b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na/ des ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang
87b3(rgyud 'bum): po la shin tu phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste legs so legs
87b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis/ mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing / dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig/ oM mu ne hUM ma hA/
87b5(rgyud 'bum): bI ra swA hA/ snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do// oM hrI hU~M pad+ma pri ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o// oM me ha ra Na swA hA/ byams pa'i snying po'o// oM a gar+b+ha ya swAH
87b6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po'o/ / oM ma swa hi rA u0f7f la kA thA/ kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o// oM ku ru ba na ra ha swA hA/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o// oM shrI a ra ga swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o// oM ni mA ra ba swA hA/
87b7(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o// oM k+Shi ti ha ra dza swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gri
88a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na/ de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
88a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa
88a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / da na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan
88a4(rgyud 'bum): la phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta b+ha ba nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
88a5(rgyud 'bum): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab byang chub kyi shing drung na/ 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas 'khor
88a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / rigs drug gi sems can thams cad la spos dang / sman dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nas/ bcom
88a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba 'di rnams sems can rnams kyi don du byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung
88b1(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhal zas kyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng dur dkar po la chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bas zhal zas kyi dri ma dag par gyur to// yang zla
88b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a dkar po bsams te/ zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang yo byad du gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du oM zhes pas 'phags pa dang sems can thams cad mnyes shing tshim par gyur to//
88b3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje ltar byas te gzungs 'di gsungs so// oM sarba d+harma tA badz+ra sid+d+ha hUM/ oM a mr-i ta hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoHbi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA khaM ud ga te s+pha ra Na/ i maM ga ga
88b4(rgyud 'bum): na khaM swA hA/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa na sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu mchod pa'i zhal zas kyis mchod nas/ 'phags
88b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad mnyes pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
88b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang / bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa thams cad kyi pho brang dang / sems can thams cad kyi
88b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dpag tu med cing brjod kyis mi khyab pa brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa 'byung zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang
89a1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te chos kyi
89a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa dang / bdag gi zang zing gi sbyin pa 'di bde ba dang dga' bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag bzang skyong legs so// dka' ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu byed pa legs so//
89a3(rgyud 'bum): nga'i 'khor lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / khyim bdag bzang skyong rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
89a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de dga' bar gyur to/ / bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs
89a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa'i gzungs/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas na dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba la chos ston to// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa dga'
89a6(rgyud 'bum): bo bas mtha' zhig na chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug pa las/ de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ gzugs byed mi sdug pa/ shin tu rid cing skem pa/ kha nas me
89a7(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba/ mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phra ba/ sgra 'dzings pa/ sen mo dang mche ba ring la rno ba shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas/ dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod de ste zhag bdun na tshe'i
89b1(rgyud 'bum): dus byas te/ yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// dga' bos des smras pa thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ yi dgas de la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag tshe'i dus byas nas yi dgas kyi khams su
89b2(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur ba 'di thabs ci byas na sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ de nas yi dgas des/ dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te khyod kyis sang gi nyi ma la yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig
89b3(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad ma re re'i zhal zas mchog dam pa phul te/ kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/ tshe ring zhing yi
89b4(rgyud 'bum): dgas kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe dga' bos yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba lus mi sdug pa dang / shan tu rid cing skem pa dang / kha nas me 'bar ba dang / mgrin pa mo khab
89b5(rgyud 'bum): tsam la sgra 'dzings pa dang / sen mo dang mche ba ring zhing rno ba'ang mthong la yid du mi 'ong / mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas lus skyi bung zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te/ myur bar bcom
89b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas lus smad ltas la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus 'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs
89b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol zhes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag pas mtha' zhig na chos yid la bgyid cing mchis pa las/ yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba des
90a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/ / khyod da ste zhag bdun nas nges par tshe'i dus byas te yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// bdag gis de la thabs ci bgyis na/ yi dgra
90a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhes dris na/ des bdag la khyod kyis yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa brgya stong snyed
90a3(rgyud 'bum): la zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji lta bur yi dgas dang drang srong la sogs pa de snyed kyi kha zas 'byor par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//
90a4(rgyud 'bum): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod 'jigs par ma byed cig/ khyod kyis yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang / drang srong la sogs pa la kha zas dang gtor ma mang po 'byor pa'i
90a5(rgyud 'bum): thabs ngal yod kyis yid blong bar ma byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga la gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs
90a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba yod de/ gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na/ yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang / drang srong la sogs te mang po'i kha zas dang gtor mchog par 'gyur te/ de dag la
90a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa gcig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro/ / dga' bonga'ang bram zer gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang
90b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba las gzungs 'di thos pas na/ de'i dbang gis yi dgas tshad med pa snyed dang / drang srong mang po la kha zas dang gtor ma byin par gyur te/ yi dgas kyi khams su
90b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa de dag kyang sdug bsngal las rnam par grol nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes par gyur to/ / dga' bo khyod kyis zung zhig/ bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kyang 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// /
90b3(rgyud 'bum): / dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig tshe
90b4(rgyud 'bum): ring bar 'dod dam/ bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod na/ rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/ yang na dus thams cad du byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba
90b5(rgyud 'bum): med do/ / snod gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la chan nam/ phye 'am/ 'khur ba la sogs pa cung zad cig btab ste/ lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag ste/ gzungs 'di lan bdun bsngags nas/ de bzhin
90b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yi dgas thams cad skye ba
90b7(rgyud 'bum): mang po'i ser sna byas pa mi dge ba'i las bcom zhing bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshan
91a1(rgyud 'bum): nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po byad gzugs mi sdug pa bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam klas la phyag 'tshal
91a2(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po'i skom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba dang chog cing 'grangs par
91a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po'i 'jigs pa thams cad
91a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bral te yi dgas kyi khams zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis// dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu sa
91a5(rgyud 'bum): gol lan gsum byas te/ gtor ma'i snod blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste sa gtsang mar blugs par bya'o// de ltar gtor ma byin par byas na/ phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya
91a6(rgyud 'bum): stong snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro/ / kha zas de dag yi dgas kyi yid bzhin du za ba dang / cho ga 'grangs pa dang / yi dgas kyi khams spong ba dang /
91a7(rgyud 'bum): mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te dge slong pa'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis kha zas la bsngags te yi dgasal sbyin pa byin na
91b1(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams tshad med pa snyed yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de las sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par med de tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams dang / mdangs
91b2(rgyud 'bum): dang stobs skye zhing 'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas ma rungs pa thams cad kyis gtse zhing gnod par byed mi nus
91b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gzhan la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gal te gang zhig bram ze dang drang srong la sbyin pa byed 'dod na/ kha zas yongs su dag pa snod gcig gi nang du bkang ste/ gzungs sngags lan
91b4(rgyud 'bum): bdun bzlas te 'bab chu gtsang mar gtor na/ de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zas mchog dam par gyur te/ des na bram ze dang drang srong de dag kyang sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thob nas/ sngags kyi byin
91b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis so so nas sngon chad ci dang ci la dga' zhing mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams su yongs su 'gyur bas/ so so nas mthun par dus gcig tu de la tshe ring ba dang / mdangs dang / stobs su ldan te bde
91b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/ / gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong ba dang thos pa'i sgo nas yongs su dag cing / shes pa mi nor ba dag tshangs pa'i lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing yongs
91b7(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yangs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa byer mi mas
92a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gal te dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/ spos
92a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te/ dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs kyi bu pho dang / rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas de
92a3(rgyud 'bum): lha rdzas kyi zhal zas su gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bstod pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa dang / rjes su
92a4(rgyud 'bum): yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha mang pos rtag tu srung zhing skyob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
92a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / dga' bo khyod kyis 'di rjes su chos bzhin yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas par ston cig dang / bsod nams tshad med pa
92a6(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / yi dgas mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga
92a7(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skyan shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / sems can
92b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/ / de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas chos mngon sum du byed pa na/ mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la

98a4(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs/ / shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de
98a5(rgyud 'bum): yi 'khor rnams dang / / de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs//
98a6(rgyud 'bum): de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor
98a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lho phyon
98b1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par skyong byed pa/ / rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang //
98b2(rgyud 'bum): de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad
98b3(rgyud 'bum): cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par
98b4(rgyud 'bum): lhags/ / rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// nub phyogs mngon par spyod byed pa// rgyal chen
98b5(rgyud 'bum): grags dang ldan pa ni/ / klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ong /
98b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig
98b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ / dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyi mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul
99a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ / kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par bzhugs// byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/
99a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bya// do ni nye du lhan cig tu// klu dang kar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du
99a3(rgyud 'bum): 'ongs/ / rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang
99a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/
99a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni
99a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags skyes po/ / nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni
99a7(rgyud 'bum): skyong bar byed/ / gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /
99b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de dag gi ni khol po rnams// mchod rten mang la gnas bcas pa// slu byed g.yon can sgyu ma can// sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang // ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu/
99b2(rgyud 'bum): de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal
99b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin dang // gnod sbyin chen po dang // gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang // dmag dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas lhags te// 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang //
99b4(rgyud 'bum): ba ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang // mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang // stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang // ri mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng ldeng ba
99b5(rgyud 'bum): dang g.yon can dang / / gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcagos mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring
99b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'khor dang bcas/ / 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro nas ji snyed yod pa yin// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//
99b7(rgyud 'bum): kha dog ldan zhing thags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni// 'jog po dang ni yangs pa'ang 'ongs// la ba dang ni bkyogs
100a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog dag/ srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags// klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni// yul 'khor srung dang glang po che// 'jigs byed che dang sa srungs bu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i klu yang 'ongs/
100a2(rgyud 'bum): gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshil du mngon
100a3(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs/ / gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len// stobs ldan mig rno 'dab chags bya// de ming 'dab bzangs khra bo yang // mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'ongs// de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin// ston pas
100a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dab bzang bde mdzad cing / / gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la// sangs rgyas skyabs su nye bar song // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du'o// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha
100a5(rgyud 'bum): dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ / dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lag na rdo rjes pa ma byas shing // rgya mtsho rten pa'i lha min rnams// thams cad nor lhas skrag
100a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur cing / / mtsho la skyabs su 'du shes pa// thag bzangs ris dang rab bkra dang // rab sim byed dang btang bzung dang // stobs ldan bu ni brgya po kun// rnam snang byed bu'i bu rnams dang // stobs ldan sde dang
100a7(rgyud 'bum): sgra gcan bzang / / dpa' chen khyod kyi dus lags shes// dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du// go cha bgos te lhags pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul
100b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ / kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// chu lha mo dang bu mo dang // zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs// mdza' bshes
100b2(rgyud 'bum): ma yang chu lha can/ / lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs// sa dang chu dang rlung gi dang // me yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dang // ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/
100b3(rgyud 'bum): snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing //
100b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// khyab 'jug lha dang gzhon can lha// mtshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur// zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis// zla ba nyid ni mdun du bdar// nyi mar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis//
100b5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma nyid du mdun bdar cing // char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag/ rgyu skar rnams kyis mdun bdar lhags// thams cad bzang po rdo rje can// brgya byin khyer 'jigs 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag
100b6(rgyud 'bum): kun/ / kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//
100b7(rgyud 'bum): kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni// me lce'i rtse 'dra mchi ltas can// zhib mo dang dka' bzlog ma/
101a1(rgyud 'bum): me tog gos can 'ongs gyur cing // rgyu ba mo dang mtshan chings bzang // 'chi med rnam pa du ma dang // gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa// 'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs//
101a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par
101a3(rgyud 'bum): lhags/ / rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// sngobasangs sngo bsangs chen mo dang /
101a4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang // rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du// yid rab 'khrug ma'ang 'ongs gyur cing // phag mo phag mo chen mo dang // slong ma nges ma lhan cig lhags// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun//
101a5(rgyud 'bum): kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan//
101a6(rgyud 'bum): kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang // gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing // skra dkar mo la
101a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa dang / / gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur// 'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang // sbal ma rnam pa du ma dang // dag pa dang ni 'od can ma// ma mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags// bcu tshan tshogs bcud
101b1(rgyud 'bum): dag kun/ / kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing
101b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od dang ldan/ / kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang // nag po btab pa du ma dang // lum bi ni
101b3(rgyud 'bum): dang lum bi mchog/ skar ma zhes bya legs smon dang // 'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du// dbang sgyur rnams kyang lhags par gyur// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser
101b4(rgyud 'bum): skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ / snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams//
101b5(rgyud 'bum): dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha tshogs drug cu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khor pa dang /
101b6(rgyud 'bum): gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du
101b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par zhugs/ / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/ tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba// kun 'gyed gzhon nu skar rgyal te// sa sor dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag dang /
102a1(rgyud 'bum): cig 'grogs te der lhags pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams//
102a2(rgyud 'bum): dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo// kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang // bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor zhing // de dag rnams
102a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs/ / gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i tshal du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing //
102a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas// skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi// lha rnams de dag der lhags shing // dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so// nag
102a5(rgyud 'bum): pos smras pa'i tshig la ltos/ / 'dod chags kyis ni 'di bzung la// bcing ba gyis dang khyed la legs// 'di dag kun nas yongs sdud la// 'di dag gson por ma btang zhes// de na nag po snga bo che//
102a6(rgyud 'bum): sde rnams la ni skul byed cing // khros shing rang dbang med gyur nas// rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te// lag pas la brdabs nas ni// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ste// de nas lha yi sprin 'phreng
102a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / glog dang bcas pa'i char yang phag/ sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te// de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag
102b1(rgyud 'bum): bdud sde mngon par lhags gyur gyis/ / nges par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa// brtson par byed pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas ni// de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas// de dag chags bral yin
102b2(rgyud 'bum): par rtogs/ / rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni// slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'/ de dag g.yul nas rnam rgyal zhing // 'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin// / bar gyi sdom ni/ bdun
102b3(rgyud 'bum): stong gser can ri mnyam dang / / de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srin dang // kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnams// de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang // klu dang 'dab bzangs lha min dang // chu lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang //
102b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang // dkar mo bde byed dbang phyug dang // kun 'gyed gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang // dbang bcas bdud dang dge slong ngo // // de nas gsang ba'i lha'i bu shin tu dbang che
102b5(rgyud 'bum): bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs par gyur nas/ de'i tshe tshig 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo bshad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di dag gis mdo 'di yang dag par
102b6(rgyud 'bum): bsnyed par bgyi zhing / yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ te dze te dza ba ti/ tsi ta tre tsi ta tra ba ti/ ta le ta la ba ti/ kha me kha ma pa ti/
102b7(rgyud 'bum): k+She me k+She ma ba ti/ b+had dre b+ha da dra ba ti/ ya she ya sha ba ti/ tU de dU ta ba ti/ tsa pa le tsa pa la ba ti/ kha tse kha tsa bA ti ti/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams
103a1(rgyud 'bum): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rmongs pa ma mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po
103a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las srung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ / 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// de la bro nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// gang du klog pa der dge bar
103a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / de la dgung lo bdun du srung bar bgyid par yang 'gyur lags so// ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyi dgung char 'bab par yang 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bebs par
103a4(rgyud 'bum): yang 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur lags so// bro nad thams cad la byab par bgyis sam/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsal na/ des de'i bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas
103a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma pa dag ma gtogs pa/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i rigs gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags kyang 'di lags la/ gsang sngags
103a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshig zhib mo 'ang 'di dag lags te/ 'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ b+hu le b+ha la mo le/ dur dule/ hi me/ phub bi sa/ kA tsaTI ku tse sI/ mI mI ne Sher
103a7(rgyud 'bum): tho ra NI/ ba ma pi baM po ta sta ke/ ta re ke gu ru ga ro Ta/ gug gu mi ti/ ta re rak+Sha/ sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo lags te/ gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di dang
103b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bu ram gyur par 'dzin tam/ klog par bgyid na/ de la mi dang mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing / gdug pa'ang mi mchi/ sbrul yang mi mchi/ dug kyang mi mchi
103b2(rgyud 'bum): la/ de'i lus la gnod pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung bar bgyis par yang
103b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur lags so/ / gang klog par bgyid pa dang / gang nyan par bgyid pa de la dgung lo bdun du bsrung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so// cha ba la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na/
103b4(rgyud 'bum): de'i bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'dod pa'i bdag po thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi yul yang lags te/
103b5(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde 'di yongs su gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lags so// tad+ya thA/ lin de li pi le pau pa pe pang ke ka me/ kA tse kA tse k+Shi/ ka tsa ping ga le/ du ma du ma du me/ ta Te tra Ta/ tad traTe/ tra TA k+Shi/
103b6(rgyud 'bum): ko lA ke li/ ki ka ko li ka/ sA d+hA sU tra ma nu pa la ya thA/ ud gri NA tha tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde lags par gsungs pa 'di dum bu ra ma gyur pa
103b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / ma nyams par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/ de ni thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// ji tsam 'tshal ba de tsam
104a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dgung char yang 'bab par 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur lags so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su
104a2(rgyud 'bum): thar par yang 'gyur lags so/ / dug 'byin par yang 'gyur lags so// cha ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor ta ma 'tshal du sprul na/ des bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so//
104a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di'ang de bzhin du/ mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid cing / 'dod pa na spyod
104a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyid la/ 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ bI re bI ra ba ti/ to Te to Ta ba ti/ d+hAd dre b+had dra ba ti
104a5(rgyud 'bum): go ne gon pa ti/ me g+he me g+ha ba ti/ dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na ba ti/ b+hu ta b+hU ta ba ti/ kho ra de kho ra da ba ti/ a dan sU tra ma nu gr-ih+Na thA/ a nu pA la ya tha tsa ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang
104a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin par bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung bar bgyis par 'gyur lags so// de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang
104a7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so/ / gang du klog pa der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so// sems can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang
104b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ / de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur lags so// gang du klog par
104b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba der dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/ / 'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar par yang 'gyur lags so// dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags so// bro nad thams cad
104b3(rgyud 'bum): sel bar yang 'gyur lags so/ / skud pa 'am cha ba la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na/ bro nad thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po
104b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags 'di'ang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin cing grub par bgyid pa lags so// rnam thos kyi bus gsol pa/ tad+ya thA/ ku re ku ra NI/ mo ri mor
104b5(rgyud 'bum): NI/ ka tse ka tse NI/ kri mi kri mi nI/ yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/ bu re/ po raM/ pu ra tI/ ho re ho ra n+ti/ pra ho ra/ ho ra nI/ ho ra nI/ 'phags skyes pos gsol pa/ ke she ka sha pa ti/ ke sha NI/
104b6(rgyud 'bum): ma ke sha the ti/ tho ba ni/ mi ri ti/ mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/ tsakle tsak+kha NI/ tsak+kha bA ki/ ni b+hi ti ri/ tirmi ni/ she me shi mi/ sha mA ne te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod
104b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di bzhi dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de la 'byung po tham
105a1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang bro nad thams cad kyang slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags so/ / gdug pas zin pa dang dug thams cad las thar bar 'gyur lags so// skud pa 'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te
105a2(rgyud 'bum): bcings sam gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na/ cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha ma yin dang rlung lhas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di'ang mdo sde
105a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so/ / tad+ya thA/ ga le/ gag ga le/ ga ga le ga NI/ khi ni khi ni/ g+hu she b+haH/ g+hu g+hASh+Ta/ kha ne/ kha kha ni/ kha na kha ne/ li pa lu pa/ lu pa lu pe daM/ bcom ldan 'das gsang
105a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing ma bkol bar bzung na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung bar 'gyur legs so// de'i bro nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// lus la dug gis mi
105a5(rgyud 'bum): tshugs par yang 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongs su bzung ba'i
105a6(rgyud 'bum): slad du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rnams kyis rig sngags dag smras pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing kun tu
105a7(rgyud 'bum): gzung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
105b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kun tu bzung ba 'di ni grub pa yin te/ nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di grub pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bshad par bya ste/ nyon cig
105b2(rgyud 'bum): dang bshad par bya'o/ / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas mdo sde chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bsrung
105b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang bsgrub pa dag bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/ de la rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi grub pa 'di yin no// tA la ta la/
105b4(rgyud 'bum): tan tA la/ ta to ta le/ me te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i grub pa ni 'di yin no// sa le sa sa li ti/ phy-ir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// la rde li Ti/ lo la ti/ dgrabacom pa rnams kyi chub pa ni 'di
105b5(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / d+hu bu d+d+hA pA/ d+hu ra d+hu rba/ ka tsi bi ka tsi/ ka tsa bi ka tse ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// d+hU me d+hu me/ d+hi se d+hi se/ d+ha so d+ha so d+ha re/ d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha re d+ho ti/ de la bsrung ba
105b6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di yin no/ / tin ti ro tsi rak+Sha/ piM ga la k+Sha rak+Sha/ mtshams gcad pa ni 'di yin no// bad+d+ha bad+d+ho/ bar+d+ha/ si ri mi ti/ bad+b+ha/ gu She bad+d+ha/ g+h+ya g+h+rA She/ bar+d+ha/ g+hu Sha g+hu She/ ya ma bar+d+ha b+hi/ bsgrub
105b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni 'di yin no/ / pe khe sa d+ha ya tu tu le se/ d+ha ye ti/ zhag gsum smyung ba byas pas tshes bco lnga'i nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ kha shar phyogs
106a1(rgyud 'bum): su bltas la bsrung ba lan brgya brjod par bya zhing / bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la mdud pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bsrung ba byas pa yin zhing / lan gsum spu zing zhes byed par yang
106a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la/ skud po de lag tu blangs te bzlas shing mtshams bcad par byas te/
106a3(rgyud 'bum): lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te mtshams gcod par byed na/ lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur ro// lho phyogs nas ce spyad mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na/
106a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas mtshams bcad par shes par bya'o// des de bzhin du smyung ba byas te/ tshes bco lnga'i nyan par khrus byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te skud pa blangs te nyan thos kyi tshig rnams dang /
106a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga zhib mos lan bdun bzlas te/ bzlas pa rjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing / mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la skud pa lag tu blangs te/ rig sngags thams cad lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrub
106a6(rgyud 'bum): pa byas na/ char pa chen po dang rlung chen po'ang 'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu phyin zhing 'bab par 'gyur la/ skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/ lan bdun gyi bar du'ang brjod par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu sprin ces bya
106a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sprin bzang zhes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/ de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing / grub pa sbyin pa dang rjes su yi rang bar yang 'gyur ro// de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sprin ni ku tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o// sprin bzang gi
106b1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di yin te/ ka ra ka ra ka ra ra zhes bya'o// tshig 'di dag dang skud pa lag tu blangs pas/ mdo sde dang gsang sngags rnams bsams na/ gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi
106b2(rgyud 'bum): mdo sde dang rig sngags 'di dag thams cad kyis chu'am skud pa la bzlas na/ gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med de/ las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang gzhan dag srung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung bar
106b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur cing // sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa
106b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing // nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bam
106b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+har+m+ma sA ga ra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/
106b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das wA rA NA si na drang srong smra ba ri
106b7(rgyud 'bum): dgas kyi nags na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
107a1(rgyud 'bum): nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag ngas ni chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ cha phra ba/ brtags pa/ mkhas shing
107a2(rgyud 'bum): shes pa sa rig par bya ba rtogs so/ / ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos
107a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor to/ / ngas thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o// dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
107a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros kyi blo dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/ gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa
107a5(rgyud 'bum): spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/ gang dag de shes pa dang / gang dag de 'dzin pa de dag gis ni myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro//
107a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brjed ngas pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing / chos bzung ba rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
107a7(rgyud 'bum): rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang / don dang / tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon
107b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhag go/ da ltar nga'ang 'jog go// de nas bcom ldan
107b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdom gyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/ des na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro//
107b3(rgyud 'bum): thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyams su len par 'gyur ro// nyams su blangs pa'i chos rnams ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed do// tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni/ 'di lta ste/
107b4(rgyud 'bum): 'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / bla na med pa'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / sa nas sa brtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig
107b5(rgyud 'bum): dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o/ / de la 'di dag ni gzi byin brtan par byed pa'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang /
107b6(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas dang / sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la zas kyi rnam grangs rnams dang sman rnams sbyin par 'gyur ro// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi gnod
107b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis mnos pa bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon
108a1(rgyud 'bum): cig/ khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/ s+yAd ya the dan/ karma ke ta ma nud tse/ ra ti ru ta gran+t+ra ma/ zum na/ nai la ta/ a saM ku la s+thA bu mi a nu sma ri/ i shaM ga ma i sha b+hU/ klen a nu
108a2(rgyud 'bum): ga te/ yA mu la gu ma b+he/ pa b+he ma gur pa ya pa/ a s+ya bAkya s+ya bi laM ga/ be la ma tha/ shrI ba ba rI pany+tsa ka/ pra sa te/ a ba be la/ a gra be la/ ni shi khu u tse dzu me/ u dze dzu me/ kun dga' bo 'di
108a3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbab pa grub pa dang / gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs mthong la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/ rim gro'ang byed byed pa rnams
108a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ching ste/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin bab pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams bzung zhig/ kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
108a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang bral bar mi
108a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed ces bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo byang gi sgra
108a7(rgyud 'bum): mi snyan gyi gling na ni gnod sbyin rnam grags zhes bya ba gnas so/ / kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling na ni gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas te/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// kun dga'
108b1(rgyud 'bum): bo gnod sbyin gzhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni de bzhin gyi tshig
108b2(rgyud 'bum): drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig gi mchog/ srog chags 'byung po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung zhig dang ngas bshad do//
108b3(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' bo de la nga'i phyin 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nus so// s+yAd ya the dan/ dan d+ha ra ma hA ha ra/ ha ra ma ba ra na/ rud dra tra/ ku ma ti dri tra/ in dra man tu ke/ a ba te/
108b4(rgyud 'bum): sa ha rA/ sa d+hA ma ti/ i la la ba ma ti/ a bi ta/ ta ra pa ra/ yi biSh+Ta sa da biSh+Ta/ a ba tiSh+Tha/ pa ri brta/ i sha brta/ sa da brta/ kra ma kra ma ti ran/ a si ba ma la bi na ha thi/ tha sha su re/ d+hu ra d+hu ra/
108b5(rgyud 'bum): ag+na mum+ba/ uh+ma pa ti/ bi sa ra gra ma ti/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / rdul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / klu dang /
108b6(rgyud 'bum): dri za dang / sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang / lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod kyis
108b7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung zhig/ phyis 'gyod ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni// gling bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya// gsang
109a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba/ / de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni// chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag/
109a2(rgyud 'bum): nyams par gyur pa de la ston// dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po yang // mthar gyis su ni song nas kyang // zab cing don dang ldan pa yi// tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya// 'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste// de dag
109a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhas rnams nyan par gyis/ / drag po dag gis thos nas kyang // phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste// gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med// de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur// sa 'di chags pa med pa ste// sangs
109a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sa ni bsam mi khyab/ / chags pa med par bstan pa yi// bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas// nyi ma sprin las byung ba ltar// de ni sa steng de bzhin snang // 'di la skye mched phung po rnams// bden dang
109a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub yan lag dbang / / dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams// sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod// de yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang // nams kyang chud zar mi 'gyur te// ma thos chos rnams de dag
109a6(rgyud 'bum): thos/ / nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas// rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog/ mig bzang rnams kyang dag par 'gyur// 'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags// sangs rgyas
109a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni chos rnams la/ / the tsom mi mnga' bden pa gang // bden des bdag la lung mnos pa// ci yod thams cad gnas gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la// byams pas gnas pa'i bden
109b1(rgyud 'bum): pa des/ / rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la// ston par rab tu gnas gyur cig gling bzhi'i gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag/ ma dad pa dang dad par bstan// gang la rtogs pa
109b2(rgyud 'bum): mi snang ba/ / de la de kun don ston 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang // glang chen snang dang khyad par stobs// drag po dga' byed gsod byed dang // zla ba mgo med lus gsod pa// dpa' sde dang ni
109b3(rgyud 'bum): lag dpa' dang / / srin po dang ni sa 'dzin pa// ljang khu kha dang sna bzang dang // ral gri'i spu can bong bu rnams// thams cad grub par byed par shog/ gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la// gnod sbyin srin po de
109b4(rgyud 'bum): dag ni/ / spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed// rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang // tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang // nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang // yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur// lung mnos pa yang chud
109b5(rgyud 'bum): mi za/ / rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur// rtag tu don dang yi ge la// de yi shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa yang // de yi legs
109b6(rgyud 'bum): bshad nyan pa rnams/ / de yi mod la dran par byed// s+yAd ya the dan/ hu kun/ mu ku na/ ha ra na/ bi ha ra na/ i sha sa kra ma na/ oM su mu kha/ ta ka Na/ a ga Na/ a pri ya/ us+thA me/ ko ba ha
109b7(rgyud 'bum): re/ u nu ba/ pra ba Na ta na/ sarba me ba ha dza ga re/ pra shi ga re/ gud+b+ha ba ne/ ud ta na/ bi ku Na/ i sha kun/ a tu la tu la/ a Ti ba Ti/ ba ri tsa mo sha/ ha ra/ dza ga ta/ e ba se pra mu khe
110a1(rgyud 'bum): ag b+ha re/ Tha hu sa su/ i ti ya/ thA hu/ tsa tra ra dwI bi ka yan/ Tha sum hu/ ug+na hu/ d+ha ra sa hu/ saM gra ha/ a bi narba ha/ a bi na gra ha/ pradz+nyA brid d+hi ye/ Sha hra sa hu/
110a2(rgyud 'bum): kar ku ru/ d+ha sa hu/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod// de ni thos la rmongs pa med// de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur// sker mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin/
110a3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin// de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// s+yAd ya the dan/ tsa ra d+he pi tsa ra d+he
110a4(rgyud 'bum): a maM ku te/ a ti mi ti/ pa ra ha re/ g+ha Na b+he/ hi pa ra me/ mA hA pra ti bA hA ne/ dza ya dza ya/ ma nu ke/ ba la pa le/ ug gra ba ti/ swa ra swa ra/ a bi sa re/ gu guni de/ pra bi ba d+he/ sa me
110a5(rgyud 'bum): adza ta dza ya/ nub la su/ kho ma su san d+hi ni ku ma no// sak+She/ tsA pe tsA pe/ tsu pe/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pu lu pu lu/ bya ba pra sa re/ ka ra ka b+hin d+he/ bi dz+nyA bi dze/ a pra ti san d+hi/ nA nA nu ma ti/ pra na nu ma te/
110a6(rgyud 'bum): a ri da si/ dzeSh+Ta nu ba ni de/ a saM gra a ba ti/ rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thogs te 'chang na/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
110a7(rgyud 'bum): grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / dbang du ma gyu pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba bzhin du 'tsho ba'i
110b1(rgyud 'bum): mthar thug gi bar du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dgon par 'dug la gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod de/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dran par bya'o//
110b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
110b3(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
110b4(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
110b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya big+h+nAn bi na ya ka ra tA d+ha ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i gzungs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
110b6(rgyud 'bum): du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo tshogs kyi bdag po su gang tshogs kyi bdag
110b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i snying po 'dzin pa des cho ga thams cad dang dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ na mo stu ste/ ka Ta kaT/ ma Ta ma Ta/ da ra da ra/
111a1(rgyud 'bum): Ta ga Na6/ grin+ta/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ na mo stu ste/ ru ru tsa tsa ye swAhA/ a b+hu tA/ bin duHkha na man cod d+ha bar sa ma gats+tsha ti/ ha rga ya/ ma hA has+t+ridak+Sha ta nan/ pra go ba ye mo
111a2(rgyud 'bum): ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ nim nam s+t+raihA/ nang par langs te sngags la ni bdun bzlas la/ chu khyor ba gang steng dang 'og gi phyogs su gtor cig dang / bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur
111a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gsang sngags sgrub 'dod pas skud pa dkar po lam dud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/ lag pa la bcings na rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// gang na tshogs
111a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan cig bklags na'ang bgegs rnams bar chad mi byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste/ lha dang / mi dang /

111a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA nI ya ma sU tra na nA ma ma hA sU traM/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
111a7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos
111b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag
111b2(rgyud 'bum): du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po

111b4(rgyud 'bum): dag gsol to/ / rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das
111b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / da ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad lani bgra phyag 'tshal// khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang
111b6(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nags 'dab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de nas gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa
111b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas
112a1(rgyud 'bum): pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan

112a4(rgyud 'bum): dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang

112b1(rgyud 'bum): cher gsol to/ / skye bo gang dag gtong bod cing // bla ma ma mchis ser sna bral// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa lags// gang gi char la brten nas ni// des na nyin mor
112b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa yi/ / nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/

112b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs

112b6(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thog/ de skad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag
112b7(rgyud 'bum): tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen gragra
113a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa lags/ / gang na yi dgas zhes bgyi ba// rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can// srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs de mngon
113a2(rgyud 'bum): par skyong bgyid pa/ / rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis
113a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs bskor cing / / grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min
113a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yul 'gyed pa/ / kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal
113a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes/ / mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni
113a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces/ / 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes
113a7(rgyud 'bum): skye bo mchi/ / phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa ni// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang du nub
113b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / de na mtsho chen zab mo ni// shin tu 'da' ba dka' ba ste// de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes// skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu ma
113b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag po rgyal po ste/ / ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing // klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang marmi
113b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ / brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs

113b7(rgyud 'bum): gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes dang // gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni// brgya phrag bcu ba skye 'gyur zhing // de dag mi rmo mo 'debs la// gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing // tshe ring mdog
114a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa dang / / nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing // zas su sA lu kha dog dang // dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang // dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal// na li
114a2(rgyud 'bum): ke ra bskol bgyis nas/ / tshod mar de 'tshal srang tshod min// gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yin// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod/

114a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lags/ / bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma
114a7(rgyud 'bum): khyod la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/
114b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po sde bzhi dag/ 'jig
114b2(rgyud 'bum): rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ / rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing //
114b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu// de dag ni chi bas rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang /
