114b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing / phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi lags so// /
114b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la
114b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba mchis/ / 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa stengs kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can
115a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/ / byang phyogs na mtsho ka bing ka zhes bgyi ba'ang mchis lags so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can
115a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so// chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te// chab rgyun tha dad de
115a3(rgyud 'bum): las 'byung / / de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur// btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang // de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs
115a4(rgyud 'bum): mang dang de bas mang / / bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi// pha rol byang gi phyogs chan// 'dun sa bya dkar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du
115a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing gnas lags so/ / rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang // 'jigs rung lho spu can dag mchis// de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rma bya khrung khru sgra snyan dang // khu byug sgra skad chen po dang // shang shang te'u
115a6(rgyud 'bum): dag sgra 'byin cing / / rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang // ko'u kum pa dang chun lag dang // bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog sbrang rtsi'i rol dga'// lus ngan po de glu gar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/
115a7(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na/ rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so// bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dunas de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags
115b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i li mi li/ ke TI mU le/ hi li ki Ti mU le/ hu du me/ hu dur du me/ gau ri/ gnad+hA ri/ go do ha ni/ oM ke mo ke swA hA/
115b2(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri zo'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod myos
115b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' bas myos pa dang / / klu yis myos pa spun dang ni// 'phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang // rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang //
115b4(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang // rnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra// tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang // gser spyod bu mo gser can dang // pa wa sangs dang phur bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag ni bdag gi
115b5(rgyud 'bum): spun legs te/ de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/
115b6(rgyud 'bum): legs par smras pa 'di thos nas// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lags so// tad+ya thA/ kun+d+ha le kun+d+ha le/ kun+d+ha le/ kun+d+ha le/ e he a
115b7(rgyud 'bum): hi/ sAd+ha ma tika/ sA d+ha b+ha Na Di ni ka/ tiSh+Tha duShA bA to si swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi rgan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu
116a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ / rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za
116a2(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgad po 'am/ dri za rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug
116a3(rgyud 'bum): ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyis dri za 'du ba'i
116a4(rgyud 'bum): nang du mchir mi chud cing / / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/
116a5(rgyud 'bum): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba
116a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgad po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho
116a7(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis/
116b1(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyis sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa
116b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hU me hA me/ hU mi li/ hU mi lA/ ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
116b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon gyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byini kri mi sha// rtsib logs che
116b4(rgyud 'bum): dang gsus po che/ / lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu// g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang // sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang // rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrog/ ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // srid smrab dang ni 'dod dgur
116b5(rgyud 'bum): mchi/ / 'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed// la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang // tshon kun dang ni mig bkrab bo// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de la bdag grul bum 'di ni
116b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag la 'tshe'o/ / grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis// legs par smras pa 'di
116b7(rgyud 'bum): thos na/ / ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ si ra bi si re/ si re bi sa re/ si re bi sa re/ kriSh+Na tsa ga le/
117a1(rgyud 'bum): kA rA Di/ baM ga le swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma
117a2(rgyud 'bum): lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bu ma ma ma
117a3(rgyud 'bum): grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgad po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum
117a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi mngag gzhug pa dang / grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar byed pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing
117a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyis grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas

117b1(rgyud 'bum): po 'am/ yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dwags kyi bu pho 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor pho 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag
117b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dgas rnams kyis yi
117b3(rgyud 'bum): dgas 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag
117b4(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / tad+ya thA/ yu mi yu mi/ yu mi le/ yu mi la ba tre ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon
117b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ / 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang // nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang // ser po dang ni zho rna dang // dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang / mya ngan med
117b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mya ngan bral/ / rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag/ ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang // yangs pa can dang bkra bdud rgyal// gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang // nag po che dang lag 'gro dang // ra skyong dang ni
117b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jog po dang / / g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang // sngo bsangs dkar dang bgrogs pa ni// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag
118a1(rgyud 'bum): @la 'tshe'o/ / klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis// legs

118b5(rgyud 'bum): ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ A pe ba ha ni/ ma hA na pa tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis
118b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // ba ra tra tsa skye dgu'i
118b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang // mgrin ngan dang ni 'gul nges dang // stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nya lnga dang // ri mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang //
119a1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri ba sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po
119a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang bcas/ / 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni
119a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin//

119a7(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ gnod sbyin rgad po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mangs

119b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du

119b5(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ srin mo rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar
119b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams kyis srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir
119b7(rgyud 'bum): mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/
120a1(rgyud 'bum): hU lu hU lu/ yu me yu me li/ yu mI la ba tri ye swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i
120a2(rgyud 'bum): mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
120a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis// dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
120a4(rgyud 'bum): dge slong dag ma dang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog
120a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog
120a6(rgyud 'bum): gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs/
120a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas// blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang // da ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad la ni bdag phyag
120b1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal/ / khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nags 'dab
120b2(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de la gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma
120b3(rgyud 'bum): da pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug
120b4(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang /
120b5(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon
120b6(rgyud 'bum): par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang /
120b7(rgyud 'bum): sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong dag ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar
121a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu
121a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol te/ skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing // phra ma mi mchi ser sna
121a3(rgyud 'bum): bral/ / gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa lags// gang zhig 'char la brten nas ni// des na nyin mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs
121a4(rgyud 'bum): gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/ / phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang
121a5(rgyud 'bum): gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ / dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po
121a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bgyi stobs po che/ / lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod
121a7(rgyud 'bum): la 'dud/ / skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal
121b1(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag
121b2(rgyud 'bum): tshol mchi/ / de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par sbyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na yi dgas zhes bgyi ba// rgyab kyi
121b3(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal phra ma can/ / srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/
121b4(rgyud 'bum): ming ni 'phags skyes pa zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang kar gyis rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis ltas// de la bu ni mang mchis
121b5(rgyud 'bum): te/ / brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs
121b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas/ / sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags//
121b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la
122a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong
122a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa/ / rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang du chub 'gyur ba// des na mtsho chen zab mo
122a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste// de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes// skye bo rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste//
122a4(rgyud 'bum): ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing // klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te//
122a5(rgyud 'bum): brgya cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas//
122a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyud ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la
122a7(rgyud 'bum): dge bas gzigs su gsol/ / khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de skad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ gol+la ta mo rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs
122b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ / mya ngar 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa
122b2(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga' zhing lhun chen lha mdzes dang // gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni// brgya phrag bcu po skye 'gyur zhing // de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la// gshol yang 'chang bar mi bgyid
122b3(rgyud 'bum): cing / / tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang // dris par yongs su spyod bgyid cing // zas su sA lu kha dog dang // dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang // dri dang me tog tshogs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal//
122b4(rgyud 'bum): na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas// tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min// gang na me lce rtse 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni//
122b5(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis
122b6(rgyud 'bum): bltas/ / de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lag//
122b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing
123a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lags/ / bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag
123a2(rgyud 'bum): tshol cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par
123a3(rgyud 'bum): skyong bgyid pa/ / rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po//
123a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba
123a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing // phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu// de dag ni chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang /
123a6(rgyud 'bum): bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing / phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi lags so// glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing / phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi lags so// chibs
123a7(rgyud 'bum): rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing / phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi
123b1(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la
123b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba mchis/ / 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyung ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa sdang kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags
123b3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bing ka zhes bgyi ba'ang mchis lags so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi
123b4(rgyud 'bum): can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so/ / chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te// chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung // de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur// btsun pa grong khyer
123b5(rgyud 'bum): u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ / lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang // de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang mkha' la bya ltar mda'// btsun pa grong khyer sbu ba/
123b6(rgyud 'bum): can gyi pha rol// byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang // 'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis//
123b7(rgyud 'bum): de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang // khu byug sgra skad chen po dang // shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing // rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang // ko'u dum pa dang chu lag dang // bya rnams sna tshogs
124a1(rgyud 'bum): skad 'byin cing / / me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'// lus ngan po de glu gar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse// btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na// rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi
124a2(rgyud 'bum): ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/ / bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag
124a3(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i ye mi la/ ki Ti mA le/ hi li ki Ti mU le/ hu du me/ hu dur du me/ gau ri gan d+ha ri/ gau do ha ni/ o ke mo ke swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spun sngar
124a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang // glu yis
124a5(rgyud 'bum): myos pa spun rnams dang / / 'phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang // rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang // ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang /
124a6(rgyud 'bum): rngarje 'dzin dang ni khu brug sgra// tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang // gser spyod bu mo gser can dang // pa wa sangs dang phur bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag bdag gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag
124a7(rgyud 'bum): dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ / dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing // de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis// legs par smras pa 'di thos nas//
124b1(rgyud 'bum): sardza kA yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'dri dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ ku du le/ ku tu le/ ku tu la/ ku tu le/ e hi e hi/ sA d+ha ma ti ke/ sA d+ha ma ti ke sA d+ha
124b2(rgyud 'bum): / b+had+d+hi ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bA to si swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun
124b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdo/ rig sdigs dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgad po 'am
124b4(rgyud 'bum): dri za rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags
124b5(rgyud 'bum): tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyis dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lhung lo
124b6(rgyud 'bum): can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
124b7(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par
125a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgad po'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo
125a2(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed
125a3(rgyud 'bum): cing gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyis sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so//
125a4(rgyud 'bum): / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hU me hU me/ hU mi le/ hU mi la/ ba tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams
125a5(rgyud 'bum): dang grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/ rtsib logs che dang gsus po che// lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu// g.yon
125a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs nag po dmar po dang / / sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang // rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrog/ ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi// 'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed// la ba bzang ldan gsum
125a7(rgyud 'bum): po dang / / tshon kun dang ni mig bkrab bo// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing /
125b1(rgyud 'bum): de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la
125b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ / tad+ya thA/ si re bi si re/ si re bi sa re/ si re bi sa re/ kr-iSh+Na tsha ka li/ ka raNi/ paM gi le swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
125b3(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung
125b4(rgyud 'bum): mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum mam/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgad po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi
125b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor pho 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng
125b6(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyis grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lhung le can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i
125b7(rgyud 'bum): mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /

126a2(rgyud 'bum): gal te yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgad po 'am/ yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu po 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor pho 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo
126a3(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na//
126a4(rgyud 'bum): glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dgas rnams kyis yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lhung lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa
126a5(rgyud 'bum): bdun du 'gas lags so/ / de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/ yu mi li/ yu mi lA ba tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu
126a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang // nor rgyas dang ni
126a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu bzang / / ser po dang ni zho rna dang // dbang po lag dang bkra shis dang // mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral// rab grol dang rgyal po bdag/ ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang // yangs pa can
126b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bkra bdun rgyal/ / gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang // nag po che dang lag 'gro dang // ra skyong dang ni 'dzeg po dang // g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang // sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni//
126b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing // de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la
126b3(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang / / bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so//
126b4(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ gau rI gen d+ha ri/ ma ta gi/ tsaN+Da li swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang

126b6(rgyud 'bum): klu mo 'am/ klu rgad po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo'am/ klu'i 'khor pho 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa
126b7(rgyud 'bum): glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyis klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing
127a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong
127a2(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyan nam/ dge snyan ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar
127a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgad po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/
127a4(rgyud 'bum): lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ lus srul po'i mingag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa
127a5(rgyud 'bum): glagrags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyis lus srul po 'du
127a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di
127a7(rgyud 'bum): dag lags so/ / tad+ya thA/ a pe/ ba ha ne/ ba hAn/ ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
127b1(rgyud 'bum): dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // ba ra dwa tsa skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang // mgrin ngan dang
127b2(rgyud 'bum): ni mgul nges dang / / stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang // ri mnyam gser can glang po dang // seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang /
127b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul
127b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa/ / 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la
127b5(rgyud 'bum): go bar bgyid lags so/ / bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos ni// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas//
127b6(rgyud 'bum): de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hi le mi le/ hi le mi le/ kI d+hi mU l-i/ hi le kI d+hi mA le/ au tu ma ba tu ma be/ au tu ma ba tum be/ o ge mo ga/ ga do hi/ b+hing g+ha re/ riSha sad
127b7(rgyud 'bum): t+ye me swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo//
128a1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo
128a2(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ gnod sbyin rgad po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag
128a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol po la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing
128a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyini rnams kyis gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lhung lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du

128b1(rgyud 'bum): po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po
128b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang
128b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ / tad+ya thA/ hi le hi le/ hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu me le/ yu mi lA bi tri ye swA hA/ zhes rgya cher smras nas/ nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi

132b1(rgyud 'bum): ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i kha dog mtha' yas pa thams
132b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras

133a1(rgyud 'bum): seng ge ba waM rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog ltar snang bsna tshogs kyi snying po can gyis ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil dang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma t
133a2(rgyud 'bum): shogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma swA
133a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho spu ni rnams dang / an da rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i
133a4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ga'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba thams cad
133a5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'ong
133a6(rgyud 'bum): zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad
133a7(rgyud 'bum): la bsti stang du bya'o/ / bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang nor bu sna tshogs pa thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung
133b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang
133b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
133b3(rgyud 'bum): snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi
133b4(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid/
133b5(rgyud 'bum): du'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal
133b6(rgyud 'bum): po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i
133b7(rgyud 'bum): sgron ma'i 'phreng ba'i snying po can gyi sang ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / me tog dang / pad+ma
134a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi 'phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po
134a2(rgyud 'bum): can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /
134a3(rgyud 'bum): nor bu rin po che'i yal ka dang phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas brgyan pa nyi ma snang bar
134a4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// zla
134a5(rgyud 'bum): mar bya'o/ / ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyis me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho
134a6(rgyud 'bum): sprin rnams dang / spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i
134a7(rgyud 'bum): dbyings can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i
134b1(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i drab bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad+ma 'bar ga kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i
134b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi ze ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla ra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha'
134b3(rgyud 'bum): yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la
134b4(rgyud 'bum): bsti stang du bya'o/ / bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin
134b5(rgyud 'bum): po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
134b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu
134b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs pa'i gdugs rgyamatsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad kyi sdong bu'i lal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i
135a1(rgyud 'bum): @nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'grengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
135a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang bar byed pa kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sgra ni ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang
135a3(rgyud 'bum): du bya'o/ / bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
135a4(rgyud 'bum): sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya
135a5(rgyud 'bum): mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil
135a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can gyi
135a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan
135b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang
135b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ / bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
135b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa
135b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer
135b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed
135b6(rgyud 'bum): pasgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston
135b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che 'od 'phro ba
136a1(rgyud 'bum): kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa
136a2(rgyud 'bum): snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
136a3(rgyud 'bum): sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dbab
136a4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
136a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ / bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis
136a6(rgyud 'bum): mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad+ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che tham
136a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin
136b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / ni ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi 'phreng ba rgyam mo sbyin rnams dang / rin po che'i mdzod mtha' mas
136b2(rgyud 'bum): brgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lusu ma 'gres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgyal tshe thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o//
136b3(rgyud 'bum): bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
136b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i spun
136b5(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling
136b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir 'ongs so/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus
136b7(rgyud 'bum): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhu ba zhus na lung bstan pa'i slad du/
137a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//
137a2(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
137a3(rgyud 'bum): klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ klu'i bdag po g.yog
137a4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun
137a5(rgyud 'bum): chad par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/ rtswa dang // shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags
137a6(rgyud 'bum): tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces
137a7(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i
137b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par
137b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
137b3(rgyud 'bum): chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'o// klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mas mi 'tshig/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi 'khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs
137b4(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur/ bsod nams chen
137b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du thag thogs med par 'gyur/
137b6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/
137b7(rgyud 'bum): klu'i bdag po lha dang mi'i byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go// klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis
138a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas par bya'o/ / klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams cad kyi glu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/
138a2(rgyud 'bum): bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skye bar
138a3(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra ni d+ha ra ni/ u d+ha ra ni/ sam pra tiSh+Tha tA/ bI dza ya brnA/ sad t+ya pra ti dz+nyA sa ra hA/ dz+nyAn+d+ha ba ti/
138a4(rgyud 'bum): ud de pA dA ni d+hi nA mA ni/ a b+hi she tsan+di A d+hi bya hU~M ra/ shu b+hA ba ti/ A dzi ma du/ e hI ku ma pA la ni/ b+ha hA ha rak+She sha na/ d+hu nA pA ba ma/ sho d+ha ya marga na/ nI ra ka/ d+harmatA shud+d+ha/ lo ka bai ti
138a5(rgyud 'bum): / mi ra rA dza sa du ShA/ sha man+t+ra sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka nA a d+hiSh+Thi te/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na b+he swA hA/ klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas
138a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod par bya'o// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs
138a7(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul pa snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa/ gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse
138b1(rgyud 'bum): mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o// de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad
138b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / klu'i rus thams cad dang / klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams
138b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / klu'i g.yog 'khor thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do// klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de
138b4(rgyud 'bum): ngag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung
138b5(rgyud 'bum): ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag
138b6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag
138b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
139a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
139a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la

150b6(rgyud 'bum): hA ri hi ri/ b+h+ye ga b+ha ke/ s+pha ra s+phA rA/ kA li kA li/ ma hA k+ShA li/ hri da ya/ pa bi sha/ a te/ ma tre/ sarba nA ga A kAR+Sha Ni/ pU ra la pU ra ya hU~M hU~M/ rat+na tra ya~M bi kur+thi te/ badz+ri Ne/ badz+re badz+ra pA ni/ kA la noH
150b7(rgyud 'bum): re/ nA ga tu bi ni/ su ru be/ b+haM ge b+ho ga/ ma hA b+ho ma hA b+ho ga~M/ b+ho ga ru bu/ ta ya ba le/ baR+Sha Ni/ sarba nA ga sany+tso da ni swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra mA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ban b+ha ban d+ha/ su ru pe/ kA la rba
151a1(rgyud 'bum): pi Ni swA hA/ chos smra bas thog ma kho nar srung ba'i cho ga byas la/ chos gos kyi glang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa bor nas/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying
151a2(rgyud 'bum): bo zhes bya ba 'di zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyun ma chad par bklag par bya'o/ / shar phyogs su ni ba lang gi lci bas klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po
151a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu rgyas byed ces bya ba mgo lnga pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/ / nub phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can zhes bya ba mgo bdun pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po sprin
151a4(rgyud 'bum): bskul zhes bya ba mgo dgu pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/ / bla re dang / gos sngon po dang / rgyal mtshan sngon po dang / lha bshos thams cad kyang sngon por bya'o// klu thams cad la dbab pa ni mngar gsum gyis bya'o//
151a5(rgyud 'bum): mngar gsum gyi dgang blugs bdun yang klu'i snying pos sbyi ni sreg bya'o// sprin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang bris te/ char gyi rgyun 'bebs te phan tshun thug cing mthar glog 'gyur bar bya'o// 'dir dbab pa ni 'khur ba bkra shis

154b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad la bsrung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed pas sems can thams cad la phan

155b7(rgyud 'bum): shin da ts+tshind/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ k+ShA ba ya k+Sha ba ya/ shAn te shAn te/ dAn te tAn te/ dA pa ya dA ya/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa rang 'aM/ sems can thams
156a1(rgyud 'bum): cad la srung du gsol srung du gsol/ / gza' thams cad dang rgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa zlog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phrul chen po mnga' ba sdang ba'i sems can rnams bsal
156a2(rgyud 'bum): dugasol/ bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam du gsol/ tsan Di tsan Di/ tu ru Tha ru/ tsan Ti tsin Di/ su mu su mu/ mu tsu mu tsu/ b+ha ba b+ha be/ u gre u gra rU be/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ ma ma
156a3(rgyud 'bum): sarba satwA nAny+tsa ma nor thi/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ye swA hA/ oM swA hA/ b+hUHswA hA/ hrIHswA hA/ d+huHswA hAH/ d+hiHswA hA/ pad+ma d+ha ra ya swA hA/ A di t+yA ya swA hA/ sau mA ya swA hA/ d+ha raNI su tA ya swA hA/
156a4(rgyud 'bum): b+hi ha s+pha ta ye swA hA/ shu krA ya swA hA/ shi ni sh+ma rA ya swA hA/ rA ha be swA hA/ ke ti bi swA hA/ bud+d+ha ya swA hA/ badz+re d+ha ra ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+hA ra ya swA hA/ ku mA rA yA swA hA/ sarba mra he b+h+ya swA hA/ sarba na k+Sha tre b+h+yaHswAhA/
156a5(rgyud 'bum): sarba dA da sha rA shaM ni b+h+ya swA hA/ sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM sarba bid+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig dngos grub thams cad kyi gzhi yin no//
156a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag ni rdo rje gang yang gza' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo 'i tshos bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas// tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te
156a7(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya'o/ / de nas zla ba nya'i nyin mtshan thog zag bklags na de dag la lo dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // gza'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' lhung ba dang / rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi
