162a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nub gcig bton na/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i don du bdag gi khyim mam/ gnas gtsang ma'i bang mdzod
162a4(rgyud 'bum): dam/ gnas gang du bang rung bar de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gsang sngags kyi lha'i phyir tsan dan gyis dkyil 'khor gru
162a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhir byas te nub gcig bton na/ rigs kyi bu de'i khyim nor dang / 'bru dang / gau ser dang / dngul dang / yo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i tshad tsam gyis gang bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams
162a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang med par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod de'i phyir rab tu bsgrims la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig
162a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / des khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das las nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs
162b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di thos nas tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
162b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor gyi rgyun ces bgyi ba blangs lags/ gzungs su zin lags/ bzung lags/ bklags lags/ kun chub par bgyis lags/ rjes su yi rangs par bgyis lags so//
162b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so// de'i skad cig tsam la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i bang mdzod rnams yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/
162b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
162b5(rgyud 'bum): bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la khyam bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim nor dang 'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdzod chen po dang bang mdzod yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos/ de nas tshe
162b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ ko'u sham bi'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhugs pa dang // nor dang 'brus
162b7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rin po che phun sum tshogs pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing dga'
163a1(rgyud 'bum): la mgu zhing yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ya mtshan du 'dzin cing dga' ba dang /
163a2(rgyud 'bum): yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang bang mdzod rnams kyang nor dang 'bru phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu
163a3(rgyud 'bum): gang lags/ / rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu khyim bdag zla ba bzang po dad cing mchog tu dad la dge ba'i bsam pa can des/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di bzung
163a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing rab tu bton te/ blangs shing bgrags/ kun chub par byas/ rjes su yi rangs par byas shing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang nor gyi rgyun
163a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi gzungs 'di long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo
163a6(rgyud 'bum): mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo bal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni lha dang /
163a7(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nangs ma mthong ngo // lan gnyis su bton
163b1(rgyud 'bum): tam/ lan gsum du bton kyang 'gal bar byed pa de ni gnas med do// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi byed pa yin no// kun dga' bo 'di dag ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa bzang pa rnams kyin
163b2(rgyud 'bum): lam du grags par mi 'gyur na/ / glegs bam la yi ger 'dri ba dang / yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/ gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can dbul
163b3(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thams cad kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang / bshad pa dang / rjes su yi rangs pa
163b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rab tu phye ba dang / bsngags pa dang / bkrol ba dang / gsal bar mdzad pa dang / bskyed pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / bstod pa dang / snyan par brjod pa dang
163b5(rgyud 'bum): go bar mdzad pa dang / bsnyad pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// sangs rgyas
163b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ / sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad rnams kyi// rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad
163b7(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen/ / chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba// ye shes pha rol bgrod pa byon gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs nas
164a1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/
164a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gter zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin
164a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs zhes bya bar zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub
164a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
164a5(rgyud 'bum): do/ / 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/ dang po re zhig dbyi
164a6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba chung gi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor song ste/ de nas nu ma'i bar du chu'i nang du nub par byas te 'dug la/ nyi ma la sngon du phyogs par yongs su brtags la ji snyed gnas kyi
164a7(rgyud 'bum): bar du bzlas pa bya'o/ / bza' ba thams cad spangs te nyon mongs shing smra bcad byas te/ nub bdun du bzlas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang sku'ang dbu skra ma gtogs par gur kum dang tsan dan
164b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis byug par bya ba ni nub mo snga bar langs te/ chur khru bdun// zheng du khru gsum ste/ khru bcu dang bcas pal tshon sna ma lus pa gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i lha bzos bcom ldan 'das ma mdog lnga ser sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis
164b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa na 'bras bu chen po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa na sgrub pa po rnams la ster ba'i rin po che'i za ma tog mu tika dang / rdo rje pa lam dang / bai DUR+Ya'i 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan pa bya'o//
164b3(rgyud 'bum): stang du lha'i bu rin po che'i char mngon du 'bebs bzhin pa bya'o// g.yas logs su dpal chen mo pad+ma'i phyag can sgrub pa po la nye bar dgos pa la gnas pa bzhin pa bya'o// g.yon logs su pad+ma'i dpal rin po che'i
164b4(rgyud 'bum): snyim pa gang ba bya'o/ / 'og tu sgrub pa po pad+ma'i lag pa can bya'o// de nas thang sku sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub phyogs su kha bstan la bkram ste/ de nas nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma ma gtogs pa
164b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzod kyi bzhes pa'ang dbul zhing dri zhim po me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la/ tsan dan dang a ka ru'i bdug pas bsreg par bya'o// zhun mar gyi mar me brgya dbul bar bya'o// de nas stan gcig la gnas
164b6(rgyud 'bum): la bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal la dmigs la nub mo mtshan yal bzlas pa byas na/ de nas skya rengs shar ba'i dus su skyes bu chen po tsam gyi nor rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun 'bab cing khang bkang bar 'gyur ro//
164b7(rgyud 'bum): yang na mtshan mo phyed na chu'i nang du zhugs la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// zla ba gcig tu gcig gi sbyor bas nor gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur te/ mi shes par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyur ro// yang na rgyal po'i dkor mngon
165a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod na nyin mo chu'i nang du bzlas pa bya zhing / mtshan mo'i phyed na til gyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na rgyal rigs las rnyed pa chen po 'thob bo// yungs kar mar la bsres nas sbyin
165a2(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du byed do/ / kun tu ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed do// kha cig gis ni sbyor ba gang gis mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan can dran par byas na sbyin bdag chen
165a3(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / yang na sgrub thabs chen po bshad par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ zas ji srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung na thang ka nub
165a4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su bstan la dgram zhing / nyin mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bgrag cing / mtshan mo stan gcig la gnas pas nub yal gyis bzlas pa byas na nor gyi phung po chen po rnyed de/ 'thor gnod byas kyang
165a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad par mi 'gyur te/ lha khang chen po bya'o// cho ga 'di'i cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs la bzlas pa byas na 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob cing / bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma dngos su mthong zhing phyir mi ldog
165a6(rgyud 'bum): papa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar de ltar tshangs spyod bya zhing / kha na ma tho ba'i zas chang dang nya sha la sogs pa spangs shing mtshan mo bzlas pa byas na dbul por mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
165a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang / zla ba bzang po yongs su dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don du gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so//
165b1(rgyud 'bum): na mo rat+na trA yA ya/ oM bA su d+ha re swA hA/ snying po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA su shrI swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA su swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i yang nye ba'i snying
165b2(rgyud 'bum): bopobo'o/ / thal mo sbyar te gung mo gnyis dang / de nas srin lag gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis kashibs te sngags mdzub phan tshun sbrel la/ mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bsnol te/ rtse mo gnyis rgyab spad de
165b3(rgyud 'bum): khab lta bu byas la/ gung mo rtse sprad pa la mtheb mo zung gcig de'i 'og tu sbar te/ reg pa bcas pa ni rab tu bzung ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa ste/ las thams cad sgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor
165b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyun ma'i gzungs 'di/ thub pas gsungs pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM shrI yi shrI ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri d+ha na ka ri swA hA/ bsgrub par bya ba'i sngags so// rigs pa 'di'i dang po re zhig dam tshig gi phyag
165b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya ni sor mo rnams thal mo sbyar la mtheb chen dbus su gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ / oM sa ma ye/ sa me sa ma ya ka ri/ ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags
165b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / phyag rgya de nyid la gung mo dang sdigs mdzub kyi tshigs gsum pa bskul zhing mthe'u chung gnyis cung zad phyir phyung ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'di ni dbab pa dang / bsdu ba dang / bsgrub bya'i sngags kyis
165b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / phyag rgya de nyid la sdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya yin te/ oM bA su d+he swA hA/ me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo brkyang ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya yin te/ sngags ni/ oM bA sung+ga re swA hA/
166a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di nyid la ming med brkyang ba'i phyag rgya yin te/ sngags ni/ oM bA su d+ha ma ti shri ye swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la mthe'u chung gi sen mo mtheb chen gyis bkab ste/ sor mo gzhan rnams
166a2(rgyud 'bum): nirdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni/ oM ba su d+ha ri Ni swA hA/ sen mo gan kyal du byas la mthe bong gnyis logs su sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni/ oM bA su d+ha re Ni swA hA/
166a3(rgyud 'bum): lhag mnye bar spyod pa nyi shu rtsa ba'i sngags kyis thun mong gi phyag rgya'am/ sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ka'i cho ga ni nyams pa med cing / sgra'i nyams pa med pa skud pa mchad pa'i
166a4(rgyud 'bum): ras zheng du mtho gang gi tshad nyid la ring du mtho do byas te/ steng du bcom ldan 'das bri/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bya/ g.yon du rdo rje 'chang bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'o ga thang ka'i dbus su
166a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma bris te/ gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gos srab mo'i sham kag mnabs pa/ de bzhin du gos srab mo'i stod g.yogs can/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi sham tham
166a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'o/ / de nas 'og phyogs su sgrub pa po lag na mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos gtsang sbra byas gos gtsang mgyon te/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad bya'o// de'i mdun du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag
166a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig byas la ji ltar 'byor pas mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o/ / de nas sgrub pa po dang ldan pas smyung ba byas te/ zhing gi dbus su thang sku bzhugs su gsol te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / nye bar longs spyod/
166b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'i gtor ma byas la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// thang ka'i 'og tu lan brgya rtsa gcig gis sngags byas pa'i bum pa chus yongs su gang ba gzhag par bya'o// bum pa'i chus gtor ma btang zhing / glang bung
166b2(rgyud 'bum): zothong 'dzin gnyis la gtor bar bya'o/ / glang bu'i mgul pa dang zong 'dzin gyi mgul par me tog gi 'phreng ba gdabs par bya'o// de rnams kyi mdun du sngags pas chu'i rgyun zhing la lan g.yas logs su bskor bar bya
166b3(rgyud 'bum): ni sngags pas mdun du 'gro zhing / sngags pa'i rting ni zhing rmor 'gro bar bya'o// phyis sa bon 'debs pa'i dus su cho ga 'dis brgyad brgya sngags la sa bon spar ba gang la lan bdun bzlas te zhing la gtor bar bya'o//
166b4(rgyud 'bum): sa bon gdab pa'i cho ga'o// de ni zhing rnga ba'i dus su yang cho ga 'dis bya'o// cho ga lhag pa ni 'dir dge slong bzhi la zhing gi mtshams bzhir ci 'dod kyi ston mo byas te/ de nas sngags pas chang pa bdun bzlas pa
166b5(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / rnga ba ni lo tog rtsa ba bya ba'i cho ga'o// da ni g.yul 'chag pa bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ g.yul 'chag pa'i dus su sngags pas rang nyid gtsang sbra byas la gos gtsang mgon la shar du zhal bstan
166b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ sku gzugs bzhugs su gsol la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / yang na nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la bzlas pa byas te/ 'bru'i phung po mtshams bzhir gzhon nu ma gsar du bkra
166b7(rgyud 'bum): ma byas shing khyo yod pa'i bud med bzhi la ston mo byas la/ de snyed kyi mthar zad pa med par gnas so// de nas skyes bus 'bru 'jal zhing grangs byed pa'i dpral ba la sngags dgod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das
167a1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i sngags de skad du smra bcad byas la bzlas pa bya'o/ / ji snyed du sngo la bltas na gnyis 'gyur du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de snyed 'das pa bya'o// de nas 'bru'i lhag ma de mi 'jal bar 'ching
167a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mi la sogs pa bos shing sbyin pa 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par bya'o// g.yul 'chag pa'i cho ga'o// da ni 'bru bang mdzod du 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ dang po re zhig mdzod kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du 'byung po
167a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gcer bu gsus pa 'phyang ba/ dbang po 'phyang ba/ g.yon pa'i lag na 'bru'i snod bzung zhing 'bru skyug bzhin pa/ gser gyi mdog rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gnyis bri bar bya'o// mdzod kyi khang par yang dri
167a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon sbyin zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ka'i mdzod kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o// de nas 'o ma'i chu rgyun gtor bzhin pa'i sngags pas
167a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar bya zhing / de'i rgyab nas de nas bri bar khyim du gzhug par bya'o// de'i rjes la 'bru'i mdzod khang du phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o// de nas mdzod kyi khang pa'i sgo ru dge 'dun gyi ston mo byas la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la
167a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs pas mchod do/ / nor rgyun ma'i gzungs rdzogs par bklag par bya'o// gtor ma rgya chen po byas la thang ka'i mdun du de nas skyes bus 'bru phyir 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'dra bar bsams la
167a7(rgyud 'bum): gur kum gyis gro ga la sngags bris la/ spyi bor bcings la kha gos kyis bkab la nyi ma re re zhing 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o// mdzod khang gi sgo ru nyin re nor rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi mdo bklag par bya'o// sngags pas bsgrub
167b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'i sngags bltas la/ dus gsum du brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o// ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du
167b2(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya ka Na pa ti hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
167b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan
167b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang la la tshogs kyi bdag po// tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'dzin na de'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzung bas dgos pa 'grub
167b5(rgyud 'bum): cing gsang sngags thams cad kyang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ / tad+ya thA/ na mo stu te ma hA ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ oM gaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaH/ oM ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ oM ga Na d+hi pi ta ye swA hA/ oM ga Na shwa rA ya swA hA/
167b6(rgyud 'bum): oM ka Ta kaT/ maT maT/ dar dar/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ d+hU bad+hU ba/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ stam b+hA stam b+ha/ dzam b+ha dza ma b+ha/ mo ha mo ha/ de hi de hi/ nA tA pa ya hA pa ya/ d+han+da di sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sa ma sa
167b7(rgyud 'bum): ma nu sma ra na mo stu te ma hA ru dza tsan ya swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM su ru su swAhA/ oM mu ru mu swA hA/ pA ba shI ti ba su puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ oM a b+hu ta bin duk+Shu b+hi ta tsit+ta ma hA sa mA gats+tsha ti/ ma hA b+ha ya/ ma hA ba la
168a1(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ba NA kra ma ma hA haste/ ma hA drAk+ShI d+hA la/ pra b+ho dwed+d+ha mi swA hA/ tad+yaD+D+h+ya/ oM ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ oM tsAru Nur+ya swAhA/ oM gtag cagaN+Dag kAN+Da gaNag ka// oM na mon mya swA hA/
168a2(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge ba sbyin nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig tshogs kyi bdag po// tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'di rtsom ning
168a3(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags bsgrubs pas/ dkon mchog gsum mchod du yul gzhan du 'gro 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la me tog dang bdug pas mchod pa byas te/
168a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'di bklags na las thams cad grub kyis/ 'di la the tshom ma za zhig/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / yul 'khrug pa thams cad kyi nang du'ang dran par byas na/
168a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du nang par langs nas tshig tu bton na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis mdangs 'phrog par
168a6(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur zhing / thag ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
168a7(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du
168b1(rgyud 'bum): ma hA ga Na pa ti tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan tshogs pa dag che// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag
168b2(rgyud 'bum): dgyes/ / gzugs ba rAn maN+Dal gru bzhir gzhag/ zla ba drug tu mchod par bya// lha yi 'khor los sgyur ba dang // tshe 'di nyid la skal ba mnyam// bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur// longs spyod lha dang
168b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa dang / / tshe yang ring ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// mi la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur// lha yi bu yang bran bzhin 'gyur// bdag gis bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur// klu yang de yis bsgo ba nyan// bran bzhi ni las rnams/
168b4(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur// lha yi longs spyod mnga' ris las// 'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos grub sgrub pa'i skal ba can// gdul bya dbang gis sku sprul pa// lha chen tshogs bdag chen pos bya// dngos grub
168b5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa mchog sgrub na/ / mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // longs spyod yid bzhin 'phel bar byed// 'jigs rten phan mdzad lha yi lha// gang gis mchod pa dngos grub yin// lha chen tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud
168b6(rgyud 'bum): las/ dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dag bya ste// ba yi lci bas legs par byugs// 'jam zhing mnyen la dbus
168b7(rgyud 'bum): mtho ba'i/ / dbus su tshogs bdag sku gzugs bzhugs// me tog dkar pos de la gtor// bdag nyid gcer bur byung byas te// log 'dren gzugs kyis yang dag mchod// ba ra ta ka zla ba drug/ nyin re bzhin du
169a1(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum du/ / gsang sngags brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs// bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// oM ni bkra shis dpal dang ldan// gsang sngags mgo
169a2(rgyud 'bum): la gzhag par bya/ / yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// dngos grub ster byed yi ge yang // de 'og gral la gzhag par bya// nyi ma lta bu'i yi ge yang // de yi rjes la bklag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po//
169a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge'i mchog ni blang bar bya// gsal byed yi ge dang po yang // de yi mjug tu brjod par bya// rin chen yi ge swA zhes bya// las kyi yi ge hA zhes bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gsang sngags bzlas// lha chen dngos grub
169a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i rgyud las/ lha'i dngos grub kyi gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas tshogs kyi bdag po bshad// tshogs kyi bdag po sku mdog dkar// glang po che yi mgo
169a5(rgyud 'bum): bi can/ / mche ba ya gcig chag pa dang // phyag g.yas la phug bsnams pa dang // byi ba'i gdan la bcibs pa dang // rin po che yis sku brgyan pa// zla ba tshes pas dbu brgyan pa// 'od gsal ba/ 'od zer 'phro
169a6(rgyud 'bum): ba/ mdog bzang ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ gsus pa che ba/ rgyun gyis spud pa'o// dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi bdag po bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas
169a7(rgyud 'bum): skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par me tog dkar po blangs te tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs bris te/ kha dog dkar po glang po che'i dbu can phyag g.yas na la phug bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na rin po che'i nor bu bsnams pa/
169b1(rgyud 'bum): gsus pa che ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zla ba dang byi ba'i khril bzhugs pa mkhas pas bya'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag la zhal phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid log 'dzin
169b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi gzugs kyis yang dag par mchod do/ / tshogs kyi bdag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas dbang ldan gyi mtshams su tshogs kyi bdag po dkar po
169b3(rgyud 'bum): glang po che'i mgo can/ byi ba la zhon pa/ mig gsum pa/ zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas na la phug dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa tri shU la dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs pa'i
169b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang la mdzub mo bkug la gung mo'i tshigs su gzung bar bya ba ni tshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o/ / tshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gsang
169b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags bstan pa ni/ / oM ni dpal ldan mgo la gzhag/ de nas yid bzhin nor bu ni// rin po che yi yi ge bri// sde tshan gsal byed dang po yang // de yi rjes su bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po//
169b6(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs yig brgyad pas mdzes par bya// gsal byed dang po yi ge yang // blo yis blangs te yid kyis bri// sde tshan gsum pa'i gsum pa la// dang po'i bzhi pa sbyar bar bya// sde tshan bdun pa'i gsum pa
169b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ / gsum pa'i dang po sa 'og tu sbyar// yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la// bzhi pa'i lnga pa zla ba gzhag/ dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan par bya// bzhi pa'i gsum pas de nas brjod// dngos grub sgrub pa'i
170a1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge ni/ / de yi rjes la bri bar bya// gsang sngags drag po'i yi ge yang // kun gyi mthar ni brjod par bya// gsang sngags 'di yi dngos grub ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid kyis byin/
170a2(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tshogs bdag chen po'i gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas gzhan yang gsungs pa ni// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yi/
170a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gyi gsang sngags zhes bya ba'i// dngos grub sgrub pa'i snying po ni// dpal dang yaM gi yi ge ste// oM zhes bya ba mgo la gzhag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge las// nyi ma'i yi ge 'og tu spras// dbyangs yig drug
170a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'og tu sbyar/ / thig le nA das brgyan par bya// mtshan gyi dang po'i yi ge ni// de yi rjes la brjod par bya// bzhi pa'i lnga pa de nas sbyar// lnga pa'i dang po bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po/
170a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge yang // dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan pa ni// de yi rjes la bri bar bya// zhi ba'i yig 'bru gnyis pa yang // kun gyi mthar ni brjod par bya// mtshan gyi gsang sngags zhes bya ba// 'dod pa thams
170a6(rgyud 'bum): cad grub byed yin/ / mtshan gyi gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par ni// me tog dkar po'i rtsa ba blangs// tsan dan
170a7(rgyud 'bum): dkar po dag las ni/ / tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs ni// mthe bong gi ni tshad tsam bya// gsus pa che la phyag bzhi pa// mkhas pas byas te legs par bya// rin po che yi snod du gzhug/ dkar chen mngon par
170b1(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba'i tshe/ / nang gi cha ris sku khrus gsol// gsal zhing dang la yid du 'ong // dri dang ldan pa'i bum pa yis// me tog dkar po'i dri yis ni// bdag tshal ldan pas khrus bya'o// de nas de ma thag tu ni//
170b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan drangs la// me tog dkar po dbul bar bya// la phug la dur bcas pa yi// gtor ma chen po'ang de nas dbul// spos dang dri dang mar me dang // lha bshos dag gis mchod par bya//
170b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'dis la phug dang / la du dang / chu dang / dkar gsum gyi gtor mas tshogs kyi bdag po la phul te/ spos dang me tog rnams kyang dbul/ de ltar byas na phyis bgegs byed par mi nus so// tshog
170b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po'i mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas la phug ces bya ba// ro brgyad ldan pa'i nyung ma ste// zas rnams kun gyi mchog kyang yin// ro mchog brgyad dang ldan pa yi// kha dang
170b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar dang bska ba dang / / mngar dang tsha dang lan tshwa'i ro// bzhun dang bro mchog che ba yang // nad sna brgyad kyi gnyen po yin// mkhris pa bad kan 'dus pa dang // khrag dang chu ser ma zhu ba// rlung dang rims nad kun
170b6(rgyud 'bum): la phan/ / 'di 'dra byung ba'i kha zas med// lha rnams kun gyi mchu yang 'gul// dngos grub 'grub pa'i zhal zas yin// tshogs kyi bdag po mchod par bya// la ru zhes bya'i zhal zas ni// mngar gsum
170b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu gsum pa ni/ / de bzhin zhim pa'i spos kyis bran// bag zan gyi ni ril bu bya// 'o ma mar du bcos byas la// tshogs pa'i gtor ma chen po bya// mar dang 'khur ba mngar gsum dang // mthun pa'i nal
171a1(rgyud 'bum): bas sna tshogs kyis/ / tshogs bdag chen po mchod par bya// de ltar tshogs kyi bdag po la'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs lag pagayas pa'i mthil du bzhugs la/ sems
171a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du ma yengs par bzlas brjod 'bum bya ste/ la phug la sngags kyis btab ste tshogs kyi bdag po mchod na/ tshe 'di nyid la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bsod nams mnyam par 'gyur ro// me tog
171a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar pos mchod na rgyal po la sogs pa pham par mi 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po la sogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa bdag gi dbang du 'dus par 'gyur ro// dngos grub sgrub pa'i zhal zas

171a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po khru gang tshad/ / rin chen me tog dkar po bkram// gsang sngags pa bum du bzlas byas pas// nad dang sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur// shel dang dung lnga tshogs bdag sku// mkhas pas ji ltar 'byor par bya//
171a6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar 'gyur// rin chen shel las tshogs bdag sku// mthe bong gi ni tshad tsam bya// se na pra zhes bya ba'i sngags// rig pa 'bum du bzlas byas te// shel gyi sku de khrus byas nas// skar ma rgyal
171a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi nyin par ni/ / bdag nyid shar du kha bltas nas// gos dkar gyon te khrus byas la// thal sbyar yid kyis gsol ba gdab// bdag la gnod pa'i bgegs gang yin// shel gyi sku de me long ste// mi g.yo mi 'gul rab tu
171b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / bdag nyid khrus byas shar du blta// dza ra ba dang rkun ma ni// gang yin me long nang du 'byung // de tshe de yi sa ngos zin 'gyur// tshogs bdag shel gyi sku de ni// mchod pa rab gsal legs byas la/
171b2(rgyud 'bum): nAr+tha ku r+yezhes byung 'i// rig pa 'bum du bzlas byas na// nAd dang sdug bsngal gyis zhen pa// sku de bstan pa tsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur// sdug bsngal las kyang thar par 'gyur/
171b3(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba chen po'i cho ga yin// rin chen gser zhes bya ba la// tshogs bdag chen po'i sku byas te// rgyal gyi nyin par mig phye nas// mchod dang rab tu gnas pa bya// ba ra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag
171b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu bzlas pa yis/ / sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i khyim der ni// nor rnams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// gser gyi tshogs bdag mthong ba yis// bgegs rnams thams cad nor 'bul 'gyur//
171b5(rgyud 'bum): bgegs kyis gnod pa mi nus te// rgyal po bzhin du mchod par 'gyur// gser gyi tshogs bdag gnas pa yis// sa phyogs rin chen char pa 'bebs// gser gyi tshogs kyi bdag po la// bgegs kyi rgyal po
171b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis/ / nor rnams thams cad 'bul ba yin// bdag nyid phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs mchog/ byas pa'i yon tan rnams la ni// gnod sbyin rnams kyis gter kha
171b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byed/ / skye ba 'di dang phyi ma la// rtag tu yo byad 'phel bar 'gyur// nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bus// rgyal bu bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed// de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag gi/ sku gzugs dkyil 'khor chu
172a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhir gzhag/ b+ha ga zhes bya'i gsang sngags ni// bzlas pa 'bum du byas pa yis// tshe de nyid la dngos grub ni// ci 'dod pa ni sbyin par mdzad// lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni// sgrub
172a2(rgyud 'bum): pa po la stsol bar mdzad/ / shin tu thugs rje'i bdag nyid pas// dpal ldan tshogs bdag thugs rje can// thugs rje'i phung pos dbul ba skyob// nor lha chen po'i bdag nyid 'di// dar dmar ras la legs
172a3(rgyud 'bum): bris te/ / rgyal gyi nyin par spyan phye nas// gang gi khyim du bzhugs pa de'i// sa phyogs de ni bkra shis 'gyur// zangs la tshogs bdag chen po'i sku// mkhas pas legs par bzo byas te// tsan dan dmar
172a4(rgyud 'bum): pos byugs pa'i sar/ / maN+Dal steng du legs par gzhag/ ban du ka yi me tog dang // pad+ma rA ga rin chen dang // me tog dmar po kun gyis mchod// bruM zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bzlas// rgyal po'i bu mo
172a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur/ / lha yi bu mo klu mo dang // mi 'am ci yi bu mo dang // bram ze'i bu mo mtshan ldan mo// mchog tu gzugs bzang gus par 'gyur// bran mo bzhin du bsgo ba nyan// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/
172a6(rgyud 'bum): sku gzugs dag la brten nas grub// mchod pa tsam gyis 'byung ba yin// gzhan yang tshogs bdag chen po'i sku// rin po che yi rgyu las byas// dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs byas te// rat+na sid+d+hi zhes bya ba'i// rig
172a7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'bum du bzlas pa bya/ / sa 'og gter rnams ston par 'gyur// ci dga' bar yang sprod par 'gyur// tshogs bdag chen po'i rgyud las// rgyal po la sogs pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
172b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag che// drag po chen po drag shul can// sangs rgyas thugs la byol song dbu// glang chen gzhon nus zhal brgyan pa// spyan gsum mche ba bzhi dang ldan// phyag bzhi zhabs bzhi klu chen gdam//
172b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po mche ba dkar po 'dzin// de 'og zhags pa g.yon pa na// dgra stag kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'dzin// mthing kha gsus pa che ba'o// de lta bu yi tshogs bdag sku// 'khar ba khro chu dag la bya// rgyal gyi nyin par rab tu gnas//
172b3(rgyud 'bum): des ni sgom zhing sgrub pa ni// dkyil 'khor bya ba'i sa brtags pa// le'u tshe dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// tshogs bdag chen pos bsgrub bya mnan// zla ba'i gdamal
172b4(rgyud 'bum): yum dang ni/ / gnyis su med par dgod par bya// de'i ming a rtsi ka re ste// rdo rje phag gdong ma zhes bya// dgra sta ba na da lag na thogs// khrag gis gang ba gtso la stob// shar phyogs kyi le'u tshe ser po la khams gsum gyi bdag
172b5(rgyud 'bum): po la phug dang gri 'dzin pa'o/ / lho phyogs kyi le'u tshe sngon po la gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje mchu ma sA de ba'i gde ba can dbyug to da 'tho ba 'dzin pa nag po'o// nub phyogs kyi le'u tshe dmar po la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po sprin gyi bdag ces bya ba
172b6(rgyud 'bum): dmar po chus gang ba'i sprin phung dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ / byang phyogs kyi le'u tshe ljang khu la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po nor gnas zhes bya ba ljang khu dbyug to dang rin po che'i kha T+wAM ga thogs pa'o// byang shar gyi le'u che dkar po la
172b7(rgyud 'bum): bgegs kyi rgyal po bin ya ka glang po che'i gdong mdung rtse gsum pa dang la phug thogs pa nag po'o/ / shar lho'i le'u tshe dmar po la yi dgas kyi rgyal po drag po zhes bya ba dgra sta dang thod pa ril po thogs pa nas po'o//
173a1(rgyud 'bum): lho nub kyi le'u che nag po la sprin phung gi sgron ma zhes bya ba sprin phur dang glog gi 'od du bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyis thogs pa'o// byang chub kyi le'u tshe nag po la bgegs kyi rgyal po log 'dren
173a2(rgyud 'bum): sna yon zhes bya ba glang po che'i sna can rtse gsum dang thod pa skam po'i nang du la phug dang shas bkang ba thogs pa'o/ / lha rnams la klu'i rgyal po brgyad bka' nyan pa ni klu'i rgyal po a ba la dang / ba ru Na dang / dung skyong
173a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'jog po dang / rigs ldan dang / mtha' yas dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po rnams so// shar gyi sgor rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung / lho sgror 'phags skyes po/ nub sgor spyan mi bzang /
173a4(rgyud 'bum): byang sgor rnam thos sras rnams sku mdog dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang khur shes par bya'o// lag na nor bu rin po che re re/ ral gri re re'o// 'di rnams kyi chung ma ni mi bri'o// 'di ltar bris
173a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang shar du gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum la/ de'i nang du dgra bo'i gzugs spra tshil las byas pa ring pa/ gnag pa/ skra zed pa/ til mar gyis byugs te/ snying khar ming rus bris la gzhug go/
173a6(rgyud 'bum): de'i sker ro sgra las byas pa'i thag pa gdags so// de ltar byas nas gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la/ la du dang la phug dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dang / gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la nya sha dang sgog btsong du sbyar ba'i
173a7(rgyud 'bum): dmar gyi gtor ma re re bsham/ klu chen po brgyad la gtor ma che ba gcig dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la re re bya/ gal te ma 'byor na che ba gcig bya/ lha bshos re re dbul bar bya'o// gzhan yang drag po'i rdzas
173b1(rgyud 'bum): spyang ki'i thod pa dang / zir nag po dang / ske tshe dang / chungs kar dang / nyungs nag gzhug par bya'o// tshogs bdag chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcugacig pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad
173b2(rgyud 'bum): bapar bya/ / sgom pa'i rim pa 'di lta bu// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas// shin tu gsang ste bsgrub par bya// yi yi rang bzhin stong pa las// snang ba'i rang bzhin hUM dang ni// ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon 'byung // ming gi
173b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags las rab tu bskyed/ / khro bo'i sprul pas stong gsum bkang // 'od bsdus thog ma'i hUM la 'dus// tshogs kyi bdag po chen po de// 'gro ba'i don du bzhengs pa ni// khro bo chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yum dang
173b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor yang rdzogs par bskyed/ / phu brgyad klu brgya de sems dpa'i tshul// rgyal po de bzhin khro bo'i tshul// yi ge b+he dang ming las bskyed// 'od zer tshul gyis spyan drangs la// dza dang dza yi 'phro 'du dang // hUM dang hUM gi gsang
173b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang / / lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs la// nus pa'i mthu dang ldan par bya// mchod dang gtor ma btab par bya// ba liM gr-ih+Na khA yi sngags// snying po dag dang spel bar bya// sgom pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
173b6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gsang sngags rgyal po ni// dbyangs yig gsal byed dag las btu// dang po bzhi pa de rjes bri// bzhi pa'i lnga pa gral la gzhag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge dang // de yi rjes su bsam par bya// de
173b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po/ / de yi rjes su brjod par bya// de la dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan// dgu pa'i yi ge dag dang ni// 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar ba yis// rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya'o// /
174a1(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar bar bya// nyi ma yi ni yi ge dang // bzhi pa'i lnga pa de nas bri// de la dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan// nyis pa'i bzhi pa'i yi ge la// dbyangs
174a2(rgyud 'bum): yig bzhi pas brgyan par bya/ / lnga pa'i bzhi pa'i yi ge la// gsum pa'i lnga pa sbyar bar bya// bzhi pa'i dang po'i yi ge la// dbyangs yi ga bzhi pas brgyan par bya// 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge la// de yi 'og tu sbyar bar bya// rin po che yi
174a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dang / / las kyi yi ge mtha' mar brjod// tshogs bdag chen po'i rtsa ba'i sngags// 'dod pa thams cad sgrub byed yin// gnod sbyin brgyad kyi gsang sngags ni// ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa// ya ya zhes bya la sogs dang //
174a4(rgyud 'bum): baM zhes bya ba la sogs dang // bi na ya ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / b+hai ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / hUM zhes bya ba dang / tri zhes bya ba ste/ brgyad po la hUM dang phaT kyis mtha' rten pas srog gi snying po'o// klu yi sngags
174a5(rgyud 'bum): ni ming las bskyed/ / oM dang hUM phaT dang ldan par bya// rgyal po chen po'i gsang sngags ni// b+he zhes bya ba dang / b+hi zhes bya ba dang / b+ha zhes bya ba'i sngags su 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyi gsang sngags 'byung
174a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / / bsgrub bya dgug pa'i sngags ni/ ya dang k+Sha dang ka dang la// ma dang sA dang b+he ra b+he// tri dang ra dang tsa dag gis// sha dz+nyA nI dza ni dza zhes// lan grangs mang du
174a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / gnod sbyin brgyad kyi gsang sngags kyis// dam pa'i bla rdo blang bar bya// de nas bla rdo bsreg par bya// de nas bla rdo mnan par bya// rbad pa'i gsang sngags rgyal po ni// ya dang kA dang ka dang la// ma dang hA nga
174b1(rgyud 'bum): b+he ra be/ / de ba yak+Sha ya ma dang // nA ga nA ga thum ril yang // che ge mo dgra bo thum ri la ya// ya ya zhes kyang bskul bar bya// de nas gsad pa'i gsang sngags ni// ma dang hA dang b+he ra be// yak+Sha la sogs gong dang mthun/
174b2(rgyud 'bum): de'i rjes 'di skad brjod par bya// nA sha yan lan gnyis so// sha ya ts+tshaN+Da tsUr+Na tha la ya// nA ga ya ka tra mA ra ya// han tsakra rim pa gnyis// bin+d+rA ya ka dzi b+hin d+ha// tan+da kA ra de nas brjod// che ge mo mA ra ya nas pa/
174b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM hUM phaT phaT/ drag pos gsad pa sngags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang ni drag po'i sngags// oM big+h+nAM b+hi ba b+hi sarba bi d+yA bi nA sha ya hrid mi ta ya/ hUM tsi tu pa tu/ pra ma ru tA ya
174b4(rgyud 'bum): han ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ brah+ma brah+ma/ brah+ma ya brah+ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ 'khar ba'am yang na zangs dag la// log 'dren cheni po'i gzugs byas la// de la rab gnas mchod pa bya// dgra bo'i gzugs
174b5(rgyud 'bum): brnyan 'og tu gzhug/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i stan du bye// dgra de 'chi bar the tshom med// yang ni sbyor ba'i las rnams ni// dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs so// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku tsan dan nam rin po che la byas
174b6(rgyud 'bum): rab gnas byas la mchod pa phul te/ ser ba gcod par 'dod na/ ser ba'i bdag po rlang lha dang chu lha'i gzugs byas te/ sprin gyi gzugs dang / 'brag gi gzugs byas la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gdan du
174b7(rgyud 'bum): mnan par bya'o/ / bdag nyid kyis kyang mnan par bsams te/ hi ka tsan+d+ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas na ser ba chod par 'gyur ro// yungs kar yang phyogs su gtor bar bya'o// ser ba 'bebs par
175a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na/ chu dang sprin gyi maN+Dal mngon par bris te/ tshogs bdag chen po 'brug la zhon par bsgoms te/ bdag gi bka' nyan par bsam/ gsang ba'i rdzas su bya ba la// lcags phye gser phye
175a2(rgyud 'bum): zangs phye rnams/ / gnam chu 'bras kyi phyes smras te// ser ba ji tsam 'dod pa'i dbyibs che chung byas la khrag gis byugs la bdun dang bdun phrag mang du byas te/ ka ka ki ku'i thod pa'i nang du blugs te/ sprin gyis
175a3(rgyud 'bum): dgab par bya'o/ / ka ka'i thod pa la sngags bri bir bya'o// rim pa gsum mo// rten gyi rdzas kyang gzhag par bya'o// bruM bruM b+ha ri sha ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa dang / ka ka'i thod pa'i
175a4(rgyud 'bum): nang du ser ba dngos su gsum mam/ bdun nam/ brgyad byung ba dang / dgra'i yul du bskyal te/ sngags zlog nas bzlas pas 'bab bo// gal te ma bab na tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku dbu thur la bstan/ zhabs gyen la
175a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa dgra bo'i yul gyi dbus su sba'o/ / mod la ser pa 'bab ste/ bya ka lan ta ka'i sgo nga tsam dang / dbyibs dmar po sha ba'i rlig 'bras tsam pa yun ring po 'bab bo// lo tog 'joms pa'i sngags ni bruM zhes bya
175a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / de gcod par 'dod na ni sku dang ka ki ma phyung ba'i bar la nyi ma re rer 'bab pas dbyung bar bya'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku la mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// gsang sngags kyang dbu zhabs ma nor bar rin po che'i 'phreng ba brgya
175a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ / sku khrus gsol ba bdag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol lo// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ tshogs kyi bdag pos byed pa yin// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag dgyes//
175b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag ce// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan gi khrom// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i lewaM ste bco lnga pa'o// tshogs kyi bdas pa rgya
175b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dri paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas/ 'jig rten dngos grub ched du ni// rgya gar yul nas bsnams nas byon// rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas la btang
175b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / rgyud 'di bsam pas grub pa yin/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud/ dbang gi rta mchog sku la phyag 'tshal
175b4(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ shar lho'i dur khrod chen po ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas shing tsan dan gyi nags kyi tshal rab tu dga' ba'i ming zhes bya ba mi ma yin pho mo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du/ dpal nag
175b5(rgyud 'bum): po chen po zhes bya ba bi na ya ka la sogs te 'khor gdug pa can rnams kyi dbus na skye 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs la dbang byed pa'i nag po chen po zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig
175b6(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams na mthar byed rta'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM
175b7(rgyud 'bum): hu lu hu lu hUM baM/ zhes brjod pas/ dur khrod ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas nas nag po chen po rang dbang med par mthar byed rta'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las ci bya zer zhing rang rtags srog gi snying po 'di mdongs gsol du phul
176a1(rgyud 'bum): kha/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra big+h+nAM bin+d+rA ya ka hUM hUM phaT/ ces phul lo// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas rgyal po mig mi
176a2(rgyud 'bum): bzang gis/ / mthar byed rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsil to// oM ma pad+ma khros pa'i bdag/ nag po chen po drag shul can// gsang ba'i sgrub pa bshad du gsol// mgon po bsgrub par bya ba gang // gsad cing lus
176a3(rgyud 'bum): srog dbye ba dang / / ma grub shis bstan pa dang // mgon po'i rtags dang ser ba rnams// rta mchog chen pos bdag la gsol// zhes zhus pas/ de nas pad+ma khros pa yis// nag po'i sgrub thabs ched du brjod//
176a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung slad du// gza' skar tshe sa grangs shis pa la// dur khrod la sogs shing gcig tu// bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas la// nag po chen po
176a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / phung sa'am sa nag dag la ni// stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas ni// dri spos khrag gis chag chag bya// dbus su gru gsum zla gam ldan// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// de dbus thod chen nang du ni// sha lnga snying
176a6(rgyud 'bum): snas brgyan pa yi/ / gtor ma bshos bu khru gang tshad// de la mda' gzugs dmar nag dar// gri snying tsaka li yang gzugs// de nyid mgon po'i rten du gzhag/ Da ma ru yi pags pa'i nang // mgon po'i srog sngags bri bar
176a7(rgyud 'bum): bye/ / sngo yi nang du ma rdos sril// spos dang rgyun gtor gtang bar bya// dkon mchog skyil mchod pa bsham// de nas pad+mar bdag bsgoms pa/ khrugs ka'i rna las bod 'bros pas// bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa/
176b1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi mdun du bsam byas la// mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya// rnam dag bdun gyi 'og tu ni// tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya// btang snyoms la sogs pa raM tri// bad stengs yi ge hUM las ni// nag po zhal gcig
176b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag drug pa/ / gri gug 'phrang ba Da ma ru// thod pa mdung dang zhags pa rnams// g.yas g.yon rim pas bsnams pa'o// sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan// sku smad pa ti khra bo gsol// stag lpags zhing gi
176b3(rgyud 'bum): sham thams can/ / gtum po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs// dpral bar dri yi thig les brgyan// spyi gtsug mi bskyod sprul sku bstan// de ltar bdag mdun gsal bsgoms nas// spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas pa
176b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / gtor ma pU dza la sogs pas// nag po che la sbyin par bya// mgon po'i thugs ka'i hUM las ni// srog gi yi ge g.yas nas bskor// khor yug dag gis bzla bar bya// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra big+h+nAM bi nA ya ka hUM hUM

176b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang // rnal 'byor bar chad byed pa rnams// nag po chen pos bsgral 'dod na// stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas kyang // drag po a yi nang du ni// pho mo rabs chad thod pa'i nang // gzugs
176b7(rgyud 'bum): ri spra tshil dag la bya/ / ming rus dag ni bkod nas kyang // gsad dang na ba skabs dang sbyar// mgon po'i sku dang dam rdzas rnams// kha dang kha la dgod par bya// phag thod nang du thun rdzas blugs// rtag gtor rgyun gtor gay+ra
177a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gas rtags pa da lasags dpa thA/ oMms gas kI ThA rnas pa sa sak+Sha sa gas sa sa pa ts+tsha kyil mams ma
177a2(rgyud 'bum): r-i Ni pa di pra ti dz+r-i s+pha ra si tadra id/ d+yaSh+Ta kha ga bA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ gr-ih+Na g+hah+na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ han ha na/ da ha de ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/ di ni me ken dgra bo mA ra ya hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ hUM bi nA ya kaM bi la sa traM bi hri d+hU dza sa mi bu bin+da
177a3(rgyud 'bum): ya ka a mu ka bri srog hur thum dza mA ra ya rbe da/ drag sngags bzlas shing thun gyis brab// zhag bdun par du smra mi bya// de la rtags rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ lus srog dbye ba'i le'u
177a4(rgyud 'bum): ste gsum pa'o/ / / de nas yang dag par bshad bya// las mtha' sbyin sreg dag gis brtul// gru gsum dbus su gdug pa'i shing // dbus su nag po 'khor bcas bskyed// ling ka gtor ma
177a5(rgyud 'bum): dam rdzas rnams/ / nag po'i zhal du dbul bar bya// sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg par bya// ag+ni dz+wa la raM las rdzogs// thal ba rlung dmar dag la bskur// a mu ka ni myur du rlag/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las//
177a6(rgyud 'bum): mtha' brtul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// de ltar bsgrubs kyang ma grub na// gcig dang gnyis la nan tan bskyed// de ltar byas kyang ma grub na// sa gsum
177a7(rgyud 'bum): khrag gsum dug gsum la/ / khru gang ba yi gzugs kyi tshad// gru gsum dbus su nag po'i gzugs// spyi tshar dag tu lding du gzhug/ bris skud ma rdzas bla rdo rnams// rang gi gru gsum mal gyi 'og/ dug dang tsher mas
177b1(rgyud 'bum): steng nas dgab/ / thun rdzas brab cing sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha la gri ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ phaT hUM hUM ka ya nA big+h+nAM bi trak+She k+ShaM la kA sA ma badz+ra oM/ de skad brjod cing thun gyis brab// de la rtags rnams

177b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyud las/ ma grub na spogs pa'i cho ga dang gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bya nag 'phur zhing lding ba dang // mon pa a tsa ra dang ni// dge ba shes ban d+he

177b6(rgyud 'bum): lhung ba 'byung / / dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi rim pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ser ba dbab pa'i las bya na// mon nam mdze can thod pa ru/
177b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bris nas kyang // rigs lnga klu yi sa bon dpod// rtsibs mtshan ser srun ming rus dang // yul du phob ces bya ba bri// de mthar 'khor lo rtsibs dgu la// dregs pa'i sngags ni bri bar bya//
