178a5(rgyud 'bum): yi rangs nas/ nag po chen pos bstan pa srung bar khas blangs nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / bod
178a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi lo tsa ba pur bu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shrI ma hA kA la nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
178a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma
178b1(rgyud 'bum): lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su lha'i sde dpon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag po/ ma hA kA la 'dod khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang sgyur ba dpal mgon po nag po chen pos
178b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol/ nad thams cad dang / rims
178b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang / nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad
178b4(rgyud 'bum): bcing ngo / / 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo // thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo // gzhan yang / oM shrI ma hA kA la gA na gu te swA hA/ na maHshrI ma hA kA la gA ne gu ti shwa
178b5(rgyud 'bum): gA/ na mo yo gi na Ni na/ tad+ya thA/ oM hi le hi le/ ki te ki te ni/ tsi de tsi de ni swA hA/ 'ad bton pas gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/ drug gsum nad kyi sman pa/ rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog
178b6(rgyud 'bum): shing / rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra lha/ bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug/ srin po lang ka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma snying rdul du rmog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan
178b7(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas so/ / 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs
179a1(rgyud 'bum): rims nad thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po chen po skyes bu gnag ser mche ba rnon po/ mche ba chen po// rims
179a2(rgyud 'bum): na thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa brjod par bya ba ste/ phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na/ n+yA dzA d+hu te na/ da ha daha/ rAt+na d+hA te na/ ba tsa ba tsaR+Sha dzA
179a3(rgyud 'bum): d+hud+ha te na/ ba hu shra be ba hu pa ri bA re/ bahu pa ri sho d+ha ne/ i pany+tsa ra tsaN+Da lan/ ha na ha na/ oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha/ shi ro muny+tsa/ tsak+ShuHmuny+tsa/ sho tra muny+tsa/ g+hA Na muny+dza/ dzi hwA muny+tsa/ kaN+Da muny+tsu/ grI ba muny+tsa/ briSh+Ta sany+tsa/
179a4(rgyud 'bum): k+Sha Ti ka mu wu/ kuk+Sha muny+tsa/ u ru muny+tsa/ dza no muny+tsa/ hasta muny+tsa/ pa do muny+tsa/ aM gu l+ya muny+tsa/ oM kra pra t+yaM ga muny+tsA/ a ba sa ra/ ar+ya sI muny+tsa/ gats+tshaH/ dz+wa ra mu to si/ bdag la swA hA/ oM dz+wA la mA aM gu le hUM/ sarba
179a5(rgyud 'bum): dz+nyAdzA ra nan phaT/ 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs// rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ba ni d+he ye shes
179a6(rgyud 'bum): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ de bi ma hA kA li nA mad+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ lha mau nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
179a7(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pazhig na byang chub kyi shing drung
179b1(rgyud 'bum): na bzhugs so/ / de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas/
179b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la lha mo nag mo chen mos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rig pa 'di 'bul na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/
179b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing bar bya'o// 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la
179b4(rgyud 'bum): thug pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o/ / thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing bar bya'o// de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM ru ru bi tiSh+Tha ba to si ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha bA to si swA hA/ 'di
179b5(rgyud 'bum): bton pas rims dang / nad dang / mi ngas dang / nyes par bltas pa thams cad dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// swA hA/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs
179b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / @rgya gar skad du/ shrI de bi kA li pra ma rA dza tan+ta ka li/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'i rgyud/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi
179b7(rgyud 'bum): mngag bdag dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po phyag na rdo rje lus bskal pa'i me ltar
180a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba/ srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/ nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugs so// 'khor ni brgya byin dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / ma mo'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis
180a2(rgyud 'bum): bskor te bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe na dpal phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan la gzhugs te bka' stsal pa/ nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin sde brgyad nyon cig/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di na bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i sring
180a3(rgyud 'bum): mo zhes bya ba rgyal tshab chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ khyed kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig/ bstod pa gyis shig/ ngas kyang khyed la byin gyis brlab bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor
180a4(rgyud 'bum): kyigyi nang nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan las langs te/ dpal lha mo nag mo la dge ba bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/ sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol na// dge bcu'i las la sems rab cher spangs nas// lam gyi khyad par gong
180a5(rgyud 'bum): ma rab rdzogs kyang / / mtho ris skyes gnas rnams la dge bcu yi// tshul gyis don mdzad phyi rol bsgyur ba yi// dpal ldan lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'das pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas// sku tshe
180a6(rgyud 'bum): ring zhing gzugs byed phun sum tshogs/ / gzhan gyi lan chags gnod pa'i rkyen dang ldan// 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma byin len pa'i tshul la rab spangs pas// bsod nams tshogs kyis
180a7(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod phun sum tshogs/ / gter gyi longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes// sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi tshangs spyod pa'i bka' rnams srung ba dang // mngal gyi grong khyer dman las rnam
180b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'phags/ / srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste// dge sbyong chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon mongs brdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis// gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso// gsung mchog
180b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te/ / bden par gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan// nyid la rnam par 'dul ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad ma//
180b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo'i 'khor tshogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ngag 'khyal spangs pa'i yon tan sbyin pa yis// ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo bar chad spangs// dgos 'brel tshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma// byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod
180b4(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal bstod/ / nga rgyal khengs sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis// zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs snyan ma// tshig rtsub gshe ba'i gnyen po byed pa ste// ngag rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// rang sems
180b5(rgyud 'bum): brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni/ / 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spangs pa'i rtags// bdag med rtags su seng ges rna ba brgyan// brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam par
180b6(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / phyi rol yul 'di gnyis med chos su gzugs brnyan khyod// gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags// sbrul gyi rna rgyan can la phyag 'tshal bstod// log par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnam spangs te// sangs
180b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod/ / de lta rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can// spros bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag/ ma dag mi dge bcu las ngan song grub/
181a1(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub// las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs pas// gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang // dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan// gdug pa'i tshul can
181a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma/ / bstod par 'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa/ dam pa
181a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni/ / tshogs kyis sbyangs pa'i don dam mthong ba yis// gnyen po shes pa rim par sgom pa la// mthar phyin pa la gshegs pa'i don mchog lags// de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni//
181a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te// dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab bsags pas// dang po sa las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes// rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni// rnam par mi rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs//
181a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni// rang sems sa gnyis dag la rab brten nas// de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son// rang sems bzhi pa'i sa la cher bsgoms pas// lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son//
181a6(rgyud 'bum): rang sems drug pa'i sal cher sbyangs pas// bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son// rang sems brgyad pa nyid la cher bsgoms pas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid// dgu pa la yang stobs kyi pha rol sgrub/
181a7(rgyud 'bum): de yi stobs kyis ye shes 'phen par 'grub// 'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni// sangs rgyas pa la smin pa'i smon lam can// sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma// 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i tshul ston cing /
181b1(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub shog/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can gyis// dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo
181b2(rgyud 'bum): nas bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste// don dam spros bral chos nyid 'di las btsal// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden// 'khor ba mya ngan gnyis su med pas zab// sems can sangs rgyas
181b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pas 'phags/ / las dang rnam smin gnyis su med pas bstod// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas smin// yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi ngang // spros dang spros med don dam dbyings kyis/
181b4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus// bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen te// mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod// bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul gcig/ gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu// mtho ris
181b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing / / bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod// bskyed med rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun grub mchog/ sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid de// sgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis
181b6(rgyud 'bum): med grub pa'i ngang / / bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bstod// yab dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don// stong dang mi stong gnyis me zhi ba'i ngang //
181b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i ngang // lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid gcis tshul// rtsol byed rtsol bya gnyis med don gcig pas// rnam par spros med don dam dbyings
182a1(rgyud 'bum): / kyis bskyod// mu stenas sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med don rtogs te// srid dang rnam tshol yang dag don gcig pas// thams cad gnyis med skul
182a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal bstod/ / phyi da nga nang med ti gcig gi dang // sems ldan sems med rnam dag ni ba'i tshul// snang dang mi snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong // gnyis med don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di
182a3(rgyud 'bum): dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul/ / spros pa med pa'i don dang 'brel ba ste// 'di rnams lha mo khyod kyi thugs la gsal// 'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i
182a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po phur phud lnga pas/ dpal lha mo la 'phrin las kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ sems nyid 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i khyad par ni// sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang
182a5(rgyud 'bum): med/ / kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// 'thun par bstan pa'i zhib dpal lha mo// zhi mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// zhi ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu ma dang //
182a6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu zhi mdzad khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dgra dang nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// mthun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo// rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can// rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis
182a7(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/ / rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjid// kun tu rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzad// mthun par bstan pa'i dbang gi dpal
182b1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo/ / dbang mdzad dbang sgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can// dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dmar po shin tu brjid// kun tu dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/
182b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzod// mthun par bstan pa'i drag po dpal lha mo// drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can// drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku
182b3(rgyud 'bum): mdog nag mo shin tu brjid/ / kun tu drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams drag pos sod// khyod kyi rang bzhin cir yang ma grub la// ji ltar 'dzin nyid cir yang snang ba
182b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / 'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa lags// bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin lhun grub nas// khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la/ klu'i rgyal
182b5(rgyud 'bum): po dga' bos sku'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa/ gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma// yon tan rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar
182b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'o/ / khams gsum gdul phyir gdan du bong bu zhon// mya ngan mi 'da'i rtags su lcags sgrog mnga'// bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas brgyan// gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris//
182b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug zla rgyas gsal// shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas brgyan// dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang // bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan me bu le bsnams// dbang drag
183a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs phyir ral pa lam nag sprug/ nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dpal mche ba gtsigs// 'khor ba ljags la bstar phyir dkan sgra bdebs// gdug pa zhe la gnon phyir sdang mig bgrang //
183a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan rtsa dmar// snyoms po'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ ma mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// sku gsung thugs rtags phyag rgya khadzAgasor// sku gsum
183a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs byed thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan/ / drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir chub mas brgyan// nyon mongs sreg phyir me phung nang na bzhugs// 'dod khams bskyang phyir yongs 'dre shing la brten//
183a4(rgyud 'bum): lha min 'dul phyir rdzong gi dka' bzlog ma// dpa' brtan brtan phyir stag gi sham thabs mnapas// bstan pa srung phyir drag mo'i cha lugs rdzogs// nga rgyal dbang sdud bdag med sgra sgrogs phyir// thabs
183a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi snyan cha g.yas pa seng ges brgyan/ / zhe sdang dbang 'dul dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab snyan cha g.yon pa sbrul gyis brgyan// 'du byed mi rtag rtags su dril bu sgrogs// chags phyir rnga ma mdzad rak+ta'i
183a6(rgyud 'bum): rba glong 'thung / / dam tshig srung phyir zhing lpags rgyan du mdzad// tha dad las rnams 'dul phyir rma bya'i 'phrul// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas// ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar ba'i
183a7(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / rang bzhin gnas mchog byang shar mtshams na brtan// dbu ma'i sa la gnas phyir dre'u zhon// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir mi yi tshul// mkha' 'gro ma mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// / de nas
183b1(rgyud 'bum): grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas/ / dpal lha mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ dom dam gnyis med byang chub sems yin yang // srid gsum gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// rang sems rnam dag
183b2(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i gzhal yas khang / / rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil pa las// keng rus thod 'phreng zhing gi rgyan dang ldan// sku mdog gnag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal// sngon mo ral pa 'dzings pa'i sprul 'gyed pa// sku yi sprul
183b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dpal ldan na ma Ti/ / gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyings su bzhengs// yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la bzhad// 'phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye bar mdzod// gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma to//
183b4(rgyud 'bum): gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum ma ste// dbang gi 'phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho ma// drag po 'joms
183b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon/ / 'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// bstan pa rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlobs// / de
183b6(rgyud 'bum): nas dpal lha mo la/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang // thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum// gdod nas gnyis med
183b7(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i snying po ni/ / dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par gsal// 'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la// byis pa rnams kyi bstod pa byed pa lhung // blun po rnams kyis dngos por rab brtags nas// gzugs
184a1(rgyud 'bum): can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba'i don yangs thugs chung khyod nyid la// tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams// nams kyang grol bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid min// gdod nas
184a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med bde chen ma gtogs par/ / khyod kyi smon lam brtags kyi cho 'phrul la// don du bzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams// khyod la brten nas thams cad btub par 'gyur// gang zhig skye ba med par shes
184a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / gdod nas gnyis med snying po bsgom nus na// gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin// khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis// bskal pa grangs med 'das par rab bltas kyang // khyod kyi
184a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus/ / gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin rnams kyis mthong // sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyis// khyod ni bos kyang bskal par mi thos te// 'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de
184a5(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / khyod kyang bos la de yang khyod kyis thos// gang zhig lus ngag dge bas khyod sgrub pa'i// blun po de yis nams kyang khyod nyid spangs// lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas// mchod
184a6(rgyud 'bum): na dngos grub de yis gter thob 'gyur/ / khyod ni rgyal ba mang po'i yon tan sdud// chos kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mo la// zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir//
184a7(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol tshul gyis thams cad 'dren mdzad ma// khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa// sgrib pa mang po stong nyid ngang du gshegs// stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod// stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis
184b1(rgyud 'bum): bstod/ / 'di ltar bstod na bstod par 'gyur grangs pas// khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang // byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod// de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser
184b2(rgyud 'bum): mig can gyis/ / dpal lha mo la bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i don// thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mkha' la spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la// sgo gsum rdul snyed
184b3(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod/ / bdag gis khyod ni mchod pas ma bsgribs kyang // dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char babs pas// mchod pa'i tshogs
184b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dis dbang po rgyal gyur cig/ dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig padag po ste// bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs// khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags na// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa
184b5(rgyud 'bum): byang bar mdzod/ / khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni// 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs// dga' bathun phrag dog med pa'i spros pa ni// rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul// 'di ltar
184b6(rgyud 'bum): yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni/ / nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum kun tu 'gro don la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul par spobs// yang dag khyod kyi yon tan
184b7(rgyud 'bum): sku mchog ni/ / gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba gdab// 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang /
185a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rangs bskul zhing gsol btab nas// dge ba 'di yis ngan song stongs gyur te// thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo// de nas dpal
185a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan b+ha mo nag mo la/ nam mkha'i lha bran rnams kyis bstod pa/ bskal pa me ltar ba ba ra ba'i glong dkyil na// rlung nag dgu pa'i glong 'khyil pho brang nas// ma cig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma// bdud kyi
185a3(rgyud 'bum): yum pa gshin rje'i lcam gcig ma/ / dpal ldan lha mo re ma ti// nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can// mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can// khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni// don dam dbyings
185a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyod pa med pa'i rtags/ / dbu sgra g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni// yul gyi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu 'khyil ba ni// don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i
185a5(rgyud 'bum): rtags/ / ral pa'i gse ba nas me stag 'phro ba ni// thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbu la thod rlon 'phreng ba bcings pa ni// thugs rje'i sbrul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// gay+Ya
185a6(rgyud 'bum): na seng ge bgying zhing mchod pa ni/ / sman mo thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// g.yon na sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka 'phyar ba ni// zhe sdar ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtags// snyun cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba
185a7(rgyud 'bum): / / sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni// srid gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig gzigs pa'i rtags// zhal gyi drag po hom khung gdengs pa ni// bstan pa 'jig
185b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ru tra sgrol ba'i rtags/ / rnog dug mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni// bsgral ba'i zhing bcus pa sgrol ba'i rtags// skul zhing spags g.yang gzhi gsol ba ni/
185b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag chos dang don dam ldan pa'i rtags// glang chen ko rlon snams phyed dkris pa ni// theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags// re lde nag pos snams phyed dkris pa ni// 'jig rten 'di na che btsan
185b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i rtags/ / lte ba'i khung nas nyi ma 'char ba ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gting nas skems pa'i rtags// spyi bo'i gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni// dug gsum ma rig mun pa sel ba'i rtags// zhabs la dbang
185b4(rgyud 'bum): gi lcags sgrog 'khril ba ni/ / thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags// phyag g.yas shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni// sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// phyag g.yon thod rlon dmar chen
185b5(rgyud 'bum): 'thung ba ni/ / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags// bong bu gA pa phyin phyogs zhon pa ni// log par lta ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i rtags// srin po'i og mas snga ru byas pa ni// srin yul lang ka
185b6(rgyud 'bum): bu rangs 'dul ba'i rtags/ / sbrul nag chun pos gong rmed byas pa ni// zhe sdang dbang gis dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i rtags// rus sbal nag po'i phob bu btang ba ni// klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i
185b7(rgyud 'bum): rtags/ / snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi khram bam ni// dam tshig nyams pa khram la 'debs pa'i rtags// phyi shar nad kyi rgyal ba btags pa ni// bstan pa 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bo la// nad ka 'bebs shing
186a1(rgyud 'bum): dal kha bsgyur ba'i rtags/ / don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zo ris btang // thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rak+ta'i thig les brgyan// 'dul byed 'phrin las rtags su thal ba'i
186a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mas gdag/ ma mo 'bum phrag bran du khol ba ni// khams gsum khyab par 'phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags// ma cig kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// rdo rje 'phyar bas ri rab tshogs por 'phen//
186a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis btsun par lha mo khyod la bstod// de nas yang gshin rje nag pos dpal lha mo la che ba'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa/ lha mo dpal ldan mkha' 'gro nag mo khyod la ni// rgyun du til
186a4(rgyud 'bum): mar gyis byugs lan bu gcig ma ste/ / ro nyarna chas bsgyings shing cha lugs mang po 'chang byed ma// rgyan du rkang sgrog lcags la byas pa gcig gis rkang pa mdzes par brgyan pa ste// mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas
186a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba de ni nag mo khyod nyid yin par shes/ / ral pas bdag nyid mdzes par brgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dge su yis shes// 'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag du ba 'thul ba na//
186a6(rgyud 'bum): nag mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur// lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can du dur khrod dgyes// khyod ni g.yog bcas mya ngan
186a7(rgyud 'bum): med cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang sgrogs/ / khyod ni dba' bo dag gi mgo bcad g.yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa yi// mgo 'phreng lag na thogs shing gar stabs bskor zhing lag pa brkyang
186b1(rgyud 'bum): bskum che/ / nub tshos che la klu dbang gshibs pa'i ska rags bcings shing lag na mdung dang ni// ba dan thogs shing khrag gi chang gis ra ro myos te mig rtsa dmar por byas// mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod ni 'byung
186b2(rgyud 'bum): po phal chen kun gyis mthong / / rkang pa'i gos ni kau rlon mtshan pas drangs pas snams kyi phyed ni re ldes dkris// mi yi rgyu ma gsar pas zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing khrag zhag tshom bus thig ler brgyan// mi sha so sar
186b3(rgyud 'bum): che ma che ma za yin mi ro'i cod pan mgo la brgyan pa ste/ / bdag la skyob pa'i drag mo mi sha thogs khyod snga nas ma mthong gzod mthong na// bdud dang srin mo ma mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig sngangs shing khyod la 'dud//
186b4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la ni// brgya byin sogs kyis bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud// lha rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams 'jug phyir
186b5(rgyud 'bum): rab brtul bas na rna ba ya gcig la/ / brang gis 'gro ba sbrul mgo gdengs ka stong dang ldan zhing phud sgrogs gcig gis brgyan nas rgyan du byas// ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor
186b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing sa gzhi gnon pa'i steng gi ni/ / phyogs nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma zla ba lha mo khyod kyi rked nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis gnon// rgya mtsho glong nas me 'bar chu rnams skems par byed par nus pa'i bud med thams
186b7(rgyud 'bum): cad zhi mdzad ma/ / lha chen sku dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka' bzlog nag mo mi nad phyugs nad kun la 'jigs pa med// ma cig dpal ldan lha mo khyod nyid la ni bdag ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod par
187a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyis/ de nas dpal ldan lha mo nag mo la/ bram ze mchog sred kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa/ ma cig lha mo dpal lha mo// rdo rje lha mo nag mo che/
187a2(rgyud 'bum): mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis btsun par khyod bstod kyis// bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas// yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags// ma mor grags shing 'jig rten skyong //
187a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rtul drag spyod brtson 'grus che// 'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal// gshin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod// gos su dar gos sngon po gsol// sdug dang mi sdug cha lugs 'chang // spyan mig mthong na mi sdug
187a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu sdang / / dad cing tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud// re 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas// re 'gab tshal dang shing la gnas// re 'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas// lha mo'i gnas rten de ru 'cha'// gnas de ri dang
187a5(rgyud 'bum): tshal dgon du/ / rtag tu lha mo khyod bstod na// de yi dgongs pa skong bar byed// bdag gis rtag tu bstod byas na// bdag gi bsam pa grub par mdzod// rma bya'i sgro la rgyal mtshan byas// gang zhig rtag
187a6(rgyud 'bum): bsten srung bar byed/ / gnag yug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed// seng ge stag dang spyang ki yis// rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang // rdo rje dril chen snyan par sgrogs// byin te dril chen snyan par sgrogs//
187a7(rgyud 'bum): na 'ga' lag na tri shU la thogs// lan bga' nyi zla'i ru mtshon 'phyar// mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig na// de yis dus su mchod byas na// lha mo khyod las lhag pa med// bdud 'dul lha min srin mor ston// dgra
187b1(rgyud 'bum): dang 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed/ / bud med nang na mchog yin te// tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra// rgyal po'i khab na pad+ma 'dra// zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra// chu la rgal na klu zam 'dra// 'phongs po rnams kyi
187b2(rgyud 'bum): genyen pa shes 'dra/ / lha dang lha min g.yul babyed tshe// lha mo khyod kyi sde ba la// lha rnams kun gyi rdzong bcas nas// lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas// lha ma yin rnams pham par byed// lag na mdung dmar chems
187b3(rgyud 'bum): se chem/ / ru mtshon ba dan me ltar 'bar// dgra 'dul g.yul bzlog khyed la bstod// / de nas drang srong chen po ko'u di n+yas/ dpal lha mo la dpe byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ 'jig rten gtso la
187b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal/ / ma rnams nang na khyod ni rtag tu mchog yin te// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod// byad bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab
187b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / mig yangs 'dam skyes sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra// bsod nams ye shes snang ba grags pas brgyan// dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu 'dra// dang bdag pad+mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang // sems la
187b6(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis pa// pad+ma lta bur shin tu rnam par dag/ lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos// mtshan ma yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan//
187b7(rgyud 'bum): dri med ye shes kun nas rab mdzes pa// dran pa rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur// ji ltar seng ge gcan gzan mchog gyur bzhin// sngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba yin// bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad
188a1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par shog/ ces bstod do// / de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs so// da yang bstod
188a2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di dag gi don sgoms shig/ yid la rtag tu zlos shig/ lha mo 'di la bstod pa ni nga la bstod pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa yin no// lha mo de dag kyang mi 'di srung bar byed do// skyob par
188a3(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor de rnams rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rgyan gyi char chen po phab nas so so'i gnas su 'khod do// bstod
188a4(rgyud 'bum): bapa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI de wi kA li aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/
188a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bzhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub
188a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad do/ / de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
188a7(rgyud 'bum): sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge brtson 'grus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' srin
188b1(rgyud 'bum): mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus la dgongs nas/ dpal lha mo nag
188b2(rgyud 'bum): mo la gzigs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / thos bsam sgom la cher gnas pa'i// rgyu 'bras rkyen gyi bdag nyid can// 'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog/ dpal ldan lha mo nag mo 'phags// byang
188b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste/ / sa ltar sten pa'i gzhir gyur pa// yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra// byang chub smin byed me lta bu// dge ba'i 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo// shes rab rnam dag nam mkha' ste// khyod ni
188b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba chen po 'dra/ / 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod// bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i// las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas// nga rgyal gzugs kyis 'dul ba goms// shes rab snying
188b5(rgyud 'bum): rje'i lam du 'gro/ / khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu// dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i chu// kun la phan pa'i dpag bsam shing // nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal// zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing // ming ni ri
188b6(rgyud 'bum): bong rA dang 'dra/ / rang gi rgyud ni 'khor lo 'dra// u dum pa ltar khyod dkon yang // bdud rtsi lta bur yongs tshim mdzad// 'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags// rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyang ston// chu dang nam
188b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i chu ba ma ltar/ / gdul bya'i srid gsum cis kyang 'dul// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong // dam pa rnams dang yang dag gcig/ dam pa rnams kyi lam du 'gro// lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo//
189a1(rgyud 'bum): @srin mo klu mo sha ma mo// bdud mo 'byung mo grul bum mo// drug mo rdzam chul glog 'gyur ma// rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma// mkha' 'grog tum mo zhing sgrol ma// ni rgyas dbang dang
189a2(rgyud 'bum): drag pos 'dul/ / dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang ston// rnam par brgyad kyi dbyibs kyang 'byung // 'gro ba drag po'i tshul yang ston// phung po lnga yang brjod par nus// dbang po tshim byed yul lnga'ang ston/
189a3(rgyud 'bum): rten cing 'brel pa'i spyod pa mkhas// yul can rnams ni gsod ma lags// de bzhin dgra rnams gsor ba dang // lus can rnams ni gsod la brtson// sems ni gsod pa med la mkhas// 'khor ba las/
189a4(rgyud 'bum): ni ring du song // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan te// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong mdzad dpal ldan ma// dam chos 'dzin pa rnams la byams// oM AHhUM shrI de bi kA li
189a5(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya dza/ DA ki ni rA ya ma swA hA/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa// yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang thob// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur// yi dgas gnas su mi skye zhing // byol song skyes pas thogs mi
189a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / lus 'phags gnas su skyes pa na// thog la sogs pa mi 'bab cing // snga mi snyan du rlung gis min// de bzhini baglang spyod du yang // chu dang rlabs kyis 'khyer mi nus// 'dzam bu'i gling du gang skyes pa//
189a7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gnod pas nyen mi 'gyur// 'dod pa'i lha rnams gnas su yang // skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur// bsam gtan bzhi yi skye gnas su// tshad med bzhi ni 'phel bar 'gyur// gzugs med gnas
189b1(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi bor yang / / don med na ni mi skye ste// 'du shes med par rnams kyang min// 'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su// khams gsum tshul gyi bdag don spyod// rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur/
189b2(rgyud 'bum): sems 'dzin par mi byed do// nyon mongs rgya ba drug po dang // de bzhin nye ba nyi shu dang // mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyur// bskal pa grangs med mang por yang // mi khom brgyad du skye mi 'gyur//
189b3(rgyud 'bum): stegs rtsod pa bzlog pa dang // mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan// sdug bsngal bskal pa mang por yang // nams kyang 'khor bar mi ltung zhing // myang ngan 'das pa thob bya'i
189b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / nyan thos sa rnams non pa dang // rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni// rab dga' dri med 'od byed 'phro// sbyang dka' mngon 'gyur ring du song // mi g.yo/
189b5(rgyud 'bum): legs pa chos kyi sprin// sangs rgyas sa chen bla na med// bcu gnyis po yang 'thob 'gyur te// kun tu 'od dang bdud rtsi'i 'od// nam mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od// rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od/
189b6(rgyud 'bum): las kyi 'od dang dpe med sa// dpal ldan sa dang shes rab 'od// thams cad mkhyen dang rang rig ste// bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang // 'di tshe byung na myur du thob// sa rnams ma thob par
189b7(rgyud 'bum): du yang / / 'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang // shes rab snying rje ldan gyur cing // chos la dga' ba rnams kyis srung // dngos grub thob ste de bzhin gshegs// rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur//
190a1(rgyud 'bum): @dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang // dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa// yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad thob ste// sku gsung thugs ni grub nas kyang // khams
190a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/ / zhes gsungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang / dpal ldan lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi
190a3(rgyud 'bum): rang zhing mngon par bstod do/ / dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa rdzogs so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa/
190a4(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum gyi rgyus// sdig min las grub lha dang lha ma yin// dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'di ru// sha khrag dmar la rol
190a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lha mo khyod/ / lha yig yul ngo rgyal bar zhal ches las// lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod// ces bstod do// rdzogs so// / dkon mchog
190a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang
190a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ badz+ra ma bu/ bud+d+ha badz+re/ badz+ra ma bu bud d+hi dze/ shUn+ya tA pra be she/ bai ro tsa na gar+b+he/ pany+tso dri ya/ a ba bo d+ha na swA hA/ cho ga ni rtag tu bzlas
190b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / bdud thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// 'chi ba'i tshe 'phags pa 'od dpag
190b2(rgyud 'bum): med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro//
190b3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so// oM badz+ra A yuShe hUM a/ 'phags pa tshe dpag med kyi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas sam/ sngags chab kyis dbang bskur natsho nur bar 'gyur ro//
190b4(rgyud 'bum): oM buN+ye pu N+ye ma hA puN+ye/ a pa ra mi ta A yur N+ye dz+nyA na saM ba ro tsi ti swA hA/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA ya na sUtra/ bod skad du/
190b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
190b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyan yod na ba dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs
190b7(rgyud 'bum): cig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig
191a1(rgyud 'bum): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
191a2(rgyud 'bum): tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin par bzhes te/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni tshe thung ba las tshe lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/

191a4(rgyud 'bum): grangs 'di yi ge ra ba dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ ming tsam yang nyan tam/ klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang bar byed dam/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba

191a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ge 'drir 'jug na de dag gi yon tan dang legs par 'gyur ba ni 'di dag go/

195b1(rgyud 'bum): ri bA re swA ny+dza/ gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des dam pa'i chos mtha' dag mchod par 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ka ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/
195b2(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri brA
195b3(rgyud 'bum): re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyo ba dang / log par dang sel dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gsar thub dang / bod srungs dang /
195b4(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa la sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad
195b5(rgyud 'bum): ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ / oM na mo b+ha ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yu ra dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ti te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a ba ri mi ta pu N+ya dzA na
195b6(rgyud 'bum): saMb+ha ro ba tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam spungs te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi
195b7(rgyud 'bum): phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su biM nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya
196a1(rgyud 'bum): ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye bu N+ye ma hA bu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro ba tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba sa skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mu da ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha
196a2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA na ya ba ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thig pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi
196a3(rgyud 'bum): nus so/ / oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dzA nA su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/
196a4(rgyud 'bum): / oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya ba ra bI re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ge ra 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'chir 'jug gam/ bsti stang du byas te mchod pa
196a5(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa yin no/ / oM na mo b+ha ka ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi rish+tsi
196a6(rgyud 'bum): tate dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma ma pu N+ye a ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba
196a7(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+he ma hAn ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ges sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur
196b1(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ / mi yi seng ges tshul khrims stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// bzod
196b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ / mi yi seng ges bzod pa'i stobs rtogs te// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// brtson 'grus

196b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ / mi yi seng ges shes rab stobs rtogs te// sA rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grags par 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur
196b6(rgyud 'bum): dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta twe dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu d+h+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te/ oM sar+b+ba sa skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba bi
196b7(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+he ma hAn ya ba ri bA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
197a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//

197a7(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sems can rnams ni tshe thung ba che lo brgya pa sha stag ste/ de dag las kyang phal cher ni dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan te/ 'jam dpal sems can
