200b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a ba ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsita
200b2(rgyud 'bum): te dzo rA dzA ya/ tra thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga gan sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med
200b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ rgyal po chen po bzhis de'i phyi bzhin du 'byung zhing / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/
200b4(rgyud 'bum): a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/
200b5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye
200b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yu ra dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA bi
200b7(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA/ sa phyogs gang du mdo sde 'di 'dri ba'i sa phyogs de'ang mchod rten du 'gyur te phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang ri dgas gang dag gi rna lam du
201a1(rgyud 'bum): grags par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su
201a2(rgyud 'bum): bi ni sh+tsi ta te dze nA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya arba te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ka na sa mud ka te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu
201a3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de bud med kyi dngos por nam du'ang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a ba ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga
201a4(rgyud 'bum): tA ya ar+ha te sa myag saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
201a5(rgyud 'bum): 'a'adi'i phyir kar sha pa Na gcig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te
201a6(rgyud 'bum): a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wa re swA hA
201a7(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa de dag gis dam pa'i chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ / oM ni mo b+ha ga wa taM/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ti te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA
201b1(rgyud 'bum): ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs
201b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sol dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs dang / shAkya thub pa la rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa
201b3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur
201b4(rgyud 'bum): / dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba sa skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dpe ra
201b5(rgyud 'bum): ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phung por byas te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni
201b6(rgyud 'bum): bgrang ba ra mi nus so/ / oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a ba ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tat+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra ba ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga nas
201b7(rgyud 'bum): mung ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thig pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod
202a1(rgyud 'bum): nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ / oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya
202a2(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya rA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skar pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa bud gA te swa b+hA wA bi shud+d+he ma sA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ge ra 'drir
202a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug gam/ gus par byas te mchod par byed pa de dag gis/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa yin no//
202a4(rgyud 'bum): oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a ba ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha ma hA na
202a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ri wA re swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ges sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par
202a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ges tshul khrims stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grags par
202a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dga' phags// mi yi seng ges bzod pa'i stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grags par
202b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ges brtson 'grus stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grags
202b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi yi seng ges bsam gtan stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grags par
202b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / shes rab stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'a phags// mi yi seng ges shes rab stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na// shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grags par
202b4(rgyud 'bum): / 'gyur// oM na mo b+hu ga wa te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi nish+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sar+b+ba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+ha wa bi
202b5(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang
202b6(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// /
202b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na hri da ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ baphags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
203a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang ga tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na
203a2(rgyud 'bum): dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/
203a3(rgyud 'bum): dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams// de na
203a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na// de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni// dge slong dge 'dun bcas te
203a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong / / de na bud med yod pa min// mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin// rin chen rnams kyi pad+mo las// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang // chos gos
203a6(rgyud 'bum): mal cha lhung bzed rnams/ / sems kyis bsam ma thag tu ni// de dag mod la 'byung bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod// de ltar
203a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ / sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab// bsam mi khyab la dad byas nas// rnam par smin pa bsam mi khyab// rnam dag zhing
203b1(rgyud 'bum): du skye bar 'gyur/ / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshed dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de
203b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal rigs su skyes so/ / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to//
203b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i btsun mo ni rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to//
203b4(rgyud 'bum): rim gro pa ni snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog
203b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to// lha sbyin gyi ming ni dang ba
203b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bar gyur to/ / dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do// dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te/
203b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la/ zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma yengs par sgom zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
204a1(rgyud 'bum): pa tshe dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o/ / dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'dibang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o// nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lag
204a2(rgyud 'bum): lngas phyag byas la/ sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bsam na/ zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs
204a3(rgyud 'bum): bcun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi/
204a4(rgyud 'bum): tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes
204a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ sha ba laM/ a ba le/ sa ma dza le/ nirbe she/ ni ra dzA te/ ni ruk+te/ nir mu khe/ dz+wa la ba ran+te da ni/ su kha ba ti nir de she/ a mr-i te/ A yur gar b+ha
204a6(rgyud 'bum): nir hA ni/ a mr-i te/ A yur pra sA d+hA ni/ nir bud+d+hi Ak+Sha sha nir de she/ A kA sha nir dzA te/ A kA sha ni ra ku sha le/ A kA sha nIr dar sha ne/ A kA sha a d+hiSh+ThA ne/ su kha ba te ad+b+hiSh+Tane/ rU ba nir
204a7(rgyud 'bum): de she/ tsatwA ri d+har+m+ma pra sA d+ha ne/ tsat+tA ri Ar+ya sa t+ya pra sA d+ha ne/ tsatwA ri mAr+ha b+ha ba na pra sA d+ha ni/ ba la bIr+ya pra sA d+ha ni/ d+har+m+ma ts+tshe da ne/ ku sha le/ ku sha la nir dai she/ ku sha la pra tiSh+Te ne/ bud+d+ha ku sha
204b1(rgyud 'bum): le/ bi shrAd+d+ha prab+hA sa/ d+hAr+m+ma ka ra// nir+ha te/ nir bAd+d+he/ bi ma we/ bi ra dze/ rA dzas/ rasa? rbe/ ra sA rba pa le/ rA sA ma?/ a rbiSh+Ti te/ ku le pra ti ku le/ bi ku le/ dan+te su dan+te tsit+ta
204b2(rgyud 'bum): su pra shAn+tu tsit+ta/ su pra tiSh+Thi ti/ su le su mu khI/ d+hAr+m+ma tsar+tha me ba le ba le/ a nu sha a ba le/ bud+d+ha A kA sha gu Ne bud+d+ha/ A kA sha nir gu NaM/ a mr-i ta dun du b+hIHsA re swA hA/ dge slong dag
204b3(rgyud 'bum): dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bstan pa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des/ gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med
204b4(rgyud 'bum): par de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang spos kyis mchod par bya'o/ / byang chub kyi snying po pad+ma'i gnas dang / byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa'ang yid la bya'o// de la'ang 'dod pa bskyed
204b5(rgyud 'bum): par byas te/ 'dod pa dang dad pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad+ma
204b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o/ / pad+ma'i gdan ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs
204b7(rgyud 'bum): pa tshe dpag med bzhugs so/ / g.yas na ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med
205a1(rgyud 'bum): pas bskor ro/ / dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang / drad pa dang / gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur te/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la rin po che sna
205a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi pad+ma chen po dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag
205a3(rgyud 'bum): med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung // gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung/
205a4(rgyud 'bum): srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // sngon gyi rnam par smin pa ni gang la'ang ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i
205a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes
205a6(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po puN+ya saM b+ha wa dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//
205a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ban a mi tA b+ha d+hA ra Ni man+ta/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
205b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dgra btsem pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn taM ka re/ a mi ta ga ga na kIrti ka
205b2(rgyud 'bum): / re sarba kle sha kA yaM ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad par 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
205b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na
205b4(rgyud 'bum): tra yA ya/ ma hI du hi ke swA hA/ lus la nad byung ba dang / nad khong bskams su gyur kyang rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/ bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags
205b5(rgyud 'bum): de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs rdzogs so// /
205b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/
205b7(rgyud 'bum): a mi ta bi krAn+ta gA mi ni/ ga ga na kIrti ka re/ sarba kle sha kA yaM ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig
206a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par yang 'gyur ro// snang ba
206a2(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra pad+ma dz+wa la mU la tan+tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan
206a3(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa le gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
206a4(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das hi ma la ya'i tshal chen po tsan dan sdong po dang myu gu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs
206a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa g.ya 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun 'ged gzhon nu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan
206a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ pad+ma dkar po dang / nyi 'od dang /
206a7(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / pad+ma'i spyan dang / ye shes dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang
206b1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i snying po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / mthu chen po
206b2(rgyud 'bum): thob pa dang / zla 'od dang / za ba can gyi 'od dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dang /
206b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gtsor byams pa la gnas pa'i dge slong mang po dang / dge slong ma mang po dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma mang po dang / lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /
206b4(rgyud 'bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba phrag drug dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang /
206b5(rgyud 'bum): rdorje gshin rje gshed dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rdo rje rta mgrin/ rdo rje bgegs mthar byed dang / rdo rje gtsug tor dang / rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa bdun nu dang
206b6(rgyud 'bum): spyan ma dang / mA ma k+Shi dang / na bza' dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / 'od zer can dang / dbyangs can ma dang / phag zhal ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / ri khrod ma dang / drag sel ma dang
206b7(rgyud 'bum): nor rgyun ma dang / dkar mo dang / yid bzang ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / dpal 'phreng mo dang / sa 'dzin bzang mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug ma la sogs pa stong phrag drug brgya dang thabs cig tu
207a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bla ma dang / bkur sti dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir mchod pa du mas mchod cing bsngags pa du mas bstod par byed do//
207a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po thugs rje chen po yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing ltas bco brgyad du gyur to//
207a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i ltas de mthong nas lang ka'i rgyal po sgra sgrogs shin tu snyems pa dang ldan nas rang gi 'khor du ba dang lhan cig der lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra sgrogs kyi sems kyis rtog pa thugs su chud nas sku'i gnas
207a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nas 'od zer bye ba phrag du ma byung ngo / / 'od zer de dang sa g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang gsal bar gyur to// de'i tshe sgra sgrogs snyems pa dang bcas pas de'i 'khor
207a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du yams nad la sogs pas rnam par 'tshe ba de thugs kyis yongs su dgongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gdong bcu
207a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag brgya stong dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
207a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i tshogs rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu rin po che pad+ma'i thabs brgyan pa zhes bya ba bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
207b1(rgyud 'bum): phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye ma mgon po thugs rje can// rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dang bcas// che ba'i byin rlabs ldan pa rnams// sgra sgrogs snyems pa gzhom pa dang // nyon mongs rgyud nas
207b2(rgyud 'bum): gdon pa dang / / sems can rnams la phan pa dang // bdag la shin tu sman pa'i phyir// sku dang rjes su mthun pa yi// rig sngags sbyor ba khyad par can// snying po dam pa bshad du gsol// de tshe 'khor
207b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs thams cad kyis/ / mkha' phyogs me tog char gyis bkang // bcom ldan thub pa'i dbu la ni// rin chen me tog gdugs su gyur// lha rnams gtsang mar sbyar ba yi// yon chab bdug spos dri
207b4(rgyud 'bum): dang bshos/ / ci 'byor dad pa'i stobs kyis phul// thub pas nam mkha'i mdzod du brlabs// lha yi bu mo du ma yis// rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang // bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang /
207b5(rgyud 'bum): lnga ljin bza' dums mchod// de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma gzhon nu'i zhal mnga' bas// bzhengs 'dzum thal mo sbyar nas ni// ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol// sgra sgrogs bzhin gyis snyam
207b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / mda' dang rtsal gyis dregs pa ste// 'di ni legs brtsams las byung min// shin tu log pa las kyang min// sngon du sangs rgyas gdong mdzes kyi// bstan pa la yang mgo btang ba'i// bsod
207b7(rgyud 'bum): nams grangs kyis byung ba yin/ / lags pa du mar 'khrul pa ni// zas dang snod spyad dgos nor rgyan// bskal pa bzhi bcu'i mchod sbyin te// de nas rtsal dang shugs kyang yin// mda' ni b+h+ring gi ri ti yi// byin
208a1(rgyud 'bum): rlabs sngon du byed mod kyang / / grangs mang tshul khrims bral bas na// srin po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang // 'khor bcas gzhan la gnod 'gyur yin// ngas ni ngang tshul rmad byung ba'i//
208a2(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi bde gshegs sbyin pa dang // sgrub brtson lags byas mtha' yas pa// spyod bzang la gnas bsgral ba'i grangs// gang+gA klung gi rdul dang mtshungs// de skad 'bras bu de brtsams te// dang po'i las can ji
208a3(rgyud 'bum): snyed la/ / phan gdags gzhi ni bya ba'i phyir// cung zad bsdus nas brjod bya ste// legs par nyon la yid la zung // sngon che 'das dus bskal pa ni// gang+gA klung bcu'i snga rol gyi// cher 'das pa yi snga rol na//
208a4(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan// ma na da ra'i dri zhe bya ba// 'jig rten ston pa byung ba'i tshe// bdag ni khyim bdag drag por gyur// thub pa de la rag sngags mnos// thob ma thag tu bskal pa'i
208a5(rgyud 'bum): grangs/ / bzhi khri snyed kyi 'khor ba bsnyil// de rjes bskal pa gang+gA klung // bye ba snyed gcig snga rol na// bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan// thogs med pad+ma brgya yi spyan// gtsug tor yon
208a6(rgyud 'bum): tan rab rgyas pa'i/ / 'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba// 'jig rten ston po bzhugs pa'i tshe// bdag nyid drang srong bdag por gyur// rig sngags 'di mnos bsgrubs pa yis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
208a7(rgyud 'bum): zhal mthong zhing / / skye med chos la bzod pa thob// de rjes 'das rus bskal pa ni// bye ba phrag brgya'i snga rol na// bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan// tshe dpag med ces 'jig rten du/
208b1(rgyud 'bum): ston pa byung ba bdag gis mnos// de tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis// bdag la dbang bskur lung bstan mdzad// khyod kyi sngon du bskal pa'i grangs// brjod mi lang nas rig sngags phyir//
208b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag stong phrag stong snyed kyang // dang ba'i mchod sbyin chen po byas// bye ba phrag grangs bcu gcig tu// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur blangs// de dang de yi rnam smin mchog/ sangs rgyas
208b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing khams rab 'byam du/ / yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// phyis ni 'dren pa shAkya zhes// mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'khrungs tshe// mi yul las kyang khyad par du// yi dgas gling du skyes pa 'gag
208b4(rgyud 'bum): gtan la 'dud 'phel bya ba'i phyir/ / mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum du// skad cig glog 'gyu ji lta bar// rig sngags 'chang ba gdong bcu gcig/ yan lag stong dang ldan pa la// spyan ni tshig stong sum cu
208b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / mtshan dang ldan pa'i sku 'byung 'gyur// de tshe skal ldan la la zhig/ mtshan nas brjod cing skul mos// rig sngags zlos pa po gang zhig/ 'jig rten 'dod pa kun grub cing // phyi nang ye shes nyis
208b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lung bstan de skad thob pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig/ grangs snyed zhal nas gsungs pa yi// rig sngags snying po gdong bcu gcig/ mthu chen thogs pa med pa ste// 'gro la
208b7(rgyud 'bum): sman cing bde ba dang / / nad kun sel byed sdig kun sbyong // bkra shis med pa kun zlog cing // rmi lam mtshan ma ngan kun sel// dus min 'chi dang ngan sems zlog/ rtag tu dpal dang sems bde thob//
209a1(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan sdug bsngal ngal ba sel// rtsod 'khrug thams cad zhi ba dang // bdud dang gdon bgegs zhi bar 'gyur// 'jig rten smon pa kun 'grub cing // bdud dang bar chad mtshon cha nad//
209a2(rgyud 'bum): dbyig pa rdeg dang bcing ba dang // btson rar bcug dang mtshon chas brtsal// gsod sar khrid dang yan lag gcad// mig 'bru mtshon gyis gtsags pa dang // chu dang me dang rlungs g.yos// dug dang byad
209a3(rgyud 'bum): stems ro langs dang / / chom rkun mi ma yin rnams gnon// rig sngags 'di yis bsrungs pa dang // len dang 'dzin dang bri ba dang // klog dang kha ton bshad sogs rnams// brtson la 'jig rten lha
209a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas dang / / bdud dang tshangs pa dge sbyong dang // bram ze bcas pas gnod pa med// sngon gyi las drag yod pa yang // byang zhing bsrabs te med par 'gyur// nges pa'i dngos po 'di lags pas//
209a5(rgyud 'bum): rig nas mngon sum yid ches par// rnam par rtog med sems kyis blang // de slad skyabs dang skyob pa dang // srung dang dbugs 'byin dpal mgon dang // gling dang khang khyim 'di nyid yin// nye ring
209a6(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs ji srid par/ / mtshams bcad nas ni rig sngags dang // 'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe ba med// gang gi sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal mchod// skyabs su 'gro zhing sdig pa bshags// mngon par dga'
209a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing gzungs sngags 'dis/ / nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pa la// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas ma lus pa// mtshungs par yi rangs legs pa sbyin// rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga// ma lus sdig kun 'byang
209b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / gnod sbyin srin po sogs snang yang // gzungs dang byams pa'i snying rje'i sems// dang po bskyed nas bla med kyi// byang chub sems mchog sa la dgod// gang+gA klung brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi//
209b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nas brjod cing bstod pa bas// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang // bdag gi ming brjod dran byed cing // rig sngags rgyun du brjod na de// myur du mchog dga'i sa 'thob tsong // lag pa'i mthil nas
209b3(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba ltar/ / bla med byang chub myur du 'byung // rtse gcig dran pas gus byas te// rtag tu nang par sngar langs nas// chos bzhin du ni dge dgyes te// brgya rtsa brgyad du gang brjod pa// tshe 'dir phan yon bcu
209b4(rgyud 'bum): thob 'gyur/ / rtag par lus la nad med dang // lha dang sangs rgyas kun gyis srung // nor 'bru rin chen gos rnyed dang // dgra sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang // gza' rnams bkur cing rigs btsun 'thob//
209b5(rgyud 'bum): dug dang 'dre gshin gdon bral dang // lus la dri zhim kun dga' dang // bsam ngan mi snyan rjod byed dang // rims nad bral zhing dgang sla dang // dus min 'chi ba sangs par 'gyur// gzhan yang yon
209b6(rgyud 'bum): tan bzhi thob ste/ / 'chi kar sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang // mkha' la 'od 'byung lhas mchod dang // nam yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // bde ba can nam bde 'gror skye// rig sngags 'di dang sangs rgyas
209b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ / ye shes snying po 'dzin pa la// byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi// rnam par thar pa'i chos sgo 'thob// bskal pa du mar dge bsags dang // rig sngags 'di rnyed 'gyur ba ste// dang ldan
210a1(rgyud 'bum): khrel yong ngo tsha shes/ / blo bzang brtson ldan snying rje che// mdog dkar dang bzang gsong por smra// sems 'jam lus ngag dal bar spyod// bla ma la gus brtul zhugs che// sred pa chung
210a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing sbyin la dga'/ / sangs rgyas gus shing sems bcas pa// nyin mtshan rgyun du rig sngags 'don// bcu bzhi 'am ni bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la// gso sbyong sku yi mdun du blang //
210a3(rgyud 'bum): skyon ma da tsan dan dkar sogs shing // rigs bzang las byas sku gzugs sam// yang nas rdo rin chen sogs// bzang las bde bar gshegs gzugs bya// yang na ris su bris kyang rung // sku gcig pu
210a4(rgyud 'bum): 'am lha tshogs kyi/ / dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas pa la// mngon sum bzhin du dmigs byas na// myur du mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur// yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa yi// bum pa chu dang bcas pa la// sngags
210a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod pas ni 'dod don kun/ / 'grub 'gyur the tshom mi bya'o// nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman rnams la// sngags bzlas bza' 'am byugs pas sam// bdugs pa tsam yang gnod pa sel// srad bu 'am ni gos dag dang //
210a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyas gdabs kyang de bzhin no// 'dod pa gang dang gang la yang // me yi las kyi sbyor bar bya// gsang sngags 'don 'dzin yid byed la// bdag kyang rjes su 'jug par bya// de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag
210a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs kyis/ / sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la ni// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma rang bzhin med pa'i chos// sna tshogs gzugs su snang ba la// brjod rtog bral ba'i skad cig ni//
210b1(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i che ba nyid yin no// sred pa dngos po med pa la// dmigs par byed pa sgom pa'o// dmigs pa mthar thug med mthong ba// de ni sgom pa'i 'bras bu'o// kun tu bzang po'i gsang sngags kyi// don la ched du/
210b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar brjod// e ma sku gsum tha dad par// lus ngag yid kyi don las byung // don gcig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// sku gcig tu ni nges par gzung // gang la gang phan skyed pa la// 'ja' tshon bzhin du snang
210b3(rgyud 'bum): mod kyang / / tshig gis brjod pa'i sprul tsam ste// ye shes sku la dbye ba med// sgrib pa rnam sel las la ni// ched du brjod pa 'di ltar brjod// e ma dngos po ngo bo nyid// ma byung ma skyes ma 'gags pa/
210b4(rgyud 'bum): skye 'gag lta bu'i cho 'phrul ni// sku des phyag rgya sngags su snang // yon tan chu yi rlabs bzhin du// skye ba'i ngo la gsal bar byed// nan tan gyis ni de nyid kyang // rgyu ba med par khong du chud// byang chub sems
210b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sa snying gis/ / rgyu la ched du 'di brjod do// e ma rang bzhin rnam dag la// thogs med blo yi mun pa'i dbyings// rnam rtog bag chags kyis dkrugs nas// blo bur dkar gnag las su snang //
210b6(rgyud 'bum): dkar po sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun// de la sgro btags byang chub sems// de las byung ba'i 'phrin las kyis// nyon mongs las kyi sgrib sbyong byed// mgon po byams pas sngags sgrub kyi// lam la ched du 'di
210b7(rgyud 'bum): ltar brjod/ / e ma gdod nas grol zhi'i sems// chu ltar dang bar snang mod kyang // sna tshogs 'gro ba'i gzugs byung bas// mun po thibs por rnam par bsgyur// de nyid sems kyi snang ba'i phyir/
211a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bad rtsol med pa'i sems kyis grol// rtsol ba'i sems kyi drims ni// dri ma med pa'i sems 'ching 'gyur// nam mkha'i snying pos sngags ming la// ched du 'di ltar brjod par
211a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / e ma stong pa mtshan ma bral// kha dog dbyibs bral chos nyid dag/ dga' ba'i sems chen gsal byed pa// shes rab chen po'i yi ge min// mtshan dpe ye shes bde ldan sku// gang gang don du de snang
211a3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / snying rje chen po'i ring shugs kyis// 'byung 'gyur yi ge ta yi don// byang chub sems dpa' pad+mos ni// gnas la ched du 'di ltar brjod// e ma rgyu rkyen nam mkha' la// nyi zla skar rgyun 'khor ba yis//
211a4(rgyud 'bum): bsal nas nyin mtshan bye brag brjod// nyon mongs ma rig sred len gyis// 'du byed srid pa'i las bskul te// rnam shes ming gzugs skye mched drug/ reg tshor skye rga shi sdug bsngal// gsal byed dag
211a5(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid kyis dag/ phyag na rdo rjes 'bras don la// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma zab cing rgya che ba// sngags mthu bla na med pa ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes// shes pa nyid kyang rdzas
211a6(rgyud 'bum): med la/ / shes bya rdzas su ga la yod// shes dang yul gyi rnam par ni// rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis bsgos pa// de zad nas ni grol bar 'gyur// de nas rig pa'i lha mo'i tshigs// spos dang me tog
211a7(rgyud 'bum): bathor byed cing / / snyan pa'i sngags kyi glu yis ni// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la bstod// oM/ bcom ldan mgon po thugs rje spyan ras gzigs// zhal grangs mdog dbyibs dum cir yang snang
211b1(rgyud 'bum): stong dang brgyad dang bcu gcig drug dang gcig/ byams pa'i zhal bzang mnga' ba'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan ma'i'o// oM/ rab dgyes zhal mdog bum cir yang 'gyur// la la byams pa snying
211b2(rgyud 'bum): rje dga' ba'i zhal/ / la la 'dod rmongs ser sna chen po'i zhal// khro sdang gtum chags lha ldan phyag 'tshal lo// mA ma kI'o// oM/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur rdzogs pa'i zhal// gtan
211b3(rgyud 'bum): ba med pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag/ mdzad pa grangs med chub pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// gdan gnyis zhabs gnyis gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// na bza' dkar mo'i'o// oM/ mdzad pa thugs
211b4(rgyud 'bum): rje'i dbyings la thug med kyang / / rtsom pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi 'chad mdzad pas// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong ba yi// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrol ma'i'o// oM
211b5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma gzi ldan 'od zer 'gyed pa ltar/ / 'jug dgongs mi mnga' kun rtog mun bral yang // bskal pa rgya mtshor khyad par don gsal ba'i// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od zer
211b6(rgyud 'bum): can ma'i'o/ / oM/ sems kyi rgyud bgag mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe// 'dod chags byung ma thag tu yal ba ste// nyon mongs rtsa ba bcad nas pha mtha' med// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal
211b7(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / dbyangs can no// oM/ nyon mongs bdag tu bzung na 'khor bar skye// de la yang yang brtags na ngan 'gror skye// rang bzhin med par shes nas grol bar 'gyur// mgon po spyan ras gzigs
212a1(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / phag gdong ma'i'o// oM/ chos rnams dag par mthong na mtho ris 'thob// gnyis 'dzin rtog pa chad na mya ngan 'das// sgyu ma'i sems dang ldan na gzhan don 'byung //
212a2(rgyud 'bum): mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// khro gnyer spyan ma'i'o// oM/ rang tshul spyod la chags pas sa bon rul// gzhan tshul dman par brjod pas zhing sa chog/ lus ngan gtsang sbra tsam las byang chub
212a3(rgyud 'bum): ring / / mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sa 'dzani ma'i'o// oM/ bdag lha mun pa'i dug gis brgyal ba la// bdag med phyogs bral ye shes bdud rtsi'i sman// pha rol phyin bcu spyod dang rtog stsol
212a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dug sel ma'i'o// oM/ rang tshul bzang spyod nga rgyal zhen pa med// gzhan spyod btang snyoms byams nas rang sems sbyong // sred med bzod ldan
212a5(rgyud 'bum): nga gis rgol ba lags/ / mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// ri khrod ma'i 'o// oM/ khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing gtong la dga'// dad dang thos ldan tshul khrims shes rab bzang // cho ga shes
212a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chung 'di dang gzhan du phyug/ mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// nor rgyun ma'i'o// oM/ yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin nyan klog dang 'chad// kha don 'dzin sems sgom brtson de la chu'i// khrus
212a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs sbyang gnas dkar gtsang yon tan stsol/ / mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dkar mo'i'o// oM narang sems dul zhing lus ngag bag yod spyod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das mchod dam
212b1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dzin/ / thos bsam sgom brtson de ni dgra las rgyal// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par rgyal ma'i glu'o// oM/ tha dad kyi 'ching dbyer med grol ba yi// thabs dang shes rab bde
212b2(rgyud 'bum): chen byang chub lam/ / rnam thar ye shes mtha' yas dpal ster ba// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal 'phreng ma'i gla'o// oM/ bsam pa bzang po gser gyi sa gzhi la// byang chub
212b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs chos dpag bsam shing chen 'khrungs/ / ye shes thugs rje chu rgyun rlan mdzad pa'i// mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// yid bzang ma'i glu'o// sgra sgrogs 'khor bcas 'dar gyur te//
212b4(rgyud 'bum): rlung gis btab pa'i rtswa dang mtshungs// thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su// ched du brjod pa 'di gsol to// oM/ mgon mo rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gtso bo rab tu che ba'i lha// bsod nams du mas
212b5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa'i sku/ / ye shes mtha' yas thugs mnga' ba// blo ldan srid mthar mdzad pa po// tshul ldan tshul khrims la sbyor mdzad// gtsang ldan bram ze tshangs pa che// mdzad spyod mkha' mnyam spyod phyag 'tshal//
212b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// 'khor la legs so legs so zhes// oM A hrIHhUM swA swa bcas// yang yang brjod pas byin gyis brlabs// lcags kyu can gyis nyar nas// klu phyugs 'bum phrag 'dren pa ltar//
212b7(rgyud 'bum): dge sbyong kun slong dkar pos ni// byang chub rin chen gling 'jog mdzad// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan
213a1(rgyud 'bum): thub pa che/ / mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// yan lag cha shas thams cad las// 'od zer sna lnga bye ba phrag/ drug cu drug
213a2(rgyud 'bum): cu'i mtha' gzhal ba/ / grangs med dag ni bkye bar mdzad// zhing khams grangs med bdun gyi mtha'// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad du// bod kyis gang nas bong de las// snyan pa'i tshigs bcang 'di snang ngo // sangs rgyas
213a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ni chos la brnyas pa spangs/ / le lo che dang spyod pa mchog 'dzin spangs// 'gyod dang chos la ma nges 'byed pa spangs// nga rgyal che dang 'dod chags spyod pa spangs// 'gro rnams med na byang chub lam med de// 'grol
213a4(rgyud 'bum): brten nas byang chub che thob 'gyur/ / byang chub che la ma thugs rje chen po ste// 'gro rnams med na gang la skye bar 'gyur// de skad grags pa'i de ma thag/ phyogs bcu'i zhing bzhugs sangs rgyas sras// brjod kyis mi lang gtso
213a5(rgyud 'bum): bo mchog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang grags med gtso// thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// mi mjed zhing 'dir lhags par gyur// 'di nas shar phyogs zhing khams ni// grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid nas//
213a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing khams seng ge spungs par ni// sangs rgyas seng ge rol pa yi// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra// mdog dkar shel gyi ri 'dra ba// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag
213a7(rgyud 'bum): bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ / glog 'gyur bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// dngul gyi me tog du mas gtor/
213b1(rgyud 'bum): mde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// bod zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa bcom// shes rab mtha' yas
213b2(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar mdzad/ / bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM hrIHsiM hA nA da hUM phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ka la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga'

213b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa'i/ / drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// spyan ras gzigs dbang yid bzhin gyi// nor bu 'khor los sgyur ba che// gser gyi ri bo'i mdog 'dra ba// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang
213b5(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ / glog 'gyur bzhin du zhing bdir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// rin chen gser gyi me tog ni// rgya che du ma
213b6(rgyud 'bum): 'thor bar byed/ / bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung tshe ba'i tshogs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i ser sna 'ching ba bcad//
213b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa'i 'byung gnas gter chen rdol// bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM pad+ma d+hA ra d+ha ke hUM phaT// snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logs su/
214a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams pad+mo brtsag

214a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'dod chags 'dam rdzab bskams/ / tshul khrims byug spos char du phab// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM pad+ma nr-i te shwa ra hrIHhUM phaT/ snying po

214a7(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ / zhing khams rdo rje bkod pa na// sangs rgyas rdo rje thogs med bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// thugs rje chen po
214b1(rgyud 'bum): mi bshol ba/ / rin chen ma ra gad ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/

215b1(rgyud 'bum): sdong sprul/ / bsam gtan bdud rtsi rgya mtsho rlabs// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM ha la ha la hrIHpad+ma gar+b+ha hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang //

216a3(rgyud 'bum): bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i mnar sems zhen pa gsal// mthu stobs chen po'i

216a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / pus gtsug thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// steng gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// zhing khams gtsug tor brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas gtsug tor rgyal po bzhugs//

216b7(rgyud 'bum): par gyur/ / 'gro ba'i shes bya'i sgrib nags sel// ye shes ral gris rtsa ba bregs// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang
217a1(rgyud 'bum): thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ / 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus gtsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs 'dus nas// rig sngags mthu chen
217a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chad pa dang / / gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i// shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun// phyag rgya rnams ni spyi bor bzhag/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis legs so byin//
217a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' snyan pa yis kyang bkang // de'i tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi// khro bo'i rgyal po ma lus rnams// sa stangs thams cad gar gyis bkang // g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zla gam dang // zlum po gru bzhi
217a4(rgyud 'bum): gru gsum 'gros/ / mchod dang gyed mchongs dril po dang // rde bas dang btsir ba'i tshul gyis su// bgegs rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad// lag pa thal sbyar phye btsums bkyed// sor mo gcig bsnol
217a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig 'khyud dang / kun bsnos kun 'khyud kun gdengs dang // rgyab bsnol res 'khyud kun 'khyud dang // mos res 'khyud bsgrengs kun bsgreng dang // mnyam gzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya// sa gnon skyabs sbyin mchog
217a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sogs/ / phyag rgya du ma bgegs stsol mdzad// gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs// ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba// snga na med pa'i rig sngags rmad// ngo mtshar
217a7(rgyud 'bum): byung zhes thos ma thag/ lus kyang shin tu 'dar gyur nas// rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lhags te// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// gang zhig gdong bcu gcig pa yi//
217b1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags len cing 'dzin pa dang // rgyun du 'don dang yid la byed// 'jig rten mgon po spyan ras gzigs// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs 'di rnams// gang gis yid la byed pa'am// yang na ji tsam dran yang rung //
217b2(rgyud 'bum): dge ldan rigs kyi bu de ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sras// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bshes// rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yab// byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin te// bdag cag rnams ni de yi babangs//
217b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste// bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing // de yi tshul khrims ral ba med// mi de skye ba don yod de// lha gnas dga' gnas spu gseb tu// ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi 'dzud// 'jig rten 'di
217b4(rgyud 'bum): yi nad rigs dang / / gdon rigs ji snyed yod pa'am// rig sngags byed stems ma lus pa// de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis// tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang // shi ba sems brgyal med par
217b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug/ rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang // rgyal ba rnams la chos nyan cing // rgyal sras rnams dang stabs gcig tu// stobs dang mi 'jigs kun bsnyes te// mtshan dang
217b6(rgyud 'bum): dpe byad ldan gyur nas/ / skad cig glog 'gyu ji bzhin du// 'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing // zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/
217b7(rgyud 'bum): lha byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin// bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la// phyag 'tshal phyogs su 'khod nas ni// gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol// phyogs
218a1(rgyud 'bum): bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po/ / mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun// rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon// 'gro ba thugs brtse chen po yis// snying po byin rlabs ldan la gsol//
218a2(rgyud 'bum): rmad du byung ba'i snying po la// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang // rig pa 'dzin rnams 'thun par dgyes// 'on kyang 'gro mang gzung ba dang // dngos grub thams cad myur ba dang // snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir//
218a3(rgyud 'bum): mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyi// byin rlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags// 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol// rig sngags nyi ma zla ba'i 'od// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sprin bral byed// 'gro ba thugs brtsa mdzad pa dang // bdag
218a4(rgyud 'bum): la phan pa'i don slad du/ / rgyal ba mya ngan kun bral bas// rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// sdig kun myur sgrol bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas//
218a5(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi thugs rje las// spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA
218a6(rgyud 'bum): kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te bi ko Te/ ni ka Te/ Ti ka Te/ ka Ti ka Te/ ka ro Ti bIr+ya swA hA/ yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun// rig sngags 'dis ni nges par skyed// khyad par du ni mdze nad la// rdza
218a7(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i me bzhin no/ / rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi gzhi// sbyor phyin maN+Dal lham pa brgyad// ba ser skya yi bdud rtsis byugs// yan lag bcu gnyis mgor bcas pa'i// sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs
218b1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / lhag ma yan lag thig ler bya// cung zad lce la myang bas ni// dus dus sum brgya drug cu'i chad// nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni// lo gcig dus su rtog ldan 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// dpal skyed
218b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe bzlog pa yi/ / ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA a ba lo ki ti shwa rA
218b3(rgyud 'bum): / bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra warti pad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni dz+wa la ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha dz+wA la A kaR+Sha ya hrIHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// glo bur gnod pa gsal ba'i phyir/

219a1(rgyud 'bum): ya/ na mo skA tA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa ra mu khod gIr+N+No raM shi bi ba ri dA/ nA ga/ yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa/ shAkya brah+ma lo ka pA la ya/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra/ nA ra ya Na skan da/ ku be ra/ a su ren+d+ra/ mA tri ga Na/

220b2(rgyud 'bum): pu trA ya ma hA ma ta ye/ na ma Ar+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa saM g+he b+h+yaH/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta/ shai len+d+ra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bde b+h+yaH/ na maHsu bar+d+ha
