227b7(rgyud 'bum): dman yang dag sgrub 'di la/ / nan tan du ni 'jug par bya// ston pas de skad gsungs pa'i tshe// 'khor rnams dga' nas thal sbyar te// mkha' la me tog gtor nas kyang // mgon po spyan ras gzigs
228a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang gtso/ / thams cad kyis ni phyag 'tshal te// bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang // gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i// zhal dang sku yi 'du byed la// 'dzum bzhin du ni bltas nas
228a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / bsang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag/ pus btsugs thal mo sbyar byas te// phyogs bcur rang rang bde bar 'khod// de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni// 'gro ba'i dor du rig sngags gsungs//
228a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs phyir// las kyi sbyor ba'ang tha dad do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA/ byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te sa mya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/
228a4(rgyud 'bum): ar+had b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa R+ShA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tid+ya thA/ oM d+hu ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ in+d+ra ban+te/ tsa le tsa la/
228a5(rgyud 'bum): pra tsa le/ pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me/ pa re i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pan ya swA hA/ shud d+ha ya swA hA/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ 'di gsungs tshe nas chen dag/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos par 'gyur/
228a6(rgyud 'bum): tsa ba'i snying po stong brjod pas// dngos grub ci dang ci 'dod 'grub// gzhan yang sngags pas kun gyi dbur// sngon gyi phyag 'tshal bzhi po brjod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsan+da b+hu ha rA
228a7(rgyud 'bum): dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyaka sa bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga twe b+h+yaHan te b+h+yaHsa myaka se bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma An+ta ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Na~M kA ya/ tad+ya thA/
228b1(rgyud 'bum): ha ra ha ra/ i li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ khi le ha la swA hA/ dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug pa'i sa// chu dang gosal bdun bdun brjod// khrus byas gos gyon nang du 'jug/ snod sogs rdzas gzhan dag kyang
228b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dzA ra swA ga ra bai ro tsan+da/ b+hu hA rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsamya ka saM bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na maHAn+ta ba lo ki te shrar+tha/
228b3(rgyud 'bum): ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+hu ru b+hu ru/ ha ra ha ra swA hA/ bdun phrag re re btab pa yis// spos bsregs pa dang mar me sbar// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na swa
228b4(rgyud 'bum): gA ra be ro tsan+da r+dz+nyA haR+Sha dz+nyA ma/ ta thA ga d+hA 5/ an te/ samyakas ban+d+ha yA/ na maHsarba twathA ga t+ye b+h+yaHan te b+h+yaHsa myaka sa bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma sAn+ta ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hAk+Sha
228b5(rgyud 'bum): tikA ya/ tad+yan+te/ si ri si ri/ g+hor d+hi ri/ si d+hi ri sid+hi ri swAhA/ me tog byug spos me tog 'phreng // bdun bdun brjod la sku gzugs la// gtor dang byug dang gdag par bya// na mo rat+na tra mA ya/ nam AH
228b6(rgyud 'bum): d+hun srag pa'i yin na d+hAs/ thA d+hA la yin d+he/ sabyags sgyu/ ma sa rba tathApa taHsa cash+tsa sa rgyags ze kye d+h+ya nAm AnA pa po ki tab+h+ya/ oM d+his twA / mab+his / mtha
228b7(rgyud 'bum): NA~MkA ya/ tad+yaSh+Tha/ oM sa rkyem d+he/ me nyi ma ci/ so su so su/ bshos gtsang me tog 'bras bur pocas// nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas ni// zhal zas rnams kyis rnam par mchod// na mor thams
229a1(rgyud 'bum): na ma An+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsan d+hu h+ya rA dz+nyA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ an te sa myaka sa~M bud+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsamyaka sa bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/
229a2(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa mA d+hi si/ tsa le tsa le/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ me tog dkar po'i shing du ma du// sum cu bzhi mar sbreng rtsir ni// zhag
229a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig spangs nas nyin gcig ga ma/ / nang ra nub ba ra re re la// sngags ra btab nas bsregs nas gzod// ci dgos pa rnams bsgrubs na 'grub// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na bya/
229a4(rgyud 'bum): ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an+ta te/ samyAka saM bud ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHa nad b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya
229a5(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM i li mi li/ bi li ti li/ tsi li ti li swA hA/ chu 'am thal ba yungs kar la// lan bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhir gtor// sa phyogs nye ring gang du yang // mtshams gcod pa yi mchog lags so//
229a6(rgyud 'bum): namo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sa ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsamyaka sa bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi
229a7(rgyud 'bum): sarba ya~M/ ma hA sa twA ya/ me hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya rmA/ oM bi ti bi ti/ tiTi tiT/ be de be de/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+yA ba lo ka te shwa rA ya/ sarba sad+ha na~M swAhA/ sku sogs slar yang spyan drangs dang /
229b1(rgyud 'bum): rang nyid gnas nas ldog don phyir// chu la lan bdun btab pa yis// bkrus na dgos pa de dag 'grub// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te/
229b2(rgyud 'bum): samya ka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+haHsa myaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma AR+ShA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra hUM hraHhoH/ bajig rten
229b3(rgyud 'bum): 'pho la rab dga' bas/ / zas skom byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po zhal ni bcu gcig
229b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+huHsamya ka/
229b5(rgyud 'bum): saM bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mi hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na ma sarba b+hU ha b+hi hi sarba a haM bud d+ho pra sa ke sau g+he b+ho/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA
229b6(rgyud 'bum): ga ra be ro tsa nA b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yoH/ arbad b+h+yaHsamyAka sa bud d+h+ye b+h+yoH/ ra ma An+d+ha ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwAM ya
229b7(rgyud 'bum): ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a b+ha ya d+ha na/ sarba pa ta b+ha ra twA na ka ra~M/ sarba AnA la ga pany+tsa pra sha na ka ra/ sarba bi shud d+ha/ kA la hib+hA ba ha/ bi gra hA/ pra ma Ni ka ra/ sarba pA pa nA sha ya ka ra/ sarba b+hu da be ta la/
230a1(rgyud 'bum): pi sha ma d+hen/ drud sar+tharA/ duHmi tAM/ sarba big+h+nAM bin+d+rA ya kAn/ bo d+his twa kar/ par tsakra/ drAr b+hek+Sha/ sha ke b+ha ya ni sa ra ka ra/ sA d+hi pa/ na ga/ mak+Sha/ gan d+harba
230a2(rgyud 'bum): a su ra/ ga ru Da/ kin+da ra/ ma ho ra ke/ sarba ts+tshe da ka raM/ sarba pi shA tsi ke Da b+hA/ su kA d+hag+ha d+ha/ kra sA ka li ra pe Da li/ maM ga la/ bi nA sha kA ra ya/ na mo nA thA ma hA ka ru Na/ e ka da sha mu kha sA
230a3(rgyud 'bum): trus b+hu dze swA hA/ sre naNi/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ka ri/ yu di sA ri ni bi tsi tri mu khi/ e ka sa mu kha/ sarba sa~M g+ha ma hA ra Ni dza mut+te/ sa ha sra b+hu dza me hA ni dr-i/ ma hA shrI ni ni laM kA ra/ ma Ni kuN+DA ya sa nat+ta
230a4(rgyud 'bum): bitsit+ta mU la d+hA re/ tsan+d+ra sun+ya/ a tair ke Ak+Sha sha ga ga na tsa riN+De/ maM ga la sha ri dzI mU te be bit+ta pri Na maM ga le/ b+hu ri mi trakA rat+te/ tsu ru tsu ru/ she ta pA te/ mu ru mu ru/ shrad+d+ha a ba na ta te/ hunu hra ru/
230a5(rgyud 'bum): b+ha pr-id+d+ha mu Shi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsi kra mu khi/ A daM d+ya bA sha par Ni nI/ dzi b+ha ni/ mag+ha d+ha ni/ sarba pA Ni ni/ sarba par+ya raM b+he/ ma hA ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha hasta/ sarba b+hA ya pi tsa ye nI ra tsa di/ ag+na bi shwA/
230a6(rgyud 'bum): ud ka pA ye/ pra shA ma nI/ ka kho ra dA ni/ b+hAnra/ oM hi ri he ri/ dza ya kA rI/ ba la ka ri/ d+ha na ka raM/ ta tsa sa ka ri/ b+hi ba b+hI/ pra sha ma nI/ mud+hA nI pa ra tsi kra sha ma Ni nI pa ra s+ya/ bi nA ni mu dota
230a7(rgyud 'bum): ra ni pra b+ha na b+he la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma No d+ha re/ tre lo ka A la~M ka ka ri ti pU Na ka re/ tri pUr+Na ga ra bi daM sa ni/ ba ra b+he na/ pi tatra pA Ni ni/ sarba bi tsa ka rma Ni/ su da ni/ sarba byah+ma d+hi ni/ pra sha ma
230b1(rgyud 'bum): mi swA hA/ oM tsa li mi li swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ si li si li swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ tsin+ta li ma ti ni swA hA/ ur+d+ha ke sha paM ga la ke to d+he ma nu mu khi swA hA/ oM ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsar
230b2(rgyud 'bum): sar sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa muny+tsa ya/ pra shA ma ya pra shA ma ya/ yu d+ho da d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ tsit+ta ni ra mA la ka ri phaT/ a su ra na ra ki ti ta phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/ ska ti ri phaT/
230b3(rgyud 'bum): sa ha sra ne tre phaT/ sarba b+harba d+ha rA na ma/ tre te phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi mo kA Ni phaT/ ma ra tsakra na pa ra Ni phaT/ pa ra sa mya si kru pa Ni phaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya ka ma si du ni phaT/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/ sarba byA
230b4(rgyud 'bum): d+hi bi nA sha ya phaT/ sarba gra ho ta ts+tshin+di na phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa pa ra sa pa ra/ naM te tsa sha ri sa ma nAM/ sarba pra ya pra tib+h+yaHsarba yut+te b+h+yaHdus+t+ri te b+h+yaHsarba trit+ta ka kho ra da/ sarba bai she
230b5(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yaHsarba kA ya b+hAk+ShI ta te si tsi b+h+yaHrak+Sha ra kA mAM swA hA/ sa ha sre b+hu dze/ sa ha sra ne tra e ka da sha mu khi/ AR+ShA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+h+waM tu me man+t+ra pa tA ni swA hA/
230b6(rgyud 'bum): rje btsun zhal ni bcu gcig pa'i// sngags 'di yon tan mtha' yas te// gang la 'di ni gtsug tor du// yid bzhin nor bu thogs dang mtshungs// 'chang dang klog par byed pa dos// mthe' yas yon tan rnyed
230b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / nad dang gdon rnams sel ba dang // khyad par du ni sdig kun 'byung // ba dkar mo yi bdud rtsi lngas// maN+Dal 'jam po lnga byugs la// gtsang sbra ldan pas dbus su ni// shing sku ring bsrel
231a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa gzhag/ gzhan yang ring bsrel ldan pa yi// sku gdung bzhi ni phyogs bzhir te// tshad ldan pa yi bum pa ni// lnga po dbus dang mtshams su ste// rigs lnga'i mdog dang
231a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya can/ / sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod pa dang // srad bu tha dad bre bar bya// ci 'dod phyag rgya bris byas te// tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar// 'dod la dmigs nas sngags brjod de// bzhi khri rdzogs
231a3(rgyud 'bum): nas bco lnga la/ / 'dod pa gsol gdab khrus byas nas// ci 'dod myur du grub pa dang // bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // rnam par 'tshe dang mi mthun pa// khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur// sngags
231a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod yon tan mtha' yas rnams/ / bsdus nas sgrub po la ldan 'gyur// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags gang brjod pa tsam la yang // gshis ngan shi ba bco lnga med// skyes bzang
231a5(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga thob par 'gyur/ / mu ge rgyal po'i chad pa dang // dug dang mtshon dang g.yul 'gyed dang // stag sogs sbrul sogs gcan gzan gdug/ dug can zas dang me chus 'chi// srog chags bdun
231a6(rgyud 'bum): dang nyal nyes dang / / g.yeng byed dang ni lha 'dres gtses// gsor mi rung dang bdag lce ba rnams// de la nam yang mi 'jigs so// rgyal po chos ldan yul skye zhing // 'phags pa bzhugs dang dus bzang
231a7(rgyud 'bum): yul/ / bshes gnyan bzang dang dbang po tshang // dge la dga' zhing tshul khrims ldan// bran khol bzang ni nor mangs rtag/ gzhan gyis bkur zhing dgos 'dod sbyor// sems bder 'jig rten skyong bas
231b1(rgyud 'bum): srung / / sangs rgyas zhal mthong don zab brtags// gzhan yang dman la byams sems bskyed// snying rje mchi ma 'khrug pa dang // yon tan dran nas spro ba dang // dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang //
231b2(rgyud 'bum): phul du 'byung ba'i blo yas 'phel// tshul bzhin ma yin yid bral dang // bka' lung sde snod dang ba rnams// yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur// ji ltar spros pa'i gnas mthong na// sngags 'di rang
231b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin med par byas/ / oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+hohUM/ 'dzin pa drag po'i blo byung tshe// sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ gang gis lus ngag
231b4(rgyud 'bum): yid g.yon/ / sngags 'dis brten par byin gyis brlabs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+Shit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma kohaM/ gang la gnod yod sems ldan dang // ngang gis sa gzhi 'gags yod pa//
231b5(rgyud 'bum): bsal phyir seng ldeng dkar po ni// brag las skyes shing gzhon pa las// sor drug tshad ldan phur bu ni// brjid ldan rtse mo rno dpal can// mgo bo rked pargya mdud tshul// sor chad phyed phyed ldan
231b6(rgyud 'bum): pal/ / phur ni bcu drug rked pa la// sor gnyis zur brgyad ldan pa'o// sor gsum zur gsum rtse rno ba// dpal mtho cung bad par reg pa// ngos dang skabs ni zab pa ste// sngags kyi byin rnatha
231b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa brgyad/ / khang pa'i bur dang phyogs bzhi por// g.yas su phyogs pa gzugs par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sA n+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsan b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA an te b+h+yas myaka/
232a1(rgyud 'bum): saM bud+d+hA5/ nam hAnA ba lo ki te shwa nA ya/ bod+hi satwA ya/ ma hAs twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kAs/ na ma shwar+b+ha badz+ra bo nA ma/ phu lu u0f7fsa?/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha banaH/ han han/ da ha daha/
232a2(rgyud 'bum): pa tsa btsa/ oMmr-i te s+phu phaT/ lhas ngan thams cad 'joms pa dang // gnas khyeng byin gyis banab pa dang // tshe dang longs spyod rtag pa dang // dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang // dang po bral mo sbyar byas
232a3(rgyud 'bum): te/ / phyis ni lag g.yon sdigs mdzub bcas// oM dang a la la la ho// zhes ni brjod cing khang pa yi// nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas// de nas hUM smas se gol gtogs// de nas oM AHbadz+ra dang /
232a4(rgyud 'bum): s+thAn pa Ni b+h+yaHa haM// rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT brjod// shin tu 'jam pa'i stan la ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas// bsrangs te mig ni sna rtser phab// dal ba'i rlung ldan dkan la ni// lce yis cung zad reg par
232a5(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / lte ba cung zad 'khum pa yis// sems ni bag yod gnas par bya// rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min// gtsang ba ma yin mi gtsang min// bde ba ma yin sdug bsngal min// bdag dang ngar min bdag med min//
232a6(rgyud 'bum): blang dang dor ba'i 'jigs tshogs min// sems ma yin zhing sems byung min// phung khams skye mched med ma yin// yid min rtag min chad pa min// mun pa ma yin shes rab min// 'gro ma ni 'ong min
232a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas ma yin/ / sna tshogs sprin glog du ma ni// 'dod gzugs du ma sgyur byed pa// mkha' byung nam mkha' la ni thim// 'gro 'ong ston pa 'dod bskul ba// med mod na yang de ltar spyod// yul gyis ma skyes
232b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po min/ / dus kyis ma yin gtan gyis min// rgyu dang de bzhin rten gyis min// gnas skabs gzhan yang de la med// de la sems pa'i sems nyid kyang // gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi gnas// gar
232b2(rgyud 'bum): yang ma song brtags na stong / / brtag par byed pa rtog pa tsam// dngos rnams brtags pa ming tsam ste// kun rdzob tsam du ming yig la// rten nas rang gi sems bzung na// rbod kyi bzhi pa dang por gzung //
232b3(rgyud 'bum): phyung ba'i gnyis pa de la brten// de la dang po gnyis pas bskor// dang po'i bco lngas mnan pa ste// bcu drug pa ni grogs su gzhag/ yi ge drug la grub pa ni// sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin te// 'od zer rnam pa
232b4(rgyud 'bum): drug dang bcas/ / rlung drug gis ni dbang byas nas// yul ni rnam pa drug la 'jug/ yul drug dag gi dbang byas nas// nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas// nyon mongs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin// phung po
232b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa drug dang ldan/ / phung po grangs kyi dbye bas ni// yan lag drug drug 'phel bar 'gyur// yan lag rdzogs pa'i grib mas ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems sgrib byed// sgrib gnyis go bas 'thug po ni//
232b6(rgyud 'bum): gsal ka'i ri bo dang bcas pa// rtag chad gnas su bzhugs pa'o// srog rtsol bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyi rol snang ba nub par 'gyur// rtsol dang bral nas dga' skye ste// yi ge la ni sems gnas 'gyur//
232b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gsal ba'i 'od zer ni// ba spu'i khung rnams thams cad nas// sems dang bcas pa ldang 'jug ste// slar yang thig le bsdus nas ni// yi ge nyid kyang mi dmigs so// 'dzin pa de las thos
233a1(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / sgyu ma'i rnam pa rjes dran bya// de la goms nas ting 'dzin ni// nyams pa med pa thob par 'gyur// ting 'dzin de brtan gyur nas ni// lus 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa thob//
233a2(rgyud 'bum): rig 'dzin de la gnas nas ni// bla med byang chub de thob 'gyur// skad cig de la rdos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bur dag nas kyang // mkha' ltar kun la khyab par spyod// rten ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste//
233a3(rgyud 'bum): lus ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo// yan lag phyag na rdo rje ste// mgo dang thod ni ma pham pa// gtsug tor sgrib pa rnam sel nyid// nyi zla kun tu bzang po ste// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang // rnam
233a4(rgyud 'bum): shes nyid dang bcas pa'o/ / thams cad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste// bsam gtan la ni gnas pa'i phyir// stsal rnams so sor bsdu bar bya// sems glong bas ni nges par 'grub// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar
233a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi/ / dus ni rtag pa ma yin te// mi rtog sems nyid 'brel gyur nas// dus la tha dad mi rtog go// nyi ma'i 'khor lo chu rgyun dang // nam mkha'i phyogs ni ji lta bar// sems kyang sems kyis btsal
233a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / gzhan ni go skabs mi 'byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las// thun mongs gi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
233a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas drang srong gnas nas ni// sna tshogs gzugs ldan zhes bya ba// bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rig 'dzin zhig/ rgya cher rang gi 'khor bcas la// dkyil 'khor
233b1(rgyud 'bum): drung du lkugs nas ni/ / rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni// ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol// oM/ mtha' yas spros la
233b2(rgyud 'bum): nyer zhi zhing / / zhi mdzad du zhi rab spyod mdzes// rtog bcom rtog mkhyen rtog yongs zhugs// ye shes kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo// zhi las zhi 'gyur mtha' 'byung ba// chos rnams kun mchog ni chos
233b3(rgyud 'bum): che/ / spros med las spros dkar bcu bya// mtha' yas chos la phyag 'tshal lo// grol gyur grol mdzad dag pa che// dag par spyod pa gtsang ma mgon// tshogs rdzogs tshogs ldan tshogs spyod rgyal//
233b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo// rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyi mas brgyan// 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'o// rtag po don chen rtag zhugs la// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal//
233b5(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum bag chags kyis dkrugs pa// thibs po'i ling tog zhugs pa rnams// mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang // sems la gsal myur shin tu dga'// mngon sum med la rjod bral yang //
233b6(rgyud 'bum): lkog tu gyur pa smos ci dgos// lkog don mngon du byed pa la// phyag rgya dang ni 'dra 'bag mchog/ mngon sum thob ldan ming nas kyang // don la sems kyi gsal ba skye// don gang yang yang goms pa lnga//
233b7(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste// bde gsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu// sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o// blo dman rnams kyi 'jug pa dang // 'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang // rnon po rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur
234a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / gzugs brnyan byung tshul bshad du gsol// myur du 'jug dang grol ba dang // myur du byang chub cher 'gyur zhing // gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul 'byung can// 'dren pas de
234a2(rgyud 'bum): ring bshad du gsol/ / mkha' sprin rtag pa med pa la// mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltar// rnam rtog gis dkrugs sems la ni// su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur// dmigs pa'i mtshan ma gsal byed
234a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / gzugs brnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste// legs par 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing // byin rlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'dren pa gcos// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni// gzugs
234a4(rgyud 'bum): brnyan dge ba'i tshul byung ba/ / nga las mnyan par brtson pa ni// legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog/ rig 'dzin byang chub sems khyod legs// rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan nas kyang // legs par gsung
234a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yid la zhog/ khyod la yang dag bshad bya ba// bya ni rlabs dgyes pa'i gzugs brnyan dang // tshon gyis ris su bris pa'am// rin chen rigs sams rdo 'am// shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags//
234a6(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i las can sems can la// dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba dang // byin rlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po gsal zhing drang // gzhon zhing chag gas med pa la// bsang
234a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing dud pas bdugs nas ni/ / dang ldan ngang tshul bzang bas bzhag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon gyi sku// bco brgyad sor tshad ldan pa la// gdan khri dag ni sor dgu ste// rgyab yol sor tshad drug gis
234b1(rgyud 'bum): bskyed/ / bzhengs te ldem bag nyams dga' ba// rin chen du ma'i gzugs kyis brgyan// g.yas kyi dang po bgrang 'phreng ste// gnyis pa mi 'jigs stsol ba'i phyag/ g.yon pa dang po pad+ma dmar/
234b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs thogs// zhal gyi grangs ni bcu gcig la// mdun gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can// byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i mdangs// dkar po dkar ser dmar skya bo// g.yon
234b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi gsum ni khro bo'i zhal/ / sgeg pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste// dmar dang dmar ser le brgan no// g.yas su gtum pa'i khro zhal gsum// sngo dang ser dang ljang khu bo// rgyab tu khro gtum mdog dmar
234b4(rgyud 'bum): pab/ / rta skad rab tu 'cher ba'i zhal// khro bo'i zhal rnams mche ba gtsigs// mig gsum dbu skra ser po ni// gyen du thor tsugs bcings pa'o// steng du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i zhal// byu ru bcag
234b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtshan 'dra ba'i/ / dbu yi cod pan nang rnams su// 'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams// re re bzhin du bzhugs par bya// dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang // rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang // lag
234b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyan sen mo dor bcas pa/ / do shal rkang gdub ska rags can// rgyan dang na bza' mdzes pas brgyan// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ris ma dag la dga' gyur nas// yid gzhungs ngal spyod khro ba med// srad
234b7(rgyud 'bum): rluchung shes rab snying rje che/ / thabs ldan ri mo rgyud la mkhas// bsam pa bzang ldan tshul khrims bsrungs// 'dri chos bzo la gzhungs pa yis// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su bri// gzugs bzang yid
235a1(rgyud 'bum): ngal gtsang ldan pa'i/ / bu mos bkal ba'i ras la ni// tshon bzang ngur smrig mdog bya'o// 'thas par bcags te 'jam por bya// thig gi phyogs cha bshad nas kyang // ser skya tshon gyis
235a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan ni/ / tshad la mkhas pa tshad ldan pa'i// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// dkar po wa ye shes yin te// dmar po sems rtsol li khri'o// sngon po ram dang mthing shing ste// ser po babla dag pa yi//
235a3(rgyud 'bum): nag po snag tsha nyid yin te// ljang khu rams dang ldong ros sbyar// yang na spang ma nyid kyis byas// spug rtsi rams dang skyegs sbyar te// gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya// sbyin dang bral na grub par 'gyur//
235a4(rgyud 'bum): shing sprin sar dang ka pi ta// lo mi ta dang tha na dza ra// de dag so sor sbyar ba yis// gsal zhing dkrugs med dag par byed// a ta pas ni snun par byed// gan to ha sa ni rtag par 'gyur// rgyas par gru
235a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ / yang na sgo gcig pa yang rung // dkyil 'khor cha rim gsum pa 'am// yang na gnyis sam gsum yang rung // dbus su gdong ni bcu gcig ni// mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi ldan bri// shar du
235a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ dkyil 'khor rnam snang gtso ba can// de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi// phyag bzhi pa dang bcas pa'o// lhor ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ dkyil 'khor shAka thub gtso bo can/
235a7(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa'o// nub tu rig ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// sems dpa' bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o// dbus su rdo rje dbang mo yang // mdun du rdo rje
235b1(rgyud 'bum): rtug pa ste/ / g.yas su rdo rje dpal 'byung ngo // rgyab kyi rdo rje dpas med de// g.yo du rdo rje rnon grub bo// shar du lha mo spyan ma ni// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' bo// g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o// rgyab
235b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chags pa ste/ / g.yon du rdo rje legs pa'o// lhor ni lha mo mA ma kI/ mdun du rdo rje rin chen no// g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma ste// rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan no// g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa yin// nub tun bza'
235b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo yang / / mdun du rdo rje chos yin te// g.yas su rdo rje rnon po yin// rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu zhes pa// g.yon du rdo rje smra ba'o// byang du lha mo sgrol ma yang // mdun du rdo rje las yin te// g.yas su rdo rje
235b4(rgyud 'bum): srung ba'o/ / rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste// g.yas kyi dang po rang rigs rtags// gnyis pa
235b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad skyabs sbyin te/ / g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma yang // phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'i// sngags nor 'phreng yang 'chang ba'o// 'khor gyi lha mo de dag kun// zhal
235b6(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ / g.yon pa'i tha ma bum pa 'chang // lhag ma gong ltar shes par bya// byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang // khro mo bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o// dbus su rdo rje hUM byed de// sngon po ut+pal
235b7(rgyud 'bum): yi mdog/ mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste// g.yas su rdo rje zag mo'o// rgyab tu rdo rje brjed byed pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje mthu chen mo// shar gyi 'khor lo'i cha rtsibs la// khro bo gshin rje gshed po nag/ mdun
236a1(rgyud 'bum): @du rdo rje dbang zhal ma/ / g.yas su rdo rje khyab 'jug mo// rgyab tu rdo rje gzhon nu ma// g.yon du rdo rje skur byed ma// 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni gnyis pa la// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub ser/
236a2(rgyud 'bum): mdun du rdo rje gnag byed mo// g.yas su rdo rje me chen mo// rgyab tu rdo rje zlab mo// g.yon du rdo rje rnon po ma// rtsibs gsum rdo rje gtsug tor kaser// rdo rje khro mo khrag 'thung mo// rdo rje rlung 'dzin chen mo
236a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rdo rje sdang byed mor bcas pa'o// nub kyi rtsibs la rta mgrin dmar// mdun du rdo rje rmongs byed mo// g.yas su rdo rje zhi ba mo// g.yon du rdo tshol byed ma// lnga pa'i rtsibs la de bzhin du// khro bo
236a4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs mthar byed pa ljang / / mdun du rdo rje gsor byed ma// g.yas su rdo rje gtum mo ste// rgyab tu rdo rje ro langs ma// g.yon du rdo rje rengs byed ma// rtsibs drug 'khor lor bri ba ni// rdo rje gnod
236a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzes rgyal ldang sngo/ / mdun du rdo rje chu dbang mo// g.yas su dngos grub 'byung ma'o// rgyab tu rdo rje mtshan mo dag/ g.yon du rdo rje mkha' dbang phyug/ de ltar rdo rje khro bo khro mo rnams// kun kyang
236a6(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o/ / khro bo phyag gnyis mda' gzhu ba kang // g.yas na bo con kha T+wAM dang // tho ba rdo rje rgya gram dang // 'khor lo gtun shing rdo rje rnams// rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang ba'o// g.yon na
236a7(rgyud 'bum): sdigs mdzub zhags pa'o/ / kun kyang stag gi sham thabs can// khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// g.yas na gri gug cang te'u ste// g.yon na thod khrag kha T+wAM // zhing lpags dag gi chos gos te// gzig gi/
236b1(rgyud 'bum): pags pa'i sha ma thabs can// khro bo'i g.yon na sgeg pa'i tshogs// de rgyab cha yi snam bu la// phyogs rer lha mo bzhi bzhi dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bzhi// phyogs rer brgyad brgyad bkod pa ste// /
236b2(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhengs pa'i tshul// de bzhin sgo bzhir sems ma mchog/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // 'bebs ma rang rtags phyag rgya g.yas// gnyis pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// g.yon
236b3(rgyud 'bum): pa phyogs mdog pad+ma dang / / gnyis pa dar gyi chos gos so// kun kyang sgeg nyams ldan par bri// de rgyab dkyil 'khor cha la ni// shar du brgya byin glang chen zhon// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// gnyis
236b4(rgyud 'bum): pa skyabs sbyin phyag rgya can/ / g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma ste// gnyis pa rang mdog 'phreng ba bri// de yi g.yon du tshangs pa ser// ngang ba'i khril bzhugs pa la// g.yas kyi dang po nyi ma 'chang //
236b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su nime lha ste// mdog dmar ra zhon me dpung 'dzin// lho yi phyogs su gshin rje sngo// thod dbyug bzung ba ma he ho na// bden bral du ni srin po gnag/ rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhon/
236b6(rgyud 'bum): nub tu chu l+la dkar po ni// klu yi khri la sbrul zhugs bzung // de yi g.yon dus bdag dkar// bum pa bzung ste rus sbal zhon// lha min phyogs su rlung lha snang // ba dan bzung ste sha bzhon// byang du
236b7(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin mi la zhon/ / ljang nag phyag na gter sgrom mo// byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni// rtse gsum bzung ste khyu mchog zhon// sgo bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs kyi kha dog go cha can/
237a1(rgyud 'bum): pi wang ral gri zhags pa can// rin chen dbyug togayas kyis 'chang // gnyis pa skyabs kyi phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa pad+ma bgrang 'phreng ni// phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o//
237a2(rgyud 'bum): kun kyang sgeg nyams phyogs kyi mdog/ rim bzhin stag gzig dom seng ge'i// khri la bzhugs pa'i gzigs pa can// rang rang phyogs kyi sgo la ni// srung brtson shin tu 'grub pa'o// dkyil
237a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor cha brgyad khor yug tu/ / bza' shing me tog spos shing dang // mdzes pa'i shing tshogs tshal gseb tu// mdzes pa'i bya tshogs dud 'gro dang // lha yi bu dang bu mo sogs// de bzhin klu dang gnod
237a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin dang / / dri ba grul bum bu mo'o// rol mo byed pa du ma bri// 'di ltar dang na la las ni// 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang rol du// gza' dang rgyu skar sum cu drug/ rin chen pad+ma la gnas bri// smin drug pad+ma dmar po
237a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang / / snar ma yis ni mgo ut+pal// nab so pad dkar lag tri shA la// rgyal ni bgrang 'phreng skag sbrul nag/ mchu ni pad ser gre mnyam gzhag/ me bzhi pad dkar dbo dbyug pa// nag pa pad+ma sa ri ras// sa
237a6(rgyud 'bum): ga po ti lha mtshams bum/ / snron ni rdo rje snrubs dbyug ste// chu stong ril ba chu smad pad// byi bzhini gser gyi 'khor lo ste// gro bzhin chu skyogs mon gru dang // mon gre shel sgong khrums stod kyis// ral
237a7(rgyud 'bum): gri khrums smad ku mu da/ / nam gru ba dan tha skor gyis// shing lo bra nye dbyug sran no// zla ba ku mung dkar po ste// nyi ma pad+ma dmar po'o// mig dmar me yi phung po ste// gza' lhag ut+pal sngon po'o//
237b1(rgyud 'bum): bu bus chos kyi glegs pam mo// pa la sangs ni bgrang 'phreng bzung // spen pa lag na ram rmi 'chang // skrag can bdud ci'i gagong bu'o// nang gi rmA li n+ya gtogs pa// bkra shis su mo brgyad yin te/
237b2(rgyud 'bum): tag dga' ma dang rgyal ma shar// don grub ma dang mi 'pham sbyor// nub tu bde ba bde dga' ma// myur gyib sa dang gtanam byang // ce lnga rtse gsum rdo rje dang // sngon po ser po rin chen dang // dkar dang
237b3(rgyud 'bum): dmar dang ut+pal dang / / ut+pal sngo dang gu sud// dang po phyag na rim bzhin 'chang // skyabs sbyin pad+ma bgrang 'phreng ni// smyug ma rnams kyis rim bzhin 'chang // de dag thams cad phyogs ma dog/
237b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i spros pas skyon yang // lnga bcu brgyad dam sum cu bdun// nyi shu dgu'am nyi shu lnga// bco lnga dgu ba ma lnga 'am gcig/ yi ge phyag rgya gzugs brnyan tshogs// sprul pa'i sku yi cho 'phrul te/
237b5(rgyud 'bum): rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa yi// sems kyi byin rlabs nyid du 'gyur// bde gshegs sku dang po ti dang // phyag rgya sogs pa rab gnas bya// nyams sam dri mas gos pa ni// bkrus dang bshig nas dag
237b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis su// de la bsod nams dpag tu med// gzugs tshogs sngo bas sman 'gyur yang // de yis bsod nams mtha' yas thob// 'phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba/
237b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid de// de bzhin nyid de stong pa nyid// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang // mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu'o// sum cu gnyis dang brgyad cu ni//
238a1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge brda dang spros pa'i sku// longs sku bsod nams rgyu mthun 'bras// sprul sku las kyi rnam smin 'bras// kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid ldan// dag dang ma dag skal ldan la// brda
238a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs 'phrin las gzugs sku gnyis/ / tshogs gnyis la ni sku gsum byung // rnam byang kun nyon mongs pas stong // lus ngag yid kyi spyod yul min// dmigs med nam mkha'i khams rtog pa/
238a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku'o// rtag chad med pa'i rten 'brel ni// skye bgag med par thugs chud pas// yid kyi rnam shes 'jug lam gyis// bsam gtan goms pas shes par bya// dad pa'i lcags
238a4(rgyud 'bum): kyu shes rab can/ / lha klu 'bum phrag dkar po'i sems dge ba// kun slong byang chub gter gyi rin chen nor// thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung // sems kyi dbus su gces phyir ngal
238a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pas/ / dbang por bya ba'i rgyud kun khyad par du// pad+ma'i dra ba phyag stong gis brgyan par// myur du sgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams// bsdus brtson dang byas ldan pas gces su bya// bla ma'i
238a6(rgyud 'bum): lung yod snying rje gang ldan pa/ / rgyal dang rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas// 'jig rten skyong tshogs dga' ba smos ci dgos// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma rbab
238a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba las/ / gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas dga' ldan gnas 'khrungs pa// bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa// rig pa gsum ldan lha yi bu//
238b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'i tog ces mtshan gsol ba// spyan ras gzigs la cher dad nas// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas shing // 'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas// mgrin gcig tu ni 'di skad gsol// oM/ khams
238b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum kun gyi bla ma gtso/ / 'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// sa gsum ye shes 'od po che// bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ rig ldan bde ldan byin rla bra/
238b3(rgyud 'bum): can// g.yung drung rtag pa dam chos gtso// kun rtogs sel skyob phyag 'tshal lo// rtag par brtse ldan spyan ras gzigs// byang chub sems tshogs 'byung tshogs rgyal// bya ba byas nas bskal par gnas//
238b4(rgyud 'bum): pad 'chang tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// thugs rje ye shes las byung ba'i// rig sngags 'phreng ba byin rlabs can// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// sem
238b5(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la phan don phyir/ / phyag rgya 'phrin las ldan par gsungs// las kyi dri ma dang ldan zhing // nyon mongs bdag rgyal gyis bcings nas// le lo ser sna'i 'dam rdzab can// khur dang ldan
238b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can rnams/ / myur du grol bar bya ba dang // thugs rje nyi ma bkram byas te// srid 'dam stug po bskam pa dang // myur du sangs rgyas 'grub bya'i phyir// lha dang gsang sngags blang ba dang //
238b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrin las sbyor ba ldan pa dang // brgyud pa rgyun gzhan med pa yi// sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung bshad du gsol// rig sngags rjes gnang med pa ni// bsgrubs kyang 'bras med ngal ba ste// 'dren pa
239a1(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i shing rta ni/ / 'khor lo bzang yang gang du phyin// nyon mongs rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir// rig sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs// bdag 'dzin go cha 'bigs pa'i mdung /
239a2(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal mtsho skam nyi ma che// kun rtog rdul phung sreg pa'i me// shes rab me tog 'khrung ba'i rlan// nad ngan kun sel sman mchog ste// bag tshogs sel ba'i sred med bu// bag chags bkru ba'i chu rgyun
239a3(rgyud 'bum): ti longs spyod 'phel ba'i gter chen nyid/ / 'khor ba la rgal gru gzengs te// nyes pa kun sel rlung dang mtshungs// de nas bcom ldan thub pa che// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas chen gyis// srab
239a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jam ring ba'i ljags bkram nas/ / tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyis gsungs// 'gro la thugs rje chen po yis// sngags 'byung ba rgyud pa'i rim 'byung ba'i// cho ga dam pa nyan brtson pa// shin
239a5(rgyud 'bum): tu legs so lha yi bu/ / nyams dga' dge ba'i sa phyogs su// sa yi cha mnyam dkyil 'khor ltar// pad+ma'i gdan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni// tshon sna ma lus rnams kyis bri// mgon po spyan ras gzigs
239a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang sogs/ / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig pa'i lha mo khro bor bcas// 'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i// sku'am phyag rgya bkod pa dang // mchod pa'i tshogs kyang dgram par
239a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / mar me yon chab byug spos dri// zhal zas gtor ma sna tshogs dang // gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang na bza' lhab lhub dang // sil snyan me tog 'phreng du ma// yid 'ong mdzes

245b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dril bu skyabs sbyin dang // chos kyi za ma tog 'chang ba'o// nyi 'od ma dang zla 'od ma// chu dbang ma dang nor 'phreng mo// dge ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o// mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung che// chu srin
245b4(rgyud 'bum): steng du rol pa'i tshul/ / Da ma ru dang bzang 'phreng dang // mi 'jigs phyag dang lcags sgrog go/ lu gu rgyud ma 'khor lo ma// gsang ba mo dang ring bsrel mo// glang gsor rdo rje chos dbang phyug
245b5(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor le chos 'chang rgya/ / skyabs sbyin pad+ma po tir bcas// dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma// sil snyan ma rnams pad zla ra ni// phyed krung ldem bag tshul du'o// rje btsun chos kyi
245b6(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor ni/ / ha ri ha ri ha ri zhon// zhal gsum phyag ni brgyad pa la// 'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang // pad dkar bgrang 'phreng skyabs sbyin dang // bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa 'chang // mkha'
245b7(rgyud 'bum): lding gdong ma shA ra'i gdong / / nyi zhal zla zhal lha mo'o// mgrin sngo dga' bo nyi dga' ste// zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma dang // po ti skyabs sbyin bgrang 'phreng phyag/ seng ge'i gdong mo klu zhal mo// dga' byed
246a1(rgyud 'bum): mo dang srog byed mo/ / pad blar sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo // dbus su mgon po gdong bcu gcig/ gsang 'dzin mo dang 'dzin pa mo// sngags srung ba dang grub srungs ma/
246a2(rgyud 'bum): gong ltar ma byad phyogs mdog go/ phyogs bzhir 'khor lo'i cha la ni// gtso bo sems dpa' bzhi dang bcas// shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni// thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyug/ rdo rje phyag rgya gter
246a3(rgyud 'bum): sgom can/ / kun kyang bad+ma zla ba la'o// lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug ste// grub chen dbang phyug dang phag zhal// grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang // gru 'dzin dbang phyug ces bya'o// nub tu pad+ma'i dbang
246a4(rgyud 'bum): phyug ni/ / skyes bu seng ge'i zhal dang ni// pad+ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag/ rtse bran rgyas mdzad ces bya'o// byang du dam tshig dbang phyug dang // 'khor lo 'chang dang stab lpags 'chang // kun grub dbang
246a5(rgyud 'bum): phyug sgra dung 'phel/ / phyogs dang phyogs kyi mdog can no// 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang // rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po// kun tu grags pa'i lha chen rnams// bstan la dga' ba dgod par bya//
246a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das don du// rigs bzang skye ba ba zhes dgongs pa// bskal pa bzang po 'dir 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stong yang dgod par bya// de ltar rgyas par spros pa ni/
246a7(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams grangs ni rgya che bar// tshig stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu bdun// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha// mgon po gdong bcu gcig pa yi// lha grangs dkyil 'khor bkod pa'o//
246b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor ban+d+ha// 'jig rten dbang gi dkyil 'khor lnga// rig pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor lnga// rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun// dkyil 'khor de dag re re la// sems
246b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor lha mang ste/ / rang bzhin gyis ni nyi shu lnga// rgyu 'bras tshul du rnam pa dgu// ye shes tshal lnga yin te// chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal// gang gang mos pa de dang de'i// dkyil
246b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnam par spro ba 'am/ / gcig tu mos pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas// khams gsum rgyal por longs spyod che// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur// gtsang sbra che zhing
246b4(rgyud 'bum): da sems can/ / rtse gcig sgrub la nan tan rtsol// blo bzang 'gro la 'jug cing spyod// ngag snyan ngang gis khro ba med// g.yo sgyu 'dod brkam g.yeng ba med// lus ngag dal zhing thos pa mang // nga rgyal
246b5(rgyud 'bum): sar sna chags pa med/ / gtong phod snying rje drag ldan pas// spyan ras gzigs la gang dmigs nas// de yi snying po rtsa sngags la// bar chad med pas rab brjod nas// gzhan la phan phyir smon lam
246b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang tshe// khro bo chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// de dag myur du sel byed shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo//
246b7(rgyud 'bum): gang yan da rams gang byung tshe// gso dpyad sman dang sman par ni// bdag nyid gyur nas myur sel shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// mu ge'i nang du 'byung 'gyur tshe// phyogs gcig
247a1(rgyud 'bum): nas ni rnam g.yos nas/ / zas skom rgyun chad med par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang du 'khrug pa che 'byung tshe// rang dbang gis ni sems gyur nas/
247a2(rgyud 'bum): bde bas phan tshun sdum par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gcig la gcig za dang // zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe// de dag sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig/
247a3(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// yi dgas zas skom gdungs pa dang // log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs tshe// nad bral bdud rtsi kun snang shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo//
247a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i skyabs dang thabs mkhas dang // shes rab gru dang ldan nas kyang // thabs kyi sdug bsngal grol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims zhags ldan lam la rtag/
247a5(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan 'das pa'i ri bo 'dzeg/ 'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jug shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// ngan song gnas rnams mthong nas kyang // der phyin de rnams zad pa yi// gnyen
247a6(rgyud 'bum): po so sor 'byung bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// dmyal rnams tsha grang bcad gtubs tshe// go cha che dang bsil gri ba dang // drod kyi 'od du 'gyur bar shog/ rig sngags
247a7(rgyud 'bum): yang yang brjod pa yis/ / yang dag lam nyid rtogs par shog/ kun 'byung sa bon rul nas ni// sdug bsngal phung po skam par shog/ mgon po mya ngan 'das thob nas// 'jig rten phyogs
247b1(rgyud 'bum): bcur rab grags 'gyur/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bsnyen pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas// dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir// sgrub pa la ni brtson par bya// zla ba dkar po'i
247b2(rgyud 'bum): tshes gcig nas/ / khrus byas gos gsar gyon byas nas// sku gzugs bzang po'i mdun 'dug nas// sbyang bar gnas nA nyin gcig la// dus gsum sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad// brjod cing ci 'byor
247b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / tshes brgyad tho rangs dus nas ni// dben par gdan khri bzang po la// sku gzugs nub tu gzigs nas gzhag/ bza' btung mngar bas spags par mchod// a ka ru dang du ru ka/
247b4(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa rgyun du bsreg par bya// 'bru dkar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing // zhag gsum bzlas pa ci nus bya// de nas zhag gsum bar du bdag/ 'o ma zho dang 'bras chan 'tshal// lha la mchod pa cher bskyed
247b5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / byang chub shing drung stong rtsa brgya da// du ru ka yi mar du spangs// dum bu re re sngags re dang // byang chub sems dpa'i drung du bsregs// sa yang g.yo zhing sku yang g.yo// steng zhal nas ni snyan pa'i
247b6(rgyud 'bum): smra/ / legs so legs so rigs kyi bu// khyod ni nan tan brtson 'grus can// 'dod dman don gnyer gang yin pa// mkha' la 'phur ram rkang mgyogs sam// drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la/
247b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag dang skal mnyam 'dod na yang // de ring nyid du stsal bar bgyi// bco lnga'i tshe sa la sku gzugs te// bde gshegs ring bsrel yod pa yi// mchod rten nang ngam chung ngu bzhugs// gso
248a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyong blangs nas smyung ba yis/ / skya sngar me tog brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags re brjod pas skul brdeg/ de tshe mdun zhal rtsa banas// 'brug sgra chen po lta bu 'byung // sa chen rab tu
248a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo bar 'gyur/ / de tshe bdag nyid mi skrag par// sngags bsgrub rjes su zan bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ thugs rje che dang ldan
248a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ bdag nyid gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ri sems can thams cad kyi// mgon skyabs re gnas gyur nas kyang // 'gro ba kun gyi ri 'dod rnams// tshul bzhin du ni skong bar shog/
248a4(rgyud 'bum): de tshe 'dod pa stsal pa la// lha glu tshogs kyis bar chad med// sngags kyi 'dod don kun grub ya ni// bsod nams rdzogs byed smon lam mo// phyag 'tshal rten la skor ba dang // mchod rten rtsig
248a5(rgyud 'bum): cing dkyil 'khor ni/ / rnal 'byor yan lag las ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir// rgyun chad med par brtson pa na// dge byed smon lam rgyas pa ni// de dag myur du 'byung bar 'gyur//
248a6(rgyud 'bum): de phyir smon lam mchog tu bshad// gang la dge sbyong g.yel ba yis// le lo can ni bdud bzung nas// gya tshom smra zhing chos la smod// bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur// de phyir dmangs/
248a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs gdol pa can// long spyod can ni ring du song // ser sna le lo nga rgyal can// bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni// bdud kyi 'ching lam log lam pa// zhugs dang slar la gtang bar bya//
248b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma za ba zhes bya ba las/ dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs// sngags
248b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod tsam gyis bsal bar bshad/ / nad gdon gang dang gang la yang // sngags pas drag tu gsal btab la// rang gi rtse gcig sems kyis bzla// dang po snying rjer bcas pa yi// sngags kyis nad dang
248b3(rgyud 'bum): gdon las grol/ / de tshe mchod la brtson par bya// smyon nad nyin re ldang ba dang // nyin gnyis pa'am nyin gsum pa// nyin bzhi nyin bdun ldang ba'i rims// 'byung po mkha' 'gro sha za'am// smo byed brjed
248b4(rgyud 'bum): byed lus srul po/ / 'dre gdon drag pos bgyis mod kyang // brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur// yang na srad bu kha dog lnga// mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdung ldan mgul lam dpung par gdagra
248b5(rgyud 'bum): kha na ma tho bsags pa yi/ / sgrib kun zhi zhing byang gyur na// bgegs sogs nad lta smos ci dgos// bde brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab bo// skrangs dang 'bras kyi 'phreng ba dang // shu ba phol mig rma mdze/
248b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / me dpal ldog pa g.yan la sogs// ma rungs pa yi nad rnams dang // ral gri mda' mdung la sogs pas// myos sam de yis nyen pa dang // sbrul dang sdig pa rtsangs pa dang // bung ba
248b7(rgyud 'bum): mchu rnon la sogs pa'i/ / gdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang // brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod// yang nas ser 'jim pas byug/ de yis nad las grol bar nges// bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa
249a1(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / gzhogs gcig phyogs su nad langs sam// rna ba 'on nam sna bsubs na// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa 'am// 'bru mar zho dang ru rta dang // lan bdun brjod nas
249a2(rgyud 'bum): bska byug dang / / zos shing rna ba sngar byugs na// sos par 'gyur bar the tsom med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// nyi 'od kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang // bsrung dang lam 'gro ba skyab pa'i
249a3(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / byin rlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'di gsungs// na mo bud+d+ha ya gu ra be/ na mo d+harmA ya tA yi ne/ na maHsaM g+hA ya ma hA te/ tri b+h+yo pi swA hA nA ma/ nyin mtshan dus su 'di brjod pas// sdig kun byang
249a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing nad rnams zhi/ / lam du bgegs bdud mi phrad cing // rtag tu sems dga' dam pa 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyang // bsrung ba'i don du sngags 'di gsungs// sha ma ta
249a5(rgyud 'bum): he ru sha ho/ A dz+nyA ba te/ su ru te/ shaM ki Te/ ba ra ma byA te/ su ru te/ kA laT te khi ma te swA hA/ tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gcig/ na sa ra ba tag sa na nad sel 'gyur//
249a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang yon tan grangs med 'thob// sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la// bdun bzlas rma khar btab na sos// seng ldeng stag gzig dom dred kyi// pags la nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags// brjod
249a7(rgyud 'bum): nas gra khrims can la bskon/ / de ma thag tu rims sel 'gyur// glo bur gdon gyis nyen pa la// lan bdun brjod pa'i gu gul bdug/ ldong ros yungs kar lan tshwa dkar// sbyar nas nyi shu rtsa
249b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig brjod/ / nad pa'i mal bzhabs nas bdugs na// 'byung po 'bros te nad las krol// til mar nang du ru rta btsos// byugs pas gzhogs nad rna nad dang // zha grum myur du sel bar
249b2(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / yang na rtsi mar nyid la bya// til mar lte bar bskus pa yis// myur du bu thon 'gyur bar nges// lcim rtsa sha ma thon par nges// du ru ka dang spyi mong sbyar// snying nad drag po sel bar
249b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / kha rog mo yi lci dron gyis// rma khar glan na mes tshig sos// srini bu ring mo snying la za// rta dkar gcin la khyor gang 'thung // des ni srog chags bud par 'gyur// 'bras la rams
249b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi lo ma yi/ / khu ba bskol bas byugs par bya// bong bu'i rtug pa gsar pa btsir// nyal kar mig tu blug na sos// mtshan mo srangs la skud dkar ro// de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// brgya
249b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar/ / dpung par btags pas g.yul las rgyal// phug ron ril ma nyi shu brgyad// bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang // shing sgrog la sogs grol bar
249b6(rgyud 'bum): nges/ / thal ba'am bye ma la ni sngags// stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol// gdon dang yams nad zlog pa la// dri bzangs chu la bzlas nas bkru// bud med bu 'dod don du ni// stong bzlas pa mar
249b7(rgyud 'bum): btung bar bya/ / byi ba sbrul dang rus sbal sha/ phye ma gtor na phyugs rnams rengs// mar ka ni dang shu dag dang // lga dang go snyong sbrang rtsi sbyar// sngags 'di yis ni shes rab 'phel// na mo rat+na tra y+Ya
250a1(rgyud 'bum): ya/ na ma An+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sAtwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA nu Nik+ShA ya/ tad+h+yaSh+TA/ khA hi khA hi/ ba li te swAhA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA a ba lo kit+ta
250a2(rgyud 'bum): rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM pad+me phu/ ma hA pad+me phu/ pad+ma lo tsa ne phu/ a mo g+ha be te/ na mo a do ta ku tA ya/ sa ra sa ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ i maM mak+Shi ro ga nA
250a3(rgyud 'bum): sha ya swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang // thal bas mig ni phyi rol bskus// mi gnad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun// sngags bdun bzlas pas rna ba
250a4(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / nad rnams thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// gur kum ka ra cha mnyam pas// sna yi nad ni sel bar byed// a ru ra yi phye ma dang // sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pas ni// so yi nad dang lce yi nad//
250a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'joms par shes par bya// oM hUM shrI hUM shu k+She phu/ nyi shu rtsa gcig chu la bzla// 'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa sel// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA
250a6(rgyud 'bum): ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya Sh+TA/ oM rat+na she/ ma hA tsaSh+Ta/ a su ra ma rta ka/ dz+wA la dz+wa la/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/ hu ru hu ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ha na ha na/ sarba dz+nyA ren+d+ra ka/ ban d+he na/ mA ra ya
250a7(rgyud 'bum): mA ra ya/ sarba gra haM swA hA/ sngags 'di mtshal gyis bris nas kyang // mgul du btags na nad rnams sel// gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis// las rnams de dang de la sbyar// sbrang bu srin bu
250b1(rgyud 'bum): sbrul lhog pa/ / g.yan pa shu ba skye nad la// sbrang rtsi bi pi ling gis byug/ gang zhig btson du zhugs pa la// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa la// tsan dan lde gu snying khar byug/ gang gi mig nad sel ba la// shing
250b2(rgyud 'bum): mngar chu'am spos chu'am/ / pa la sha yi khu bas bya// rna ba la ni til mar gyis// gzhan gyi yi ge gsal ba dang // 'thab mo gshags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe// bum pa'i chu yis gdong pa bkru// gang yang byis pa
250b3(rgyud 'bum): srung ba ni/ / seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi la// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // don yod zhags pa'i sngags ring dag/ stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas btags na// tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod// ba lang rwa dang po so 'chal/
250b4(rgyud 'bum): shing kun dang sbrul lpags pa dang // ras bal sa bon grung po dang // de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis// nas kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i sgra// byi la'i rtug pa bra ha ti// shug pa bya rog sgo nga dang // ba lang rmig
250b5(rgyud 'bum): pa na le sham/ / da dur dang lhan cig sbyar// de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis// pags rnams sel phyir ru tra yi// dud pa bcu drug ces bya ba'i// pu shel ci dang ba bla dang // ba can dug gi ni sbrul shun
250b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / bdugs na rims nad thams cad sel// nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed// ba lang lci ba'i khu bar ni// so ma ra dza'i phye ma gdab// yi ge hrI yis byin brlabs nas// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtse ba'i
250b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags/ / brgya rtsa brgyad brjod 'thungs pas ni// dug dang rims nad sel bar byed// skyer ba bskol ba'i khu bar ni// so ma ra dza'i phye ma sbyar// ril bu rgya sran tsam gyi tshad// yid bzhin nor bu'i
251a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags brjod nas/ / zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams// zos kyang lus la gnod pa med// 'o mar yung ba sran cig bskol// so mar dza blugs te blud// so so chang
251a2(rgyud 'bum): la ha la'i sngags/ / brgya rtsa brgyad sngags grangs tshang ba// brjod de blud na skyugs nas ni// dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// khyim gyi dud pa rgyam tshwa dang // skye du dmar rtsa lo mar bcas// phye ma
251a3(rgyud 'bum): mar gsar sbrang rtsi bcas/ / ha ri chen po'i rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btung bar bya// sbrul nad thams cad sel bar byed// shu dag ru rta a ka ru// lung ba bong dkar po rnams// don
251a4(rgyud 'bum): yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye/ / byugs pas dug nad thams cad sel// rgya ma tshwa srang gang mar srang gnyis// gcin srang brgyad dang lhan cig bskol// rdo rje chos kyi sngags kyis 'thungs//
251a5(rgyud 'bum): dug nad thams cad sel bar byed// rgya mtsha tshwa gsum mar srang bzhi// sbyar te mi bshol sngags brjod nas// byugs nas reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel// ku ma ri dang
251a6(rgyud 'bum): ser po gnyis/ / lcim tshwa myang tshwa spar bcas la// gar dbang sngags dang mu yis btung // dug nad thams cad sel bar byed// ser po gnyis dang ldong ros dang // go thal gur kum le brgan rtsi//
251a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rgyan lung sngags kyis btung // dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed// gang la gza' dang rgyu skar gyis// 'tshe ba byung na de bsal phyir// pad+ma 'dab brgyad maN+Dal gyi// phyogs dang phyogs
251b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams dbus rnams su/ / mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// mkha' lding gzugs su 'gyur ba la// spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig gis// gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkod// nyi ma zla ba
251b2(rgyud 'bum): lag 'dzin pa'i/ / khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs// mnan pa'i mkha' lding mig sman mdog/ nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs// mig gsum ldan pa brjid pa'i lus// rin chen lnga yi sker
251b3(rgyud 'bum): gshog can/ / rdo rje mchu rno khro dang bcas// nyi ma bye bas brgyan pa'i bod// snying khar nyi ma 'od 'bar la// gaM yig nag po sngags kyis bskul// spu rnams gzings kyis gyur nas kyang // phyogs
251b4(rgyud 'bum): bcur rdo rje khyab par 'phro/ / gza' dang rgyu skar mog byas te// gdon dang klu rnams bsreg par byas// thugs rje mi bshol ba yi sngags// 'brug sgra lta bur gsal bar brjod// gang yang grangs med
251b5(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag ni/ / las rnams thams cad sngags 'dis 'grub// mkha' lding dkar po brjid pa'i lus// klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya// de la mgrin pa sngon po yi// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas
251b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / sa stengs gtum po klu yi gdon// dum nges par sel bar byed// klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsregs// 'gro la mdze nad gtong bar byed// mkha' lding dmar po sbrul za ma// me tog thod
251b7(rgyud 'bum): ba kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon na 'chang ste g.yas pa na// ral gri me 'od 'bar ba 'chang // mgon po seng ge'i sgras bskul nas// dba' rlabs bskal pa'i me dang mnyam// sbrul dang rin chen dbyug to can/
252a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lding sha za'i gdon la ni// mgon po ha ri'i sngags kyis bskul// mkha' 'gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni// ljang khru ral gri phur pa 'chang // pad+ma ral gri sngags kyi
252a2(rgyud 'bum): bskul/ / las rnams gang dang gang la yang // sngags dang phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o// ji ltar mos te phyag rgyar bcas// lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya// ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa yis// sngags
252a3(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur/ / da ni phyag rgya bshad par bya// sku yi mdun du langs nas kyang // rkang pa g.yas pa yud tsam bskum// lag gnyis so sor thung ngu brkyang // gung srin so sor
252a4(rgyud 'bum): mthil ru bkug/ mtheb mdzub dag ni so sor brkyang // gru khug lag mthil mdun du bstan// 'gro 'am 'dug kyang dgra dpung las// rgyal phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA
252a5(rgyud 'bum): ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ba te/ pa ra ba te/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ yang na sngon ltar lus bsrangs te// sIng khar
252a6(rgyud 'bum): thal sbyar spro ba bsnol/ / mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs rtse mo sprad// mtheb gnyis mdzub tshigs dang por bkug/ lag mthil cung zad ma reg pa// gzugs sngags gang brjod phyag rgya'o//
252a7(rgyud 'bum): bgegs kyi 'tshe ba byung ba'i tshe// sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis bsal bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/
252b1(rgyud 'bum): oM sarba d+harmA Ni maN+Da lA ya/ e h+ye hi pa rim shud d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ yang na sgom la 'jug pas ni// thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo // pus btsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar// mdzub gnyis bkug
252b2(rgyud 'bum): la rtse sprad nas/ / de la mthe ba gnyis gzhar bar bya// 'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges// yang na lag gnyis rgyab sprad nas// sor mo rtse rnams reg par bya// mtheb gnyis brkyang nas mdzub
252b3(rgyud 'bum): nang sbyar/ / smin mtshams su ni gzhag par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba duSh+TA na mo badz+rA ya me

252b5(rgyud 'bum): satwA ya/ ma hA krU ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba de ba a na le swA hA/ glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin// yang ni bsgreng ste rting pa sprad// lag gnyis kyis 'jigs byed tshul bya// rtsa sngags gang
252b6(rgyud 'bum): rung brjod pas ni/ / ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur// yang na pad+ma rgyan lung gi/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis thal sbyar srin lag gis// mthe bo'i sen mo mnan byas te//
252b7(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung rtse mo'i gung mo sprad// gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste// dgug na mdzub rtse bskul zhing dgug/ yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dgug/ g.yon pa slar gtang bya babo// nam
253a1(rgyud 'bum): rat+na tra sA ya/ na ma An+t+ra ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA k+Sha ru Ni k+Sha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na/
253a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo g.yas pa lha chen rnams// yang na phyag rgya 'di bcas la// nyi zla gza' bzung dus su ni// gzungs sngags ba mar la bzlas nas// phyag rgyas btab nas zos pas ni// shes rab
253a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phel dang tshe 'phel zhing / / nad med gzugs dbang thob par nges// 'grengs te rkang gshibs thal sbyar nas// mtheb gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug pa// snying khar gzhag bya spyan ras gzigs//
253a4(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya// mchod sogs las kyi sngon 'gro ba'o// de bzhin sdig bshags la yang ngo // mdzub bkug mthe bong sen mor bcas// lag gnyis rgyab sprad gar dbang rgya/
253a5(rgyud 'bum): thal sbyar mtheb mdzub so sor brkyang // mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang // mi bshol ba yi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis rgyab sprad mtheb gnyis brkyang // bdug pa
253a6(rgyud 'bum): bzang la sngags 'di bzla/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya// ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo rat+na sha ri tsan+d+ra a laM kA ra marga te dza su pra tsa ka bi shwa rA
253a7(rgyud 'bum): dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+ne rat+ne/ ta te sha rat+na ta ta sha rat+na/ pra te ma he rat+ne pra b+hU te/ rat+na gar+b+he swA hA/ snga bar brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do// nor yang thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur// 'gro gzhan bdag la byams
253b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na/ / so shing la ni nyi shu gcig/ ldo ba skyen 'dod pa shu dag la// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas snying khar sku// gang bshad phyag rgya dang bcas pas// gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs kyang 'bros//
253b2(rgyud 'bum): namaHsarba bud d+ha d+harma saMg+hA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu pi hu pi/ ka pa
253b3(rgyud 'bum): du bi/ pra gA ya ni swA hA/ rnam grangs 'dug pas sangs rgyas 'dug/ lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya// yan lag g.yas pa'i mthe bong ni// lag mthil bzhag nas sor mos dgag/ rna lhag
253b4(rgyud 'bum): phyar nas mdzub mo ni/ / brkyang bskum bskul bas spro ba dang // g.yon pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// dus ma yin par 'chi sogs zlog/ lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang // sor mo bsnol te
253b5(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa las/ / mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor ni// sprad de sprad pa shes rab rgya// oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni swA hA/ de bzhin bsnol te bkan pa yi// gung gnyis nang du bshi bas bsgrengs pa//
253b6(rgyud 'bum): mar me'i rgya ste sngags 'di'o// oM tIp+ta lo tsa na swAhA/ de nyid sbubs nas gung mo gnyis// rtse sprad bsgrengs pa bdug spos so// oM d+hu pa d+ha ta swA hA/ rting sprang sor rtse rang sar dgug/ byug
253b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul ni byug pa'i rgya/ / oM d+ha li be t+ya swA hA/ rting sprad sor mo gyen du bgrod// zhal nas 'thor tshul bshos kyi rgya// oM nai bi d+ye prak+Sha ta swA hA/ lag gnyis bkug nas rtse brgyad sprad// mtha
254a1(rgyud 'bum): @bong rkyen du lan pa ni/ / na bza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o// oM bA sa ra Ni swAny+dza/ snyim pa la phye bteg pa'i nus// rom stsal ba'i phyag rgya'o// oM At+ma hrIHsa ka la gaNapa ri wA re
254a2(rgyud 'bum): ba ri ke ra a A/ a ba ta raM te/ a ba pa r-i ti/ a ba ta ran+na da sha di ka lo ka pA la/ sa pa riwA re b+h+yaHi daM ba laM gr-ih+Nan+tu/ khA daM tu bi baM tu/ ya the baM ya theSh+TaM dzaHhUM bo hoHsaM trip+tA sarba satwA ni
254a3(rgyud 'bum): shAM taM ku r+yA puSh+TiM ku ru ba shaM ku ru/ A ba ra Na ku ru gu pa ti/ ka ro ta kur+thaM tu hUM hUM phaT/ Ar+ya a ba lai ki te shwa ra s+ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ oM Ak+Sha ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NA A t+ya nuta pan+d+ha twAta oM AHhUM phaT/
254a4(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ oM hrIHdzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya swA hA/ longs spyod rtag phyir gnod gnas la// chu gtsang rtag tu sbyin par bya// oM A hrIHlo ke shwa ra hu nu smA ti ka rA ya swA hA/ yi dgas rnams la sra ra zas//
254a5(rgyud 'bum): ci phyir chu dang bcas pa stsal// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // 'byung po yi dgas kun brtson 'gyur// sems kyi lcags kyu ldan bya ste// nyon mongs
254a6(rgyud 'bum): sems la rab drang ste/ / lha klu 'bum phrag sems dga' ba'i// kun slong byang chub rin chen gyis// las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyed// mdzad pa rgya chen kun grub 'gyur// 'phags pa
254a7(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas// byang chub
254b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ / nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa zhig/ mchod pa'i bkod pa chen po dang // bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis// bcom ldan 'das la
254b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod par byas/ / bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang // phyag 'tshal gsang bstod phyogs gcig mchod// pus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// mgon po'i yon tan kun gyi rgyal// ye shes rmad
254b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ / thar pa'i lam chen nyi shur rgyal// 'dren pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan dpe mthar thug med pa'i sku// gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la// blo gros yangs pa'i nam
254b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' can/ / sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs dbyangs du ma bsam mi khyab// nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha' bkang nas// tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung // gsung gi gsang ba phyag
254b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo// bsam yas bsam du med bsam pas// bsam mi khyab pa'i shes rab dang // thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs
254b6(rgyud 'bum): 'ching gcod pa'i/ / ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa// kun rtog dra ba sel ba yi// sgron ma de ring bshad du gsol// byis rnams mun pa'i 'obs su byung // nyan thos 'dod chags tshogs kyis skrag
254b7(rgyud 'bum): rang rgyal gsang ba'i bzod dang ldan/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'ching bas 'jigs// nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la// shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis// bag chags bcas pa gtan
255a1(rgyud 'bum): spong ba'i/ / thabs mchod du ma bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// 'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas// tshangs pa'i dbyangs chen gsung snyan pas/
255a2(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas// shes rab snying rjer 'brel ba yi// sbyor ba'i cho ga du ma gsungs// bsdus pa'i don du byas pa 'di// nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni// legs so byang chub sems
255a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' che/ / dpal dang ldan pa khyod legs so// rtsa gcig gus dang bcas pa yi// sems kyis legs nyon yid la zung // nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su// shin tu dga' ba'i sa las ni// dkyil
255a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/ / gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// shar ram lho yi sgo btod bya// dkar po ser po dmar po dang // ljang khu'i tshon gyis bri bar bya// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// dkar
255a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i lte bar 'tsham par dmar/ / mu khyud gnyis dang ldan pa'o// gser dngul zangs sams nyid la// bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phra// kha g.yel zhabs tshod zhum pa la// shin tu gtsang mar bkrus nas
255a6(rgyud 'bum): snang / / gu bur gur kum cu gang dang // gla rtsi ki'u wang chu yis bkang // b+hA g+ni seng g+hi ha sa der// ka ri kar ni de bko/ nas 'bras til mo mon sran dang // gser dngul b+hu ru mu tig dang // man

255b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / rgya mtsho chen por 'khrug pa nas// dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bur bcas// 'jig rten dbang gis gang ba yis// sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas// sngags kyi mthu yis
255b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nas/ / dgongs pa rgya chen skyes gyur te// legs so bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal sras rnams dang rig pa yi// lha mo tshogs dang klu len dang // bkra shis du ma rjod par 'gyur//
255b3(rgyud 'bum): de tshe mkha' la ye shes kyi// 'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yis// shing chen yongs su smin pa las// bdud rtsi char chen 'bebs par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong la gtor ma sbyin// rgyal dang rgyal sras
255b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / skar ma la sogs 'bab pa 'am// tshes gcig nas ni nya yi bar// sngags kyi 'phreng ba brjod par bya// lha la yang yang bskor ba bya// las rnams gang dang gang la yang // lha
255b5(rgyud 'bum): yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya/ / de dang de ni las rnams la// ci bde bar yang sbyar bar bya// phran tshegs las la spyan ma'i sngags// lhog pa 'brum pa la sogs la// mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis
255b6(rgyud 'bum): sgyur/ / gdon rigs zlog la gar dbang ste// byad stems rig sngags zlog pa la// don yod zhags pa'i sngogs kyis bkra// shes rab 'phel ba rdo rje chos// klu nad ha la ha las sel/
255b7(rgyud 'bum): ches 'phel pad+ma rgyan lung ste// mamin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed// rgam chen pos 'dug spos te// gdong bcu gcig pas blo bur sel// seng ge'i sgras ni mdzen de sel/
256a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor yo byad 'dod pas ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyis bkru// bkra shis rol mo du ma dang // gtsang sbra gos gsar ldan pa yis// snyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan
256a2(rgyud 'bum): pas bkru/ / myur du sgrib pa 'byang ba dang // 'dod yon kun grub sngags 'phreng ni// gang dang gang yang sbyar bar 'gyur// phran tshegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zla ba gzas bzung gyur pa'i
256a3(rgyud 'bum): tshe/ / mar srang gcig ni dngul snod gzhug/ sku gzugs mdun bzhag sngags brjod na// zla ba sos nas mar bslangs te// zos sam lus la byugs pa yis// nad rnams zhi zhing bde bar 'gyur//
256a4(rgyud 'bum): ldong ros ki'u wang cha mnyam pas// sku yi mdun bzhag sngags stong bzla// chus bkrus dpral bar thig le ni// khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub// chu dron sbyar nas lus bkrus na/

256a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu sngags rer bcas/ / bal bu le la brgya rtsa brgyad// sku yi drung du bsregs pas ni// mi yams phyugs nad thams cad 'chad// skud pa gtsang ma mdog dmar po// sngags re btab pa'i mdud pa
256a7(rgyud 'bum): bdun/ / zhal gcig steng zhal brtags nas ni// nad pa la btags rims nad zhi// sngags re mdud pa nyi shu gcig/ mdun zhal steng bzhag blangs btags pas// mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs gdon/
256b1(rgyud 'bum): drag pos zin pa 'joms par byed// gal te des kyang ma sos na// mdung re brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas// zhal gcig mdun zhal dbur btags te// blangs te btags na nges par grol// sdug bsngal
256b2(rgyud 'bum): nad pa yun rings brdungs/ / khyim du 'dre gdon 'jigs zhugs nas// 'bru re sngags re thang 'brom 'bras// sku mdun brgya rtsa brgyad bsgrags te// gong ltar sgrub pa'i skud pa yang // lus la btags na nges
256b3(rgyud 'bum): par grol/ / mi mdza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang // byad stems drag po zlog pa la// sku la spos dang me tog mchod// bi na ya yi gzugs mdun du// phra bo'i 'bras bu dgra ming sreg/ sngags re mdud pa
256b4(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad/ / mdud ldan g.yon gyi khro zhal gdags// zhag bzhi lon nas sku las dgrol// mdud pa re re'i bar du ni// sngags re brjod cing gcad par bya// bdag la sdang byed skyabs su 'ong // rdzas dang sngags
256b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi nus pa'o/ / brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud nas mdud bzhag steng btags pa// zhag gcig lon dgrol lus btags na//
256b6(rgyud 'bum): las rnams bkra shis tshul du 'grub// gang zhig bsgribs pa'i gshegs ldan pas// las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing // dus dus bkra mi shis byung na// gtsang sbra bum chu bzang po gnyis//
256b7(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs re re brjod// dang pos sku gzugs bkru bar bya// gnyis pas bi na ya ka bkrus// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas// rang nyid de nas bkru bar bya// bar chad byang nas 'dod
257a1(rgyud 'bum): kun 'grub/ / ci ltar sprul pa'i gdon bsal phyir// byi la'i mgo rus thal ba dang // sa bzang chu gtsang sbrus pa'i sa// byi la yi ni gzugs byas te// sku yi mdun du bzhag nas
257a2(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / khro zhal g.yon par srad bus gdags// rta mgrin sngags ni stong phrag zab// gzungs brgya bzlas pa'i ral gri yis// dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad dugatub// dum bu re re sngags re dang // dong gi
257a3(rgyud 'bum): nang du dor bar bya/ / de dag gnod pa gtan du sel// mig nad sna tshogs ma rungs la// 'bras bu gsum pa zhib tu btags// sbrang dkar khye'u 'tsho'i nu zhor bcas// bu btsas gsar pa'i bud med dang /
257a4(rgyud 'bum): khyi phag dag gis mthong byas nas// thum po 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags// sngags stong 'das nas sbyar ba des// mig tu blugs na mig 'bras skye// mig nad thams cad sel bar byed// mig rnon dag
257a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ / lhag ma ma yin khron pa'i chus// gu gul ga pur cha mnyam bskol// khyor gang bdag par gyur pa des// rtsa ba'i zhal gdangs sngags stong 'das// bkrol nas ril bu byas mid
257a6(rgyud 'bum): / / hA la ha la'i dug 'joms 'gyur// glang po dkar po'i gi'u wang ni// mthing bum bzhag nas sku yi mdun// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan lag bskul// dpral bar thig le byas gyur na// lha klu 'byung
257a7(rgyud 'bum): po'o mi rnams dga'/ / khyo shug mi mthun rtag pa la// ngur ba'i mjug sgro sku mdun du// stong bzlas lag tu blangs nas 'dum// chu bskams sa'am char med na// ling ga'i drung du sku bzhugs la//
257b1(rgyud 'bum): cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du// stong brjod chus skyes char chen 'bebs// gang zhig char tshe ring 'dod ni// 'gog par snyoms zhugs phyag rgya bcing // sku yi mdun du rtag par ni// a ka ru nAg
257b2(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa sogs/ / mchod pas rgyun du mchod bya zhing // brgyad nas nye bar sngags stong brjod// mig gi mngon shes sgrub pa'i phyir// dri zhim dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// rgyal mtshan pa dan kha dog bzhi//
257b3(rgyud 'bum): bla re yol ba dkar po yi// dbus su pad+ma lnga bris te// ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdung bzhugs// tsan dan dkar po'i dri chu dang // bdug pas rgyun du mchod par bya// ba mdog ser skya'i mar gyis ni//
257b4(rgyud 'bum): sgron ma'i 'phreng bas mchod par bya// man shi ri ka ku shu dang // pad+ma dmar dang sngon po dang // rgya mtsho chab kyi dbu ba dang // nya rkun nag po'i myu gu dang // ma brlabs pa dang gu gul dang // ku banas dang
257b5(rgyud 'bum): gi'u wang dang / / gur kum dmar dang ser po dang // tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdungs// de rnams phyed tshad gla rtsi dang // ga bur stsal nas re re'i tshad// sngags ni stong phrag re re grangs// sku yi mdun
257b6(rgyud 'bum): du brjod par bya/ / de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas// sngags khrir bcas te nya la ni// zangs kyi za ma tog tu stsal// sku yi steng zhal btags nas ni// mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab//
257b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khar ba'i thur mas mig tu stsal// ling thog gam ni mchi ma 'dzag/ sbyin dkar sbyin dmar g.yos pa dang // klad pan dang mig nad dang // glo bur long dang thibs pa sel// nyin gnyis bskus
258a1(rgyud 'bum): na lus kyi nad/ / bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel bar 'gyur// gsum pas gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad 'byang // lngas ni rtsod pa'i g.yul las
