264a3(rgyud 'bum): smu gul spos dkar dri/ / zhi ba'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur// mdog dmar g.yo zhing mog pa la// nyi mthal ka'i ri rtse badra// shib sgra ma li ka la'i dri// dbang gi las 'grub the rtsom med// mdog
264a4(rgyud 'bum): ser mi g.yo dngas pa la/ / nyi ma shar ba'i ri ltar 'bar// lha ba sgra tsam pa ka yi dri// rgyas pa'i las 'grub the tsom med// le brgan mdog ldan 'khyil zhing smug/ hu ra sgra rul dri bro ba dang // nags kyi
264a5(rgyud 'bum): ribo ltar 'bar ba/ / mngon spyod las la 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten ting 'dzin ldan 'grub pa'i// drang srong rigs la dpag med kyang // me yi lha ni bzhi bcu bzhi// sbyin sreg las la spong bar
264a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / 'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin can// bcu gnyis grangs ni gzung bar bya// gnya' na ka dang sa be ki/ tu kU se'u mya s+ye tro dang // lto ba yid skyes khro bo dang // dmar po mri ta cho ma li// b+hi su ya ki
264a7(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis po/ / phan 'dogs la sogs las la sbyar// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg thal bas ni// 'byung po phra mo zhi bor byed// dbang gi thal bas 'byung po 'ching // rgyas pas 'dod pa'i las sbyin byed//
264b1(rgyud 'bum): ri bo'i rtse la gtor bar bya// drag pos 'byung po sel bar byed// lam gyi gzhung du gtor bar bya// zhi dang dbang gi zhing phyogs dang // rab skyed mos tshal du gtor// dag par byed pas chu bo
264b2(rgyud 'bum): ltar/ / rgyas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // gang bar byed pa rgya mtsho ltar// sbyin sreg gis ni lha mnyes shing // sngags sgrub sngags kyi las rnams 'grub// drang srong tshog nam thams cad dang // dri za'i tshogs rnams thams cad
264b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / 'byung po'i tshigs rnams thams cad ni// sbyin sreg gis ni rab dga' nas// rnal 'byor grogs byed srung ba dang // skyob phyir tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing // nad med longs spyod rgyas
264b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / bsam pa bzhin du 'grub par gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las// me lha brten pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// /
264b5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo zhes bya ba// mkha' la yi ge sprul nas ni// 'gre don sna tshogs mdzad pa zhig/ 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor der lhags nas/
264b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas par mchod// phyogs gcig 'khod nas ston pa la// mgrin gcig gsung ni snyan pa yi// 'di skad tshig ni gsol ba 'debs//
264b7(rgyud 'bum): oM/ mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa'i sku// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// chos kyi longs spyod ji snyed pa// rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal// gang la mkho ba de'i gtso bo//
265a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa gzugs brnyan du ma 'chung // sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sra// bde ba chel phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'gyur rnam dag byang chub lam// phyogs chos byang chub sum cu
265a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun/ / stobs dang mi 'jigs brtson mdzad pa// chos rnams lhun grub sku phyag 'tshal// rnam dag rgya mtshor ldan rnams la// thugs rje rgya mtsho rgyun byung bas// zhing khams rgya mtsho skyong mdzad pa'i//
265a3(rgyud 'bum): mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// sngags dang rdzas dang phyag rgya'i rims// sna tshogs kyis ni don mdzad phyin// theg pa kun las khyad par du// sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags//
265a4(rgyud 'bum): nan tan sgrub pa smos ci dgos// sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang bas kyang // nad dang gnod sel bskal pa yi// sgrib rnams 'byung bas khyad par 'phags// dbul po rigs dang dman pa yang //
265a5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs ma thag nas bde ldan zhing // cung zad grub nas nus mthu ni// dpag med 'byung bas khyad par 'phags// mgon po bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas// dpal chen ye shes kun gyi mdzod//
265a6(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gzi can// 'gro la 'dren gtso ded dpon gyi// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas pa yis// 'gro la sna tshogs phan don du// ji ltar 'gyur
265a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad bshad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// pad+ma'i spyan gdangs 'dzum mdzad nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'gro la phan phyir 'di skad gsungs// dge byed
265b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya sngags dang bcas/ / 'gro la phan phyir zhus pa ni// legs so rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo che// shes rab 'chang ba khyod legs so// sems dpa' chen po de phyir ngas// khyod la ngo mtshar legs
265b2(rgyud 'bum): par bshad/ / khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// legs par zung la rgya cher spros// ras sam grog shing shun gang // 'jam zhing nag ris med pa la// gur kum gi'u wang sen rtsi dang // tsan
265b3(rgyud 'bum): dan gyis ni phyag rgya bri/ / pad+ma 'dab brgyad mu khyud bcas// 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya// d+hu ra d+ha ra dang po ste// gnyis pa d+hi ri d+hi ri spro// gsum pa d+hu ru d+hu ru ste// i ti bin+d+he bzhi lnga pa// tsa le tsa la
265b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bri 'o/ / pra tsa le gnyis drug pa'o// ku su me dang ku su ma// bdun pa bris te brgyad pa la// b+ha la i li mi li bri// oM mi tsi ti dza laM dang // swA hAr bcas pa dbus su'o// phyag 'tshal
265b5(rgyud 'bum): bcas sngags mtha' mar bri/ / rab rdzogs sngags kyis lhar dmigs nas// gtsang ming mchod pas mchod bya ste// sngags stong brjod pas lus la gdags// 'di ni srung ba'i mchog tu
265b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / nad dang yams nad gdon rnams dang // 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob par nges// rig sngags zlog nas khyad par du// rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga la// 'od kyir ba zlum po yi// ri mo gaN+DI
265b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa bri/ / rwa rnams la ni hUM gnyis par// rig sngags zlog dang bcas pa bri// lte bar oM hrIHswA hA'i bar// bdag nyid srungs zhes bri bar bya// mu khyud dang por bri bar bya// gzigs dbang yid bzhin nor
266a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gsum par pad+ma gar dbang gi/ sngags rnams g.yas su bskor bar bya// gal te nad lams zlog pa la// 'dab brgyad
266a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma mu khyud gsum/ / sngon ltar yi ge bkod pa la// mu khyud gnyis par spyan gyi sngags// gsum par rten 'brel sngags bris nas// lus sam mgul du thogs pas ni// nad rims dang ni lkog
266a3(rgyud 'bum): babrum sogs/ / rlung gis rdul bzhin sel bar 'gyur// de nas tshig de thos ma thag/ lha min bu mo nad bdag mo// sa du de bi zhes bya ba// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas te// bu mo khris ni mgrin gcig
266a4(rgyud 'bum): tu/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// rje btsun 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pu// mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// bdag gi sngags 'di gang 'dzin pa// gal te 'brum nad byung na ni//
266a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro// dam bca' 'di ni dran par bya// tre ba la bya yi ka ka pa ni ta// su ma ya bi lA sa ka ka ra Ni// ki shun pany+tsa tra li he na yi// ke na ka ta tsa ra Ni/ ya mirta nad ma na tsa/
266a6(rgyud 'bum): ya mi par nad bu ra dA/ dA tsa pi ta tra tsit+ta nad daM/ sa sU de wi me b+ha wa/ lha mos de skad gsol ma thag/ mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// oM oM b+ha bi ta/ bita ti mi ti/ ga tsan+d+ra ka ra Ni a mu
266a7(rgyud 'bum): ka s+ya ka bya/ lo hi ta gaM d+harba rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/ byin rlabs ldan pa'i sngags de ni// rgyun du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// oM ha na se rU pa d+ha riswA hA/ srad bu ma nyams dkar po le// nyi shu rtsa
266b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig mdud par bya/ / bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzlas nas kyang // lus sam mgul du gdags par bya// kr-i hi tika tika tra tha praka shi ka/ ta thA ya thA tsa la he huM hUM phaT/ sran ma rdog po re re la// brgya rtsa
266b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad brgyad bzlas pa yi/ / 'bru bdun thum por byas pa zhig/ dri bzang bcas la mgul du thogs// lams nad kun dang 'brum nag nad// shin tu gdug pa kun sel 'gyur// de nas rig sngags
266b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba mo/ / dpal 'phreng ma sa ni 'di skad gsol// bdag gi rig sngags 'di zlos pa// rims nad kun dang bral bar 'gyur// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
266b4(rgyud 'bum): / ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo badz+ra mA ra bi dza yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ sarba b+hI ra thA/ ha na ha na badz+ra/ sarba dzA ra
266b5(rgyud 'bum): pra sha ma ni ye swA hA/ mi skra mi rus sle tres dang // gu gul yungs kar sgog skya dang // shing kun gla rtsi'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad phyogs bzhir hrIHyig bri// mtshams bzhir bris te dbus
266b6(rgyud 'bum): su ming / / sngags 'di mu khyud dang po la// gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa yi sngags// bris nas lus sam mgul du thogs// nad rims thams cad sel ba dang // rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par
266b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// 'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol// rang byung can gyi ras la ni// sen rtsis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri/ rtsibs
267a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi hrIHla g.yon bskor du/ / bIHgI wa shaM ku ru NI// mu khyud dang po mgon po ni// pad+ma gar dbang sngags bri'o// gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po 'phreng // gsum pa lcags kyu
267a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu gcig/ dbus su baM yig hrIr bcas bri// lha dam nyid kyang dam byed na// 'gro ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos// gsol dang bkra shis brjod pa dang // bgegs kyi gnod pa sel 'dod pas//
267a3(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum rdo rje rgya gram ste// dbus su spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon// pad+ma gtsug tor sngags bri'o// rwa rnams kun la hUM yig ni// bgegs ming u tsa ta yi bskor// mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs//
267a4(rgyud 'bum): ha la ha la'i sngags bri'o// gnyis pa khro bo rta skad sngags// gsum par bgegs dgra'i sngags bris la// de rgyab me yi phung po bri// gang zhig 'khor lo 'di bris pas// sred med bu ltar mthu che ba'i//
267a5(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa can yang bathor byed na// phran tshegs 'byer ba smos ci dgos// gang la ser sna rnam chags shing // longs spyod 'phel bar mi 'gyur na// phun sum tshogs ldan dpal 'phel phyir// skyob pa'i phyag
267a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya bshad par bya/ / rgyal po 'am ni dge 'dun la// gtsang ldan rab bzang blangs nas kyang // dag par bkrus te dri bzang byug/ legs par brgyan nas thig btab ste// gur kum dang ni gA rtsi yis// pad+ma
267a7(rgyud 'bum): 'badab bcu drug pa bri/ / phyogs bzhir 'dab mar dpal be'u ste// mtshams bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri// mtshams brgyad la ni yi ge gang // oM dang badz+rad ke hUM/ yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya//
267b1(rgyud 'bum): mukhyud dang por mi bshol sngags// gnyis pa gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gsum pa ut+pal 'phreng ba ste// yang tog rtse 'am mdzod bzhag nas// gsol btab mchod na longs spyod 'phel/
267b2(rgyud 'bum): bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas// de bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// phyogs bzhir hrIHbri mtshams su drang // dbus su khye'u'i gzugs shig bri// phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri// sngags bu
267b3(rgyud 'bum): spro la bcas bri bar bya/ / mtshams bzhir oM dang a ma ra// dzI wa na tI ye swA hAs bskor// mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags// gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i
267b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags/ / gsum pa ut+pal dmar po'i 'phreng // bod 'phro rtag par mchod pa dang // phul du byung ba bstod pas bstod// gsol ba 'debs shing sngags bzlas na// bu stsol 'gyur la the tsom med//
267b5(rgyud 'bum): srung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang // bu slong ba yi phyag rgya ni// smin drug snar ma rgyal la bri// lhag ma rnams ni ci bder bri// gang zhig sems stor yid mi dga'// glo bur yi mug skye 'gyur na//
267b6(rgyud 'bum): parla 'dab ma bzhi pa yi// dbus su rang gzugs mtshan ma bri// 'dab mar rdo rje mdog bzhi pa// gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mu khyud la ni spyan ras gzigs// don yod zhags pa'i
267b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags bri'o/ / gnyis par rdo rje'i 'phreng ba bri// de'i rgyab 'od kyi 'phreng ba bri// rtag par mchod cing gsol ba gad pa// nad sel tshe ring bsod nams 'phel// gang zhig shes rab 'dod pas ni// dpal
268a1(rgyud 'bum): / be'u rgyal po'i du mar ni// hri yig rgyab tu sngags 'dis bskor// oM dang kA la de ka la// ma ni swA hA zhes pa zi// de yi cha rgyab 'khor ba la// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa sngags ze//
268a2(rgyud 'bum): de rgyab 'od kyi ra ba bri// gang gis 'di ba chang mchod pa la// nad dang gnod pa kun bral te// dug dang rims nad 'joms pa dang // shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur// yul du lo tog nyams pa
268a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / thog pa brug ser brgod pa dang // klu dang sa ba dag gnod pa ste// de gsal sbyor ba bshad par bya// shing shun dkar po ma nyams pa// nyams dga'i nyi rim sbyor ba la// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa//
268a4(rgyud 'bum): mig sman gyis ni bri bar bya// grwa rnams la ni hUM yig la// oM dang dzi na ti ti te// hUM phaT ces pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mu khyug dang por mgon po che// gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags 'phreng bri// gnyis
268a5(rgyud 'bum): par thugs rje chen po mgon/ / mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis bskor// gsum par rdo rje 'phreng ba dang // me yi 'od dang ldan par bri// phyag rgya 'di ni bstan tsam gyis// klu yi rgyal po mthu ldan rnams//
268a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang bcas te lus bskams 'gyur// gang gi khyim du gdong ba dang // ma he rta sogs yams nad can// bsal ba'i thabs kyi phyag rgya ni// brtan par drang srong tshogs rnams nyon// ko bi da ri'i
268a7(rgyud 'bum): shing la ni/ / khru gang khru gnyis dbyibs gru bzhi// gas grugs chag sogs med pa la// shin tu srab 'jam sor gnyis rngams// shing de la ni rta babs gzugs// 'khor lo gdugs dang bcas
268b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / brtsegs pa'i g.yas zur dang po ni// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ste// gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po'o// gsum par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser// bzhi par pad+ma dkar po'o// g.yon zur dang por pad+ma dmar/
268b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa ut+pal sngon po'o// gsum pa nor bu bzhi rgya gram// nang khong du ni pad+ma bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od ldan pa'o// lte ba dang ni 'dab brgyad la// oM dang bi sha tsi par+Na// sha ba ri sarba byA d+hi// pra sha
268b3(rgyud 'bum): ma ni swA hA zhes/ / baM yig la ni bskor ba bri// mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs// gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags bri'o// gnyis par chos kyi gtsug tor gyi// rtsa ba'i 'phreng sngags bri bar bya// rgya skyegs
268b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni mtshal yin te/ / de la shing sbyin byug par bya// mchod dang gsol gdab sngags dag ni// bdun stong re re brjod byas nas// sgo gong la gdags 'byung 'jug tshe// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal
268b5(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / rta phyugs yams nad ma lus la// rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten mgon gyi rig sngags mthus// myur du sel bar mnan pa dang // zlog dang bcing bar brjod ces brjod// phyug
268b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag chen po skyong ba ltar/ / glang po rta bong ma he tshogs// rtag cing nad dang gnod pa med// shin tu 'phel zhing rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la//
268b7(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du ni skyob pa yi// phyag rgya sbyor ba mnyan par gyis// yung bas ras sam shing la ni// par dkar steng du kha T+wAM dang // ral gri 'ong ma bri bar bya// de la gdu bu gsum gyis bskor// dang po
269a1(rgyud 'bum): @gdong gcu gcig pa'i sngags/ / gnyis par seng ge'i sgra yi sngags// gsum par ha ya chen po'i sngags// de rgyab me yi ra ba bri// 'di la gsol ba btab nas ni// g.yul
269a2(rgyud 'bum): ngor khyer te zhugs pa dang / / dgra dpung chen po 'bros 'gyur te// rang nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur// longs spyod spyir ni byang bltas bri// dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste// g.yul zlog pa ni lhor bltas
269a3(rgyud 'bum): bri/ / lhag ma rnams la shar bltas bri// dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba yi// dbye bas zas dang gos shes bya// 'dzum dang rnga ma dang dgod dang khro// bzhin gyi rnam par bshad pa yi// sngags
269a4(rgyud 'bum): dang sngags kyi 'od 'phreng dang / / lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang // snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang // rgyan yang de ltar shes par bya// kun kyang rin chen pad+ma'i gdan// kha dog sna tshogs ldan par ni//
269a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi yig 'bru'i lha rnams bzhugs// sngags rdzogs nas ni sngags su dmigs// gang gis phyag rgya 'chang byed la// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang // rig pa'i lha mo'i tshog
269a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / 'jig rten 'dren pa'i tshogs bcas dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang // khro bo tshogs bcas ma lus dang // 'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan rnams// ci 'dod
269a7(rgyud 'bum): las rnams ma lus pa'i/ / grogs dang dpung du byas nas ni// tshul bzhin du ni sgrub pa la// brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis kyang // the tsom du ni mo bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
269b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba las/ phyag rgya la brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas mkha' la gshegs pa yi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i drang srong
269b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ mtshan dpe du ma rgyas pa che// nyi ma'i gong bu zhes bya ba// drang srong rje dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ 'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can// spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po la// sangs
269b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas tshig gis 'di skad gsol/ / oM/ 'od zer du mther zug gi/ srid 'dam stug po skam byed rgyal// yon tan ye shes kyis brgyan sku// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal//
269b4(rgyud 'bum): gsung snyan yan lag brjod bral chos// bag chags ri bo snyil mdzad rgyal// skye 'gag bral ston sde snod gsum// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// skye 'gag gnod bral mnyam
269b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag pa/ / ting 'dzin shes rab 'phel mdzad rgyal// ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas thugs// mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs sman dang sngags sbyar nas// lha yi
269b6(rgyud 'bum): gong bu'i ril bu ni/ / 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi// thugs rje'i nyi ma lham mdzad pa'i// mgon po pad+mas bshad du gsol// 'gro rnams ma
269b7(rgyud 'bum): rig 'dam la zhe na/ / srid pa'i thag pas rgya gram bcings// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pas g.yogs// nga rgyal phrag dog chu bos g.yengs// ngan rtog log lam g.yang sar lhung // bag med
270a1(rgyud 'bum): ser sna'i dug gis myos/ / sdig pa'i grib mas rnam par rgyal// bag chags thum po'i ri bos mnan// mgon khyod thugs rjes ngal ba med// nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsapa
270a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir/ / shes rab thabs 'byung bshad du gsol// de nas 'jig rten mgon po rje// thugs rje thugs dpag mnga' ba yi// thugs dam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bur bcas// khyad par gsung 'di bka'
270a3(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang // rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan sems shes// 'das dang ma 'ongs don shes dang // mtha' yas shes drug las spyod pa// dngos dang rtags dang
270a4(rgyud 'bum): cha mthun gyis/ / rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur// phra dang yang dang mchod par bya ba dang // bdag por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur ba dang // gar yang phyin yang 'dod dgur ldan pa dang // dga'
270a5(rgyud 'bum): mgur gnas te dbang phyug yon tan no/ / rnam pa brgyad kyi dpe bya yis// longs spyod dbang dang lus la dbang // tshe la dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang // chu la mi bying mkha' la 'gro// sa 'og
270a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro dang mi snang ba/ / zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// dngos po gang dang gang bsgrubs rnams// ril bu las ni 'byung 'gyur gyis// gzhan ni myur du 'grub mi 'gyur// byang chub sems
270a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i ril bu ni/ / mtshams med la sogs byed pas kyang // rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur// nye dang dbang ldan lha yi sras// ma mos dbang du byas gyur nas// 'byung po sha za lha min mi/
270b1(rgyud 'bum): ma mo mkha' 'gro 'byung po klu// dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can// sems can gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngos grub bzang po 'dod pa yis// khyad par ril bu 'di bsgrub bya// gi'u//
270b2(rgyud 'bum): wang dang ni lig bu mig/ lde nga ros bzang por sbar ba yis// ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas// snod gtsang nang du gzhag par bya// sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na// stan chad ma mthong snang ba'am// /
270b3(rgyud 'bum): sgra thos sam ni bde gshegs gzugs// yid 'ong mngon du byung ba sogs// mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas zla ba gzas bzung tshe// ci 'byor mchod de snyim par bcug/
270b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas nas nyi shar na// du bar 'thul dang dri can 'gyur// dud 'thul lus la byugs pas kyang // snang ba dang 'od gzugs can dang // 'dzam gling phyogs rnams rgyu ba dang // longs
270b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod che dang ldan 'gyur te/ / shi 'phos dga' ldan gnas su skye// dri ma tsam gyis lus byugs kyang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang byed cing // thos pa 'dzin cing sgyu rtsal mkhas// shi nas 'dzam
270b6(rgyud 'bum): glogrong 'di nyid du/ / snang lo can gyi gnod sbyin ni// 'khor ba gzhon nu'i rigs su mye// yang na mi yi rgyal po bam// glang po nyid du skye bar nges// 'bar ba lus la bskus na lta// rig sngags
270b7(rgyud 'bum): 'chang lus nyi shar mdog/ bskal par gnas te 'dod dgur spyod// 'jig rten kun tu thogs med rgyu// mkha' ldings 'og chu bran 'gro// sangs rgyas kun nas phyin nas kyang // dbang por
271a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas te rgyal por gnas/ / sprul pa'i rdzas kyis bde gshegs mchod// 'dod nas shi 'phos 'jig rten khams// gzhan 'das sangs rgyas dag tu skye// 'jig rten 'jig rten
271a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa yi/ / bdag nyid yid du 'od 'dod pas// gur ku ra ga pur gla rtsi dang // gi'u wang bsregs nas sngags stong bzlas// brdungs te phye mar byas nas kyang // sngags stong bzlas te chu gtsang gis//
271a3(rgyud 'bum): ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas// re re la yang stong stong brjod// rlung dang nyi ma ma reg par// bskams nas gnod gtsang gzhag par bya// ril bu tsam zhig mur na yang // rgyal po blon po 'khor bcas kyis/
271a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong na bu bzhin gzigs 'gyur na// tha mal skye bos smos ci dgos// nor rnams gzhan gyis ster ba dang // bsgo ba la ni ngag btsan 'gyur// ga pur gu gul gi'u wang dang / tsan dan gan da brda dang //
271a5(rgyud 'bum): gla rtsi dag ste cha mnyam du// re re sngags stong bzlas nas su// brdungs te ril bu byas pa dag/ g.yon pa'i zhal la gdags par bya// bdun nas nya yi bar du ni// sngags bzlas pa dang mchod par
271a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / bdugs pas nad dang gdon rnams sel// mig la byugs pas rgyal po dang // rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang // blon po la sogs dbang du 'gyur// khar bcug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong // gdam pa
271a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad don yod 'gyur/ / spyi bor btags na byad stems dang // g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur// gal te phye mas bdugs pas kyang // sdig pa thams cad 'byang 'gyur te// kun gyis mthong
271b1(rgyud 'bum): dang dga' ba dang / / gzi byin pa phags pa kun gyis mchod// ga pur gla rtsi gur kum dang // tsan dan gla rtsi ka ko la// spos kyi rgyal po pad+ma dang // ut+pal sngo dang tsan dan dmar// re re la yang stong bzlas
271b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / cha mnyam phye ba'i gi'u wang bcas// ril bu tsa na ka tshad bya// grib bskams byas nas lus la 'chang // gling bzhi kun khyab rgyal srid 'thob// kra ku la yi thang chu dang // ldong ros be dang ut+pal
271b3(rgyud 'bum): sngo/ / rgya mtsho bu ba gi bu wa dang // yung dang sbyar ba gur kum dang // ga pur dang ni gla rtsi gsum// re re la yang sngags stong bzla// de nas sku yi mgul btags te// stong bzlas thal nas ril bu bya//
271b4(rgyud 'bum): mig nad sel na chu dang sbyar// sond la ni ka ka ru// rna ba'i nad la ru rta ste// ut+pal mu tig mig nad la// gre ba'i nad la ba sha ka/ glo nad la ni ba le ka/ sha ka ra yi thang dang sbyar// rlung nad la ni mar dang
271b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / mkhris nad la ni tig ta dang // bad kan la ni lga dang sbyar// mdze nad la ni dug mo nyungs// ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa// skrangs nad rnams la thug po che// bgegs dang yams nad sel ba la// gu gul
271b6(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas bdug par bya/ / ril bu'i yon tan mtha' yas ni// nam yang brjod par mi nus so// gu gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i// ril bus bgegs tshogs sel bar byed// ke su rtsa dang sge'u gsher dang //
271b7(rgyud 'bum): ba la ta ka tsha ba gsum// ser po mu zi phye ma rnams// sbrang rtsi dang bsres ril bu bya// pad+ma gar dbang sngags stong bzlas// zlos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te// nad dang gdon dang dgras mi tshugs// 'dod
272a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / ta ka'i rtsa ba ba ru ra// skyu ru ra dang til ti la// mnyam byas srin bya'i khrag dang ni// ril bu byas nas mig la byugs// klu dang yi dgas
272a2(rgyud 'bum): khang pa dang / / sa 'og thams cad mthong bar nges// byis pa zla ba gsum pa'i lce// nyin gcig spros phor nang du bzhug/ gnyis pa ra'o gsum dang 'byung // bzhi pa ral bu tshil chen gtso/
272a3(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa sbrang rtsi'i nang du ste// drug pa dngul chu'i nang du gzhag/ bdun pa rigs ngan thod par ni// byi la'i khrag gis bskas la gzhag/ bskams nas bya dang spang ku'i sha/ lhan cig rang gi khar
272a4(rgyud 'bum): bcug na/ / de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur// gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med// ldong ros gyen du bcas pa dang // dzA ti lo ma sa bon bcas// ril bu sngags stong bzlas pa yis// bar snang la
272a5(rgyud 'bum): ni 'gro bar nges/ / pan du ma dang ki ram dang // ma ka ri dang su mi tam// pra pan ta ma'i ril bu ni// nyi zla gzas bzung dus su mid// shes rab phul du 'byung ba ste// thos pa 'dzin 'gyur
272a6(rgyud 'bum): smos ci dgos/ / gI'u wang swA hA tsa ni dang // sre ta sbrang gi ril bu bya// sngags stong bzlas nas khar bcug na// 'das pa'i don rnams shes par 'gyur// gi'u wang sug pa yi dang // ba ra swa
272a7(rgyud 'bum): ta ha su ri/ / a ra hu ri sbrang rtsir bcas// ril bu byas nas sngags stong bzlas// mid pas ma 'ongs don rnams shes// gzhan yang nad 'dod byed pa yi// ril bu chen po bshad par bya//
272b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal dang rnam rgyal na gu la// kan d+ha na gu li dang ni// ru Ni a ba ya ba ni// i pa ya na ta ka ra// gan d+ha ka dang pri yang ku// 'khor lo che dang 'khor lo dang // biSh+Ta ka Ti de bzhin du// so ma ra tsa un na ti//
272b2(rgyud 'bum): re re la yang sngags pa phreng dang // brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya// de nas brdungs te sbrang dang bcas// byis pa la ni dpung par te// bu 'dod mo la mgul po ra gdags// 'di btags pa yi de ma
272b3(rgyud 'bum): thag/ 'jigs pa brgyad dang nad las grol// ba mar shu dag pa lcir bcas// lcags kyi snod du btsos pa yi// ril bu a mra'i 'bras bu tsam// sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod de// phyis ni
272b4(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu gcig brjod nas/ / snga bar ming bas shes rab 'phel// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM shud d+he mr-i taM ba la
272b5(rgyud 'bum): baM d+ha ni swA hA/ srod dang tho rangs dge sbyong dang // dal smra gsong po dul bag can// khrus la dga' zhing dri bzang bsten// spyod lam rab zhi khro ba med// rtag tu sngags brjod brtse sems can// spyan
272b6(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang la cher dad/ / gdung bag gdong la mchi ma can// lung thob bla mar rab dga' ba'i// skyes mchog de la rab dge zhing // 'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang // 'byung po la sogs
272b7(rgyud 'bum): smos ci dgos/ / rtag par rang gi yid la ni// snying po gsang sngags bcang bar bya// nye ba'i snying po lus dag pa'i// lha yang rang la nye bar byed// rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod mang ba// khri dang /
273a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bum dang sa ya dang // sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de// kha cig la yang bzhi dang ni// lnga tsam gyis ni de grub yin// las la sbyar ba bdun dang ni// bcu bzhi nyi shu rtsa gcig dang
273a2(rgyud 'bum): brgya dang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs/ / de ma thag tu chu bi yin te// cung zad pa ni mar gyis bya// brtan par 'gyur ba ka ra ste// ches brtan pa la srad bu yin// sman dang sngags kyis sel byed de//
273a3(rgyud 'bum): ril bus ring du skyod byed yin// sngags sgrub pa la mi mos pa'i// bdun du rtsom na de dag rnams// de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag/ rdo rje snying po nyi 'od dang // pad dkar rin chen snying po dang //
273a4(rgyud 'bum): pad spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang // ye shes dbang phyug par dbang phyug/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams// rang rang sde dpung sngar bcas pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams//
273a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bkram byas te// rin chen rigs las 'khrungs pa yi// mchod pas nam mkha'i gtor rab bkang // rol mo du ma lhab lbu
273a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sil snyan lha yi tshogs rnams kyis// sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar// bkod pa mtha' yas bsham byas te// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// mgon
273a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung snyan la// yi rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod rten che// 'jig rten dbang po dbang phyug
273b1(rgyud 'bum): che/ / pad+ma sems dpa' pad 'byung che// rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa chen po chos rgyal gtso// blo gros chen po sems dpa' che// pad+ma 'chang ba pad+ma dpal// pad+ma'i mgon
273b2(rgyud 'bum): khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ / pad+ma las byung dam pa'i yid// pad+ma gsal mdzad dga' mdzad po// pad+ma'i rdo rje dam pa'i sku// khyod mchog spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba kun chen thabs po che// chetshe mnyam
273b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dgongs pa che/ / dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal// bde ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsam chen mkhyen chen theg chen po// rnal 'byor chen po mes chen po// bde stsol bde mdzad dga' mdzad
273b4(rgyud 'bum): che/ / pad+ma rgyas zhal phyag 'tshal lo// chos mnga'i don mnga' pad+ma rgyal// dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog 'dzin// rmad byung chen ldan chos rab 'chang // chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
273b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' mchog sems dpa'/ / rin chen sems dpa' chos sems dpa'// dam tshig sems dpa' las sems dpa'// kun mkhyen sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten dpa' bo dpa'
273b6(rgyud 'bum): bopo mchog/ rnam par gzigs gtso skyob mdzad che// 'jig rten gsal mdzad 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten yi ge kha dog che// yi ge che mtshungs yig drug mchog/
273b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge'i rang bzhin yi ge gzigs// yi ge 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// pad+ma'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i lag/ legs so sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin pa'i// sangs rgyas tshogs te sangs rgyas chos// sangs rgyas che khyod
274a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / tshad med che sku sangs rgyas sku// gzugs bzang 'chang ldan rdo rje gzugs// gzi brjid che mchog chos snang ba// snang bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gtso mgon
274a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po pad+ma'i dpal/ / chos kyi dpal mgon 'dren mdzad pa// tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug mgon// tshangs pa'i sras khyod phyag 'tshal lo// cher gsal gtso bo snang ba mchog/ 'od chen
274a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad par rang gsal mdzad/ / snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon// snang ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po che// chos kyi spyan ni gzigs pa che// ting nge 'dzin po ye shes mtsho//
274a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang skyur gtso// mkhan po chen po sangs rgyas sras// rgyal thabs brnyes pa khyu mchog che// sangs rgyas dpag med phyag 'tshal lo// drag po chen
274a5(rgyud 'bum): po brtul chen po/ / ha la chen po seng ge'i sgra// mgrin sngon gar gyi dbang phyug gtso// ye shes gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang // 'chang la nad med bgegs med de/
274a6(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong // yang yang lhar skye mya ngan 'da'// de skad gsungs nas blo ldan rnams// rang rang gdan la rnam par 'khod// de tshe phyogs bcu rnam par g.yos// bdud rigs
274a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mog por gyur/ / de nas gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la// rtogs pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid// nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so// kun tu bzang po'i spyad tshul can//
274b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar lam bcu pa rnam spro ba// sems can gang du 'dod sbyor ba'i// rigs ni rigs chen thams cad pa'o// lus ngag yid bcu spyod bcu ni// rgyun mi 'chad du sbyor mod kyang // rags pa yi ni gzugs
274b2(rgyud 'bum): brnyan mthus/ / sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi// lha la goms pa lha mthong ngam// mngon shes dang po sems gsal bas// mkha' mnyam sems kyi rdzu 'phrul che// sems snang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa//
274b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma pho mo la sogs pa'i// mngon shes 'jig rten gsal mtho bas// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste// brtan pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o// dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam spyod// sems dang
274b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dbyer med dang / / zhi lam sgro skur chad pa dang // sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog dang lam// bzhi bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang // rten 'brel zab don mngon gyur pa// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs/
274b5(rgyud 'bum): kun mchog/ mtshan med ting 'dzin la gnas nas// rtsol bcas gzhan don sgrub pa dang // rtsol med shugs kyis bde 'byung dang // nges tshig chos don spros pa'i mtha'// rdzu 'phrul du ma spyod yul la//
274b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs chen yongs su grub pa'is// mkha' spyod phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // sems kyi snang ba du mar bsgyur// dngos rnams spros spang bsdu spyod pa// rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis// chos sku kun
274b7(rgyud 'bum): snang kun tu 'od/ / bde skur snang ba pad+ma'i spyan// yi ge 'khor lo sprul tshogs che// mtshon bya mtshan nyid rdo rje 'dzin// zag med ye shes bla ma'i sa// 'du 'bral med pa'i bde chen sa// de ltar drug
275a1(rgyud 'bum): ni sangs rgyas kyi/ / sa chen bla med mthar gnas so// ngo bo spros med chos sems pa// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go// sems can sems snyoms byang sems
275a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / nges par sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis so// sems can mi gtong tshul khrims srung // sngags don mi spong nyid dang gsum// rang gi sngags grub gzhan gyi sngags// bar mi gcod dang 'gro ba la/
275a3(rgyud 'bum): byams pa sgrub dang snying rje sgrub// sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu bzhi'o// dben pa bstan dang 'du 'dzi spong // thos pa bsam zhing de don spyod// phyi rol sngags spong zhi sdang skyong // de dag sngags sgrub rgyu lnga'o// dad pa/
275a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dun pa gsol ba dang // phyi nang sngags la mi spyod dang // spros med ston pa'i gzhung 'jugs dang // theg chen mdo gzhung 'dzin pa dang // sngags gzhung tshol ba mi skyo dang // dge sbyong brtson dang drug pa'o// bzlas dang
275a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg mchod gtor brtson/ / phyi rol dka' thub gdung med dang // snod bcud 'og min gnas lha dang // bu mo pha rol phyin yul lha// 'gro ba mi bsla chos mi 'byed// theg dman mi len pa dang bdun// nyan thos rang
275a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal blo ldan dang / / rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tsom med// lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang // dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang // ser sna med dang gtong la dga'// gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yeng dang // gzi brjid
275a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang che'i lus thob dang / / grags kun blo ldan brgyad por blta// skur pa med cing bden par smra// bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste// brgyad pa de yang sgrub pa'i rgyu// rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid// gang
275b1(rgyud 'bum): zhig lcags kyu bzung bas gnyis re nas/ / klu phrug 'bum phrag 'dren ltar dge ba'i sems// kun slong byang chub rin chen thob mdzad rgyu// rtag par 'chang na gnas 'gyur byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom
275b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan thub pa ches/ / blo ldan rnams la bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so sems dpa' che// gang dag de dag de bzhin du// bde 'dod rnam par g.yeng ba dang // des ni sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das// gdung
275b3(rgyud 'bum): pa chags sdang 'khrug pa dang / / des ni log pa'i chos 'dor yang // dge sbyong log ltas tshangs pa'i gdon// sngags log spyod byed rig 'dzin gdon// gdul dka' dag la rgyun rings so// skya ngan 'jigs
275b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir blo zab spyod/ / gang gi khyim na rgyud 'di yod// bri dang bklag dang mchod pa dang // rim gro chad zhugs la byed la// bkra shasi tshe ring dpal 'byor bskyed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
275b5(rgyud 'bum): stsasprul pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs de dang // rig pa'i lha mo dang // khro bo du ma dang // nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad dang // lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar
275b6(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las// sbyor
275b7(rgyud 'bum): ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // 'phags pa span ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// /
276a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'byung gnas rig pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab pad+ma rgyas pa'i kha che'i yul bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di ta chen po so pa shrI b+ha ba zhes bya ba dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba
276a2(rgyud 'bum): kyu ra dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i dA yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
276a3(rgyud 'bum): don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
276a4(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das po ta la ke'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas sa ma la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan med pa dang / a ti mug ta ka la sogs
276a5(rgyud 'bum): pa mang po dang / sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag par brgyan par dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong phrag bco brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa
276a6(rgyud 'bum): dgu dang / / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i
276a7(rgyud 'bum): bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
276b1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
276b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su// 'jig rten gyi dbang
276b3(rgyud 'bum): po rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/ gang yang bdag gi dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
276b4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu brgya stong mang po'ang 'dus so/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tu rnyed do// gzhan gang gi tshe bcom
276b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'dra sa gzhi'i phyogs gcig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtogs par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang // dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag
276b6(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro// gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das sa'i phyogs gcig pu de mchod rten du
276b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro// de bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yod zhags
277a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/ 'phags
277a2(rgyud 'bum): pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa// mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de
277a3(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das des re zhig de nyid smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na de'i skye ba 'di'i las yongs su dag cing yongs su zad par

300a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
300a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'di smras so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na swa gA rA baM ro tsa na b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha te b+h+yaHsa myaka saM
300a7(rgyud 'bum): bud d+he b+h+yoH/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ye thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ Id ti ban+thi/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa la/
300b1(rgyud 'bum): ku su me kA su me ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma ba nA ya swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni sgrub mi dgos par las thams cad byed de/ rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang /
300b2(rgyud 'bum): nyin bzhi pa dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dra dang / lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / lba ba dang / 'bras kyi 'phreng ba dang / bas baljags la sogs pa dang / dug dang
300b3(rgyud 'bum): phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags te bsku'o// lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa sbyong bar bgyid do// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bru mar ro// rna ba
300b4(rgyud 'bum): bro 'tshal ba la ni ru rta dang 'bru mar ro/ / sna bro 'tshal ba la ni gro btags na des zhi bar 'gyur ro// bro nad thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bgyi ste bklags pas 'grub bo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
300b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / // 'phags pa zhal bcu gcig pa'i rig sngags kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
300b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod 'od ma'i myu gu'i dkyil 'khor na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
300b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan
301a1(rgyud 'bum): yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa snyed dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
301a2(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po dag gis yongs su
301a3(rgyud 'bum): bskor nas mchod cing rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas te/ gsang sngags brjod pa la chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
301a4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
301a5(rgyud 'bum): la mgo bos phyag byas te g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la rig sngags
301a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa mchis te/ deng bdag gis sems can thams cad la sman cing bde bar bgyi ba dang /
301a7(rgyud 'bum): bro nad thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dgag pa dang / dus ma lags par 'chi
301b1(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad bzlog pa dang / ngan sems can rnams gdul zhing dang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dag bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / khon dang bcas pa rnams 'dun par
301b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba dang / bdud dang gdon bgegs rnams zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems kyi smon pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'jig
301b3(rgyud 'bum): rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang rig sngags 'dis bsrung bar bgyis pa dang / 'di len
301b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / bdon pa dang / yi ger bris nas spel bar bgyid pa de dag la bgegs bgyid pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa dang /
301b5(rgyud 'bum): dug dang / byang stems kyis gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so// bdag gis rig sngags 'di gnas pa'i phyogs su ring yang rung nye'ang rung ste/ ji tsam du mtshams bkum
301b6(rgyud 'bum): pa las 'das nas gnod pa bgyid du mchi ba ma mthong lags te/ sdig pa'i las nges par rnam par smin par gyur pa ni ma gtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das des dngos po 'di nges
301b7(rgyud 'bum): par de lta bu lags par rig par bgyis nas mngon par yid ches pas blang bar bgyi'o/ / rnam par rtog pa ni mi bgyi/ de ltar bgyis na gdon bgegs thams cad thag ring du spong bas nye bar
302a1(rgyud 'bum): mchi zhing glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/ / rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bsngags pa brjod cing / mtshungs par rjes su
302a2(rgyud 'bum): thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ bskal pa
302a3(rgyud 'bum): g ang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma brgya'i spyan thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i gtsug tor yon tan rab tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer
302a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bdag de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de las rig sngags 'di mnos lags so// rig sngags 'di 'thob pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs
302a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'ang thob par gyur pas/ rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so// de lta bas na yongs su dang ba dang ldan
302a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa dag gis rig sngags 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don par 'tshal na gus pas sems rtse gcig tu dran pas bcangs
302a7(rgyud 'bum): te rtag par nang par langs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/ rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la phan yon rnam pa bcu 'thob par 'gyur lags so//
302b1(rgyud 'bum): bcu gang zhe na/ rtag par lus la bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang / nor dang / rin po che dang /
302b2(rgyud 'bum): gos dang / zas pas pa ma mchis pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thams cad thul zhing 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ya rabs btsun pa rnams kyis bkur zhing gsod
302b3(rgyud 'bum): por smra bar 'gyur ba dang / dug dang 'dre gdon gyis mi tshugs shing gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha dang dbyig pa thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur pa dang / chab kyis/
302b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lags so// gzhan yang
302b5(rgyud 'bum): yon tan gyi sman yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / nams kyang ngan 'gro rnams su lhung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yang ba ma spangs
302b6(rgyud 'bum): pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal
302b7(rgyud 'bum): pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol dag gi yang ches snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas man da ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bdag khyim bdag chen po zhig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas de la rig sngags 'di mnos lags te/
303a1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'di thob ma thag tu bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil lags
303a2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rig sngags 'di klog pa dang 'dzin pa dag gis gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje chen po'i ye shes kyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi sgo
303a3(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis gang dag btson ra dam por chud pa dang / mtshon char sprul ba dang / 'gum pa la thug pa dang / chab dang / zhugs dang / rlung dang / chom rkun
303a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dug dang / byang stems dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bgegs thams cad las yongs su skyob par bgyid pa lags so// bdag ni 'di'i dbang
303a5(rgyud 'bum): gis sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / skyabs dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su srung ba dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / gling dang / khang khyim du gyur pa lags so// rig sngags
303a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dibi mthus gnod sbyin dang srin po ma rungs pa la sogs pa thams cad yongs su bsdu zhing yongs su bzung nas sngar byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems bskyed du sprul nas/ de'i rjes la bla
303a7(rgyud 'bum): nam mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par bgyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags 'di'i gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas gang la la zhig gis lan cig tsam
303b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyis na'ang rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag sangs rgyas
303b2(rgyud 'bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams kyis deng gdod rig sngags 'di thos par 'gyur lags na/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta
303b3(rgyud 'bum): smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang la la zhig gis gdugs mtshan du rig sngags 'di klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid na bdag gis de dag gi smon pa ci mchis pa yid bzhin du
303b4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par bgyid lags so/ / gang la la zhig gis zla ba phyed cing tshes bcu bzhi'am bco lnga la smyung bar bgyis te/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/
303b5(rgyud 'bum): sems rtse gcig tu bdag rjes su dran par bgyis nas rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rig sngags 'di gi
303b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis ming btsun zhing thos par dka' bar gyur lags te/ gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i mtshan nas brjod cing yid la bsams pa dang / gzhan yang 'ga' zhig
303b7(rgyud 'bum): gis skad cig tsam du bsam pa thag pa nas bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par gyur na/ de nyid kyi yon tan mnyam zhing mtshungs lags so// bdag gi ming nas brjod pa de dag thams cad
304a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur/ bro nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur/ lus dang /
304a2(rgyud 'bum): ngag dang / yid kyis nongs pa zhu byang bar 'gyur na/ bdag gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos
304a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang ci 'tshal lags te/ gang zag de dag ni bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub lag mthil na mchis pa bzhin du khong du chud cing legs par 'gyur bar rig par bgyid lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
304a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can thams cad la de lta bu'i byams pa dang snying rje'i
304a5(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa bskyed nas rig sngags chen po 'di rnam par phye ste bstan pa yin pas/ khyod thabs 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang / bgegs dang /
304a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa las yongs su skyob pa thar par byas nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rnam par 'jog pa
304a7(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ rigs kyi bu dbang rjes su yi rang nas khyod kyi rig sngags yongs su gzung gi/ khyod kyis spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan rag gzigs
304b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rig sngags 'di 'don pa gang
304b2(rgyud 'bum): lags pa nges 'di skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
304b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
304b4(rgyud 'bum): phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / zhes brjod par bgyi lags so// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ir+d+he baT+Te/ tsi le tsa le/ pra tsa le prats+ra
304b5(rgyud 'bum): laM/ ku su me ku su me ba ra/ i li mi li/ tsi ti tsi ti/ dz+wa la ma hA pa na ya shud d+ha tA swA hA/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rtsa ba'i rig sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig
304b6(rgyud 'bum): gis rjes su dran zhing bzlas brjod bgyis na/ gong du bstan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so// dkon mchog gsum le gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
304b7(rgyud 'bum): babags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
305a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal
305a2(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / tad+ya thA/ ha ha ha ha/ i li mi li/ tsi li pi li/ khi li hi le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chab dang gos la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'tshal na
305a3(rgyud 'bum): sngar khrus bgyis te/ de'i rjes la sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btab ste lus la gtor bar byas nas bsang bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis lan bdun btab ste gzod bgo bar bgyi lags
305a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
305a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po
305a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ha ha ha ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni pog spos dang mar me la gdab pa'i sngags legs te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas pog
305a7(rgyud 'bum): spos bsregs te mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'das pog spos la lan bdun btab ste gdong bsreg par bgyi'o/ / mar me spar bar 'tshal na yang sngar sngags padis 'bru mar la lan bdun btab ste
305b1(rgyud 'bum): gdod mar me spar bar bgyi lags so/ / dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag
305b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
305b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ si ri si ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ si ri d+hi ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni me tog dang / byug spos dang / 'phrang ba la gdab
305b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas me tog dang / byug spos dang / 'phreng ba dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis me tog la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la gtor bar
305b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang sngags 'dis byug spos la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la byug par bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis 'phreng ba la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la brgyan par bgyi lags so//
305b6(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa daH/
305b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang
306a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ sa te sa te/ si ti si ti/ su d+hu su d+hu swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas la mchod cing dbul ba'i zhal zas la gdab
306a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig zhal zas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btab nas de'i rjes la gdod
306a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bgyi lags so/ / dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de
306a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
306a5(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ ma si tA si/ hu ru hu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ mA ru mu ru swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yam shing la gdab pa'i sngags
306a6(rgyud 'bum): lags te/ gal te la la zhig gong du bstan pa'i rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis bgyi ba mchis te/ sngar sngags 'dis me tog sha ta'i shing la lan gcig gdab par bgyi'o// zhugs 'bud par 'tshal na
306a7(rgyud 'bum): logs shig tu me tog sha ta'i shing blangs nas dum bu sum cur gtubs te zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi'i nang du spangs nas zhag lon par bgyis te/ gdugs re dum bu re re blangs nas sngags lan re
306b1(rgyud 'bum): btab ste zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o/ / de dag thams cad bas par bsregs lags nas de'i rjes la gdod bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// /
306b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
306b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA
306b4(rgyud 'bum): I li mi li/ be li ti li/ tsi li hi li swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mtshams dgum pa'i sngagaso lags te/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal na sngar sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btab sta
306b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o/ / yang na yungs kar ram thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor na sems kyis nyi ring ji tsam bkum pa mtshams su gyur nas
306b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su srung bar 'gyur lags so/ / dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// ba phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag
306b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
307a1(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ bi Te bi Te/ ti Te ti Te/ tsi Te tsi Te/ bin+d+he bin+d+hu/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/
307a2(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sa b+hA sa b+ha sa b+ha na~M swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag slar rang gi gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i sngags lags na bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyis legs nas/ bdag slar rang gi
307a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i tshe sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor na bdag slar mchi bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di ni dngos
307a4(rgyud 'bum): grub mngon du ma gyur lags kyis kyang las su bgyi ba rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pas sems rtse gcig tu bzlas brjod bgyis na smon pa rnams kyang mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/ / gang zhig
307a5(rgyud 'bum): smyos nad gdugs re lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs gnyis shing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs gsum zhing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdugs bzhi zhing lan re ldang ba 'am/ gdon 'byung pos bgyi ba 'am
307a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro mas bgyis pa 'am/ sha zas bgyis pa 'am/ lus srul pos bgyis pa'am/ smyo byed kyis bgyis pa 'am/ brjed byed kyis bgyis pa 'am/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnam pa sna tshogs
307a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis bgyis pa'ang rung ste/ nad pa de dag la sngags 'dis lan brgyad btab na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags lan re bzla zhing re re mdung
307b1(rgyud 'bum): de brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas nad pa'i mgul pa 'am dpung pa la btags na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa zhu byang zhing bro nad kyang sos par 'gyur lags so/ / gal te skrangs pa dang / 'bras kyi 'phreng ba dang /
307b2(rgyud 'bum): shu ba dang / phol mig dang / rma 'dzags pa dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur tam/ ral gri dang / mda' dang / mdung la sogs pa phog ste smos par gyur
307b3(rgyud 'bum): tam sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / bung ba dang / gdug pa la sogs pas zin par gyur na sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas te btab na sos par 'gyur lags so// gal ta sgrib pa lci ba
307b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig lags na dog sa ser po'i 'jim pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bro 'tshal ba'i dmigs su byugs na sel bar 'gyur lags so/ / gal te rlung nang na ba 'am/ phyogs gcig pa langs par
307b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur tam/ rna ba 'on pa 'am/ sna 'tshubs pa 'am/ rlung gis zin pa'i nad la sogs pas bro 'tshal bar gyur na sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa de dag la lan brgya rtsa
307b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad sngags kyis btab na nad sos par 'gyur lags so/ / gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na 'bru mar dang / chab mar dang / gro dang / ru rta rnams bskol te sngags lan bdun btab nas lus
307b7(rgyud 'bum): la bskus sam/ rna ba dang snar blugs sam/ 'tshal du sprul na bro nad sos par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang bro nad gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal bar gyur na sems rtse gcig tu sngag
308a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di gdab par bgyi'o/ / yang na bdag nyid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gal te rig sngags 'di sgrub par 'tshal na sngar sra zhing 'phan skyon
308a2(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis pa'i tsan dan dkar po las/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs srid du mtho phyed dang do mchis pa/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma la brgan dang ril
308a3(rgyud 'bum): ba thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas bgrang ba phreng thogs shing 'jigs pa ma mchis pa stsol ba'i lag tu ston pa gdong gcu gcig par bgyis te/ mdun gyi gdong gsum ni byams pa
308a4(rgyud 'bum): dang snying rje dang bcas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par bgyi'o/ / g.yon phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni khro bo'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni mche ba dkar po gyen du 'byung ba'i mtshan
308a5(rgyud 'bum): can du bgyi'o/ / rgyab kyi gdong gcig ni khro ga tum che zhing rab tu dgod pa'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// spyi bo'i gdong gcig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal gyi gzugs can du bgyi'o// mgo rgyan de dag thams
308a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i lus ni do shal la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par bgyi'o// gzugs bgyis/
308a7(rgyud 'bum): lags nas smon pa rnams grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ smyung ba bgyis nas sdom pa yang dag par blangs te/ zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshas gcig nas
308b1(rgyud 'bum): tshes brgyad kyi bar du gdugs gcig la dus gsum du sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ yang na dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de slan chad gnas dben pa gcig tu stan gtsang ma
308b2(rgyud 'bum): bting ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs bgyis pa kha nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la nyams kyis ci 'byor pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba dag gis mchod nas/ a ka
308b3(rgyud 'bum): ru dang du ru ka 'ba' zhig bsreg par bgyi'o/ / rnal 'byor pa de 'bru phye dang 'o ma'i zas 'tshal nas snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gdugs gsum pa la thug pa'i bar bgyi'o// de slan chad
308b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i yo byad bshams pa'ang snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi'o/ / rnal 'byor pa de zas dkar gsum po 'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / 'bras chan 'ba' zhig 'tshal
308b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / byang chub kyi shing blangs nas gzugs de'i mdun du zhugs spar bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te du ru ka'i mar gyi nang du blangs nas
308b6(rgyud 'bum): gdugs gcig la dum bu gcig blangs te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas par gyur na/ de'i tshes chen po rnams rab tu g.yo bar gyur la/ de'i
308b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis sku gzugs bgyis pa de'ang rab tu g.yo zhing nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi kha nas sgra phyung nas rnal 'byor pa de la 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod
309a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'di ltar nan tan brtson 'grub kyis smon pa rnams yongs su gnyer bas bdag gis khyod kyi smon pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ / khyod 'di nas nam mkha' la 'phur te 'gro 'am/
309a2(rgyud 'bum): yang na khyod rgyu zhing 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa'am/ yang na drang srong rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po byed par gyur pa 'am/ yang na bdag ji lta ba bzhin du rang dbang thogs pa med pa nyid du bya'o// zhes bsngags pa brjod par
309a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshas bco lnga la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gdong bcu gcig pa de sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel dang
309a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang sdom pa yang dag par blangs te/ gdugs mtshan gcig la rab tu smyung bar bgyis nas su ma na'i me tog stong rtsa
309a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad blangs te/ me tog re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste/ thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na/ de'i tshe gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gdong gicig gi kha nas 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur la/
309a6(rgyud 'bum): de'i dbang gis sa chen po'ang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur bas/ rnal 'byor pas de'i tshe rang gi sems bde bar bzhag nas/ skrag cing 'jigs pa mi skyed par rig sngags dang smon cing sgrub pa gang lags pa 'ba'
309a7(rgyud 'bum): zhig rjes su dran par bgyis te 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nam
309b1(rgyud 'bum): zhig na sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi smon pa rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur zhes brjod par gyur na/ de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ji
309b2(rgyud 'bum): ltar smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur te/ smon pa rnams stsol ba'i tshe lha dang klu la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar chad dang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba la
309b3(rgyud 'bum): gza' zhugs pa'i tshe chab mar srang gcig blangs te dngul gyi snod kyi nang du stsal nas gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du bzhag ste/ sngags 'dis bzlas brjod bgyis na zla ba'ang snga mkho bzhin du skyab
309b4(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu gyur pas/ de nas blangs te 'tshal na lus kyi bro nad rnams mi 'byang ba gang yang ma mchis lags so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas ldong ros dang gi'u wang cha mnyam par bgyis te/ gzugs
309b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pa de'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab kyis spras nas dpral ba la thig le bgyis na don rnam pa gsum 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / sngar bstan pa bzhin du
309b6(rgyud 'bum): chab dron po dang sbyar te khrus bgyis na bgegs thams cad dang bro nad ma rungs pa thams cad bsal zhing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang gal te pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis g.yul 'phrog
309b7(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na/ spyan ci mar rtsi'i 'bras bu gcig blangs te sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas gzugs bgyis pa de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong la byugs te/ dgra'i phyogs su kha bstan na
310a1(rgyud 'bum): dgra'i dmag tshogs rnams drung du mchi bar mi 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang gal te yul phyogs su mi dang phyugs la rims nad byung bar gyur na/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i
310a2(rgyud 'bum): mdun du shing shug pa'i zhugs bus la/ gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te/ dum bu gcig blangs nas yungs 'bru'i mar gyis bskus te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas
310a3(rgyud 'bum): zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang skud pa dmar po la thag mdud pa bdun mdud de/ mdud pa lan re mdud cing sngags lan re bzlas nas nang gi gong
310a4(rgyud 'bum): namachis pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags na rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nad zhi nas sngags thag kyang 'grol bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang glo bur du mkha' 'gro ma
310a5(rgyud 'bum): n gadang 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin te bro 'tshal bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la sngags mdung nyi shu rtsa gcig mdung de sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa re re mdud nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan
310a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol la nad pa'i mgul du btags na bro nad sos par 'gyur lags so/ / gal te las kyi sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags te sos par ma gyur na sngags thag de
310a7(rgyud 'bum): blangs nas yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ snga ma'i gzugs kyi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol la nad pa'i mgul du btags na nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur ba lags so//
310b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gang la la zhig bro nad rgyun rings kyis btab nas sdug bsngal zhing sos bar ma gyur tam/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa khyim du zhugs par gyur na/ hun lug thang 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs
310b2(rgyud 'bum): te gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du 'brum bu re re blangs la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la sngags mdung
310b3(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa gcig mdung de sngags lam+ba ra bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te/ slar bkrol nas nad pa'i mgul
310b4(rgyud 'bum): du btags na bro nad rnams 'byang zhing gdon bgegs ma rungs pa rnams 'byer zhing 'gyes par 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang mi mdza' ba dag gis glags btsal bar gyur tam/ 'thab cing rjod
310b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang byang stems kyis gnod pa bgyis par gyur na/ me tog dang pog spos la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis gzugs bgyis pa de la mchod cing bi na ya ka'i gzugs kyi mdun du zhugs sngar nas 'un ti
310b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud
310b7(rgyud 'bum): pa re re mdud nas gzugs de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag bzhi lon te/ slar bkrol la skud pa de blangs te mi mdza' ba de'i ming nas brjod de mdud pa re re nas so so tha
311a1(rgyud 'bum): dad par sbas nas re re la'ang sngags lan re bzlas shing re re nas gtugs te thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na/ mi mdza' ba de dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal mi 'byor cing rang nyid skyabs
311a2(rgyud 'bum): su mchi bar 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang gang la la zhig legs pa'i dngos po 'grub par 'tshal na tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la sngags mdud brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa
311a3(rgyud 'bum): re mdud nas gzhan yang gzugs bgyis pa'i mdun du sngags lan bdun gyis btab ste/ byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol nas bdag nyid
311a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi lus la btags na smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang gang la la zhig sgrib pa'i bgegs dang ldan pas legs pa'i dngos po rnams phal cher smon pa yid
311a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur tama?/ bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po dag dus dus su rgyun ma chad par 'gyur na spos chab kyis gzugs bgyis pa de bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang chab la lan brgya
311a6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste bi na ya ka'i gzugs bkru bar bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang chab la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste rang nyid kyi lus la gtor na/ sgrib pa dang bgegs
311a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zhu byang nas smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smras pa
311b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'khor mang po thams cad kyis mthun par skyes bu chen po legs so legs so// sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di smras pas bdag cag kyang rjes su yi rang
311b2(rgyud 'bum): nizhing yongs su 'dzin par smon to zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ / de nas 'khor mang po thams cad dgrab mgu yi rangs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
311b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag byas te gyes par gyur to/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring

311b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug lag pa stong dang mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

311b7(rgyud 'bum): ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ khri de ni rin po che'i mchog sna tshogs rlo mas spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis yongs su brtsegs pa/ lha'i ba dan sbyangs pa ste/ de'i
312a1(rgyud 'bum): tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri nyid la bzhugs nas 'di snyam dgongs te/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs bshad gor ma chag snyam du
312a2(rgyud 'bum): dgongs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
312a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
312a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i spyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
312a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
312a6(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po rnam
312a7(rgyud 'bum): thos kyi sras sha stag dang thabs cig go/ / 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa gang dag gis nyan thos dag gis sa bcu spyad par gyur pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dang /
312b1(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dung la sogs pa tshangs rig kyi lha'i bu du ma dang / lha'i bus 'tsho la sogs pa lha'i bu du ma dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'phags skyes po la sogs pa du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang
312b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa du ma dang / klu'i rgyal po nus pa'i dra ba la sogs pa klu
312b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po du ma dang / lha'i bu mo gzhon nu'i mig la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dum dang / dgon pa'i lha du ma dang yang thabs cig go// 'bab chu dang / mtsho dang / mtsho bran dang / khron padang
312b4(rgyud 'bum): chu klung dang / chu klung chen po dang / sman dang / rtswa dang / shing gal ba dang / nags tshal dang / nags khrod dang / gtsug lag khang dang / khyim dang / chu dang / me dang
312b5(rgyud 'bum): rdul gyi ri dang / sa dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / mchod rten dang / dri gtsang khang la sogs pa na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang der 'dus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan
312b6(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor chen po de'i nang na 'dug pas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis mtshor bar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams khyab par snang bar byas shing
312b7(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang gser gyi kha dog lta bur byas so/ / lha dang / klu thams cad dang / lha mchog thams cad kyi khang pa dag kyang khrol zhes g.yos so//
313a1(rgyud 'bum): chu klung dang / chu klung chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / ri khor yug dang / ri bo ri rab dang / rdul gyi ri drang / ri nag po thams cad kyang shin tu g.yos so// zla ba dang
313a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma dang / rin po che dang / me dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar gyi 'od kyang mog por byas so// byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos ltas rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ ltas
313a3(rgyud 'bum): sngon ma mthong ba la the tshom skyes te/ de stan las langs te thal mo sbyar te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i ltas 'di sras bgyis zhes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas zhus
313a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ deng su byang chub yang dag mthar thug gyur// thams cad ldan pa'i 'od zer su yis btang // 'jig rten mgon po ci slad phyogs bcu yi// zhing rnams gser mchog 'dra bar gnas par gyur//
313a5(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum 'di ni ci slad tshig pa 'dra// deng 'dir su zhig gis ni dbang thob lags// sngon chad ma byung rdzu 'phrul stobs sus bstan// su yis 'dir ni zhing rnams g.yos par bgyis// ci slad lha dang
313a6(rgyud 'bum): klu rnams khyim 'khrugs shing / / gzhal med khang mchog dag kyang rab 'gul dang // thams cad skrag nas rnam par blta zhing mchis// ci yi slad du stong gsum g.yos pa dang // gang gis
313a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'dir the tshom skyes gyur de'i/ / rgyu dang su yi mthu lags ma 'tshal na// ci slad rdzu 'phrul mngon shes bstan bgyis pa// rgyal ba byams pa'i thugs can bka' stsal gsol// bcom
313b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod la sogs pa 'di ltar shes par gyis shig/ da ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub
313b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod de/ 'di ni bskal pa du ma nas 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang /
313b3(rgyud 'bum): thabs la mkhas pa bsgoms pas sgrub pa dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la nus pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la zhi ba dang bde bar 'dod pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po 'di phyung ngo //
313b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug stan las langs te gos legs par bgos nas/ sangs
313b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis gsang sngags snying ltar bzung ba mchis te/ sems
313b6(rgyud 'bum): can gyi khams thams cad kyis phan pa dang bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad dang / las lci ba rnams 'byung bar bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang mi khom pa rnams yongs su
313b7(rgyud 'bum): spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / 'jigs pa dang gnod pa tham
314a1(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su spang ba dang / mchog thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dade brjod par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rjes
314a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag la nges par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ k+She rigs kyi bu shin tu snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod/ sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir
314a3(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags gang brjod par 'dod pa 'di da ltar legs par khyod kyi dus la bab kyis myur du smros shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang rjes
314a4(rgyud 'bum): su thugs rang ngo / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'a phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa
314a5(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa du ma 'das par gyur pa na/ 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer stong gi rgyal po dag par gnas pa zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba'i bla ma des bdag la
314a6(rgyud 'bum): byams pas dran par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du thugs rje chen pos snying lta bu 'di yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi bzlog pa dang / rgyas par bshad de/ gser
