314a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag bdag gi mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad ces/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma bongs pa'i sdig pa can gyi dus kyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir/ snying
314b1(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'i gsang sngags 'di zung zhig ces bka' stsal to/ / bdag ni de'i tshe thog ma nyid dus dang po la gnas par gyur to// 'di ltar bdag gis gsang sngags 'di lan cig thos pas de nyid na gnas
314b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du sa brgyad pa nges par rtogs par gyur to/ / bdag gis de'i tshe snying la bab pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba thob nas/ de nyid du bdag gis smon lam 'di skad btab ste/ 'di ltar
314b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / zhi bar bgyid nus par 'gyur zhe na/ da nges par bdag gi lus la lag pa stong dang mig stong yongs su rdzogs par
314b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur cig ces bgyis pa dang / smon lam de skad btab ma thag tu de nyid na mchis bzhin du/ lag pa stong dang mig stong yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// phyogs bcu dag tus chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu
314b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yos so/ / phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'od zer stong stong bdag gi steng du bkye nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa snang bar gyur to// de slan
314b6(rgyud 'bum): tshachad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das du ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su yang dang yang du rnyed cing thos te/ de dag gi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di bzung ngo // yang dga' ba dang mgu ba du ma skyes par gyur
314b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis bskal pa du mar skye ba dang 'chi ba nges par rtogs par phyi mo thob par gyur to/ / de slan chad rtag tu brjod cing bzung ste bskyed par ma gyur to// gzungs sngags 'di bzung ba'i don bdag gang
315a1(rgyud 'bum): dang gang du skyes par rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las rdzus te skyes nas/ ma'i mngal du skye ba bzung bar ma gyur to// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
315a2(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la zhig brjod cing 'dzin par 'tshal ba des/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed
315a3(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / thog mar bdag brjod pa'i 'og tu smon lam chen po 'di skad gdab par bgyi ste/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par shes rab chen po'i
315a4(rgyud 'bum): ming thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par sems can yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
315a5(rgyud 'bum): snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par shes rab
315a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi grur zhugs par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras
315a7(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag tshul khrims kyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can
315b1(rgyud 'bum): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'dzeg par gyur cig/ bdun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur '
315b2(rgyud 'bum): dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig tu gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri de la
315b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba na/ ral gri'i ri de bsnyil zhing zhig par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag ma ma mur gyi nang du 'gro ba na/ me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du 'gro ba na
315b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gshin rdo'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba na/ yi dgas rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas
315b5(rgyud 'bum): su 'gro ba na/ de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su 'gro ba na/ de dag ye shes chen po'i de kho na rang thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar smon lam de skad btang nas/
315b6(rgyud 'bum): da pa dang ldan zhing sems kyis dran par bgyis la bdag gi ming brjod par bgyi'o// de nas yang bdag gi slob dpon 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rtag tu dran par bgyi'o// de nas
315b7(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'di brjod par rigs so/ / nub gcig la 'di lan lnga brjod na bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba stong phrag brgya dang / bye ba stong phrag bcu bsags pa rnams spong bar 'gyur/
316a1(rgyud 'bum): byang bar 'gyur ro// yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi thams cad snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di ji lta ba
316a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du brjod cing 'dzin na/ gal te de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i steng du phyag rkyong zhing 'di skad ces khyod gang du skye bar 'dod/ gang dang gang
316a3(rgyud 'bum): du smon lam btab pa der song zhig ces gsung ngo / / yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi 'am mi ma lags pa gang zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi
316a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin la/ de gal te ngan song gsum du lhung bar gyur na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/
316a5(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba ma thob na bdag sangs rgyas su ma gyur cig/ yang su zhig gis gsang
316a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ des ting nge 'dzin dang so so yang dag par rig pa du ma ma thob na bdag sangs rgyas su ma gyur cig/ yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ tshe gcig
316a7(rgyud 'bum): gis yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs na/ 'di snying rje chen po'i ring bzhin gyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i ming thob par mi 'gyur ro// su sdig pa bgying pa dang ma dang pa ni ma gtogs so//
316b1(rgyud 'bum): bung med su zhig bud med kyi chos la ming byung nas/ bdag skyes par gyur cig ces 'tshal te// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags pa ni 'di brjod cing bzung la/ de bud med kyi lus
316b2(rgyud 'bum): las ma gyur cing / skyes pa'i lus ma thob na bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te 'dzin par bgyid pas de la the tshom cung zad tsam zhig bgyis na/ gdon mi
316b3(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mi 'grub bo/ / gang gis dge 'dun gyi bza' ba dang / thug pa dang / nor dang babru phrogs sam/ chung gsan te/ gang la sangs rgyas stong
316b4(rgyud 'bum): gis bshags su gnang bas bshags su lags kyang bshags par ma gyur la/ gal te gsang sngags 'di brjod kyis/ sdig pa thams cad 'byung bar ma gyur na/ de'i slang du dge 'dun
316b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi rdzas ci spyad pa dang / chud gsan pa dang / phrogs pa des phyogs bcu dag na rab tu byung ba thams cad kyi so so'i mdun du mchis la bshags na/ de'i tshe de'i bshags par 'gyur ro// gal
316b6(rgyud 'bum): te de ltar gsang sngags 'di brjod par gyur na/ phyogs bcu dag tu gtogs pa'i rab tu byung ba'i 'dus pa rnams de la dbang yin no zhes smra zhing las thams cad kyang bshags par chud par 'gyur ro//
316b7(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa bcu po thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / dus ma lags par zas 'tshal ba dang /
317a1(rgyud 'bum): bslab pa nyams pa dang / mchod rten dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / dge 'dun gyi rdzas chud gzon pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag par gnas pa'i sems can
317a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi tshul khrims nyams par bgyid pa dang / de la sogs pa'i sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang the tshom 'tshal ba ni
317a3(rgyud 'bum): ma gtogs te/ de'i sdig pa chung ngu dang / las yang ba'ang 'byang bar mi 'gyur na/ shin tu lci ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba rnams byang bar ma gyur tu lags kyang /
317a4(rgyud 'bum): yun ring mo zhig na sangs rgyas kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro// yang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te mi'am mi ma lags pa zhig gis snying rje chen po'i
317a5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod par gyur na/ de skye ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga thob par 'gyur ro// gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga ni myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bco lnga gang zhe na/ dang po ni gang
317a6(rgyud 'bum): ltogs pas sdug bsngal te 'gum par mi bskur ba'o/ / gnyis pa ni gang chad pa ngan pas bcad pa'i tshor bas nyam thag pa'i gnod pa dag gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// gsum pa ni dgra dang /
317a7(rgyud 'bum): khan mchis po dang / phyir zlog pa rnams kyi dug dang / mtshon gyis 'gum par mi bskur ba'o// bzhi pa ni gang dmag gi gsul babyed par zhugs pa'i tshe 'gram par mi 'gyur ba'o// rdza na
317b1(rgyud 'bum): gang stag dang spyang ki la sogs pa gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis gsad pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/ / drug pa ni gang sbrul gdug pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / srog chags u tsi ling gas zin nas
317b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/ / bdun pa ni gang me dang chus 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// brgyad pa ni gang drug tu 'gyur 'tshal bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// dgu pa ni gang srog chags sna tshogs kyi dug gis
317b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/ / bcu pa ni gang rmongs pa dang / rnam par g.yengs pa dang / brjed pa dang / nyal bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu gcig pa ni gang ri dang / shing dang / g.yang
317b4(rgyud 'bum): sa dang / gad ba las lhung bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu gnyis pa ni gang byad kyis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu gsum pa ni gang dag lha g.yon can rnams dang / 'byung po sdig pa can
317b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis glags bltas pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o/ / bcu bzhi pa ni gang gsor mi rung ba'i nad rnams kyis btab nas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bco lnga pa ni gang bdag la bdag gsod pas 'gum
317b6(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ba ste/ gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin can te/ gang snying rje chen po'i ring bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de la/ gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
317b7(rgyud 'bum): ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga'ang thob par 'gyur te/ dang po ni gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po rnams dang phrang bar 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa ni gang 'i phags pa'i yul du skye ba thob
318a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba'o/ / gsum pa ni dus bzang po dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni gang rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// lnga pa ni gang
318a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang po mtha' dag tshang ba'i lus 'thob par 'gyur ba'o/ / drug pa ni gang dge ba'i phyogs la sems yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'o// bdun pa ni gang tshul khrims nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o//
318a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa ni gang gnyen bshes rnams dang bran g.yog rnams kyis bye brag shes shing mthun par 'gyur ba'o// dgu pa ni gang yo byad dang / nor dang / zas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ba'o//
318a4(rgyud 'bum): bcu pa ni gang gzhan gyis go 'phang bstod pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gcig pa ni gang nor dang yo byad mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gnyis pa ni gang
318a5(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa sems dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o/ / bcu gsum pa ni gang lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba'o// bcu bzhi pa ni gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
318a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnams mthong zhing chos kyang thob par 'gyur ba'o/ / bco lnga pa ni gang chos thos pa dang don zab mo shes rab kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ste/ gang la la zhig snying rje chen po'i ring bzhin gyi snying po 'di
318a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod cig 'dzin pa des gong du smos pa'i skye ba rnam pa bco lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / de'i slad du lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod cing bcang bar bgyi ste/ de la skyo ba bskyed par mi
318b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' ba phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshig de skad smras nas/ de'i rjes la 'khor mang po'i dbus de nyid du 'dus ste/ lag pa gnyis mnyam par thal
318b2(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar nas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin rgyas par byas nas/ rgyas pa chen po'i kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa thogs pa med pa snying rje chen po'i
318b3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyi snying po gzungs sngags chen po gzhi mdzes pa 'di smras so/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sAr+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM
318b4(rgyud 'bum): sarba ban d+ha nats+tsha dA na kA ra ya/ sarba pA ba sa mu drots+tshe ShaN ka ra ya/ sarba b+ha d+hi pra sha man ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu pa dra ba be nI sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu dUr NA ka rA ya/ ta s+ya na mas+thi tra/ I
318b5(rgyud 'bum): Ar+yas pa lo ki te shwa ra/ ta ba ni la kar+N+Na nA ma par mahri da ya/ mA brti yi Sh+ya mi sarba ar+tha sa d+han+na/ shu b+hA tse tan+daM/ sarba satwAnAM/ pA pa mArga sho d+ha na tad+ya thA/ a
318b6(rgyud 'bum): ba lo kit+ta/ lo ka ma ti/ lakA kA tA~M/ e h+ye hi ma hAn d+hisaH/ boHsaH/ h+ye ma hA bi hU~M saH/ he pri ya bod+hi sa/ nyi ma hA kaR+Sha NIka/ s+thA thaMd ma/ man+d+ran+da
318b7(rgyud 'bum): Ar+ya ba lo ka ta shwa rA sa/ par ma me tI u0f7frtikA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru karma/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya bi brA na da hi / me me raMg maM ga maM bi hi ga ma/ sid d+ha mo kI shwa ra/ du ku du zhum hA bI d+yen+ta/
319a1(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ra d+har d+hA raSh+TA~M shwa ra dz+wa la bi ma la nUH/ Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwarA/ kr-iSh+Na dzin dza Tas kuHa laM kr-i ta/ sha rI ra lam+ba phral lba ba bi lan+da/ mahA sid b+ha klung /
319a2(rgyud 'bum): d+hA d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma la ma la ma hA ma la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dzA la/ kr-iSh+Na k+Sha/ kr-iN+Dap+na sha/ nar+m+mi tAn/ he pad+ma has+ya/ dza ya ka rA/ ni shA tsa ra shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo ba
319a3(rgyud 'bum): bI ta/ a h+ye hi ma hA bI ra/ ma hA bar ma hA da ra ha mu kha/ tri pu ra ha ha ne shwa ra/ nA rA ya Na rU pa/ ba la ge ga d+hA ri/ he nI la kar+dz+dza/ a h+ye hi ma hA/ ha la ha la/ bi Sha ni rdzi ta lo ka s+yA
319a4(rgyud 'bum): rA ga bi Sha nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha bi nA sha na/ mo ha bi Sha bin+na sha na/ ni ni ri mo k+Sha Na hu lu hu lu/ mu n+ya muny+tsa/ mu hu mu hu/ ha lA ha la/ ma hA pad+mA na d+hI/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si rI/ su ru suru/
319a5(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha bu d+h+yaHbo d+ha ya bo d+ha yA mI/ ta ba nI lar+N+Na/ me h+yA hi bA mas+thi ta/ ma hA sing ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hAn+yAn+na nir+N+Ne de ne/ e h+ye hi D+ho b+ho ma hA/ sid d+ha mo
319a6(rgyud 'bum): shwa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ba tsa na sA s+thA ya/ sA d+h+ya sa/ bi d+yA na/ sma sma ra staM/ he b+ha ga bA na/ lo ki bi lo ka sti/ ta thA ga tA/ de hi dai hi me der sha naM/ kA mA s+ya dar sha naM/ pra sA d+ha ya ma
319a7(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ sid d+hA ya~M swA hA/ ma hA sadi d+hA ya swA hA/ sid d+ha yo gA shI ru yi swA hA/ nI la kar+N+Na ya swA hA/ ba rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ si hA mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA pa na ra sa hI mu kha ya swA hA/ badz+ra dastA
319b1(rgyud 'bum): ya swAhA/ ma hA badz+ra ha swa ya swAt+ma/ sId d+ha bad+hi d+ha rA ya swAhA/ ma hA sid d+ha bid+yA d+ha rA ya sAH/ pad+ma d+hastA ya swA hA/ mahA pad+mA hastA ya swAts+tsha/ kr-it+ta sa rbakr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bI tA sa swAH/ maH
319b2(rgyud 'bum): mums sa rba r+d+ha swA swAt+ma/ kA swa d+haR+Sha ma s+yAH/ shang la sha dz+ra ni nA dA na ka R+Sha ma swAHbo d+ha na ka rA sa hrIH/ bA mag+ni/ Ats+tsha sha~M kr-iSh+Tadza nA saSh+TAH/ rnam bAHkA u0f7f mamaNi y
319b3(rgyud 'bum): as+thAH/ lo kA swai rA ya swAhA/ ma hA la kai shwa rA ya sAt+ma/ sarba sid d+hed+ha shwa rA ya swAH/ rak+Sha rAk+Sha nA~M sAT+Ta/ ku ru rak+ShA rmAts+tshin+d+ra swAH/ na mo b+ha ga pa te/ nam sA myas pa lo ka
319b4(rgyud 'bum): shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+h+yan tum/ man+ta pa dA ni sne hA/ oM hrIHtrai lo kya ba~M dzi ya/ sa mo g+ha pA sha/ a pra ti ha ta hrIHha hUM phaT swAH/
319b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po 'di brjod nas sa chen po ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// 'gul lo// bur 'ur ro//
319b6(rgyud 'bum): pabar snang las rin po che dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char mngon par bab bo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad rjes su thugs rang ngo // bdud dang gzhan mu stegs thams cad
319b7(rgyud 'bum): sngangs skrag ste spu zing zhes byed par gyur to/ / 'khor de thams cad ni so sor 'bras bu thob ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
320a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ / kha cig ni sa dang po thob bo// kha cig ni sa gnyis pa/ kha cig ni sa gsum pa/ kha cig ni sa bzhi pa kha cig ni sa lnga pa nas/ kha
320a2(rgyud 'bum): cig ni sa bcu pa'i bar du thob bo/ / gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dpag tu med do// de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/
320a3(rgyud 'bum): gos legs par bgos nas/ gus pa'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpab pa phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// kye kye las mdzad pa chen po legs so//
320a4(rgyud 'bum): legs so// bdag kyang 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyur te/ bdag gis de dag tu chos kyi rnam grangs dang gzungs
320a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgo sna tshogs dag kyang thob na/ bdag gis snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi thogs pa med pa rgya chen po 'di mi thos kyis/ nga byang chub sems dngapa bi las mdzad pa chen po de'i
320a6(rgyud 'bum): lus dang / rtags dang / tshul dang / mtshan nyid nges par bshad du gsol// bdag la sogs pa 'khor chen po 'di thos par 'tshal zhing smos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
320a7(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye khyod kyis thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir dri ba 'di byas so// de
320b1(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig dang mdor cung zad cig kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ni snying rje chen po'i sems so// 'di ni mtshungs shing
320b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i sems so/ / 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi sems so// 'di ni chags shing zhen pa med pa'i sems so// 'di ni stong pa nyid du lta ba'i sems so// 'di ni bsti stang du byas shing gus pa'i sems
320b3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / 'di ni ma 'khrugs shing skyon med pa'i sems so// 'di ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ sems de dag la sogs pa ni snying po 'di'i mtshan nyid dang tshul yin par de ltar shes par bya'o//
320b4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar tshul 'dis spyad par bya'o// bsgom par bya'o// tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so// bdag la sogs pa 'khor 'dis snying po 'di'i tshul dang mtshan nyid deng slan chad ma 'tshal to//
320b5(rgyud 'bum): da slan chad ni blang ngo // mi bskyed par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpab pa phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
320b6(rgyud 'bum): la la zhig snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/ des byang chub kyi sems chen po yangs pa bskyang ba'o// de ltar yi dam bcas nas/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus gzung bar bya'o//
320b7(rgyud 'bum): zas dus dus su bza' ba dang tshul khrims dang ldan par bya'o// sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//
321a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsang mar gnas pas gnas par bya'o// khrus legs par bya'o// gos gtsang ma bgos la lha'i ba dan dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang /
321a2(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma la sogs pas mchod par bya'o// sems rtse gcig tu gzung bar bya'o// yang dag pa ma yin pa la brtag par mi bya'o zhes de skad ces brjod par bya'o// de ltar gzung bar bya'o//
321a3(rgyud 'bum): bon tang byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla bod dang / lha'i drang srong du ma'ang der 'gro ste/ dbang byed cing dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro// kho bos kyang
321a4(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe mig stong gis sgrub pa po de la blta'o/ / lag pa stong gis sba zhing bzung ngo // 'jig rten gyi mdo dang / yi ge rnams len cing 'dzin kyang nus par 'gyur ro// gzhan
321a5(rgyud 'bum): mu stegs can thams cad kyi chos dbang du bya ba dang / rig byed rnams kyang nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pas ni 'jig rten
321a6(rgyud 'bum): na 'byung pos phyung ba'i nad kyi rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gang su la byung yang rung sos par byed do/ / des zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i nad gang yang med do// yang 'byung po 'am lha rnams la'ang
321a7(rgyud 'bum): rgol ba'i mthu yod par 'gyur ro/ / bdud kyang pham par byed do// gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi phyogs lkugs par byed do// gal te ri la gnas pa 'am/ dgon pa na gnas pa gang zhig la
321b1(rgyud 'bum): ton byed dam/ bsam gtan byed pa la de na gnas pa sdig pa byed pa dang / bgegs byed pa dang / gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang 'byung po sna tshogs gang dag sems 'khrug par byed na/ snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas
321b2(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ / gang la la zhig tshul 'di bzhin du gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/ srog chags thams cad la snying rje bskyed par bya'o// de'i tshe kho bos kyang lha dang / klu'i rgyal po
321b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brangs la bsrung ba bgyis te phrad par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ / mig gi 'bras bu dang rang gi srog ji lta ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur ro//
321b4(rgyud 'bum): tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/ gang zhig dad pas snying po 'di// kha yis rtag tu 'dzin pa yi// sgrub pa po la dus kun tu// soms la srung ba gyis shig ces// khung du mig dang de bzhin du// stobs
321b5(rgyud 'bum): po che dang lu gu rgyud/ / lha yi dam pa lcags kyu dang // lag na rdo rje bsgo bar bya// kho bo'i snying po mchog 'di ni// dad pas rtag tu 'dzin pa yi// sgrub pa sdig dang bral ba la// khyed cag srungs shig smyoH
321b6(rgyud 'bum): shig ces/ / dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // nor gyi bu dang drag po dang // kum bi ra dang ser skya dang // de dag rnams la kho bo bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// gsang sngags 'di rjod 'dzin byed pas
321b7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang la mi g.yel bar/ / soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// lnga rtsen dang ni bde mchog dang // tsin dal dang su ma la// bingag la dang gshin rje la// kho bos lung gis bsgo bar
322a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// kho bo'i gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing // rtag brjod rig sngags 'chang ba la// bsam pa kyis shig srung bgyis// sgrub pa po la srungs shig ces/
322a2(rgyud 'bum): bden pa po dang so brtsegs dang // mi mjed bdag dang lha mo dpal// de dag kun la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig dad pas kho bo yi// gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing // rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba
322a3(rgyud 'bum): la/ / soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang // lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang // sum cu gsum dbang ro langs dang // mang po 'dzin la kho bos bsgo// kho bo'i rig sngag
322a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'chang la/ / soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// gnas lnga dag na gnas pa yi// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha rnams dang // yang dag shes dang nor bu bzang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig
322a5(rgyud 'bum): dad pas kho bo yi/ / gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing // rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shig srung bgyis shig ces// rgyal po rnam thos bu dang ni// 'brog ma bu dang bcas pa dang // yul
322a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor srung dang skyod byed dang / / mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes dang // skam byed gzhon nur gyur pa dang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dang ba yis// rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing /
322a7(rgyud 'bum): rjong byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// dgapa po nye dga' klu gnyis dang // stobs kyi lha dang rgya mtshe dang // drang srong nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo/
322b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing // rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// klu yi rgyal po ut+pal dang // 'phrul chen lto phye
322b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / lha min mi ci dri za dang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing // rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shing srung /
322b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyis shig ces// chu dang me yi lha rnams dang // sha za rnams dang glog dang sprin// grul bum dag dang maba' lding dang // de dag kun la kho bos bsgo// bde bar byed pa'i lha g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang
322b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa khyed thams cad dang / / de bzhin du lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rnams dang / lha dang / lha'i bu mo la sogs pa dang / gnod sbyin stobs dang ldan pa rnams kyang gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di
322b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byed pa de'i phyi bzhin du 'grongs shig/ gnod pa sol cig/ srung ba gyis shig/ gal te sngags pa mi zhig ri dang nags tshal stong pa thibs po dgan gcig pur grogs med par nyal na'ang /
322b6(rgyud 'bum): bde bar byed pa'i lha de dag rang gi 'khor dang bcas te srung bar byed do// yams kyi nad rnams dang bgegs rnams kyang zhi bar byed do// gal to ri khrod du lam stor bar gyur na gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod
322b7(rgyud 'bum): byas pa dang / bde bar byed pa'i lha dang klu'i rgyal po de dag mi'i gzugs kyis de la lam ston par byed do// gal te ri dang / nags dang / dgon par son la chu dang me med par gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de
323a1(rgyud 'bum): la bsrung ba'i phyir chu dang me ston par byed do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang rig sngags 'chang de la yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa
323a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhig cing bsal ba'i phyir zhi bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / gal te 'brog dang ri khrod rnams shig tu// stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan khro rnams dang // sbrul dang rtsangs pa dang ni mkha'
323a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma/ / 'ong yang 'di thos sngags mthus ldog par 'gyur// rgya mtsho chu klung mtsho bran 'gram gnas na// dug ldan sbrul dang sbrul 'dzin byed pa dang // chu srin gnod sbyin nye dang ku bi ra// 'ongs na'ang
323a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags thos na 'jigs par 'gyur/ / dmag dpung chen po'i dgra dang 'thab pa dang // nor 'phrog chom rkun rnams dang phreng na yang // dad pas rtse gcig sems dang byams pa yis// gsang sngags bzlas na
323a5(rgyud 'bum): sdig byed mi nus ldog/ rgyal po'i khrims can go rar bcug pa dang // btson rar lcags dang shing sgrog bcug na yang // dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na// rgyal po bdag nyid de la dga' bar 'gyur//
323a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te drug can nags sam khyim gang na// dug can zas yod der ni son gyur la// dad dang ldan pas gsang sngags mchog brjod na// dug rnams thams cad gyur nas bdud rtsir 'gyur// gal te bud med bus
323a7(rgyud 'bum): thogs mi byiphyin cing / / g.yon can bgegs kyis na bar byed na yang // dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na// 'byung po 'bros shing bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur// 'byung po sdang dang gnod sems
323b1(rgyud 'bum): klu rnams kyis/ / gsad pa'i ched du gnod pa byas na yang // dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na// tshe yang 'phel zhing nad rnams 'byang bar 'gyur// gal te 'byung pos sbyangs nad byas pa dang /
323b2(rgyud 'bum): bas bldags nad dang shu ba rnag khrag can// dad pas rtag tu gsang sngags 'di bzlas na// gsang sngags mthu yis thams cad med par 'gyur// sems can rab tu sdang bas gsad pa'i phyir// g.yo dang
323b3(rgyud 'bum): spu yi las rnams byed na yang / / dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na// de drung sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gro mi 'gyur// dam pa'i chos nyams sems can rnyog pa can// 'dod chags bcings shing log pas
323b4(rgyud 'bum): rmongs rnams dang / / nyin mtshan mi drang ma zhi rtog ldan zhing // khyo dang lhan cig mi dga' bud med rnams// gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pas 'byin nus te// 'dod chags ma zhi sems ni drang por
323b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / gal te snying po bdi yi mthu brjod na// bskal pa gcig gi mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur// tshon skud sna lnga pa la snying po 'di lan lnga bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la mgul du
323b6(rgyud 'bum): gdag so/ / snying po 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o// gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed la/ yongs
323b7(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de dag la/ myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o// gang dag sangs rgyas nyid du sems bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do// gang nyan thos kyi 'bras bu ma
324a1(rgyud 'bum): thob pa de dag kyang myur du thob par byed do/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sems
324a2(rgyud 'bum): skyed par byed do/ / gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dbang po rnams dad pa ma rnyed pa de dag kyang thob par byed do// snying po 'dib mthus theg pa chen po la thar pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gal te
324a3(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa zhig yod na'ang kho bo'i snying rje dang thabs la mkhas pas thams cad 'grub bo/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na sems can gang
324a4(rgyud 'bum): dag gnas pa rnams kyang / gal te snying po 'di thos na sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa de dag kyang sa bcu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi
324a5(rgyud 'bum): bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyang rang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// nas kyi sa pa can gyi sems na gang dag gis snying po 'di lan cig
324a6(rgyud 'bum): thos na/ drung ba che'i sems kyi thos mongs mos shing sbom por 'gyur ro// dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bani 'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thob bo// gal te de sbyar bzod na skyong gsum gyi stong chen popo 'jig rten
324a7(rgyud 'bum): khams kyi phyi nang na yod pa'i ri dang / rdo dang / rtsig pa dang / ri rab dang / ri khor yug rnams kyang g.yo zhing rdul phra rab bzhin du bya mar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'ang rol zhing 'thor bar 'gyur ro// gal
324b1(rgyud 'bum): te de dang de'i gam yon sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe 'di la dam par gyur pa de dag gis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshul
324b2(rgyud 'bum): khrims dang ldan par byas la/ snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi sdig pa'i las gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byung bar
324b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po pa 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha'i drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po thams
324b4(rgyud 'bum): cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mi 'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di kha ton byed pa de 'bab chu 'am rgya mtsho khrus byas na// de na srog chags gang dag 'khod pa la des reg pa de dag gi las shin tu lci ba thams
324b5(rgyud 'bum): cad babyang bar 'gyur/ tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / sgo nga las skye ba'i skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur na/ gang 'di
324b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / rjod pa dang / klog pa lta ci smos/ 'don cing rjod pa lta'ang ci smos/ rlung gang gis rig sngags 'chang la reg pa'i rlung des sems can gang la la la reg par gyur pa'i las lci ba thams cad 'byang bar
324b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yang dang yang ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung bar skye bar 'gyur ro// 'di ltar yang shes par bya ste/ gang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi
325a1(rgyud 'bum): khyab cing dpag tu med do/ / gang la la snying po 'di brjod pa de'i kha nas tshig dge ba'am mi dge ba ci byung yang rung ste/ de thams cad bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / srung ba'i lha dang
325a2(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / 'byung po rnams kyis yongs su dag pa'i chos su thob par 'gyur ro// su snying po 'di kha ton byed pa de la thams cad sangs rgyas su 'du shes skyed cing gus par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
325a3(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab snyed dag gis sdug par dgongs shing yongs su bzung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdzod du shes par bya'o/ / de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snang bas snang
325a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur bas/ lus 'od zer dang ldan par shes par bya'o// gang snying po 'dis sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa de snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du
325a5(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya'o/ / gang la ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams la lta ba de nam mkha'i snying po'i
325a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzod du shes par bya'o/ / gang la rtag tu lha dag dang lha rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de mi 'jigs pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang gi kha nas gzungs kyi sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa de gtam sna tshogs kyi mdzod du
325a7(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya'o/ / gang yams kyi nang rnam gsum dang dus ngan pas chud mi zod pa de rtag tu gnas pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang bdud dang gzhan mu stegs can gyis bar du gcod cing zlog mi nus pa de'i me'i
325b1(rgyud 'bum): sha'i mdzod ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par shes par bya'o/ / gang rtag tu snying po 'dis sems can thams cad gso bar byed pa de sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o// gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la 'byung ba
325b2(rgyud 'bum): de ni mngon par shes par bya ste/ de'i bsod nams kyi bsngags pa ni mtha' yas so// gal te rigs kyi bu mir gyur pa zhig yun ring po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing bde ba 'dod na/ des thog mar bas
325b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dben pa'i gnas btsal bar bya ste/ der 'dug par bya'o// gtsang mar mtshams legs par gcad par bya'o// gal te chu la bzlas brjod byas sam/ yang na zas sam/ thug pa'am/ sman nam
325b4(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa la so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te spyad na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ / mthu yod par 'gyur ro// mtshams gcod nus par 'gyur ro// rjes su mthun pa'i chos len pa 'am 'dzin nus par 'gyur
325b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la mtshams gcad pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ thog mar ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor gcad par bya'o// yang na chu gtsang ma la
325b6(rgyud 'bum): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya sa la/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ste/ 'di ni mtshams so// yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par
325b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yang na ji tsam 'dod pa sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o// yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mtshams gcad do// yang na tshon skud sna lnga pa la bzlas
326a1(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas la phyogs bzhir bres na thams cad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/ / cho ga 'dis len cing 'dzin nus par gyur na bdag nyid 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// sus snying po 'di'i
326a2(rgyud 'bum): ming thos pa de'i bskal pa du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur na/ su 'di rjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ gang zhig 'di rjod cing smra bar nus pa de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa du ma
326a3(rgyud 'bum): la mchod cing bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / gal te cho ga 'dis sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal la gnas pa thams cad gdon par byed nus par gyur na/ mi de ni snying rje chen po
326a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan zhing ring po mi thogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par rig par bya'o/ / rig sngags 'chang des sems can ji snyed mthong ba dang / sems can so so la brjod pa dang / de la gang dag gis thos pa'ang
326a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang de'i bsod nams dang dge ba'i mtha' ni brjod mi nus pas dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// gal te lus bsdams shing zas dus su za bar gnas la dge zhing drang po'i
326a6(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis brjod par nus na/ des de'i tshe sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ched du sngon gyi las rnams bshags par bya'o// bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du bshags par bya'o// gal te de ltar goms shing
326a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyun mi 'chad par snying po 'di brjod na/ des tshe 'di la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu pa ni thob par 'gyur/ dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan la blo skye bar 'gyur/ sa bcu'i 'bras bu
326b1(rgyud 'bum): thob pa la mi dka' bar gyur na/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu 'thob pa lta ci smos/ ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams de la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
326b2(rgyud 'bum): dbab 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying rje chen po dang smon lam chen po zab cing rgya che ba'i stobs kyis so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i mthu stobs rgya chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
326b3(rgyud 'bum): la bka' sru la pa/ kun dga' bo yul gang dang gang du yams kyi nad byung la/ yul der gal te rgyal pos chos kyis yul bsrung zhing rgya che ba dang gtsang mar bya na sems can rnams snyams las mi gcod do//
326b4(rgyud 'bum): nyes par byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o// rgyal po des lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus dang ldan par byas la/ zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na/ yul der yam
326b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi nad ci byung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / lo tog thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro// gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas
326b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa dang / mi yongs mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / der nad byung ba dang / chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang / der zla ba dang nyi ma lam drang por mi 'gro ba dang / gal te sdig pa'i las de
326b7(rgyud 'bum): snyed byung na rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas te/ gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de logs su bzhin bstan te gzhag go// shin tu dad pas bdug pa dang / me tog dang /
327a1(rgyud 'bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / zhal zas ro brgya pas mchod par bya'o// de nas rgyal po des snying po 'di brjod pa'i phyir nyin zhag bdun du brtson 'grus
327a2(rgyud 'bum): brtan por gnas par byas na/ sa ris so sor dgra thams cad de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// rang rang gi yul la dga' bar 'gyur// sems mthun par 'gyur/ phan tshun grogs su 'gyur/ mi yongs dang
327a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bu thams cad kyang byas pa gzo zhing legs par byed par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro// lha dang klu rnams kyang yul srung bar byed do// char yang dus
327a4(rgyud 'bum): su 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / 'bras bu dang lo tog rnams kyang mang zhing grung bar 'gyur ro// yul na gnas pa rnams kyang bde ba dang yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// gal te khyim gcig tu nad dang gnod pa sna tshogs
327a5(rgyud 'bum): byung ngam/ bdud dang 'byung po g.yon can gnas pa 'khrugs shing smras 'am/ skur pa 'debs sam/ gnod pa dag byung ngam/ phyi nang gi mi mthun pa chen po 'am chung ngu dag byung na/ de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs
327a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug lag pa stong pa dang mig stong dang ldan pa de'i mdun du mchod pa byas la/ shin tu dad pas snying po 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/ gong du smos pa'i gnod pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
327a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ ji ltar blang bar bgyi/ ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ kun dga' bo snying po
327b1(rgyud 'bum): ba di'i ming ni mang du yod de/ gcig ni rgya cher dri ma med pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// snying rje chen po thogs pa med pa zhes kyang bya'o// sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob pa zhes kyang bya'o// tshe 'phel bar byed pa
327b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes kyang bya'o/ / ngan 'gro'i lem rnams par 'jig pa zhes kyang bya'o// las kyi sgrib pa 'joms pa zhes kyang bya'o// bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya'o// sems kyi rjes su mthun par
327b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang ba zhes kyang bya'o/ / sa gong mar myur du nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya ste/ kun dga' bo de ltar zung zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//
327b4(rgyud 'bum): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang snying po drang po 'di ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di mo ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
327b5(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/ / mdo 'dzin pa zhes kyang bya'o// 'od zer dang / mig dang / lag pa stong yod pa zhes kyang bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
327b6(rgyud 'bum): phyug de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ni dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ / 'di ni 'das pa'i bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i snga logs su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos snang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom
327b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das zhes bya'o/ / de ni snying rje chen po dang smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / mi mjed
328a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / klu'i 'khor dang / khyed thams cad kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig/ de la brnyas par ma byed cig/ lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag
328a2(rgyud 'bum): tu mchod pa gyis shig/ ming yang rjod cig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba skye zhing sdig pa du ma'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
328a3(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// su nor bu dang / 'bru dang / rin po che dang / yo byad
328a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa des yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su nad sna tshogs kyis btab ste/ nad med par 'dod pa des don yod pa'i zhag pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te
328a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dug par bya'o/ / su lto na pa des rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te bsam par bya'o// su 'byung po rnams dang bgegs byed pa'i lha la sogs pa gdul bar 'dod pa des rin po che'i ral gri thog pa'i lag pa
328a6(rgyud 'bum): lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud 'dul bar 'dod pa des rdo rje thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su dgra tshar gcod par 'dod pa des rdo rje can gyi gtun shing
328a7(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su thams cad du 'jigs par gyur te bde ba ma thob pa des mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su mig na zhing mthong ba nyams pa
328b1(rgyud 'bum): des nor bu rin po che me shel thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su tsha ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang dug 'thungs pa des nor bu rin po che chu shel thogs pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o// su bdag po
328b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / rnyed pa dang / go ba phang 'dod pa des rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag pa la bsam par bya'o// su grogs po sdug pa myur du phrad par 'dod pa des rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag pa la dmigs par bya'o//
328b3(rgyud 'bum): su lus la nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa des me tog gi snye ma thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su lus la las kyi sgrib pa'i sdig pa rnams zad par 'dod pa des rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i
328b4(rgyud 'bum): lag pa la blta bar bya'o/ / su nye du dang / gnyen 'dab dang / bu dang / chung ma rnams dang sems mthun par 'dod pa des ril ba bing gar thogs pa'i lag pa la blta bar bya'o// su stag dang / spyang ki dang //
328b5(rgyud 'bum): gcan gzan ma rungs pa spong bar 'dod pa des phub thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su phyogs thams cad du dbang phyug rnams kyis glags lta ba yongs su spong bar 'dod pa des dgra sta
328b6(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bkol bar 'dod pa des sor mo la ri thogs pa'i phyag rgyab leg pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su bsod nams dang dge ba sna
328b7(rgyud 'bum): chogs byed mi nus pa des pad+ma dkar po thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'jug par bya'o/ / su sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'dod pa des pad+ma sngon po thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su ye shes
329a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po thob par 'dod pa des rin po che'i me long thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa des pad+ma thogs pa'i lag pa la
329a2(rgyud 'bum): bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su sa'i 'og gi gter rnams thob par 'dod pa nges rin po che'i za ma tog thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su drang srong gi lam tshol bar 'dod pa des tshon sna lnga'i sprin thogs pa'i
329a3(rgyud 'bum): lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su tshangs rig kyi lha'i nang du skye bar 'dod pa des ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su lha'i nang du skye bar 'dod pa des me'i mdog lta bu'i pad+ma thogs
329a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su yul gzhan gyi dgra phyir phyogs par 'dod pa nges rin po che'i mdung rtse gsum thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su lha dag dang / lha dang / yongs
329a5(rgyud 'bum): su skyong ba thams cad dgug par 'dod pa des dung thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su lha rnams dang 'byung po rnams la bsgo nga byed par 'dod pa des khri'i zur shing lta bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas
329a6(rgyud 'bum): te 'dug par bya'o/ / su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis myur du lung bstan par 'dod pa des bgrang ba'i nor bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su skad snyan
329a7(rgyud 'bum): cing tshangs pa'i sgra lta bu 'dod pa des rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su dogs pa thams cad dag par 'dod pa dang / lce bde ba dang / mkhas par 'dod pa des phyag rgya
329b1(rgyud 'bum): rin po che thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / rgyal po rnams kyis yongs su srung bar 'dod pa des lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o//
329b2(rgyud 'bum): su sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rjes khyab par 'dod pa des 'khar gsil thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su sems can thams cad kyis bsti stang bya ba dang dran par 'dod pa des thal mo
329b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su tshe rabs tshe rabs su sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa des sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bstas te 'dug par bya'o// su skye zhing skye ba na sangs
329b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rgyal po'i gnas dang khang bzangs su skye zhing / ma'i mngal du mi skye bar 'dod pa des sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su mang du nyan pa dang mang du slob par 'dod pa nges
329b5(rgyud 'bum): glegs pa ma thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su che 'di nas bzung ste sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du yid mi ldog par 'dod pa nges 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o// su mi 'jig
329b6(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa sbyin pa rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba tshim par 'dod pas mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams myur du byon te/ phyag gis mgo la
329b7(rgyud 'bum): nyug cing lung ston par 'dod pa des mgo la sangs rgyas sprul pa bzhugs pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / su 'bru dang 'bras bu la sogs pa btab cing bskyed pa rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar 'dod
330a1(rgyud 'bum): pa des rgun gyi snye ma thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o/ / de la sogs pa 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams rnam pa stong du rig par bya ste/ mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no//
330a2(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis snying po 'di ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur bar dge ba'i sems kyis zung zhig/ long
330a3(rgyud 'bum): zhig/ rgyas par ston cig/ de ltar na snying po 'di don chen po byed pa yin no// khams gsum na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i lus la nad gang dag yod pa de gal te gsang sngags 'dis gso bar byed na/ nang
330a4(rgyud 'bum): med par mi 'gyur ba de gang yang med do/ / snying po 'dis shing skam po la bzlas brjod byas na de la yal ga dang / me tog gi snyem dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur na/ sems yod pa'i
330a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can bde bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ 'di la the tshom za bar mi bya'o// kun dga' bo snying po 'di'i mthu stobs ni brtag par mi nus shing bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bas na yon tan rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin to//
330a6(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi dus dag na dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pas ni ming yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci smos/ khyod la sogs pa'i 'khor chen po 'di dang / lha dang / klu dang / mi rnams kyis snying po 'di la rjes su yi rang bar
330a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gang gis thos la spong ba des ni gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// su zhig snying po 'di la the tshom skyed cing yid mi ches
330b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mo de ni/ yun ring po nas rnyed pa las rab tu nyams nas bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du ngan 'gro rnams su 'khyab par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba mi 'thob pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mi mthong
330b2(rgyud 'bum): pab dang / chos mi thos pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rnams mi mthong bar shes par bya'o// de nas lag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor chen po de dang / brgya byin
330b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / 'byung po gnas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas thams cad rab tu dga' ste/
330b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis rig sngags de srung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras so// sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo//
330b5(rgyud 'bum): dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo// gsum la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// sus tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod na/ de sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// bgegs byed pa bdud dang mi phrad par 'gyur ro//
330b6(rgyud 'bum): yams kyi nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig la dus gsum du brjod cing / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshe rabs gzhan na gzugs dang ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro//
330b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyis rig sngags 'chang de srung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras so// sha ma ta te tu su te/ a dz+nyA ba te/ u tu te/ shaMwi
331a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ pa rma n+ya te/ a tu Te/ ku la ta te/ khi ma Te swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di ni zhal nas gsungs pa'o// gsang sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas brjod byas la/ tshon sna bdun
331a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i skud pas bcing ba bya ste/ gsang sngags 'chang gang du na bar gyur pa der bcing bar bya'o// gsang sngags 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs te/ bdag gis kyang
331a3(rgyud 'bum): da rig sngags 'chang rnams srung ba'i phyir smras so/ / bgegs dang yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar byed do// sdig pa thams cad dang nad thams cad byang bar byed do// 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral
331a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dge ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo spyan ras gzigs
331a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gis smras pa'i gsang sngags 'di ni de bzhin no/ / ma nor ba de bzhin no// don yod pa'o// su byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs par 'dod pa des gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
331a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas te bsregs na/ byang chub sems dpa' der 'ong bar 'gyur ro// su zhig byi la'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na byi la'i mgo rus blangs te bsregs la/ sa gtsang ma dang thal ba zhib mo dang
331a7(rgyud 'bum): bsres te chus sbrus la byi la'i gzugs byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du ur mo'i ral gril lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ ral gri nges byi la'i gzugs de brgya rtsa brgyad du
331b1(rgyud 'bum): gtubs la dum bu re re la'ang lan re ba zlas brjod byas shing ming nas kyang brjod na/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du mi ldang po// su zhig ha la ha la'i dug zos na des gu gul gyi bdug pa dang ga pur cha bsnyams te khron
331b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chu lhag mar ma gyur pa dang / bskol ba khyor gang tsam lus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na dug las sos par 'gyur ro//
331b3(rgyud 'bum): su zhig sbrul dang srog chags u tsi ling gas zin par gyur na/ lga phye la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te rma khar btab na sos par 'gyur ro// su zhig sdig pa'i 'chi ba dang skur pa 'debs pas mi gzhan la
331b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe na/ des sa gtsang ma 'am/ bag phye ba ma/ spra tshil las de'i gzungs byas la/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du ur mo'i ril gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad dus gcig tu bzlas brjod
331b5(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ snying po brjod la dum bur gtubs te/ de'i ming nas brjod cing lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dga' bar 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mdza' bar 'gyur ro// su zhig mig nyams te sdongs
331b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bar du gyur pa dang / su zhig mig gi 'bras bu'i steng du ling thog byung ba dang / mig ru skyes te mi mthong bar gyur pa des a ru ra gcig dang / ba ru ra gcig dang / skyu ru ra gcig zhib tu btags la sbrang rtsi dkar
331b7(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / khye'u nu ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya ste/ sbyor ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing / bu gsar du btsas pa'i bud med dang / khyi dang / phag gis ma mthong bar byas la ril bur byas te/
332a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ gnas dben pa rlung mi 'ong bar 'dug ste/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du sman de ma'i 'o ma dang
332a2(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang brdar ba mig tu blugs na/ mig gi 'bras bu skye'o// ling thog med par 'gyur zhing legs par mthong bar 'gyur ro// su grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa'i ched du stag lpags sam/ gzig
332a3(rgyud 'bum): lpags sam/ dred lpags sam/ dom lpags sam/ spyang lpags la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa la bskon na rims sos par 'gyur ro// seng ge'i pags
332a4(rgyud 'bum): pab ni thams cad kyi mchog go/ / gal te sbrul gyis zin na mi de nyid kyi sgra bcad la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ dug gi rma khar bzhag na sos par 'gyur ro// su zhig snying na zhing mi dran nam 'chi 'dod
332a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur na/ shing sle ma ta ka'i theng chu star ka tsam chu gtsang ma dang bskol te phyed du ba dang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la 'thungs na thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro// bud med kyis bskol bar mi bya'o// su
332a6(rgyud 'bum): zhig 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin tam/ mi ma yin pas btab pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur na/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te snar blugs so// yang na ri bong gi rtug pa
332a7(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyi ril bur byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bza'a'o/ / sha dang / chang dang / sgog pa dang / 'thab mo spang ngo // 'on tang sos par 'gyur ro// yang na ldong ros dang / yungs
332b1(rgyud 'bum): kar dang / lan tshwa dkar po bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ nad pa'i mal gyi 'og nas bdugs na/ nad gtong ba'i 'byung po myur du 'bros te/ lus 'jig cing der 'dug mi nus par
332b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gal te gzhogs phyed na'am/ gzhogs phyed nyams sam/ rna ba 'o na nam/ rkang lag 'gul mi nus par gyur na/ til mar gyi nang du ru rta btsos la/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bskus
332b3(rgyud 'bum): na sos par 'gyur ro/ / yang na ba mar gcig pu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bskus na sos par 'gyur ro// bud med la la zhig bu 'byung shin tu dka' na/ til mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
332b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te/ lto ba 'am lte bar bskus na myur du 'byung ngo // gang gi mngal du bu 'tshon shing a ba marga srang gcig chu khyodar do'i nang du bskol la phyed lus pa dang / de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te 'thung
332b5(rgyud 'bum): na/ gnod pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sha mo mi 'byung na'ang sman de la bzlas brjod bya'o// la la zhig shi la thug pa tsam du snying na ste brnags mi bzod na/ du ru ka dang dbyi mo cha bsnyams te bsres la lan
332b6(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te so la bsku zhing mid la skyugs skyugs kyi bar du byas na sos par 'gyur ro/ / sgog pa rnam dgu dang / sha dang / chang spang bar bya'o// mes tshig na ba nag mo'i lci ba dron mo la lan
332b7(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ rma khar glan na sos par 'gyur ro// la la zhig srog chags ring po snying la za na/ rta dkar po'i gcin khyod phyed la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na
333a1(rgyud 'bum): srog chags de 'byung ngo / / gal te na tshabs chen khyor gang 'thungs na srog chags thag pa srid 'byung ngo // gal te 'bras drag po byung na rams kyi lo ma brdungs te khu ba btsir la de la
333a2(rgyud 'bum): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas te rma khar gtor na rtsa ba dang bcas te 'byung ngo / / la la zhig mig la sbrang bus zos par gyur na/ bong bu'i rtug pa gsar du byung ba btsir te/ khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa
333a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu bzlas brjod byas te/ dgongs su nyal ka ra mig tu blugs na sos par 'gyur ro// la la zhig lto ba na na khron pa'i chu lhag mar ma gyur pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i nang du lan
333a4(rgyud 'bum): tshwa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la btab ste/ khyor phyed 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro// su'i mig la mig nag chags sam/ rab rib bam/ rtsa dmar bar gyur na/ shing sham
333a5(rgyud 'bum): mya ka'i lo ma btsir te/ de'i khu ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la nang du 'gron bu bcug ste/ zhag gcig bzhag la nang par yang lan bdun bzlas brjod bus te mig tu blugs na phan no// su zhig mtshan mo
333a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs shing mi bde la skrag na/ skud pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bslus brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la mgul du btags na 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// las rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur ro//
333a7(rgyud 'bum): zhig tu glo bur du gnod pa dag byung na/ bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma sor gnyis kyi tshad du gtubs pa stong rtsa brgyad byas la/ bamar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi snod gcig tu blugs pa drung du bzhag ste/ lcug ma'i
333b1(rgyud 'bum): dum bu gcig blangs la lan cig bsngags te/ rtse mo gnyis mar du bsnyugs la sreg go// de bzhin du lcug ma'i dum bu thams cad bsreg na/ yams kyi nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro// las 'di ni sangs
333b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya'o/ / shu dag dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ dpung pa g.yas par thogs na 'thab mo'am/ 'gyed pa'i tshe rgyal bar 'gyur ro// shing sham mya ka'i lo ma dang
333b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa sor gnyis kyi tshad du gtubs la cho ga gong ma bzhin du sbyin sreg bya'o/ / nyi ma gcig la dus gsum du lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// gal te nyi ma bdun du de bzhin byas na dngos grub 'thob bo//
333b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa'i lam yang skye'o// gal te 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po las rgyal bar 'dod na lung tang gi shing la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas brjod byas la ba mar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang sbyin sreg byas te/ byang
333b5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i mdun du bya'o/ / glang dkar po'i gau'u wang srang gcig mthing bu'i snod du bcug la/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ yan lag rnams bskus la dpral
333b6(rgyud 'bum): bar thig le byas na/ 'byung po dang mi thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang dag nyes byung ste lcags sgrog dang shing sgrog tu bcug na/ phug ron gyi rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te lag pa la'ang
333b7(rgyud 'bum): bsku'o/ / lcags sgrog dang shing sgrog la'ang reg par byas na thar par 'gyur ro// gal te khyo shug me dang chu ltar mi mthun par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du ngur pa'i mjug sgro la lan
334a1(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te lus la thogs na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dum par 'gyur ro/ / gal te srog chags dag lo tog phung bar byed na/ thal ba gtsang ma'am bye ma gtsang ma la lan
334a2(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ me tog kun tu ga tor na/ srog chags rnams phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// gal te srog chags dag shing thog la za na tshul bzlas brjod byas te shing rnams la gtor na
334a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu la mi za'o/ / de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
334a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag tshe rabs snga ma'i bsod nams kyi rgyus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la khyod sems can gyi khams thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed nas/ bcing ba dang 'jigs pa thams cad gcod nus par 'gyur
334a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ de'i mthus sems can thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar 'gyur/ zhi ba dang bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan par gyur to// ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha mar gyur pa na rigs kyi
334a6(rgyud 'bum): du'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig snying po chos kyi sgo 'di nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum 'dzin nus na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'grub par 'gyur
334a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi bka' drin dran par 'gyi ste/ grong khyer ram/ grong ngam/ grong rdal lam/ nags tshal gang na rig sngags 'chang gnas pa la/ gal te den gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams 'tsha
334b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu der mchi zhing kun tu bsrung bar bgyi ste yongs su spong bar mi bgyid do// de'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
334b2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la sems can phal cher rnyog pa can du 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zhing rtag par rgyun du dge ba'i
334b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bgyid mi nus pa dang / gal te 'dzin na'ang de'i tshe lha dang 'byung po 'tshe bar 'gyur bas/ bdag gis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / bde ba dang /
334b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar bgyid pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis gzungs 'di'i cho ga da bshad par bgyi'o// bdag gis kyang 'das pa'i bskal pa du mar gzungs 'di la
334b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bgyis so/ / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa rnams kyis kyang gzungs 'di la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed
334b6(rgyud 'bum): chub brnyes so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag tu gzungs 'di 'dzin cing 'chang na/ de'i tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi rgyun thogs pa med par 'gyur/ dbang po rno zhing mkhas par 'gyur/ spobs
334b7(rgyud 'bum): pabamyur bar 'gyur/ lha dang mi thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// gang su'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / grags pabang thos shing bde ba dang dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro//
335a1(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang du skyes par yang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun yang mthong bar 'gyur/ tshig la'ang yid ches shing yid rton par 'gyur ro// de'ang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
335a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnams kyi mthu lags par bgyi yo/ bdag nyid kyi ni ma lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod nas/ legs so//
335a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'ang byin te/ khyod ni lha dang mi la sogs pa la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / zhi bas las kyi lam la sbyor bar nus so// gal te yun ring por phyir mi ldog pa lta na/ da ngas ye shes kyi phyag rgyas gdab
335a4(rgyud 'bum): bo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa bdag ri gru 'dzin la gnas shing /
335a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i bskal pa du mar gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi sgo 'di brjod do// de'i tshe bdud der mchis te/ bdud des 'khor bsdus nas/ ci nas kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di mo 'grub par bdag gi chos
335a6(rgyud 'bum): de la mtho btsam par brtsams pa dang / de'i tshe bdag gise gsang sngags kyi chos de'i cho gas bdud pham par bgyis/ rnam par pham par bgyis so// gsang sngags 'di'i mthu ni brtag mi
335a7(rgyud 'bum): nus shing bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'a phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes
335b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di smras so/ / na maHsarba dzA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sitwA ya/
335b2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma brIp+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ye/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi bu la/ bi man supr-i tiSh+Tha ta/ oM sau g+hA ya/ sU r+ya sha ta sa ha sr-im r
335b3(rgyud 'bum): e ka/ pra b+hA a ba b+hI sa ta mUrta ye/ ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Da la/ a laM kA ra d+hA ri Ne/ b+ha ga ba te/ pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka a pa sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha mu kha sa mU be sha/ a b+haSh+pa sarba satwA pa
335b4(rgyud 'bum): ri mo tsa kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hA ra b+hu ba swA hA/ ma hA a lo ka ka ra Na ta me sti mi ra pa Ta la nA sha ka rA ga dwe Sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/ sha sa ka/ sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/ rak+Sha ka/ sarba a pA ya durga
335b5(rgyud 'bum): ti pra sha ma na ka ra/ sarba satwA sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/ sarba sA shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ sa ma pa dA na ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwA ba ra pad+ma A lo ka saM b+hu ta ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ dza nA ma ku TA/
335b6(rgyud 'bum): a lang kr-i Ta/ shi ro ma Ni ka na~M ka/ rA dza ta badz+re bai DUr+Ya a lang kri te/ shi rI ra a mi tA b+hAHni ka ma la/ a lang kri ti pra b+ha ra NA ra dza na sha ta sa ha sra a b+hi la Shi tA kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hA satwa sa ba ra ba ra /
335b7(rgyud 'bum): d+hi d+ha ma bi d+ham/ bin+da sha ya/ ban+deg sa/ ma tha lan tra/ kle sha kaSh+Ta ta/ a ba bi d+ha bi bi d+ha sa// sangs ra tsar ka/ bra ma tha na kar/ pra mra bad+da/ su ru brtag/ pra mu sA gar
336a1(rgyud 'bum): pu ru Sha sid hA/ bI ra bA ra dza su daHta ba ri br-i ti/ d+ha ma d+ham/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra sha sa ya pra sha sa ya/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ bi bi ri bi bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ si ri si ri
336a2(rgyud 'bum): su ru su ru/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi d+hi ri d+hi b+hi d+hi ri/ bi ri di ri/ mu ru muru/ mu kha mu kha/ mU ya mu ya/ mur+Na muny+tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hun bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya gA ya/ gA ya gA ya
336a3(rgyud 'bum): ga d+ha ya ga d+ha ya/ sa ha sa ha/ pra sa ha pra sa ha/ nan bi ba~M d+ha kle shi bA sa na/ nan bi bi d+ha kl-i shi bA sa nA/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra sa ha ra/ d+hu ru tu d+hu ru tu/ ma hA maN+Da la sha ta pra se ka/ a ba b+hA
336a4(rgyud 'bum): si ta bi bi d+ha bA sa na sha me ka/ sha sa ka/ rak+Sha ka/ ma hA bo d+hi sa ta ba ra ba ra da swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma'i phyag gi rgyan gyi yu ba zhes bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
336a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das lha dang / klu dang / mi'am ci du mas yongs su bskor bas/ rdo rje chen po dang ldan zhing dga' ba'i rgyu las byung ba'i khang bzangs su thams cad kyis mchog gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du
336a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ sgrib pa'i ri chen po rnam par 'joms pa'o// gang la la zhig gis mnyan pa dang / blta ba dang / bklag pa dang / brjod pa thob na/ mi de'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ji snyed mchis pa thams
336a7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / su zhig dad par gus pas snga dro brjod na/ byang chub sems dpa' ba phagra pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba bgyid do// gang ci 'tshal ba dag
336b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang de bzhin du 'grub bo/ / su zhig gal te bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par thob par 'tshal ba des gcig pu phyogs dben par mchis la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
336b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing / gzhan bsam par mi bgyi bar/ gzungs sngags 'di lan bdun brjod na/ yid la bsams pa gang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de gang yang ma mchis so// sems can
336b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu rjes su mngon du dran na/ bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad
336b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong du tshang ba'i bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gar skye gar skyes kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/
336b5(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// su zhig snyim pa spos kyis bkang ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gtor la/ gzungs sngags 'di'ang lan bdun brjod
336b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ stong gi bsod nams kyi mchog dang / snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yang ba thob bo// de mi'i 'jig rten 'dir yang stobs chen po yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob bo// su zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
336b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi gdong du lta zhing / gzungs sngags 'di brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa' mtshan rgyas pa mthong nas/ sa dri ma med pa'ang 'thob bo// 'jig rten na'ang snang ba bgyid do// tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas
337a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mthong ngo / / ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur mchis par 'gyur ro// gAr skye gar skyes kyang sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//
337a2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// su zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa des/ tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba la bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad bzung ste/ gos gtsang ma bgos la ring bsrel
337a3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ der me tog sna tshogs gtor bar bgyi/ bdug pas kyang bdug par bgyi/
337a4(rgyud 'bum): mar me'ang bud par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o// de'i tshe gzungs sngags 'di'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
337a5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor der 'dug ste/ mtshams med pa la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rnams kyang yongs su dag
337a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang 'thob bo// 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyang 'thob bo// sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te char dbab par 'tshal na gyen
337a7(rgyud 'bum): du nam mkha' la bltas la gzungs sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na char 'bab bo/ / gal te sa la bltas te gzungs sngags brjod na/ sa bon thams cad rnam pa brgyar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
337b1(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'bab chu bskams pa'i shul lam/ 'bab chu chen po 'am/ 'bab chu'i dngo'am/ mtsho 'am/ mtshe'u 'am/ mtsho bran gyi 'gram du mchis te brjod na/ chu thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
337b2(rgyud 'bum): nad thams cad kyi don du gzungs sngags brjod de lag pas bya bas na sos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nyams pa'i mo'i mdun du brjod na dran pa slar 'thob par 'gyur ro// bru bas nyen pa'am sgom pas nyen pa'i me'i
337b3(rgyud 'bum): gdong du bltas te brjod na/ bkres pa'am skom pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams gcad par 'tshal na/ des mtshe'u chu'i nang du zhugs te der mchis la/ gzungs sngags 'di yi ger bris te/ rgyal
337b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ dpag tshad brgyar mtshams gcad par 'gyur ro// der nyes pa rnams mi 'byung ngo // mtshams kun tu srung ba rdzogs so// / da ni lus thams cad
337b5(rgyud 'bum): bsdu ba'i phyag rgya brjod par bgyi'o/ / lus drang por 'greng ste/ rkang pa nye bar mnyam du gzhi bas la/ rkang pa g.yas pa yid tsam bskums te/ lag pa g.yas pa thur du brkyang / gung mo dang srin lags nyis lag
337b6(rgyud 'bum): mthil du dgug/ badzub mo dang / mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung brkyang la lag gathil ba kan te gzhag go// lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyi'o// lag pa gnyis ka'i gung mo bkug la lag pa phrag pa dang mnyam
337b7(rgyud 'bum): par gzhag go/ / lag mthil ni mdun du bstan te gzhag go// 'di ni lus bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang po'o// // su zhig bdud dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / dgra rnams pham par bgyi ba dang /
338a1(rgyud 'bum): lam dang po la gnas par 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs 'di'ang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo kau te shwa rA ya/ bo d+ha sitwA ya/
338a2(rgyud 'bum): / ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a ba d+he ba ra ba d+he/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ gang gong du phyag rgya ji skad smos pa de bzhin du lus gnas par bgyis la/ snying khar thal mo sbyar te/ sor mo thams cad
338a3(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun thangad kar bsnol la/ g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa rnams la 'khyud par bgyi/ mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng la rtse mo gnyis sprad do// mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshogs dang
338a4(rgyud 'bum): po la reg par bgyi'o/ / lag mthil ni ma 'byar bar bgyi'o// 'di ni gzungs thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste gnyis pa'o// / bskal pa du mar tshe rabs su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba tham
338a5(rgyud 'bum): cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe phyi ma la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub brnyes par mdzad par brtsams pa'i tshe bdud kyis/
338a6(rgyud 'bum): mtho btsams pa na/ phyag rgya 'dis btul te/ de'i tshe zhi ba'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'ang brnyes par gyur to// gzungs sngags 'di bang brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ sarba d+hA
338a7(rgyud 'bum): ra ni/ maN+Da lA ya/ e h+ye hi pa ra ma shud d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ yang thog mar lag pa g.yas pa 'byin pa ltar bgyis la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ mgo bor thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis
338b1(rgyud 'bum): bkug ste rtse mo sprad/ mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis pa la sbyar ro// 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ rnam par grol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro//
338b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni phyag rgya gsum pa'o// // sngon de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mthun par bsgoms te/ de'i tshe bsam gtan rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par grol ba bsnyes
338b3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / yang 'di ni gzhan te 'greng la rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gzhib bo// lag pa'i gung mo dang / srin lag dang / mthe'u chung rgyab sbyar te sen mo phrad par bgyi/ mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rtse mo phrad par
338b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshogs gnyis pa la reg par bgyi/ lag mthil nang nas so bcu tsam gyis bkyed la smin mtshams su gzugs so// 'di ni mig stong gi phyag rgya ste bzhi pa'o// /
338b5(rgyud 'bum): gal te phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs sngags brjod na/ skad cig de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dkrigs pa bye ba phrag stong mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag rig sngags
338b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang de dag lhan cig spyod cing grogs su gyur pa ni zhing re re na'ang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs pa bye ba phrag pa bum dang / bzhi stong nyi shu mchis so// gang dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa des ni blta bar
338b7(rgyud 'bum): mi rigs te/ phyag rgya de'i chos nyid do// su la rigs she na/ gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid la'o// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi sbyin pa ye shes kyis rtogs par 'tshal ba thams cad
339a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / gzungs sngags ni 'di legs te/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+ya sarba tsak+ShuHkA rA ya d+hA NIn drA ya swA hA/ yang 'greng la rkang pa mnyam par gzhibs te/ lag pa g.yas
339a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bkan la sor mo lnga gzhibs te brkyang la/ lag pa g.yon pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis te bkan la lag pa g.yas pa'i rgyab la sbyar te snying khar gzhag go// 'di ni lag pa stong thams cad bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ste lnga
339a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud dang dgra mchis pa rnams thul lo// gzungs sngags 'di lags te/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba duSh+Ta sa
339a4(rgyud 'bum): ha ya me swA hA/ yang bgreng ste rting pa phrad par bgyis la/ lag pa g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis la/ lag mthil bdag logs su bstan par bgyi'o// 'di ni ting
339a5(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ste drug pa'o/ / / 'dis ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// phyag
339a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya 'dis ni thams cad kyang 'thob bo/ / gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags snga ma/ na maHsarba dzA/ zhes bgyi ba lags so// yang 'greng la rkang pa nye bar gzhibs te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis
339a7(rgyud 'bum): mthe bo'i sen mo mnan to/ / g.yas pa'ang de bzhin te mthe'u chung dang gung mo rnams rtse mo sprad la/ lag rting dang por bsrang ste/ dgug pa ni mdzub mo gnyis dgug go/ slar btang na ni brkyang ngo // de
339b1(rgyud 'bum): ltar mchis la sngags brjod par bgyi'o/ / lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gnyis ni dgug go// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo gnyis ni slar gtang ngo // mgo'i thon 'khor g.yas nas bskor bar bgyi ste bong nga'o//
339b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas ni bsal ba ltar bgyis te slar gtang ngo // phyag rgya 'dis ni lha dang klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad bsdu ba'i slad du dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste bdun pa'o// / gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/
339b3(rgyud 'bum): oM sarba de pa na ga a na la swA hA/ phyag rgya snga ma la rtse mo bkyed de/ lag rting gnyis sbyar ba las yid tsam gzung mdzub mos g.yab ste snga ma bzhin no// 'di ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa chos mnyan pa'i slad du
339b4(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste brgyad pa'o/ / / gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/ oM ma hA brah+ma ye/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di dang gsang sngags 'di ni gzungs sngags dang / phyag rgya dang /
339b5(rgyud 'bum): / chos kyi sgo du ma gzung ba'i slad du bsdu ba'o// nyi ma spyang kis zin pa dang / zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe/ ba mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ phyag rgya 'dis phyag rgyas btab la 'thungs na
339b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang po rno bar 'gyur ro/ / nyin gcig bzhin du chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa khri lobs nus par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di dang chos kyi sgo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa'
339b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ched du gsungs pa'o/ / yang 'greng ste rkang pa nye bar gzhi bas la/ lag pa thal mo sbyar te snying khar bzhag la mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bkug ste/ rtsa ba'i
340a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags chen po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang rang gi nor bu yid bzhin lta bu'i phyag rgya ste dgu pa'o// / 'dis nges
340a2(rgyud 'bum): par lha'i gzhal med khang rnams su 'jug go/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su'ang mchi'o// mchod pa'i don du rin po che brgya stong dag kyang bsams pa bzhin rnyed par 'gyur ro// su zhig chos
340a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgo 'di'i las bgyid nus na/ de nang par sngar langs la khrus bgyi zhing kha gdong bkrus te/ phyag rgya de'i dam tshig gagyis na/ des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du
