340a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa du mar tshe rabs su bstsags pa'i sgrib pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa ni rab tu mang ngo // yang snga ma bzhin
340a5(rgyud 'bum): du thal mo sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo'i sen mo la bcar te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo'ang phan tshun du rgyu ba sprad la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
340a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi sems la 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu pa'o/ / // ci 'tshal ba de bzhin du 'grub bo// nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// yang
340a7(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar ba las mthe bong dang mdzub mo so sor brkyang ste lag mthil dbye bar bgyi'o/ / 'di ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bdag la stsal ba ste/
340b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dis bdag byang chub kyi lam rab tu rtogs so// 'dis rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu gcig pa'o//
340b2(rgyud 'bum): yang thal mo snga ma las mdzub mo gnyis bskum zhing brkyang bas bskul bar bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams 'thob pa'i phyag rgya
340b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu gnyis pa'o/ / / gzungs sngags ni 'di lags te/ oM sarba bud+d+ha sa ma sa de h+ye hi par ma shud d+ha satwa swA hA/ da ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong
340b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa/ lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa'i cho ga brjod par bgyi'o// thog mar ri rnams dang nye bas gzhi bkra shis pa'i phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o// der sa brkos te gseg ma dang /
340b5(rgyud 'bum): gyo mo dang / rus pa dang / mi gtsang ba rnams bsal la/ dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci ba dang 'jim par bsres te byug par bgyi'o// der chu zheng du khru bcu drug pa'i stegs bu bgyi'o// 'phang du ni mtho gang gi
340b6(rgyud 'bum): tshad du bgyis la sgo bzhi gtod de/ shar gyi sgor ni yul 'khor srung / lha'i sgor ni 'phags skyes po'o// nub kyi sgor ni mog mi bzang / byang gi sgor ni rnam thos kyi sras te/ de dag gi gam yor rang rang gi 'kho
340b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bri'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pa// lag pa stong dang ldan pa gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i mdun du khri'u
341a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag ste/ khri'u'i steng du gzungs sngags kyi cho ga gnag par bgyi'o// de la bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug go// me tog sna tshogs bkram mo// lha bshos sna tshogs dbab bo// der
341a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa de rnams gzhag ste/ sgrog pa rnam dgu dang / sha dang / chang mi dbab bo// gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi na nyin gcig bzhin mchod pa thams cad kyang gsar pa gzhan gyis brje'o// cho ga
341a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dngos po thams cad kyis mchod par bgyi'o/ / sgrub pa po gang dag sngon mthong ba de dag gis bri bar bgyi'o// de sgrub pa po shar phyogs su bltas te 'greng la/ bzungs
341a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags snga ma dang po nas bcu gnyis kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi mthar phyin gyi bar du skyo bar mi bgyi'o// thog mar phyag rgya dang po lan cig bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par
341a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / bcu gnyis pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin du bgyi'o// der de'i tshe phyir mi ldog pa brtan po'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o// cho ga 'dis de bzhin du dgug pa bgyis na thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sangs rgyas
341a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi ched du nges par drang po'i sems kyis drang por mchis par bgyi'o/ / gsang sngags dang lha thams cad rjes su dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar na mdun na mig lam na gnas pa lta bu dang phan tshun gnod pa bgyid pa ma mchis
341a7(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / dmigs pa gzhan la dmigs par mi bgyi'o// de'i tshe rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan stong brgyad cu bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'on tang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun dga' bo'i gzugs
341b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis der mchis te/ sgrub pa po la ci 'dod ci slong zhes 'dri zhing phan tshun smra bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa pos bdag nyid kyis mchod pa bgyi bar bsams la/ bdag la ji skad dris pa lan gdab par bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang
341b2(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ / yang na 'di skad du 'di ni lung bstan pa'i dus lags pa snyam bgyid na/ thugs rje dang ldan pas bdag la nges
341b3(rgyud 'bum): par thugs rje chen po skyed du gsol/ bdag ni rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa mi 'tshal gyi/ nam zhig na sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du ltar ba dang yongs su skyob par 'gyur snyam du sems so// /
341b4(rgyud 'bum): yang 'byung po gnyug mar gnas pa thams cad bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur cig snyam du sems so zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal te yid la bsams pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na gzhan la mi brjod
341b5(rgyud 'bum): par bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / gal te cho ga 'di grub na bzlas par bgyi/ gcig tu gzung bar bgyi'o// 'di ni bslab pa gcig tu gsang ba'o// su zhig sna tshogs 'tshal ba des a ka ru nag po'i cha ba
341b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya bcu pa'ang bcing bar bgyi'o// 'on tang
341b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal ba yongs su rdzogs par rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe glegs bam 'di bzhin du sems shing / su zhig 'di bzhin du mchod pa bgyid na gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs
342a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / / yang cho ga gzhan te su zhig bde ba thams cad thob par 'tshal ba des/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'i phyag rgya dgu pa bcings la rtsa ba'i gsang
342a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / til nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mer bsregs na ci 'tshal ba bzhin du 'grub bo// ci nas rgyal po dga' bar bgyi 'tshal na des rgyal po gnas pa na mchis
342a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i shing las lcug ma blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis la/ rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba der bor na dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te sems can sdig pa can rnams dang / dgra rnams tshar gcod
342a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'tshal na des shing ni ma ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mer bsregs na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / yang cho ga gzhan te lha dang 'byung po ma dul ba de'i slad du/ gu gul dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa
342a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mer bsregs na/ 'byung po thams cad bdag nyid tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// gang du nad byung na chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis te/ der ba mar la lan brgya rtsa
342a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la mer bsregs na nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / mar de nyid las nyung zhig nad pa la blud na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sngon yul ko bi nar nad byung ste/ nad pa rnams gdugs gcig gnyis bro
342a7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas gum mo/ / de'i tshe dbus kyi yul gyi mi bden gyur ces bgyi ba der mchis te/ des gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga bgyis nas bsgrags pa dang nad chad do// 'byung po'i rgyal po'ang yul de nas byung
342b1(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i stobs 'tshal te/ gang du rang gi 'khor du pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba der thog ma'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bcings la bcangs la/ gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
342b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyis na/ dgra bo chom rkun rnams bdag nyid mi rung bar 'gyur ro// su zhig tshe zad pa des 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi/ nyin gcig bzhin mchod par bgyi/ a ka ru
342b3(rgyud 'bum): nag po'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi zhing / gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na de tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// bud med gang zhig bu mi phyin na ba mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/
342b4(rgyud 'bum): de la blud na zhi ba dang bde bar 'gyur ro// gang bskyed pa'i bu dang bu mo dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo bzang po sngon gyi bsod nams rnams kyis brgyan cing / sems can rnams
342b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / mir skyes pa na rtag tu mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing bde ba mchog rnams myong bar 'gyur ro// su zhig mig na ba des mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gzungs sngag thams
342b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi phyag rgyas mig la phyag rgyas btab na sos par 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar steng gi phyogs kyi lha bde ba myong ba rnams mthong ba de lta bu'i mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// da ni ri mo bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/
342b7(rgyud 'bum): ri mo bri ba'i ched du ras dkar po bgyis la/ byang chub sems dpa' mdog 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser lta bu bri bar bgyi'o// lag pa stong dang ldan par bgyi'o// lag pa so so'i lag mthil na mig re re
343a1(rgyud 'bum): mchis par bgyi ste/ sbyin ma mchis pa'i tshon gyis bri bar bgyi'o// tshon rtsi'ang ka bidi tha dad bsre bar bgyi'o// mgo la rin po che sna bdun gyi cod pan bri bar bya'o// yan lag dang nying
343a2(rgyud 'bum): lag rnams su rgyan gyis brgyan par bri bar bya'o/ / yang na ras la byang chub sems dpa' srid du khru gang ba bris te/ lag pa gnyis bri bar bgyi'o// gong du smos pa'i lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya lnga pas//
343a3(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang gis mchod pa bgyi'o// gal te lag pa dang mig stong dang ldan par ma gyur na dpral bar mig gcig bgyi'o// yang 'di ni cho ga gzhan te/ su zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mchod par 'tshal na/
343a4(rgyud 'bum): thog mar ras la bri bar bya'o// de ni 'di ltar bri bar bgyi ste/ cho ga snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// de nas ri mo mkhan bsla pa brgyad bzung ba cha ga khung sar mchis te/ slar log nas legs par
343a5(rgyud 'bum): bkrus pa gtsang mas bri bar bgyi'o/ / tshon rtsi rung bas cho ga bzhin bris la/ de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchis te/ der sbyang ba bgyis la nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod pa'i las rgya cher bgyis na
343a6(rgyud 'bum): de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong ste/ de la the tshom mi bgyi'o// smad kyis zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu'i 'od kyang bgyid do// gang dge ba dang dang pas mi bgyid pa des ni ma gtogs so//
343a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga bo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs byung ba'i tshe'ang bdag gis bdud 'dul ba'i lus mig stong dang ldan pa sprul pa'o// mig re re las kyang sangs rgyas
343b1(rgyud 'bum): re sprul te/ de dag ni bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong 'byung ba lags so// lag pa stong las lag pa re re labang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re re sprul to// de dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong
343b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba lags so/ / bdud 'dul ba'i tshogs kyi nang na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni thams cad kyi mchog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
343b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / ngas gsang sngags 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyas par bshad na/ bskal pa 'das kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras
343b4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das las gsang sngags 'di thos nas rab tu dga' ste yi rang nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs sngags 'di brjod do// na mo rat+na rash+mi
343b5(rgyud 'bum): / tsan+d+ra a laM kA ra mArga ta dza pu N+ya tsak+Shu bo ShA ya rA dza ya ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rat+na rat+na/ ta ta sha rat+na/ rat+na pra ti ma te/ rat+na pra b+hA rat+na da ka te swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
343b6(rgyud 'bum): phyug gis gzungs sngags 'di brjod nas/ de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la thug gi bar du rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu
343b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yos so/ / 'og min gyi lha'i ris na dbang phyug chen po'ang mi bde bar gyur to// lha'i gnas der 'jigs pa chen po'ang byung ngo // ngan song du gyur pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po rnyed do zhes sgra chen
344a1(rgyud 'bum): po 'byin cing / phar 'bros tshur 'bros te gar song mi shes so// de'i tshe sprul pas ngan song du gyur pa'i 'khor chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te gsang sngags 'di las 'da'
344a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing bgras par byed na mgo bo rdul phra rab bzhin du 'gyes so/ / gsang sngags 'di'i mthus ni ri 'thor ro// rgya mtsho chen po skems so// lha ma yin gyi dmag pham par bgyid do// 'byung po rnams tshar gcod do//
344a3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa can gyi mi rnams kyang tshar gcod do// nad chen po dag kyang chad par bgyid do// yul bsrungs par yang 'gyur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyang phyag 'tshal lo// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig
344a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de'i gzi brjid dang stobs yun thung ngus bshad par mi nus so/ / gzungs sngags 'di 'chang zhing rjod pa ni dpa' bar 'gyur ro// phyug pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang /
344a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du rgyal po byams par 'gyur ro// ci 'tshal ba thams cad 'grub bo// su zhig bdud pham par bgyid par 'tshal ba des bdug pa gtsang ma la rtsa ba'i
344a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / su zhig 'di snyam du bdag la sems can thams cad byams par 'tshal ba des/ so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te 'chos na byams
344a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / su zhig bdag gi tshig thogs pa med par 'gyur bar 'tshal ba des/ shu dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi sa la snying khar bskus na 'grub bo// las de dag 'a 'ang rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
344b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod do/ / phyag rgya'ang bcing bar bgyi'o// lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar la mthe bong gnyis brgyung ngo // phyag rgya 'di ni ji ltar bdag bsrung ba de bzhin du gzhan yang srung ngo // mtshams gcad pa'ang bgyi'o//
344b2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig tu mchin chab bam thal ba lag par blangs te lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis la/ bdag gi steng du gtor na phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par yang 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la
344b3(rgyud 'bum): la zhig 'byung po rnams sam/ bgegs dang / log 'dren rnams kyis mtho btsams par gyur na/ bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dal gyis gzhus na sos par
344b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i so so'i rig pa'i phyag rgya thogs pa med pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// / gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha d+harmA saM g+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba
344b5(rgyud 'bum): lo ki tai shwa rA s+ya bo d+hi satwA s+ya/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ bo d+hi satwA s+ya tad+ya thA/ d+hu pi d+hu pi/ kA ya d+hu bi/ pra sha ma ni swA hA/ log par lta ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar nus so// su zhig dus gsum
344b6(rgyud 'bum): du gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa re re brjod pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// bud med du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//
344b7(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis de'i spyi bor phyag
345a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhag ste/ 'di skad du bu ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs so// 'dir skyes nas dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dir 'byung po rnams
345a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo / / 'greng ste lag pa g.yon pa gru mo bkug pa drang por brkyang ste/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bgyi/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug la sor mo
345a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhis mnan te/ khu tshur 'di rna ba g.yas pa'i gong du bzhag la mdzub mo bskul bar bgyi'o// brkyang bar bgyi'o// bskum par bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'di ni stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
345a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las rnams 'byang bar bgyi ba'i slad du smras pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / / phyag rgya 'di ni nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun bdun brjod na/ mtshams med
345a5(rgyud 'bum): pa lnga po dag dang / rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang 'byung bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyes na/ las kyi rtsa ba thams cad tshig par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe tshe 'di 'dor
345a6(rgyud 'bum): ban sangs rgyas dang phrad par 'gyur ro/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dpag tu med cing mi zad pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur ro// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur
345a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / lus la ltas rnam pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus la gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // mig nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce nad mi 'byung ngo // phyi dang nang gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/
345b1(rgyud 'bum): ro// sngon gyi las mi dge ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gal te char mi 'bab na til nag po la e raN+Da'i mar gyis smras te ril bur bgyis la/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te mtshe'ur srul na de'i
345b2(rgyud 'bum): mod la char 'bab bo/ / gal te char ches na yungs kar gyi mar gyis sna ma'i me tog sbrus la ril bur bgyis te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la mtshe'ur stsa lan char 'chad par 'gyur ro// sor mo
345b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga phan tshun bsnol te g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa'i sor mo rnams dam du 'khyud la mgo bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'di ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
345b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten du bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ste bco lnga pa'o/ / / phyag rgya 'dis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du sbyar bar bgyi/ gdugs nyi shu rtsa dgu'i bar du tsan ngan dkar po'i
345b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dag gus dkyil 'khor byug/ me tog gtsang ma dgram mo// de'i tshe khrus bgyis la gos gtsang ma bgos te/ a ka ru nag pos bdug par bgyi'o// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
345b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyi'o/ / 'di ni ngar snyems pa bgyi'o// de nas yungs kar dang til nag po lhan cig btags la/ pho sum gang tsam la lan gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhugs su dor ro// de ltar gdugs
345b7(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig cing / yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na ci 'tshal ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'greng la rkang pa mnyam par nye bar gzhibs te/ lag pa
346a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa thur du thams cad brkyang la bkan te pus mo'i steng du gzhag/ lag pa g.yon pa'ang de bzhin du bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa stsol ba'i phyag rgya ste bcu drug
346a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / phyag rgya 'di ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcings la/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs
346a3(rgyud 'bum): pa stsal bar 'gyur ro/ / yang na shu ti'i sa bon dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / nye'u shing dang / 'di deg sangs rgyas kyi spyan lnga 'am/ bla gab med pa'i phyogs su sbyin sreg bgyi'o// gsang
346a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags lan sum cu gnyis bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / me tog dang bdug pas mchod par bgyi'o// 'di ni gsang sngags kyi cho ga lags te/ ci rtsom pa thams cad de bzhin du 'grub bo// gsang sngags gang mi 'grub
346a5(rgyud 'bum): nagasang sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub bo/ / rmi lam mthong bar 'tshal na gsang sngags 'dibang brjod cing / phyag rgya 'di'ang bcings na ci 'tshal ba rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mi bsod nams dang
346a6(rgyud 'bum): mi ldan pa gang zhig dngos grub mi thob na/ gsang sngags 'di gdugs bdun gyi bar du gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ ci 'tshal ba de bzhin du 'grub bo// de'i tshe yang byang
346a7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho chen po'i ning du klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i khang par 'dug ste chos bshad do/ / der klu sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dag mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te/ gal te yongs su skyob pa zhig yod na/ sdug bsngal
346b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi gnod pa rnams las thar par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / de'i tshe der klu'i bu mo chos 'dod pa zhig gis rin po che 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed gcig ri ba gcig phul ba dang / des kyang sdug bsngal tham cad yongs su thar par
346b2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i chos bshad do/ / de'i tshe de'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chu'i snying pos kun tu srung ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'di smras so// bi ma le ma hI ba ma le/ oM ha raM ma hA o ha re/ hu me re ma hA hu ma re
346b3(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di 'dzin nA/ de gar mchi bar bdud kyi 'khor gyis sdug bsngal bar bgyid pa'i bar du bdag gis rtag tu kun tu bsrung bar bgyis
346b4(rgyud 'bum): gang la la zhig glo bur du 'jigs par gyur tam/ rang gi yul lam/ gzhan gyi yul lam/ chom rkun dang phyir rgol ba dag byung na des tshon skud sna lnga pa bcing bar bgyi ste/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor
346b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ mdud pa re re zhing yang gsang sngags lan re re bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa g.yon pa la bcing bar bgyi'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs
346b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ mthe bos de dag mnan/ mthe'u chung brkyang ste dgra logs su bstan la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dbab mig stong dang ldan pa'i kun tu
346b7(rgyud 'bum): srung ba'i phyag rgya ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / / gsang sngags lan bcu bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ dgra thams cad ldog par 'gyur zhing / gnod par bgyid mi nus so// de'i tshe yang
347a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' gangs kyi ri la gnas te chos kyang 'chad do/ / der gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyi yul na sems can rnams phan tshun za zhing / de dag la dge ba'i sems
347a2(rgyud 'bum): med par mthong nas/ byang chub sems dngapa 'a 'di snyam du nam zhig na 'dul bar 'gyur snyam nas de'i tshe der song ste/ yul der de dag gi don gyi phyir lag pa stong dang ldan zhing mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus
347a3(rgyud 'bum): sprul nas des bdud rnams pham par byas so/ / der gzungs sngags 'di'ang smras so// de nas srin po'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i gan du song ste/ las de bshags nas phyag byas so//
347a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpas kyang phyag rgya bcu bdun gyis phyag rgyas btab pa dang / de'i mod la byang chub kyi lam thob bo// 'greng ste rkang pa phan tshun nye bar gzhibs la snying khar thal mo sbyar te
347a5(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung phan tshun bsnol la/ g.yon pas g.yas pa la 'khyud par bgyi/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
347a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya yongs su rdzogs pa ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / / yid la bsam pa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro// su zhig ngan 'gro drug po dag gi sems
347a7(rgyud 'bum): can rnams skyob par 'tshal ba des 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ sor mo bcu rtse sprad la lag rting dbye/ sor mo'i bar yang sor gnyis gnyis tsam gyis ma phrad par bgyi'o//
347b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams yongs su thar par bgyid cing / 'gro ba drug po dag tu zhugs pa dang 'dra bar rig par bgyi ste/ phyag rgya de'i cho ga'o// yang
347b2(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa g.yon pa pus mo'i steng du lag mthil bkan te gzhag par bgyi'o/ / g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis la/ lag mthil pus mo'i steng du kha sbub ste gzhag par
347b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dam tshig yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgya ste bcu dgu pa'o// // 'di ni rang
347b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis 'gog pa dang mtshungs te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyag rgya 'di gcig pus sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyas so// phyag rgya 'dis las mi dge ba thams cad
347b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te sgrub pa po skyil mo krung bcas te mchis pa la chos rnams mngon du gda' bar ma gyur na/ gdugs bdun gyi bar du dben pa'i phyogs kyi gnas su phyag rgya 'dis
347b6(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di brjod la shin tu dad pas sangs rgyas la phyag bgyi zhing / gdugs mtshan drug tu las rnams so sor bshags na/ de'i tshe chos mdun du gda' bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams
347b7(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / yang lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs la g.yas pa'i sor mo bzhis g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs te/ cung zhig mchis
348a1(rgyud 'bum): la g.yas pa'i mdzub mos g.yab bo/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' pa phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i rnam pa rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste
348a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu nga'o/ / / gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/ oM ku Te ku Te/ ba ku re tsi le tsi li/ tsi li le swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di dang phyag rgya 'di ni lhag par rgya che ba'o// rigs
348a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig ci rtsom pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal na/ gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ yid la ci bsams pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur
348a4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / su zhig gdugs gcig bzhin du goms par bgyid na las rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems mi bskyed do// rmi lam bzang po dpal du 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi
348a5(rgyud 'bum): shing drung na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du mthong zhing / byang chub tu lung ston par rmi bar 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro// yang
348a6(rgyud 'bum): bgreng ste rkang pa phan tshun bsnyen la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug ste/ sor mo bzhis khu tshur bcangs la snying khar gzhag/ g.yas pa'ang de bzhin bgyis la
348a7(rgyud 'bum): rna ba g.yas pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ mdzub mos g.yab bo// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'a' phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lha dang klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad po dag dgug
348b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / gsang sngags ni 'di lags te/ na mo na gin+d+ha/ na nong dra ba na swAhA/ na mo ni rje la swAhA/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'am/
348b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyag rgya 'di dang gsang sngags 'di 'dzin tam/ 'don tam/ klog pa tshe rabs bdun dran par 'gyur ro// sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro// dug kyang
348b3(rgyud 'bum): gdug par mi 'gyur ro/ / lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so// rgyal po'i ched pas 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // bskal pa mang por sems can dmyal bar mi mchi'o// sdug bsngal nyams
348b4(rgyud 'bum): su mi myong ngo / / gang brjod par 'byung po rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig lhags te/ gsang sngags 'di nyan par 'gyur ro// gang gi drung du 'byung po mchi ba der skud pa dkar po gdags par bgyi ste/
348b5(rgyud 'bum): mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bor la/ mdung pa re re la'ang lan re bzlas brjod bgyis te mgul du btags na bde bar 'gyur ro// gal te yul du yams kyi nad byung ste sems can mang du 'gum
348b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal nas pad+ma dag blangs la/ pad+ma re re la'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ bsregs par bgyis na yams kyi nad 'chad par 'gyur ro//
348b7(rgyud 'bum): yang skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong dang gung mo rtse mo sprad do// lag mthil bkan la pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag/ g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis la
349a1(rgyud 'bum): pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha phub ste gzhag go/ / sor mo gzhan brkyang la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'di ni byang chub sems

349a3(rgyud 'bum): las dag bgyis pa sdig pa re re'i phyir yang / dper na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa'i rdul gyi rdul phra rab mtha' dag re re'i bskal par sems can dmyal bar mchi 'tshal la/ 'byung ba ni nges par mchis
349a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur na/ des de'i tshe ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nyal zas mi 'tshal bar phyag rgya 'di bcings la/ gsang sngags 'di'ang lan brgya rtsa

361b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i gzungs bzlas na/ / 'dod pa'i ma zhi log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur// bdag gis gzungs 'di'i mthu stobs rgyas brjod na// bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug yod
361b6(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur/ / rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas te tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi mdud nas mgul du gdags par bya'o// gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
361b7(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rnal 'byor pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug mngon par bsgrub pa yongs su ma
362a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang chub sems ma bskyed pa dag myur du byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang / nyan thos kyi gang zag
362a2(rgyud 'bum): gang dag 'bras bu mngon du ma byas pa de dag myur du mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na drang srong gang dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa
362a3(rgyud 'bum): ngag myur du sems bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can gang dag theg pa chen po 'di la dad pa'i dbang po ma thob pa dag gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus theg pa chen po'i sa bon dang
362a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi myu gu 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin pas/ bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje'i mthus de dag gi ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad 'byor
362a5(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun nag gi gnas su ngan 'gro gsum po'i sems can ji snyed gnas pa dag bdag gi rig sngags 'di thos
362a6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa dag ni myur du thob par 'gyur la/ sa bcu pa'i bar du'ang ma thob pa thob
362a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar du'ang phyin par byed pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad brgyad cu'ang rang gi ngang gis 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te
362b1(rgyud 'bum): nyan thos kyi gang zag gang dag gzungs 'di rna bar lan cig thos par gyur tam/ gzungs 'di spyod cing yi ger bris sam/ drang po'i sems kyis chos bzhin du gnas par byed na/
362b2(rgyud 'bum): dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag ma btsal bar rang gi ngang gis thob par 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ri dang / chu klung dang / brag dang / rgya mtsho
362b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po bzhi'i chu ji snyed pa dag kyang g.yo zhing 'khol bar nus so/ / ri rab lhun po nas/ ri khor yug gi bar dag kyang g.yo zhing rdul phran bzhin du 'jig par nus so// de na gnas
362b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can ji snyed pa dag kyang thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par nus so/ / sems can gang dag tshe 'di nyid la smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub par 'dod na/ zhag
362b5(rgyud 'bum): nyishu rtsa gcig gi bar du gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas na gdon mi za bar smon pa rnams kyang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i mtha' nas 'khor
362b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar du'ang sdig pa'i las thams cad ma lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nang dang phyi rol na/ sangs rgyas
362b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / byang chub sems dngapa 'a ji snyed cig bzhugs pa rnams dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po ji snyed
363a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa thams cad kyis kyang mkhyen cing shes par 'gyur ro/ / lha 'am mi gang yang rung ste gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chu klung ngam rgya mtshor zhugs
363a2(rgyud 'bum): khrus byas pa las/ de na gnas pa'i sems can de dag de dag gis lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyur na/ sdig pa'i las dang kha na ma tho ba lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas zhing
363a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag pa dag tu pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur bas/ mngal dang / drod gsher dang / sgo nga las skyes pa'i lus len par mi 'gyur na/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang
363a4(rgyud 'bum): klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa lta smos kyang ci dgos gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag lam du zhugs te 'gro ba'i tshe rlung chen po langs te/ gang zag de'i lus dang /
363a5(rgyud 'bum): spu dang / sgra dang / gos la bus pa'i rlung gang yin pa de'i rdzi phyogs su song ba'i sems can gzhan gyi lus la reg par gyur na/ de dag gi sgrib pa dang sdig pa'i las lci ba thams cad mA
363a6(rgyud 'bum): lus par yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur bas yang ngan 'gro gsum po dag gi rnam par smin pa myong bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur bas na yongs su 'dzin
363a7(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag gi bsod nams dang 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o/ / gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byed pa'i kha nas ji tsam du tshig tu brjod pa byung ba dge'ang rung //
363b1(rgyud 'bum): mi dge'ang rung ste/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang / mu stegs can dang / lha dang / klu dang / 'dre srin thams cad kyis thos par gyur na de dag thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi
363b2(rgyud 'bum): dbyings nyid du 'gyur bas/ de la sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa'i sems bskyed nas bkur sti dang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de
363b3(rgyud 'bum): dag ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gter nyid du rig par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis 'phangs shing gces par mdzad pa'i phyir ro// gang
363b4(rgyud 'bum): bag de ni 'od can gyi lus kyi gter yin par rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis snang bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni byams pa dang snying rje'i
363b5(rgyud 'bum): gter yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di ltar gzungs kyis sems can yongs su skyob par byed pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni dam pa'i chos kyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/
363b6(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kun sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro// gang zag du ni bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sde snod yin par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong rnams rtag par
363b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / gang zag de ni nam mkha'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ rtag par stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis sems can la lta ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni 'jig
364a1(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ lha dang / klu dang / dge ba'i lha rnams rtag par yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni dam pa'i tshig gi
364a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ kha nas gzungs kyi sgra 'byung ba la rgyun chad pa med pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni rtag par gnas pa'i gter yin par rig par bya ste/ 'jigs pa gsum gyi
364a3(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa dag gis gzhig par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ / gang zag de ni rnam par grol ba'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ lha'i bu'i bdud dang mu stegs can rnams kyis bshol bar mi nus
364a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir ro/ / gang zag de ni sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod yin par rig par bya ste/ rtag par gzungs kyis sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad gso ba'i phyir ro// gang zag de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gter
364a5(rgyud 'bum): yin par rig par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su rgyu ba la rang dbang thob pa'i phyir ro// de bas na gang zag de'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod na nams kyang mthar thug
364a6(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su skyo nas tshe ring ba'i smad yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas mtshams yongs
364a7(rgyud 'bum): su dag par bcad de/ gos la sngags kyis btab nas bgo bar bya'o// chu dang / zas dang / spos dang / sman rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste spyod
364b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed na gdon mi za bar tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te chos bzhin du mtshams bcad de chos bzhin du yongs su 'dzin par byed na thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/
364b2(rgyud 'bum): de la mtshams gcad pa'i cho ga ni ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sa la ri mo bris nas mtshams gcad par bya'o// yang na chugatsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
364b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis btab nas phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o/ / yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir gtor nas mtshams gcad par bya'o//
364b4(rgyud 'bum): yang na 'du shes kyis gang du phyin pa tshun chad mtshams su 'gyur ro// yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mtshams gcad par bya'o// yang na tshon sna lnga'i
364b5(rgyud 'bum): skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste phyogs bzhir bskor nas mtshams bcad par bya'o/ / de ltar chos bzhin du 'di yongs su 'dzin par gyur na rang gi ngang gis 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur
364b6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gzungs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang bskal pa tshad med pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba rnams yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang 'dzin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos
364b7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'di 'don pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro byas la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / gang dag sems can sdug
365a1(rgyud 'bum): bsngal gyi bgegs la yongs su 'dren pa'i ched du chos bzhin du 'don pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas ring por mi thogs par mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya bar
365a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ / ci tsam du sems can snang ngo cog gi ched du bzlas brjod byas te/ de dag gi rna lam du grag par byas nas byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur bar byed na/ gang zag de dag yon tan tshad
365a3(rgyud 'bum): med dpag tu med pa dag 'thob par 'gyur bas brjod kyis mi lang ngo / / gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sems dang lus gso sbyong dang / tshul khrims la gnas nas/ sems can thams
365a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sngon gyi las kyi kha na ma tho ba rnams bshags nas bdag nyid kyis bskal pa tshad med pa nas byas pa'i sdig pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs 'thol bshags te/ kha nas gzungs 'di myur du
365a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas nas sgra rgyun chad pa med par byas na/ dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po de dag tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur ro// dbang po rnon po shes rab dang ldan pa sgom pa'i thabs la mkhas
365a6(rgyud 'bum): pa zhig yin na ni sa bcu'o 'bras bu'ang dka' ba med par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa phran tshegs yongs su gnyer ba tsam mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos
365a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po dang / smon lam gyi mthu shing tu zab pa'i phyir dang / gzungs 'di'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu rgya che ba'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis/
365b1(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ yul gang dag na gnod pa byung bar gyur na de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal pos yang dag pa'i chos kyis yul 'dzin cing mi rnams bag yangs su bkod de/ sems can snyams las mi
365b2(rgyud 'bum): gcod cing nyes pa byung ba rnams yongs su bskyabs nas nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus bskyed de/ thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs sngags 'di 'don par byed na/
365b3(rgyud 'bum): yul de'i gnod pa dang bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal bar 'gyur/ 'bru rnams legs shing mi mang po bde bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra dag yang nas
365b4(rgyud 'bum): yang du 'ongs te gtses pas 'bangs mang po mi bde bar gyur tam/ blon po chen pos rku bshams nas log par gyur tam/ rims nad byung bar gyur tama?/ tha na chen byung bar
365b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur tam/ nyi zla rgyu ba nor bar gyur tam de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa byung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas nas de'i phyogs su kha bstan te/
365b6(rgyud 'bum): spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rin po che'i bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas dang skom gyis sems rtse gcig tu mchod par bya'o//
365b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rgyal po des nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du lus dang sems kyis brtson 'grus bskyed de/ gzungs kyi tshig gya nom pa 'di 'don par byed na/ phas kyi dgra rnams rang dul bar gyur nas slar
366a1(rgyud 'bum): log ste so so nas tshul bzhin du yul sbyong zhing / yul yang 'dre bar gnas par byams pa'i sems kyis phan tshun gcig la gcig lta bar 'gyur/ rgyal bu dang blon po
366a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang sri zhu dang drang dkan spyod par 'gyur/ btsun mo dang sras rnams kyang rgyal po la sri zhu dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / 'dre srin rnams kyang yul de srung
366a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing skyong bar 'gyur/ char chu rus bzhin du 'bab cing 'bru rnams legs pas mi mang po rnams kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyim du nad chen ma rungs pa dang phrad par gyur
366a4(rgyud 'bum): tam/ ltas ngan sna tshogs byung bar gyur tam/ 'dre srin dang log pa'i bdud rnams kyis khyim dkrugs par gyur ta ma/ mi ma rungs pa ngag gis klang skur btab nas rku bshams
366a5(rgyud 'bum): te gnod pa byas par gyur tam/ khyim mi che chung rnams phyi nang mi 'dum par gyur na/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mig stong pa'i gzugs byas pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas
366a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ sems rtse gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byas nas gzungs sngags 'di lan sbyong tshang bar bzlas na/ gong du smos pa'i dngos po ngan pa
366a7(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags
366b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar yongs su gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di la ming rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/ rgya cher
366b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa zhes kyang bya'o/ / thogs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes kyang bya'o// sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// tshe bsring ba'i gzungs
366b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes kyang bya'o/ / ngan 'gro yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// las kyi sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
366b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o/ / sems kyi rjes su rang dbang du gyur pa'i gzungs zhes kyang bya'o// sa gong ma rnams las myur du 'da' ba'i gzungs zhes kyang bya ste/ de ltar yongs su
366b5(rgyud 'bum): gzungs par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ngos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming
366b6(rgyud 'bum): lags na/ 'di lta bu'i gzungs bstan pa la mkhas par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i ming ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces
366b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang bya'o/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes kyang bya'o// 'od stong pa'i mig can zhes kyang bya ste// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di'i ming dang /
367a1(rgyud 'bum): gzi rjid dang / mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mtshan yang
367a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i chos kyi snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa yin yang / thugs rje chen po dang smon lam gyi mthus sems can bde bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lus
367a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon du bstan pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor mang po khyad dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha dang / klu rnams kyis gus pas
367a4(rgyud 'bum): bkur sti byas nas brnyas par mi bya'o/ / lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag par mchod par byas te/ sems rtse gcig tu ming nas rjod par byed na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur
367a5(rgyud 'bum): kha na ma tho ba tshad med pa snyed yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
367a6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gal te rin po che sna tshogs phun sum tshogs shing phyug por 'gyur bar 'dod na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i lag la mchod pa bya'o// mi bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs
367a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis gtses par gyur na zhags pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / khong par nad rnams yod par gyur na rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// 'dre gdon thams cad
367b1(rgyud 'bum): gdul bar 'dod na rin po cheshA ral gri thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / lha'i bu'i bdud thams cad 'dul bar 'dod na rdo rje thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra gzhom par
367b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na rdo rje tho ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i gnas thams cad las thar par 'dod na 'jigs pa med pa sbyin pa'i lag la mchod do// mig mi gsal te 'od
367b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mi ldan par gyur na me shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs te bsil bar 'dod na chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// blo thabs 'thon por
367b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / grogs po mdza' bshes dang myur du phrad par 'dod na rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs
367b5(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na lcug ma thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / lus kyi bgegs ma rungs pa bsal bar 'dod na rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du gyur par
367b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na dum pa thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / stag dang / 'phar spyang dang / dom dred dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pa thams cad spong bar 'dod na phub thogs pa'i lag la mchod do//
367b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang dus thams cad du rgyal po'i bgegs las thar par 'dod na dgra sta thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// bu dang / bu mo dang / g.yog 'khor gyi phyir ni shel gyi gdub kor thog pa'i lagal mchod do// yon
368a1(rgyud 'bum): tan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phyir ni pad+mo dkar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / phyogs bcu'i zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye bar 'dod na pad+mo sngon po thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// shes/
368a2(rgyud 'bum): rab chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i me long thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod na pad+ma dmar po thogs pa'i lag la mchod
368a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ / sa'i gter 'byin par 'dod na rin po che za ma tog thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// drang srong gi lam mngon par 'grub par 'dod na sprin sna lnga thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// tshangs par skye
368a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dod na ril ba thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / lha'i gzhal med khang du skye bar 'dod na pad+ma le brgan thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// phyogs gzhan gyi dgra phyir rgol ba bsal bar 'dod na ral
368a5(rgyud 'bum): gri dang mdung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / dge ba'i lha 'dre thams cad dgug par 'dod na rin po che'i mdung thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// lha 'dra thams cad 'khol bar 'dod na thong pa'i 'khar ba thogs
368a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lag la mchod do/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas myur du gshegs nas phyag gis byug par 'dod na bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa'i lag la mchod do// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs mchog dam pa thams cad mngon
368a7(rgyud 'bum): par grub par 'dod na rin po che'i dril bu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / tshig gi spobs pa gya nom pa dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i phyag rgya thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// dge ba'i lha dang klu rnams
368b1(rgyud 'bum): rtag par 'ongs te srung zhing yongs su skyob par 'dod na lcags kyu thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / byams pa dang snying rje sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'dod na 'khar gsil thogs pa'i
368b2(rgyud 'bum): lag la mchod do/ / sems can thams cad kyis rtag par phan tshun gus pas bsnyen bkur byed cing brtse bar sems par 'dod na thal mo sbyar ba'i log la mchod do// skye ba'i skye gnas thams
368b3(rgyud 'bum): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'dod na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang du
368b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas mangs gyi snying por skye bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod na sprul pa'i gzhal med khang thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / mang du thos pa'i shes pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'dod na rin po che'i mdo sde'i
368b5(rgyud 'bum): glegs bam thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / da ltar gyi lus 'dri nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la thug pa'i bar du rtag par byang chub kyi sems las ldog par mi 'gyur bar 'dod na phyir mi ldog pa'i gser
368b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du gshegs nas spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas
368b7(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa'i lag la mchod do/ / shing thog dang 'bru rnams grub par 'dod na rgun 'brum thogs pa'i lag la mchod do// de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i cho ga stong yod kyang / deng mdor bsdus
369a1(rgyud 'bum): nas mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis shin tu yongs su dang ba'i sems kyis gzung 'di zung la
369a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu'i gling du rgya cher yongs su spel nas rgyun mi 'chad par bya'o/ / gzungs 'di khams gsum gyi sems can nad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pas/
369a3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'dis yongs su gsos na mi 'tsho ba gang yang med do// rig sngags chen mo 'dis shing skam po la btab na'ang yal ga dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur
369a4(rgyud 'bum): na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i sems can lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sems can nad kyis thebs pa rnams gsos na mi 'tsho ba'i gnas nges par med do// rigs kyi bu gzungs
369a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i byin gyi rlabs dang mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/ / sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskyed pa ma yin na tha na 'di'i ming tsam
369a6(rgyud 'bum): yang thos par mi 'gyur na/ mngon du mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha dang / mi dang / klu la sogs pa'i 'khor mang po khyed rnams ngas gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas
369a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis rjes su yi rangs par bya'o/ / gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di la skur pa btab par gyur na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag la
369b1(rgyud 'bum): skur pa btab par 'gyur ro/ / gal te gzungs 'di la the tsom dang yid mi ches pa skyes par gyur na/ gang zag de ni phan yon chen po dang gtan dung bral bar gyur pas bskal pa brgya stong snyed du ngan
369b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gror 'khor zhing 'byung ba'i dus med de/ rtag par sangs rgyas kyang mi mthong / chos kyang mi zas/ dge 'dun yang mthong bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// 'khor der 'dus pa'i byang chub
369b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / klu dang / 'dre srin thams cad
369b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di'i bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas/ thams cad kyis rab tu dga' zhing mgu bas bka' yang dag par blangs nas mngon par sgrub par gyur to// de nas byang
369b5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' nyi 'od kyis thugs rje chen po'i gzungs 'dzin pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i ched du rig sngags chen po 'di smras so/ / na mo bud+d+ha gu ra be/ na mo d+harmA ma hA te/ na maHsaM g+hA ya Ni/
369b6(rgyud 'bum): tri pu pi sa tru taM na maH/ rig sngags 'di bton na kha na ma tho ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ bdud spong bar byed/ bgegs rnams sel bar 'gyur bas lan re bton nas sangs rgyas la
369b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lan re bya'o/ / de bzhin du nyin re bzhin dus gsum du rig sngags bzlas nas sangs rgyas la phyag byas na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye ba thams cad du yid du 'ong ba'i mtshan shin
370a1(rgyud 'bum): tu mdzes pa re re'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' rgyu bod kyis kyang rnal 'byor pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs 'ja
370a2(rgyud 'bum): / smras so// sin ti te du soSh+Ta/ a dzA mi te a tuSh+Ta/ sin khi ta pa li tiSh+Ta/ ya mi dzA ta o d+huSh+Ta/ ku la tiSh+Tha khi many+dzu swA hA/ rig sngags 'di lan lnga bzlas nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la

370a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa dag yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang / bgegs thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang / nad ma rungs pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba'i phyir dang / dge ba'i chos thams

370a7(rgyud 'bum): na gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / gang la la zhig byi la'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na byi la'i mgo rus bsregs
370b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i thal ba sa gtsang ma dang bsres te/ 'jim pa la byi la'i gzugs byas nas/ mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gri gtsang ma la brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ dum

370b4(rgyud 'bum): na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te sdig pa dang sbrul gyis zin par gyur na bca' sga'i phye ma la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste rma khar bskus na 'phral du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gal te mi ma rungs
370b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dag gis rku bshams nas gnod pa byas par gyur na sa gtsang ma 'am/ bag zan nam/ spra tshol la pha rol po'i gzugs byas te/ mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du ur mo'i gri la
370b6(rgyud 'bum): lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re brjod de lan re gtubs nas pha rol gyi ming nas brjod de/ sregs zin nas dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du byas na pha rol po dga' zhing nam
370b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho ba'i bar du gus pas bkur zhing byams par 'gyur ro/ / gang dag mi ga nad kyis btab ste mig gi 'bras bu nyams par gyur tam/ mdongs par gyur tam/ mi gsal bar
371a1(rgyud 'bum): myur tam/ ling tog dkar po dang dmar po dag gis khebs te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na/ a nur dang / ba cur dang / s+phu rur 'brum bu re zhib tu btags te/ bzlag
371a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe gtsang sbra bya dgos pas bud med gsar du bu btsas pa dang / khyi dang / phag rnams bsnyen par mi du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nis brjod de sbrang rtsi dkar po dang mi'i 'o ma
371a3(rgyud 'bum): dang sbyar nas mig la bsku bar bya'o/ / 'o ma de'ang bu khye'u btsas pa'i nu zho rung gi/ bu mo btsas pa'i nu zho ni mi rung ngo // sman de skyur zin nas kyang mig stong pa'i gzugs kyi mdun du

371a6(rgyud 'bum): ste lus la bgos na sos par 'gyur ro/ / gal te sbrul gyis zin par gyur na gang zin pa'i mi de'i rna spabs blangs nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste rma khar glan na sos

371b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis btab ste cig car blud na sos par 'gyur ro/ / sman dbang bud med kyi drung du bskol bar mi bya'o// 'o langs kyi gdon gyis ta nas spyan ring dun par gyur na gu rgal la lan
371b2(rgyud 'bum): shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste bsregs te snar 'dug par bya'o/ / yang na ri bong gi rtug pa'i ril bu bdun blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas mig tu bcug na
371b3(rgyud 'bum): sos par 'gyur te/ sha dang / chang dang / dku ba rnam pa lnga dang / tshogs ngan pa rnams bsrung dgos so// yang na ba zla dang / yungs kar dang / lan tshwa la lan nyi shu rtsa
371b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig sngags kyis btab ste nad pa'i khri'i drung du bsregs na/ gdon de'i lus 'jig par 'gyur bas 'dug pa'i thugs mi thub ste 'byer bar 'gyur ro// gal te gzhogs phyed na
371b5(rgyud 'bum): zhing rna ba dang sna subs par gyur ta ma/ rkang lag sdud mi nus par gyur na ru rta til mar gyi nang du bskol te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas lus la bskus na gtan du 'tsho bar
371b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yang na ba'i mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste lus la bskus na'ang sos par 'gyur ro// gal te bu btsa' dka' bar gyur na til mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags
371b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis btab ste/ bud med sbrum ma'i lte ba dang mo mtshan la bskus na myur du btsa' bar 'gyur ro// bud med sbrum ma gang dag mngal du bu shi bar gyur na gi'u si srang gcig chu phul ngo'i nang du bskos
372a1(rgyud 'bum): te phul gang lus pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas blung na/ sdug bsngal zhing na ba med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sha ma 'byung du mi btub par gyur na'ang sbran
372a2(rgyud 'bum): bdi bathungs na phan par 'gyur ro/ / glo bur du snying ka gzer te mi bzod par gyur na de ni ro nyul gyi gzer thabs zhes bya ba yin pas kun du ru dang pog dkar po ma grubs pa la lam nyi shu rtsa gcig

372b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis btab nas phul phyed 'thungs na phan par 'gyur ro/ / mig tshag por gyur tam/ mig tu sha lhag byung bar gyur tam/ ling tog byung bar gyur na ke'u khe tshe'i shing gi lo ma brdungs te
372b2(rgyud 'bum): btsir ba'i khu ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ de'i nang du khar ba'i dong tsha gcig mtshan gcig spangs nas yang lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste mig tu blugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// /
372b3(rgyud 'bum): gal te mtshan mo 'byung 'jug gi tshe 'jigs sngangs nas mi bde bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas nas mgul du btags
372b4(rgyud 'bum): na 'jigs shing sngangs pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jigs pa dang bral ba kho nar ma zad kyi/ bsod nams kyang thob la sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gal te khyim
372b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du ltas ngan byung bar gyur na bal po se'u shing gi yal ga blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te/ mgo mjug gnyis kar mar dang zho bskas nas sngags lan re bzlas
372b6(rgyud 'bum): shing re re bsregs te stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ de'ang sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya dgos so// shu dag dkar po blangs
372b7(rgyud 'bum): nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na g.yul ngor 'thab pa dang 'brel ba'i gtam smra ba'i gnas thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ke'u khi
373a1(rgyud 'bum): tshe'i shing gi lo ma 'am yal ga'ang rung ste/ dum bur gtungs nas mgo mjug gnyis kar ba mar yang dag pa dang / sbrang rtsi dkar po dang bzho bskus te sngags
373a2(rgyud 'bum): lan re bzla zhing dum bu re re bsreg pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bya'o/ / nyin gcig la dus gsum du bya zhing dus gcig la'ang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te zhag bdun tshang bar gyur na sngags mkhan de
373a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gis mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / gdon mthu bo che gdul bar 'dod na lung tang la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sngags kyis btab ste/ bu ram dang sbrang rtsi bskus nas 'phags pa

373b1(rgyud 'bum): mdun du sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis btab nas lus la btags na/ de dag nam 'tsho'i bar du gcig la gcig dga' zhing byams pa dang bkur bar 'gyur ro// lo tog dang 'bras bu
373b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams la srin bu zhugs te za bar gyur na sa 'am/ thal ba 'am/ bye ma gtsang ma blangs te lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab nas zhing gi phyogs bzhir gtor na srin bu rnams 'gyes par
373b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / chu gtsang ma la sngags kyis btab ste 'bras bu'i ljon shing la gtor na srin bu 'bras bu la za ba'i thugs mi thub bo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ sha ra ma hA sha ra/ tu lu tu lu ma hA
373b4(rgyud 'bum): lu/ oM ku ma ha ni sha ba/ oM ku ma ha ni sha ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la la zhig 'bru dkon pa'i gnas su phyin te/ mu ge byung nas zan chad par gyur na khyed kyi mig

373b6(rgyud 'bum): snod bkang nas khyer te 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te khyim na gnas pa'i tshe dgos par gyur na snod gtsang ma spyong pa mdun du bzhag nas mig btsums te kha chus bkang nas lcang ma'i lcug ma
373b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / rnga yab dang / lhung bzed la gtor bar bya'o// chus gtor rin nas mig btsums te gzungs 'di lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas na rang gi ngang gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas snod
374a1(rgyud 'bum): kun gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur bas blangs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du bza' bar bya ste/ de ltar na 'di'i mthu stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// zas zos/
374a2(rgyud 'bum): zin nas mig btsums te sa ra kha zhes brjod nas zas kyi lhag ma'ang spang bar bya'o// zas zos te ltor ming nas kyang myur du 'ju bar gyur pas stobs dang ldan zhing bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/
374a3(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i gzungs ni 'di yin te/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na maHa ngan
374a4(rgyud 'bum): ni ye/ u ka tsi du uka tsi du/ ma ti la li la/ la lu te na mi ti na mi swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'dzin pas phyogs bzhi nas rgyun chad pa'i ri'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor byas nas mtshams bcad
374a5(rgyud 'bum): de lus bsrungs nas/ 'khar ba'i lhung bzed chung ngu zhig khron pa'i chu gtsang mas bkang ste mdun du bzhag nas gzungs sngags bzlas na gdon mi za bar skar ma gsal ba gcig 'ong bar
374a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bas/ 'ong ba'i tshe 'jigs pa mi bskyed par sems bde bar mnyam par bzhag nas sems rtse gcig tu gzungs sngags 'don par byed na/ dbang po rno zhing shes rab dang ldan par
374a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bas mi shes pa ci'ang med par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi chos kyang mi rtogs pa ci'ang med par 'gyur ro// thos pa rgyud pa'i tshe skar ma mchog tu gsal ba zhig lhung
374b1(rgyud 'bum): bzed kyi chu'i nang du 'ong bar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ / // byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher
374b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs bam po gnyis pa/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gus pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan
374b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngon bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis/ deng bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung
374b4(rgyud 'bum): bstan par mdzad pa dang / bdag snying rje chen po bskyed nas sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba dang / bcing ba mtha' dag gcad pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur
374b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bzhed pa lags pas/ deng bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par 'tshal te/ dus tha ma'i sems can rnams yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'di thos pa'i byin gyi
374b6(rgyud 'bum): rlabs kyi mthus de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang bral ba nas bde ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dus lnga brgya tha ma la yul lam/ grong ngam//
374b7(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gang yang rung ba dag tu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pas rtag par gdugs mtshan lan drug tu chos bzhin
375a1(rgyud 'bum): du yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog cing 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' drin
375a2(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran zhing gzo ba'i slad du rtag par rjes su 'brangs nas/ gang zag de dag yongs su srung bar bgyid cing spong bar mi bgyid pas 'dre srin thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags
375a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / gzhan yang tshe rabs kyi sgrib pa lci ba thams cad kyang dus gcig tu yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo thams cad kyang myur du yongs
375a4(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i sems can rnams ni phal cher sdig pa'i dri ma lhun stug
375a5(rgyud 'bum): cing bsod nams chung bas yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis na'ang 'dre srin dag gis gnod pa bgyid pas/ deng bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams la
375a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya cher sman par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams la bde bar bgyi ba dang / lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i ched du gzungs kyi chos bshad par 'tshal te/ bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i
375a7(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi bar du gzungs kyi chos 'di la brten cing mchod pa bgyis lags so/ / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bar
375b1(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i rgyus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par brnyes pa lags pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
375b2(rgyud 'bum): sems rtse gcig tu yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'don cing klog pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na de dag tshe 'di nyid la tshig gi spobs pa myur zhing thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /
375b3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab dang spobs pa mngon par rtogs par 'gyur pas/ lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po'i nang du mchog tu 'gyur/ gang dag thos pa rnams kyang rab tu dga' zhing thams cad kyis spyi bo btud de phyag bgyid par
375b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun mthong bar 'gyur/ gang ci smras kyang rung ste thams cad kyis yid ches pas nyan par 'gyur lags te/ de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas
375b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu lags te/ rang nyid kyi mthu ni ma lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis 'di ltar lha
375b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / mi dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa de dag thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba dang / las kyi lam yongs su sbyang ba'i ched du smras pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ ngas kyang deng
375b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab nas/ khyod byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la sogs pa'i sems rnam pa sna tshogs las gtan du ldog par mi 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan
376a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te/ 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad ma
376a2(rgyud 'bum): mchis pa nas yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung bas/ ri bopo Ta la la mchis pa'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos bdud kyi 'khor mang po dang 'grogs nas bdag gi chos dkrug cing //
376a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi tshig rnams mngon par mi 'grub par bgyi ba bshams pa la/ de'i tshe bdag gis yum zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs 'dis bdud mang po rnams btul nas thams cad bdag so sor gyes par
376a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas/ gzungs 'di'i mthu bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa dang snying rje chen pos sems can thams
376a5(rgyud 'bum): cad la phan gdags shing / lha dang mi rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong
376a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan stong dang ldan pa'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs lus po che'i sngags 'di smras so/ / na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga d+hA ya/ ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha sa/ na ma aR+tha
376a7(rgyud 'bum): ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prAp+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi pu la bi ma na su pra tiSh+Thi ta saM g+hA ya/ sU r+ya
376b1(rgyud 'bum): shata sa ha sra a tri ta ri ka pra b+hA a ba b+hA si ta mUrta ya ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kuN+Da la a laM kA ra d+hA ra Ni/ b+ha ga ba te pad+ma pA Na ye/ sarba lo ka a pA sha ma nA ya/ bi bi d+ha mu kha sa ma be sha biSh+Ta sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya
376b2(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ oM b+hAr b+hu ba/ ma hA lo ka ka ra na/ nA tha ma sid d+he mi ri b+ha drA bi nA sha ka rA ya/ rA ga dwe sha mo ha dz+wa la sha ma ka/ sha sa ka/ sa mA shwA sa na ka ra/ rak+Sha sarba pA pa durga ta pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma
376b3(rgyud 'bum): pa da na ka ra/ he ha ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da pad+ma lo ki saM b+hU ta/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka dza TA mu ku TA laM kr-i ta sha rI raM/ ma Ni ka na ka sha ta/ badz+ra bai DUR+YA laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ a ma tA b+hA si na ka ma lA laM kr-i ta pra b+ha ra Ne/ la ri tsa
376b4(rgyud 'bum): na ma hA du na/ na ra ni ra sha ta sa ha sra/ a b+hi la shI ta kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/ bi d+ha ma bi d+ha ma/ bi nA shA ya bi nA shA ya/ ma hA ya na tr-i kle sha ka ba te/ a ba ba d+ha bi bi d+ha satwA/ saM sA ra tsA ra ka pra ma tha na/
376b5(rgyud 'bum): pu ru Sha pad+ma/ pu ru Sha nA ga/ pu ru Sha sA ga ra/ du ru Sha si ha/ bi ra bi ra sha ya/ su yan+ta su yan+ta/ ba ra ba ra/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra shA sa ya pra shwA sa ya/ gi ri gi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/
376b6(rgyud 'bum): mu ru mu ru/ mu yu mu yu/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsu/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ ru d+hu ru d+hu/ gA ya g+hA ya/ gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra ha sa pra ha sa/ bi bi d+ha kle sha bA sa na/ ma ma bdag ming 'di
376b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba/ s+ya ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ du ru ti du ru ti/ ma hA man+ta du ru ti/ ka ra Na sha ta pa ra si ka b+ha ba bi sa na/ sha ma ka ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da swA hA/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
377a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rin po che'i bkod pa'i khar ba'i yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu/
377a2(rgyud 'bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen popa 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi lha'i gnas kyi bar dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to// lha rnams kyis kyang rin po
377a3(rgyud 'bum): che'i me tog gi char mngon par phab po/ / 'og min gyi lha dang dbang phyug chen po rnams kyang g.yo zhing mi bde bas shin tu 'jigs shing sngangs par gyur to// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'dre
377a4(rgyud 'bum): gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong ba'i sgra skad chen po phyung nas shar nub tu 'byer zhing bros kyang gang du 'gro ba'i gnas kyang rig cing rnyed par ma gyur to/ / de nas sprul pa'i byang
377a5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpas 'khor mang po rnams dang / 'dre srin ma rungs pa thams cad la gang gis bdag gi rig sngags las 'da' zhing rjes su 'brang bar mi byed na/ de dag gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag
377a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu na zhing 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms shing rgya mtsho chen po skyem par byed do// lha ma yin gyi dmag rnams rnam par bcom nas pham par byed do//
377a7(rgyud 'bum): yul 'khor rnams dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / zong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar byed do// 'dre gdon dang / nad dang / sman gyi dug dang / srin bu'i dug dang / log pa dang / ma rungs
377b1(rgyud 'bum): mi rnams pham zhing rab tu zhi bar byed do/ / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams btul nas rab tu dul bar byed do zhes smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i pho brang rab tu dga' ba na bzhugs
377b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu btsun pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas pa tshad med pa thams cad kyis
377b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang dus gcig tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig
377b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dis ni sgrib pa'i ri bo shin tu rgya che ba dag kyang rnam par 'joms par bgyid pas/ gang la la zhig nyan tam/ klog gam/ 'don tam/ yongs su 'dzin par bgyid dam/ mthong bar gyur na
377b5(rgyud 'bum): de dag la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nag po ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang gang la la zhig rtag par nang par langs nas gus pa'i sems kyis yum
377b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi gzungs 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig klog gam 'don par bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid rtag par de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su srung bar bgyid cing / yongs
377b7(rgyud 'bum): su skyob par bgyid do/ / gang la la zhig smon lam rgya chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chen po thams cad myur du 'grub par 'tshal na/ gcig pu gnas dben par mchis nas/ byang chub
378a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bgyi zhing / gzhan yid la mi bgyi bar rtag par gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na sman lam rnams
378a2(rgyud 'bum): mi 'grub pa gang yang mamachis lags so/ / gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi snying drung du sdug par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad du ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so// mchis kyang rung ma mchis kyang rung ste/
378a3(rgyud 'bum): rtag par sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs par 'du shes nye bar gzhag par gyur na/ gang zag nges skye ba'i gnas bye ba brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa kun tu bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa de dag thams cad
378a4(rgyud 'bum): zhu byung bar 'gyur/ gang zag de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gi bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
378a5(rgyud 'bum): phyug dang dus gcig tu skye bar 'gyur/ btsun pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par spros sam me tog snyim pa gang tsam byang chub sems dpa' spun ras gzigs dbang
378a6(rgyud 'bum): byug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mngon par gtor nas/ gzungs 'di len nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yon tan dang snying rje chen po'i choso nyid 'a thob par 'gyur/
378a7(rgyud 'bum): gang zag de 'jig rten na mthar gyis mthu chen po myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i gdong dang / mig dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad la rnam par lta ste//
378b1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug myur du lus mngon sum du bstan nas rnal 'byor pas mthong bar 'gyur bas/ dri ma dang bral nas sa dang /
378b2(rgyud 'bum): po dang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur bas/ 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar bgyid par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
378b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa bzhin du 'chi bar 'gyur bas/ tshe rabs thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur/ kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyang zhu zhing byang bar 'gyur lags so//
378b4(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal ba des rtag par dpyid zla rab dang / dbyar zla 'bring po dang / ston zla tha chung tshes gcig nas/ tshes bcu'i bar du gso sbyong dang tshul khrims la gnas nas gos dkar po gtsang
378b5(rgyud 'bum): ma bgos te/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ ring bsrel gyi mdun du tsan dan dkar po'i 'ji ba las dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ me tog dang spos
378b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtor nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar spos kyis bdugs te zhugs mar gtams nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
378b7(rgyud 'bum): gus pa'i sems bskyed do/ / rtag par gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ chos bco lnga'i nub mo byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid dkyil 'khor gyi nang du
379a1(rgyud 'bum): mchi bar 'gyur bas/ rnal 'byor pas mthong ma thag tu mtshams mchis pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa tsa mchis pa thams cad zhu byang nas/ lus dang / dag
379a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / yid kyi las thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa'i mthu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa'i mthu dang / khyad par du 'phags
379a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ye shes kyi sa'ang 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te dgung char dbab par 'tshal bar gyur na/ gnam du bltas nas gzungs 'di stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na
379a4(rgyud 'bum): zil mngar gyi char dus bzhin du 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ / dog sa la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar 'don par bgyid na 'bru rnam pa sna tshogs legs par 'gyur lags
379a5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rtsang po dang chab mig bskams pa'i drung du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ chab 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur lags sa so// zo nad kyis thebs pa thams cad kyi
379a6(rgyud 'bum): mdun du rang gi sug pa lag pa la sngags 'dis lan bdun bsngags te sug pas bya bas na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so/ / gang dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
379a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyis na yang dag pa'i dran pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ / gang dag bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i mdun du de'i gdong la bltas nas gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis
379b1(rgyud 'bum): na bkres skom gyis nyen pa'i 'du shes ngan pa thams cad rab tu bsal bar 'gyur lags so/ / gang dag mtshams dgum par 'tshal na rdzing chab kyi nang du zhugs te/ chos bzhin du gzungs 'di
379b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi khar btags na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du gdon bgegs ci'ang ma mchis te/ mtshams bkum pa nyid du gyur nas yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur
379b3(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs gcig bzhin du gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i bsod nams brjod
379b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis mi lang bas rig sngags 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang skye bo mang po kun gyis byams shing bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur/ smon lam rnams
379b5(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/ / gang dag bdud gdul bar 'tshal na yum gyi gzungs 'di bzlas te/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags
379b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di lan re bzlas shing lan cig bsreg par byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na yongs su bsal bar 'gyur lags so/ / gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'tshal na rtag par
379b7(rgyud 'bum): lung ma'i lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khar bcas na thams cad kyis byams shing bkur bar 'gyur lags so// gang dag bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes
380a1(rgyud 'bum): rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu dag srang gcig phye mar btags te/ chab mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar nas ril bu bgyis te/ yum gyi gzungs 'dis mtshan ma gsum po 'di lta
380a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ drod dang / dud pa dang / 'od byung gi bar du sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o// mtshan ma de dag thob nas gdugs re bzhin sman gyi ril bu tsam bdun bdun 'tshal nas snying khar yang byug
380a3(rgyud 'bum): bapar bgyi ste/ de ltar zhag brgya'i bar du 'tshal na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur bas/ bdag nyid kyi lus bsrung ba'i slad du gdugs re zhing yum gyi gzungs 'di lan
380a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyang bgyi 'o/ / de la dang po byang chub sems dpa'i mig stong dang ldan pa'i lus kun tu sdug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar langs nas
380a5(rgyud 'bum): 'greng ste lus drang por bsrang nas rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ rkang pa g.yas pa cung zad cig dgug par bgyi'o// sngar su ga pa lag pa g.yon pa thur du brkyang nas gung mo dang srin lag
380a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bkug ste/ lag mthil du bzhag la mthe'u chung dang / mdzub mo dang / mthe bong ni yin par brkyang ste/ lag mthil bkan nas gyen du phyogs par bgyi'o//
380a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i rjes la sug pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas gung mo bkug ste phrag pa dang mnyam par bgyis nas lag mthil mdun du blta bar dgyi ste/ 'di ni lus kun sdud pa'i
380b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o/ / gal te bdud dang mu stegs can log par lta ba'i thibs po bcom nas yang dag pa'i lam du gzud par 'tshal na/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags lan
380b2(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas gdon mi 'tshal bar smon pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ na mo ran+ta tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya
380b3(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a bat+ta a bat+ta/ pa ri bat+te/ e hi a hi swA hA/ de la gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang
380b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ snga ma'i lus kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya bzhin du thal mo sbyar te snying khar bzhag nas sor mo lnga bsnol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas
380b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa mnan nas mdzub mo gnyis drang por bsgrengs te rtse mo phrad par bgyis la/ mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshogs pa dang po la mnan nas cung zad cig dbye bar bgyi ste/
380b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'di bgyis par gyur na bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa'i las ci mchis pa thams cad dus
380b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ slad ma'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag khye bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par
381a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par byang chub tu nye ba'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos glags btsal ba dang / kun 'dzin gyi gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di mdzad pas shin tu bde ba'i bsam gtan dang
381a2(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin brnyes par gyur to/ / gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ sarba d+hA ra Ni/ maN+Da la/ e hi e hI/ pra b+hA shud d+ha/ satA pa ya swA hA/ de la gsum
381a3(rgyud 'bum): ba byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
381a4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad la mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshogs gnyis pa'i steng du bkan par
