393b6(rgyud 'bum): ni'adi lta ste/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha/ d+harmaHsaM g+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba le ko te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ na mo badz+ra pA Na ye/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si bi si bi/ kA ya si bi/ pa la sha ba la sha ni swA hA/ rig sngags kyi
393b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'dis ni log par lta ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char ba'i tshe dang / gdugs kyi gung dang /
394a1(rgyud 'bum): gdugs bas pa'i tshe lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bye brag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam
394a2(rgyud 'bum): du'ang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan du 'bral zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin
394a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo la byugs te/ khyod pa'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig ces bka' stsal par 'gyur/ tshe 'di nyid la'ang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'dre gdon dag
394a4(rgyud 'bum): gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha na ma tho ba yongs su skyong ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags
394a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun du phul te sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo // de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil
394a6(rgyud 'bum): du bkug ste/ sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du bcangs nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya ni gdugs gcig
394a7(rgyud 'bum): la dus gsum du bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ dus gcig gi tshe'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang / shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags
394b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje bskyed par gyur na kha na ma tho ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsregs nas/ tshe 'das pa'i rjes la'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing / sangs
394b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang ye shes mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/
394b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce la sogs pa bro 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing / lus kyi nang thams cad kyang yongs su
394b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byang bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi las dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so// gal te than pa byung bar gyur na til 'bru yog po'i 'bras bu'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa
394b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing du bor na dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so/ / gal te char ches na 'bras sA lu brngos pa'i me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya
394b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing du bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams
394b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sor mo bsnol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te/ khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis
395a1(rgyud 'bum): na 'khon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dral bar 'gyur lags so/ / cho ga 'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du chos nyi shu dgu'i mtshan
395a2(rgyud 'bum): mo tsan dan dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par pog por thogs te/ a ka ru
395a3(rgyud 'bum): bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te skyil mo krung bcas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste/
395a4(rgyud 'bum): lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lags so// gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu dang gcig tu bsres
395a5(rgyud 'bum): te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/ pho gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan cig sngags kyis btab ste zhugs su 'dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis la/ gdugs re la'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang
395a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyis na/ slad kyis ci bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di
395a7(rgyud 'bum): lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa lag pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yas pa ba kan te lag ngar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du banag par bgyis te/ sug pa lag pa
395b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ myur du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
395b2(rgyud 'bum): sgo thob par 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang shing kun dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / ta ta pa'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi nang du bor te bsreg par bgyi'o// 'di dag bsregs
395b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/ dkyil 'khor ram/ gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re bsregs pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar
395b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyis nas spos dang me tog dag gis rig sngags la mchod pa bgyis na/ ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis ma thub pa dag sngags
395b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dis btab na thams cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ / gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams
395b6(rgyud 'bum): cad rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so/ / bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal yid bzhin du 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs re bzhin rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa
395b7(rgyud 'bum): dgung bdun du tshang bar gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i chos kyi 'dun sar chos ston pa na/ klu
396a1(rgyud 'bum): mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po rnams myong bar mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can mang po rnams sdug
396a2(rgyud 'bum): bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa'i dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las/ de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ri ba gcig phul
396a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / bdag gis ni de la yum gyi gzungs ladi rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar gyur lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis rig sdug 'di yongs su 'dzin pa
396a4(rgyud 'bum): ngag la phan gdags shing bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras so/ / bi ma le/ ma hA bi ma le/ u ha le/ ma hA u ha le/ hu ma le/ ma hA hu ma le/ sa ha le/ ma hA sa ha le/ tsi le te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu
396a5(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyog gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ bdag kyang rtag par de dag gi
396a6(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'brang ste yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig brel zhing 'phongs par gyur tam/ pha rol gyi dgras gtses sam/
396a7(rgyud 'bum): chotshom rkun dag gis gnod pa bgying bar gyur na// tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re ba zla zhing mdung pa re re mdud nas dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par bgyi'o//
396b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang sug pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe'u chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad
396b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas na thams cad rang gyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ / sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ri la gnas te chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po'i
396b3(rgyud 'bum): yul na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' zhig 'tshal zhing / dge ba'i sems ci'ang ma mchis pa mthong ba dang / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing
396b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can gdul ba'i ched du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/ mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pa'i sa bdud gdul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzungs mngon par
396b5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa dang / de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas/ nongs pa 'thol bshags te phyag bgyis pa dang / bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgyas
396b6(rgyud 'bum): btab pas/ de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas
396b7(rgyud 'bum): sug pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ snying khar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis snol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ cho ga
397a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung ste/ thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po
397a2(rgyud 'bum): dag sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyob pa'i 'khor lo ba phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal na 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par bgyi
397a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag ngar gyi tshogs dang lag mthil ni dbye bar bgyi'o// sor mo rnams kyi bar yang tshon gang tsam mchis par bgyi ste/ 'di ni byang chub
397a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su bzlas pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar
397a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga
397a6(rgyud 'bum): car bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag go/ / de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga car kha sbub nas pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du mnan par bgyi'o// 'di ni 'gog pa'i
397a7(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'dis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba
397b1(rgyud 'bum): lags pas/ phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do// rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du ma gyur na/ gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa
397b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas su mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig sngar mngon sum du bzhugs pa yid la bgyis te/ gdugs mtshan gcig la dus drug
397b3(rgyud 'bum): tu 'thol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par
397b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur lags so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcang
397b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bong khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas/ lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag pa g.yas pa'i chang pa'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas//
397b6(rgyud 'bum): sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni phan tshun du brgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM ku tsi ku tsi/ ku tsi ya ri/ tsa ri tsa ri/ tsa ri le swA hA/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam
397b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi khyab pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing / snying khar phyag rgya lan re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad
398a1(rgyud 'bum): tshang bar gyur na/ sems la ci dang ci 'dod pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rngu 'di bgyis nas sngags
398a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems stong par mi 'gyur bas/ gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i tshe g.yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis
398a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur//
398a4(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyang rtag tu nye bar mchis nas rim gro bgyid cing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas
398a5(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / 'dre gdon sde brgyad po dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil
398a6(rgyud 'bum): du bkug nas/ sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcangs te snying khar gzhag go// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtang nas
398a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo phan tshun du brgyu bar bgyi'o/ / sngags ni 'di lta ste/ na mo nI la kar+N+Na/ na ma Ar+ya sha pa ta swA hA/ na ma Ar+ya sha la swA hA/ e hi e hi swA hA/ rigs
398b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs dang phyag rgya 'di len tam/ 'dzin tem/ klog gam/ 'don par bgyid na/ myur du tshe rabs bdun tshun chad
398b2(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur ro// dug gis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur/
398b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du rig sngags 'di 'don par bgyid
398b4(rgyud 'bum): na 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don pa'i drung du nye bar mchis nas/ rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
398b5(rgyud 'bum): la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na skud pa dkar po la sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa re re mdud de/ mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshang bar
398b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyis nas de'i mgul du btagA na de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so/ / gal te yul gang du ltas ngan pa dang rims nad byung ste/ yul mi mang du gum par gyur na/ rgyal
398b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i kun dga' ra ba dang rdzing dag tu pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ pad+ma re re la sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor te bas par bsregs na/ rims nad rab
399a1(rgyud 'bum): tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas
399a2(rgyud 'bum): nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bob rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni brkyang nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i
399a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha spusbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag
399a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya 'di bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal rnams
399a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos sdig phun
399a6(rgyud 'bum): sum tshogs par bgyis pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gis ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rab de re re'ang bskal pa re re mngon par byung bar gyur na/ gang
399a7(rgyud 'bum): zag de dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan du 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na'ang / /
399b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngango tshos bco lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkram ste phyag rgya mdud nas/ rig
399b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/ de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags
399b3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng ste
399b4(rgyud 'bum): sngar sug pa g.yon pas rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ / de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag ngar gyi steng du btsor
399b5(rgyud 'bum): nas lus po che'i sngags lan bdun 'don par bgyis na/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na'ang dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra
399b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar mi bgyi'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung
399b7(rgyud 'bum): gisen mo'i steng du reg par bgyi'o/ / de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yin par bsgrengs te/ lag ngar gyi tshigs
400a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ drang srong 'bur te 'chi bdag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar
400a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur lags so/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sug pa gnyis nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te/ lag ngar gyi tshigs
400a3(rgyud 'bum): / sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM a ru li te li/ lo ka bi do ya/ sarba ya dru/ pra marda na ka rA ya/ bu ru swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
400a4(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
400a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa thogs
400a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ / // zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba
